A.lyrics:
1. Asihambe labelusi, siyembona uMsindisi, ozalelwe eBetlehema, oyiNkosi yethu.
2. Sihlabele lezithunywa, simdumisâ`osemgwembeni siyibonge leyoNgane, ezalelwe thina.
3. Asihambe lamakhosi, sinikele kanye lawo, konkâ`okuhle esilakho, kiyo leyoNgane.
4. Asibonge njengoNina, loJosef â`umondli wayo, siyithande leyoNgane, enguMthandi wethu. 5. Inhliziyo zethu zonke, siyazipha wena Jesu,
zemukele zibâ`ngezakho, zikuthande njalo. 6. Sibusise Ngane enhle, usinikâ`uxolo lonke,
usilondoloze Jesu, ngobumnandi bakho.
A.title: Asihambe labelusi

A.lyrics:
1. Asihambe lathi, labelusi, siyembona khona, uMsindisi ozalelwe khonale, eBetlehema.
Chorus: S. B&S. A&T.
Sihlabele sithi:
Uze â lwe, uze â lwe, Aleluya â Aleluya 
All: EBethlehema
2. Makholwa jabulani, nanguMsindisi,
onguyâ`iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. 3. Sihlabele labelusi simdumise,
yiyo iNkosi, yamakhosi.
4. Izithunywa zihlabelela, ozelweyo,
Zwanini kuyahlatshelwa, izingoma. 5. Hambani Eye, esitebeleni,
lingesabi, kuzelwâ`uMsindisi. 6. Wozani sihambe, makholwa, simbonge uKristu, oyiNkosi.7. Sithabe sijabule, ngozelweyo, sithole uxolo lomusa, lokulunga. 8. INkosi elamandla, ivelâ`ezulwini,
Asikhuleke kuyo, ngokuthaba konke. 9. Uzakuthiwa, nguMeluleki,
INkosi ilathi, isibusisile.
A.title: Asihambe lathi labelusi

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Asithokoze, sithabe,
ngoba iWundlu, elisindisayo,

selifikile, aleluya, selifikile, aleluya. (2x) 1. Kwathi, uJesâ`esezelwâ`Betlehema,
kwafika izazi zasempumalanga. 2. Zabuza, eJerusalema zathi:
Ungaphi ozelweyo oyiNkosi yakoJuda na? 3. Zathi, siyibonile inkanyezi yakhe,
kwelasempumalanga size ukumkhonza. 4. Abapristi, lababhali babantu bathi:
EBetlehema laseJudiya!
(c/f Mika 5,1; Mat 2,1-6) P. T. Ndlovu
A.title: Asithokoze, sithabe

A.lyrics:
1. Asiyâ`eBetlehema, sibingelele sithi:
E! Mntwana woPhezulu, E! Mntwana kaMariya. (2x) Bayethe Jesu, Bayethe Jesu!
2. Sikhonza ngani kuyo? Ngomlomo wodwa yini? Hayi, nanzâ` inhliziyo, sezingezakho Mntwana (2x) Bayethe Jesu, Bayethe Jesu!
3. Ndodana yoPhezulu, Ndodana kaMariya,
mawube nguMsindisi, wabantu bonke Mntwana. (2x) Bayethe Jesu, Bayethe Jesu!
A.title: Asiyâ`eBetlehema

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Abantwana bamaHeberu, bendlalâ`impahla zabo endleleni,
bememeza besithi: Hosanâ`eNdodaneni kaDavida, ubusisiwe oza ngebizo leNkosi.
1. Tshayani izandla lina zizwe zonke, hlokomelani iNkosi ngelizwi lokuhalalisa. 2. Ngoba iNkosi enguPhezukonke iyesabeka,
iyiNkosi enkulâ`ephezu komhlaba wonke. 3. Ifaka abantu ngaphansi kwethu,
lezizwe ngaphansi kwenyawo zethu. 4. Isikhethela ilifa lethu,
udumo lukaJakobe amthandayo. 5. INkosi iyenyuka ngokuhlokoma,
iNkosi ngokukhala kwetolopito. 6. Hubelani iNkosi, hubani,
hubelani iNkosi yethu, hubani.
7. Ngoba iNkosi inguMbusi womhlaba wonke,
hubani ihubo.
8. INkosi iyabusa izizwe,
iNkosi ihlezi esihlalweni sayo sobukhosi. 9. Izikhulu zabantu zibuthene,
lesizwe sikaNkulunkulu kaAbrahama.
10. Ngoba izihlangu zomhlaba ngezikaNkulunkulu,
ophakeme kakhulu.

(c/f Mat 21,9) B. Ndlovu
A.title: Abantwana bamaHeberu

A.lyrics:
1. Abantwana bamaHeberu, bephethâ`ingatsha zamalala, bahlangabeza iNkosi, bememeza besithi: Hosana kweliphezulu.
2. Umhlaba ngoweNkosi lakho konke okugcwele kiwo, ilizwe labobonke abahlala kilo.
3. Ngoba yawusekela phezu kwezinlwandle, yawumisa phezu kwemifula.
4. Phakamisani lina masango izinhloko zenu, lani minyango yaphakade,
phakamani ukuba iNkosi yobukhosi ingene.
5. Ingubani liNkosi yobukhosi na? YiNkosi elamandla, eliqhawe, yiNkosi eliqhawe ekulweni.
6. Phakamisani lina masango izinhloko zenu, lani minyango yaphakade, phakamani ukuba iNkosi yobukhosi ingene.
7. Ingubani liNkosi yobukhosi na?
INkosi yamaxuku, yiyo eyiNkosi yobukhosi.
B. Ndlovu
A.title: Abantwana bamaHeberu

A.lyrics:
1. Abantwana beJerusalema bahlangabeza iNkosi uKristu, bephethe amalala behlokoma besithi:
Chorus: Hosana, hosana, hosana
hosana hosana, hosana kweliphezulu (2x)
2. Abantwana...,
bendlala izembatho zabo bedumisa besithi.
3. Abantwana... ,
behlokoma bedumisâ`iNkosi behlabela besithi.


4. Abantwana...,
behubela ukuvuka kwakhe, behlokoma besithi.
A.title: Abantwana behlokoma

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Aleluya ivukilâ`iNkosi (3x) Aleluya, iNkosi elamandla.
1. Pho bangaphi, ababeyiklolodela, ngobâ`ukukhanya sekuphumelâ`ezweni.
2. Siza Nkosi, singakuthandabuzi, lokhâ`ukukhanya sekuphumelâ`ezweni.
3. Hlala lathi sitshiseke njalo, zivuthâ`inhliziyo ngomlilo wothando.
4. Nkosi thela kithâ`intokozwâ`enkulu, sijabule ekukholweni kwethu.
5. Makholwa asijabulenini, ngobâ`iNkosâ`isikwehlulilâ`ukufa. 6. Amandla wonke asemhlabeni,
lasezulwinâ`anikwâ`iNkosi yodumo.
7. Jesu Nkosi thela kithi umoya wesibindi
sikufakaze ezizweni.

M. Mkandla
A.title: Aleluya ivukile iNkosi

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Aleluya, asithokoze, aleluya, sijabule ngalo Aleluya, iNkosâ`ivukile, aleluya! (2x)
1. Nantâ`usukâ` olukhulu olwenziwe yiNkosi. 2. Khangelani nansi iMvana kaNkulunkulu,
esusâ`izono zomhlaba!
3. Jabulani makholwa lithokoze, iNkosi ivukile. 4. Ukufa lokuphila kwancintisana!
5. Mdumiseni, limbonge uNkulunkulu,
onguMsindisi womhlaba.
6. Adunyiswe uYise, leNdodana loMoya oyiNgcwele.
A. Tshabalala
A.title: Aleluya, asithokoze

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Asihlabelele, asihlabelele, sidumisâ`iNkosi yethu.
Yasihawukela, yasihawukela,
yasephulâ`ezitheni zethu. 1. INkosâ`iliqhawe iliqhawe lezimpi,
iNkosâ`ingamandla, ingamandla ami. 2. Yachithâ`amabutho amabutho kaFaro,
yakhululâ`isizwe, isizwe sayo.
3. Ngubanâ`onjengayo, onjengayo iNkosi.
Ingubani yona? InguNkulunkulu.
P. Mthombeni
A.title: Asihlabelele sidumisâ`iNkosi yethu

A.lyrics:
1. Adunyiswâ`uBaba wethu, onguYisâ`olaphakade. Idunyiswe iNdodana uMsindisi wethu sonke. Adunyiswâ`uMoya oNgcwele. E! Udumâ`alube kuye.
2. Sibusise, Baba wethu, owazenzâ`izinto zonke. Sibusise Jesu wethu, owafela thina zoni, wena Moya ophezulu, silungise thinâ`abakho.
3. E. Buthathu obuNgcwele, sikhuleka kuwe, njalo, sithi, kanye lezithunywa, wenâ`uNgcwele, Baba Nkosi. Awukhonzwe, udunyiswe,
ngazo zonke izikhathi, ngazo zonke izikhathi.
A.title: Adunyiswâ`uBaba wethu

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Adunyiswe uYise, hosana! Adunyiswe uNdodana, hosana!
Adunyiswâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele.
Aleluya, adunyiswe. Aleluya. 1. Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla, hosana!
Siyakâ`babaza, siyakwazisa, hosana!
Siyakâ`guqela siyakâ`dumisa, Aleluya... 2. Nkosi Jesu Kristu, hosana!
Ndodana eyodwa kaNkulunkulu, hosana!
Wenâ`osusâ`izono zomhlaba, Aleluya... 3. Nkulunkulu Moyâ`oNgcwele, hosana!
OyiNkosi uMphilisi, hosana!
Ophuma kuYise beleNdodana. Aleluya..
B. Ndlovu
A.title: Adunyiswe uYise

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Adunyiswe, aleluya, Aleluya, aleluya Aleluya, adunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu. (2x)
1. Dumisani uNkulunkulu amalanga onke, ngoba laye ulothando kini lonke.
2. Yonkâ`imisebenzi yethu ivela emandleni akhe, kufanele sicelâ`amandla okwenza imisebenzi emihle.
3. Thanda iNkosi ukuba intando yayo yodwa,
yenziwe ukuze idunyiswe, yona ngazo zonke izikhathi.
4. Nkosi faka uthando lwakho enhliziyweni zethu; ukuze zitshisekele wena kokuphela.
5. Qinisa imihlangano yamakholwa athembeke kuwe, aze akuthande, iBandla lakho likhule.
6. Konke okwalumhlaba kuyinto ephelayo, kodwa okwasezulwini kuyilifa laphakade.
7. Nika uKhesare okukaKhesare;
kodwa uNkulunkulu umnike okwakhe.
8. Lokho okufunwa nguNkulunkulu kuwe ngumoya lomzimba;
lakho konke olakho kunikele kuye, khona uzasindiswa. W. Hlabano
A.title: Adunyiswe (96)

A.lyrics:
Awu, Nkosi sihawukele (2x)
Awu, Nkosi sihawukele thina zoni. Awu, Kristu sihawukele (2x)
Awu, Kristu sihawukele thina zoni. Awu, Nkosi sihawukele (2x)
Awu, Nkosi sihawukele thina zoni.
C. Nyoni
A.title: Awu, Nkosi sihawukele (581)

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Abrahama, Ngilapha Nkosi.
Abrahama,
Thathâ`indodana yakhâ`eyodwanje uyenikela ngayo. (2x)
1. Wathathâ`ubabhemi lenceku zakhe kunye layâ`uIsaka 2. Waqondâ`intaba, besahamba
watshiyi nceku zakhe waqhubeka layâ`uIsaka 3. Baba, Baba, B: Watshu Isaka
Nanzi nkuni: B: Umlilo
kodwa lingaphi, iwundlu lokutshiswa.
4. UNkulunkulu, mntanami, uzakuzibonela.
(Gen 22,1-19) S. Magonya
A.title: Abrahama (631)

A.lyrics:
1. Akulalele Israyeli, akuzwe ndlu kaJuda. Chorus: INkosi ithi, lanxa izintaba zingasuka,
kodwâ`uthando lwamâ` kaluyikususwa kuwe. 2. Lalelanini makholwa, ilizwi leNkosi.
3. Lawe soni akulizwe, ilizwi lothando.
4. Lelo lizwi lothando lagcwaliswa nguJesu.
5. Lapho wayekhuleka, elengesâ`phambanweni.
(c/f Is 54,10) P. Mthombeni
A.title: Akulalele Israyeli (122)

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Bass: Aleluya luya, aleluya, aleluya - luya, aleluya.
Soprano: Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, aleluya (2x) 1. Khuluma Nkosâ`inceku yakho iyezwa. (2x)
2. Silalele sonke Nkosi njengoSamuyeli. (2x)
3. Thumela Nkosi, Moya wakho oNgcwele. (2x)
(Isam 3,10;Joha 14,26) B. Ndlovu
A.title: Aleluya (516)

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Aleluya, hlabelelani, hlabelelani (2x) 1. Hlabelelani eNkosini ihubo elitsha.
Hlabelela eNkosini lina mhlaba wonke. 2. Hlabelelani eNkosini, lidumise ibizo layo
Litshumayele ukukhulula kwayo insuku ngensuku. 3. Landisani udumo lwayo phakathi kwezizwe
lemisebenzi yayo emangalisayo phakathi kwabantu bonke.
(c/f Hubo 33,3;66,2-4) S. Moyo
A.title: Aleluya, hlabelelani (608)
Akusiphathe kuhle Nkosi (134)

A.lyrics:
Akusizwe, siyakuncenga, Nkulunkulu
1. Siyakuncenga ukuba usize uPhapha labaBhishopi
bonke, ukuba beluse kuhle iBandla lakho.
2. Siyakuncenga ukuba usize abapristi labafundisi
bonke, bafundise kuhle, bahole kuhle amakholwa
akho.
3. Siyakuncenga ukuba usize amaBrada lamaSista
onke, empilweni yabo lasemisebenzini, yezibizelo zabo.
J. Mkhwebu
A.title: Akusizwe, siyakuncenga

A.lyrics:
1/C.- Asithi, Asithi (2x) 2/C. Ngothando, - Ngesihle! - Ngomoya wonke;
S. Amen, siyakudumisa, Amen, siyakudumisa,
A. Baba, Amen, siyakudumisa, Amen, siyakudumisa, T. Baba, Amen, siyakudumisa, Ndodana Amen,
siyakudumisa!
B. Udumo alube kuYise, Amen lakuNdodana,
C. Asithi:
S. Amen, Amen, Amen siyakudumisa!
A. LoMoyâ`oNgcwele Amen-Amen- siyakudumisa
T. Amen- Amen-, Amen-Amen-siyakudumisa
B. Amen, LoMoya oNgcwele, akube njalo, laphakade!
Lumko; B. Ndlovu
A.title: Asithi: Amen, siyakudumisa (148)

A.lyrics:
1. Adunyiswe uNkulunkulu, alidunyiswe ibizo lakhe eliNgcwele.
2. Adunyiswe uJesu Kristu uNkulunkulu lomuntu sibili.
3. Alidunyiswe ibizo likaJesu.
Adunyiswe uJesu eSakramenteni leAlithare
eliNgcwele sibili.
4. Ayidunyiswe iNhliziyo eNgcwele sibili kaJesu.
Adunyiswe uMoya oNgcwele uMthokozisi.
5. Kahlonitshwe uNina kaNkulunkulu, uMariya
oNgcwele sibili.
Kakuhlonitshwe ukwemula kwakhe okuNgcwele okungelacala.
6. Kakuhlonitshwe ukukhwezwa kwakhe okulobukhosi. Alihlonitshwe ibizo likaMariya iVirigo elinguMzali.
7. Kahlonitshwe uJosefâ`oNgcwele, umkakhe olenhliziyo emhlophe sibili.
Adunyiswe uNkulunkulu kuzithunywa zakhe labangcwele bakhe.
A.title: Adunyiswe uNkulunkulu

A.lyrics:
1. Asimbonge uBaba, onguMdali womhlaba, ngokuba esinika, okuhle okungaka.
2. Usiphile umzimba, lomoya lokuhamba, uyasilondoloza, kakwazâ`ukusincitsha.
3. âThina, siphiwâ`inyanga isisilisa, UJesu wasifela, sithethelelwa thina.
4. Ngaye sihlezi kuhle, lapha phansi ezweni, laphaya ezulwini, sizahlangana laye.
5. Ngawo umusa wakho, sicela kuwe, Baba, silondoloze thina siyizimvu ezakho.
6. O! Baba, siqinise, size sikudumise, ngaye uJesu Kristu, ezinsukwini zonke.
A.title: Asimbonge uBaba, onguMdali

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Asibongeni laphakade, iSakramente eliNgcwele. (2x)
1. Bonganini iNkosi zizwe zonke, ibongeni lina Bantu lonke.
2. Ngoba umusa wayâ`uqiniselwe phezu kwethu lothando lwayo lumi kuze kube laphakade.
3. Udumo alube kuYise leNdodana, loMoya oNgcwele.
4. Njengoba kwakunjalo ekuqaleni, kusenjalo lakhathesi,
kuzakuba njalo, kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
A. Tshabalala
A.title: Asibongeni laphakade (150)

A.lyrics:
1. Asidumisâ`iSakramente alimisâ`uJesu Kristu, ekudleni kokucina, walinika abaphostoli bakhe.
Chorus: Wozani, Wozani eSidlweni seNkosi, wozani, wozani sidlâ`uMzimba weNkosi. Wozani, wozani, wozani, samukelâ`iNkosi.
2. Makholwa bonani nansâ`iSinkwa, siphendukâ`uMzimba woMsindisi, kuphenduka lewayini libâ`iGazi likaJesu.
Chorus: Wozani eSidlweni seNkosi, wozani sinathâ`iGazi leNkosi.
Wozani, wozani, wozani samukelâ`iNkosi. 3. Odla leliSakramente, uzaphila kokuphela,
ngobâ`uJesu wathi nguye iSinkwa sokuphila. 4. Wozani eSidlweni seNkosi,
wozani lizatholâ`ukuphila.
Wozani, wozani, wozani, samukelâ`iNkosi.
C. Zikhali
A.title: Asidumise iSakramente (151)

A.lyrics:
1. Asimbonge uMsindisi, onguMondli loMfundisi, loMelusâ`omuhle wethu. Asimbonge, simdumise, ngokwamandla ethu onke; ufanelâ`ukudunyiswa.
2. Nansâ`isinkwa sokuphila, esivela ezulwini, esizophilisa thina. LesiSinkwa sezithunywa, akusiphe sona Nkosi, sizwe ubumnandi baso.
3. Nantâ`iGazi loMsindisi, lingumthombo wokulunga liyesulâ`izono zethu. Jesu akusigezise,
ngalo leliGazi lakho, khona sizakuba mhlophe.
4. E! Melusi wethâ`omuhle, akusondle thinâ`abakho, usilondoloze kuhle. Ube lathi ekufeni;
akusise ezulwini, sithokoze kanye lawe.
A.title: Asimbonge UmSindisi

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Asihlabelele, Asihlabelele
Asihlabelele sibonge oPhezukonke, oPhezukonke
simdumise, labangcwele ngokupheleleyo. 1. Lina zithunywa zikaNkulunkulu,
ezingaphambi kwazo zonke.
2. Kalidelelanga ukulaya kweNkosi,
kusukela ekuqaleni.
3. UNkulunkulâ`uliphathisa okwabantwana,
njengendodana elaywa nguyise. 4. Lina abathandekayo eNkosini,
abamukelekayo kuyo.
5. Ngokuthembeka kwenu kuSomandla,
uGabriyeli wathunyelwa kuMariya.
6. Lathi udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu,
kube lokuthula emhlabeni.
P. Khumalo
A.title: Asihlabelele (574)

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Ave Mariya, Ave Mariya, (2x) Ave Mariya, Ave Mariya,
Nkosikazi, Nina wokulunga,
lokuthula, unguMama wethu.
1. Mariya oNgcwele, Nkosikazi yokuthula,
wena owazala uMsindisi, onguJesu Kristu.
2. Sinike uthando, enhliziyweni zethu,
ukuthula emulini zethu, kuwo lo umhlaba.
3. Nina kaNkulunkulu, siyakubabaza,
sikhokhele kuJesu, iNdodana yakho.
4. Phakathi kosizi, ncedisa abantwabakho,
ngokuxotsha ububi, ngobâ`ulesibindi.
5. Lapha kulendlala, lamlela abantwabakho,
ngokubacelela izulu, kuNkulunkulu.
6. Ngesikhathi senhlupheko, thina sithembele
kuwe wena Nina woxolo, Nina wokuthula.
7. Wena mvikeli wethu, olenhliziyo elesihawu,
ungumthombo wokulunga, sikhalela kuwe.
8. Qinisa abakholwayo, duduza abagulayo,
vuselela ababuthakathaka, ngokubakhulekela.
A.title: Ave Maria

A.lyrics:
Chorus:
a: Lisikhulekele, lisihlangabeze siye ekhaya
likaNkulukulu.
b. Usikhulekele, usihlangabeze siye ekhaya
likaNkulunkulu. 1. Bafelukholo abangcwele,
balandeli bakaJesu uMsindisi, owahluphekayo. 2. Bafelukholo abangcwele,
lina elanqoba bonke ubunzima, ngobuqhwa benu. 3. Charles Lwanga oNgcwele,
Mmeli wentanga entsha eAfrika, lamaKhatholika. 4. Mathias Malumba oNgcwele,
Mholi oqotho lomlandeli kaKristu, owazithobayo. 5. Josefâ`Mkhasa ongcwele,
mfelukholo wokuqala eUganda,
wasâ`khuthazâ`eBandleni.
6. Dionysius Ssebugwawo ongcwele,
mtshisekeli wokholo lobukristu, wawulenhlonipho. 7. Pontianus Ngodwe ongcwele,
wethembeka waze walangazela, abafelukholo. 8. Andreas Kaggwa ongcwele,
sibonelo sabatshumayeli, labafundisayo. 9. Athanasius Bazzekuketta - ongcwele,
malusi othembekileyo, wamagugâ`enkosi. 491

10. Gonzaga Gonza ongcwele,
owabalozwelo ngezibotshwa, labalosizini.
11. Nowa Mawagali ongcwele,
sisebenzi esithobekileyo, lomthandi weVangeli.
12. Luka Banabakintu ongcwele, owahlupheka njengoJesu, ngokufelâ`ukholo.
13. Jakobe Buzabulyawo ongcwele,
butho elithembekileyo, selizwe lakini.
14. Gyavira ongcwele,
sibonelo sokuthethelela, bonkâ`abasonayo.
15. Ambrosius Kibuka ongcwele,
wawugcwele amadlabuzane, lokuthandâ`umakhelwane.
16. Anatole Kirigwajjo ongcwele,
wazithoba njalo wazidela, wahloniphâ`umhlaba.
17. Achilles Kiwanuka ongcwele,
uKristu wakwehlukanisa, ukukholwa okulize.
18. Kizitho ongcwele,
oyibumhlophe benhliziyo, lentokozo yobuKristu.
19. Mbanga ongcwele,
owakhethâ`ukufa lokunqandwa; yinsiselelo yabazali.
20. Mugagga ongcwele,
nsizwa eliqhawe lobumhlophe, benhliziyo yakho.
21. Mukhasa ongcwele,
mtshisekeli wokufundelâ`ukholo, wombhabhathizo
weGazi.
22. Adolf Ludigo ongcwele,
walandelâ`iNkosi yethu, wazidela ngenxa yethu.
23. Bruno Serunkuma ongcwele,
sibonelo sokuzinqabela, lokuzisola kwethu.
24. Johannes Muzeyi ongcwele,
meluleki ohlakaniphileyo, ngobâ`ulesihawu.
25. Lina lonke bafelukholo abangcwele,
zibonelo zenhlanzeko lokucoleka, lobumhlophe
benhliziyo. elabambelela eBandleni, likaJesu Kristu.
26. Lina lonke bafelukholo abangcwele, 
elabambelela eBandleni, likaJesu Kristu.
A.title: Abafelukholo baseUganda

A.lyrics:
Chorus: Aloyisi oNgcwele, lamhla siyadumisa, ubungcwele bakho, phezulu ezulwini.
1. Usesemhlabeni, wawunjengesithunywa, umhlophe emzimbeni, lenhliziyweni yakho.
2. Umoya wakho wamthanda, uNkulunkulu wethu, usubona isono, wawungakhethâ`ukufa.
3. Lapho wemukela, uMzimba kaJesu, inhliziyo yatshisa, ngokumthanda kwakho. 4. Sumthanda uMariya, kungathi ungunyoko,
wamthabisa yena, ngokumlandela kwakho.
A.title: Aloyisi oNgcwele (265)

A.lyrics:
1. Amandla kaJosefa umondli kaJesu, kehlulwa yilutho nxa esicelela. Njengoba iNkosi yamenza induna, lenkosi yemfuyo yomuzi ongcwele.
2. Josefa owake wamfihla uJesu,
nxa wayezingelwa yinkosâ`uHerode, akungivikele nxa ngisengozini, ngingaze ngehlulwa ngumlingi omubi.
A.title: Amandla kaJosefa (266)

A.lyrics:
Ana, mama wethu mandla ethu, sicelelâ`umusa, (2x) Ana, mama wethu, mandla ethu, akusisize, (2x)
1. Usesemhlabeni, wathanda uMdabuli,
wagcina ilizwi lakhe2. Waxwaya izingozi, zomoya lezomzimba,
wazonda konkâ`okubi, wahamba ngokulunga Ana. 3. Wathanda uMariya, wathanda indlu yakho,
Walalela uMenzi, walalela lomkakho, Ana. 4. Wakhanya njengelanga, ngesibonelo sakho.
Akusikhulekele, size sifuze wena, Ana.
A.title: Ana, mama wethu (267)

A.lyrics:
1. Ana mzali kaMariya, mkhulumeli wabomama, sikhulekele kuMlimu, asiphe igrasiya lakhe; silondoloze ubungcwele beSakramente loMtshado.
2. Ana mama olomusa, mlondolozi wabomama, sikhulumele kuNkulunkulu asiphe usizo lwakhe; silondoloze ubumhlophe lesithembiso soMtshado.
3. Ana mondli kaMariya, mlondolozi weVirigo, akusisize zonkâ`insuku sihambe ngomkhondo wakho silondoloze abantwana bakhule kuhle bengcwele.
4. Ana mthandi wokulunga, sibonelo sabomama, siphephelo ekubhubheni, lokuhlakazeka kweMtshado akusihlenge zonkâ`insuku, silondoloze ubungwele.
A.title: Ana mzali kaMariya (268)

A.lyrics:
1. Ana oyingcwele, Nkosikazi eloxolo sibonelo sabomama emulini zabo.
2. Ana oyingcwele, Nina kaMariya owazala uMsindisi wasindisâ`umhlaba.
3. Ana oyingcwele, wakhulisa uMariya lathandana lobabili loJowakhimu ongcwele.
4. Ana oyingcwele wenâ`uhlala ezulwini lomntanakho uMariya licelela thina
5. Ana oyingcwele lamhla siyadumisa labomama bakho. Ana silandela wena.
W. Hlabano
A.title: Ana oyingcwele (269)

A.lyrics:
1. Azikhâ`izinyembezi ekhaya likaBaba, ekhaya likaBaba, ekhaya likaBaba. Azikhâ`izinyembezi ekhaya likaBaba ukuthokoza kodwa.
2. Azikhâ`izinhlupheko ...
3. Wozani siye khona ekhaya likaBaba,
ekhaya likaBaba, ekhaya likaBaba. Wozani siye khona ekhaya likaBaba ukuthokoza kodwa.          

Zulu song
A.title: Azikhâ`izinyembezi

B.lyrics:
1. Baba, Nkosi yaphezulu, nampa thinâ`abantwabakho.
Siyancenga sithobile: mthumâ`esimthenjisiweyo, azesusâ`izono zethu lobumnyama esikibo, asibuyiselâ`ukholo esilahlekelwa yilo.
2. Nkosi, bona ubumnyama obusemhlabeni wonke! Akuthume uMkhanyisi azekubakhanyisela abahlezi emnyameni, bengakwazi wena, Baba, baze bakuthande bonke bakukhonze Nkosi yethu.
3. Jabulani, zizwe zonke, ngoba nanku kusondele isikhathi sokufika koMsindisi wethâ` uJesu. Woza Jesu, sikhulule thinâ`esingabantwabakho. Baba, Nkosi yaphezulu, awuze umbuso wakho.
B.title: Baba Nkosi yaphezulu

B.lyrics:
1. Busuku obuhle, obasilethela iNkosi, uJesu ozasisindisa ozelwe emzini waseBethlehema.
2. E! Kwabelusayo ngalobo busuku, kwafikâ`izithunywa, zivelâ`ezulwini, zikhonza zibonga iNkosi uJesu.
3. Besesabâ`abelusi babonâ`isithunywa;
besizwake leli ilizwi elihle, basebejabula, babonga
iNkosi. 4. Wozani makholwa, wozani kuJesu: musâ`ukwesaba
ukuzâ`emntwaneni, ogcwele uthando lomusa omkhulu. 5. O! Jesu omuhle, E. ngane emnandi, ufunâ`inhliziyo;
E. nansi, ithathe, ayibe ngeyakho igcinwe nje nguwe.
B.title: Busuku obuhle, obasilethela iNkosi

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Baba, Baba, bathethelele, Baba, bathethelele, bathethelele ngoba kabakwazi, Baba,
kabakwazi abakwenzayo.
1. Kwakukhona abanye abaphangi ababili,
ababesiwa ukuba babulawe kanye laye. 2. Sebefikile endaweni ethiwa uKhakhayi,
bambethela khona kanye labaphangi. 3. Omunye ngakwesokunene,
omunye ngakwesokhohlo. 4. Babelana ingubo zakhe;
benza inkatho ngazo.
5. Abantu bema bembukela,
kodwa ababusi bamklolodela.
6. Bathi: Wasilisa abanye, kazisilise yena,
uba enguKristu okhethiweyo kaNkulunkulu. 7. Labebutho bamenza inhlekisa, beza kuye
bemnika iwayini elimunyu.
8. Bathi: Uba uyiNkosi yabaJuda,
zisilise wena!
9. Kwakukhona lombhalo phezu kwakhe,
othi: Lo uyiNkosi yabaJuda.
10. UJosefa waseArimathiya,
wacela kuPhilathu isidumbu sakhe.
11. Wasigoqela ngamalembu, wasibeka elibeni lakhe.
B.title: Baba, bathethelele

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Baba uba inkezo le ingedlule kimi,
ngingayinathanga
kayenziwe intando yakho. (2x) 1. Kanti lilele yini? Vukani likhuleke.
2. Umoya uyavuma, kodwa inyama ibuthakathaka. 3. Lalani phela liphumule, sekuphelile.
(c / f Luka 22,42) A. Tshabalala
B.title: Baba, uba inkezo le

B.lyrics:
Baba wethu ophezulu, sikhangele sihawukele. E! Ndodana yoPhezulu, sikhangele sihawukele. Njalo lawe Moyâ`oNgcwele, sikhangele...
E! Buthathu obuNgcwele, sikhangele...
Jesu, Jesu, wenâ`oweza kulumhlaba, uzosisindisa sonke: sihawukele sihawukele,
sicela kuwe Nkosi, usixolelâ`izono. IRosali yokuhlupheka
1. Jesu, Jesu, wenâ`owajulukâ`iGazi, ngenxa yamacala ethu: Sihawukele...
2. Jesu, Jesu, owatshaywa ngenxa yethu, wophâ`iGazi wonkâ`umzimba: Sihawukele...
3. Jesu, Jesu, owafakwâ`amevâ`ekhanda, waqheliswa kabuhlungu: Sihawukele...
4. Jesu, Jesu, owathwalâ`isiphambano, ngenxa yethu, thina zoni: Sihawukele... 5. Jesu, Jesu wena Mvana yethâ`eNgcwele,
ususâ`izono zethu zonke: Sihawukele... 
 
Indlela yesiphambano
1. Jesu, Jesu, wenâ`owaqunyelwâ`ukufa ngenxa yethu, thina zoni: Sihawukele...
2. Jesu, Jesu owavuma ukwetheswa isiphambano esinzima: Sihawukele... 3. Jesu, Jesu, owasindwa yisâ`phambano
waze wawa kabuhlungu: Sihawukele... 4. Jesu, Jesu, wenâ`owadabukâ`impela,
uhlangana loMariya: Sihawukele... 5. Jesu, Jesu, owathâ`ukhathelâ`impela,
waphunyuzwa nguSimoni: Sihawukele... 6. Jesu, Jesu, owabongâ`uVeronika
owesulâ`ubuso bakho: Sihawukele... 7. Jesu, Jesu, owabuya wawa phansi
ngokusindwa yisâ`iphambano: Sihawukele... 8. Jesu, Jesu, wenâ`owathulisa
ababekudabukela: Sihawukele... 9. Jesu, Jesu, owaphinda wawa futhi
ukhathele okokufa: Sihawukele...
10. Jesu, Jesu, wena othunukwe amanxeba
ngokususwa izigqoko: Sihawukele...
11. Jesu, Jesu, wena owabethelwa kabuhlungu
ngenxa yethu: Sihawukele...
12. Jesu, Jesu, owafelâ`esiphambanweni
ngokuthanda thina zoni: Sihawukele... 13. Jesu, Jesu, owethulwâ`esiphambanweni,
wagonwa nguMariya: Sihawukele... 14. Jesu, Jesu, owabekwa elibeni
elalingesilakho: Sihawukele...
15. Jesu, Jesu, wena Mvanâ`elungileyo,
susâ`izono zethu zonke: Sihawukele...
B.title: Baba wethu ophezulu

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Babelana, Babelana, izembatho zami, benzelana, benzelana inkatho ngesigqoko sami.
1. Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami ungitshiyelani na? 2. Kunganâ`ukhatshana lokungisiza,
ukhatshana lamazwâ`okububula kwami na? 3. Nkulunkulu wami ngiyakhalâ`emini,
kodwa kawungiphenduli!
4. Ngiyakhala lasebusuku, kodwa kangilakho ukuphumula! 5. Wena ungoNgcwele kalsrayeli,
mina ngiyimpethu, kangisuye muntu. 6. Okhokho basendulo bathemba kuwe,
bathemba, wena wabakhulula. 7. Bakhala kuwe, wabakhulula;
bathemba kuwe, kabayangekanga. 8. Ngizakubatshumayeza abafowethu ngikudumise phakathi kweBandla.

C. Zikhali
B.title: Babelana, benzelana inkatho

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Babelana, babelana izembatho zami. benzâ`inkatho, benza inkatho ngesembatho sami. (2x)
1. Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungitshiyeleni na?
Kunganâ`ukhatshana lokungisiza, ukhatshana lamazwâ`okububula kwami na?
2. Nkulunkulu wami ngiyakhala emini, kodwa kawungiphenduli. Lasebusuku angila kuthula,
kodwa Wena ungoNgcwele,
uhlezi udunyiswa ngulsrayeli. 
3. Okhokho babethemba kuwe, Bathemba Wena, wabakhulula Bakhala kuwe, bakhululwa, bathemba kuwe kabaze bayangeka.
4. Kodwa mina ngiyimpethu, angisumuntu, ngiyisithuko sabantu ngiyisidelelo sabantu. Bonke abangibonayo, bayangihleka,
bekhamisa imilomo, benikina amakhanda besithi: Wathemba kuNkulunkulu,
Nkulunkulu kamsindise nxa emthanda. 5. Impela nguwe owangikhupha esiswini,
wangimunyisa amabele kamama,
ngaba sezandleni zakho kusukela ekuzalweni kwami, unguNkulunkulu wami kusukela ekuzalweni kwami ngumama.
Ungabi khatshana lami,
ngoba inhlupheko iseduze, kakho losizayo. Umhlambi wenkunzi ungihanqile,
Inkunzi ezilamandla zaseBashani, zingizingelezele. Zingikhamisele imilomo yazo,
njengezilwane eziphangayo lezibhongayo. Ngichithwe njengamanzi,
wonke amathambo ami enyele,
inhliziyo yami injengengcino,
ngincibilikile phakathi kwami.
Umlomo wami womile njengodengezi,
lolimi lwami lunamathele olwangeni lwami, ungitshiya othulini lokufa,
Izinja ziyangibunganela.
Leqembu lababi lingihanqile,
Izandla zami lenyawo zami,
bazibhobozile, ngingabala wonke amathambo ami. Bayangijolozela bengiklolodela.
Babelana izembatho zami,
benza inkatho ngesembatho sami.
(Hubo 22) B. Ndlovu
B.title: Babelana izembatho zami

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Bathethelele Baba kabakwazi
Bathethelele Baba, Baba bathethelele Baba ngoba kabakwazi, Baba kabakwazi
abakwenzayo. (2x). 1. Kwakukhona abanye abaphangi ababili,
ababesiwa ukuba babulawe kanye laye. 2. Sebefikile endaweni ethiwa ukhakhayi,
bambethela khona kanye labaphangi. 3. Omunye ngakwesokunene
omunye ngakwesokhohlo. 4. Babelana ingubo zakhe
benzelana inkatho ngazo. 5. Abantu bema bembukela
kodwa ababusi bamklolodela. 6. Bathi uba uyiNkosi yabaJuda, Nkosi yabaJuda zisilise wena.
7. UJosefa wase Arimathiya
wacela kuPhilathu isidumbu sakhe.
8. Wasigoqela ngamalembu wasibeka elibeni lakhe.
(c/f Luka 23,26-34) P. Khumalo
B.title: Bathethelele Baba

B.lyrics:
1. Baba, bathethelele,
ngoba abakwaziâ`abakwenzayo.
2. Lamhla, uzakuba lami, epharadisweni.
3. Mama, nansâ`iNdodana yakho,
Nangu, Nangâ`uMama wakho.
Kusukela, lapho wamthatha, wamusekhaya.
4. Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wami, ungitshiyelani,

5. Ngomile,....
6. Kuphelile, ...
7. Ezandleni, zakho, ngiyawubeka
uMoya wami.

S. Dube
B.title: Bathethelele ngoba abakwazi

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Besithi, hosana! Besithi, hosana, besithi, Hosana kweliphezulu! Hosana kweliphezulu!
1. Abantwana beJerusalema, bahlangabezâ`uJesu Kristu, bephethâ`ingatsha zamalala. Besithi:..
2. Simhlangabeze lathi sonke,
UJesu Kristâ`iNkosi yethu, siphethâ`ingatsha zamalala. Sisithi:..
3. Lasekufeni simhlangabeze
uJesu Kristâ`iNkosi yethu, ebukhosini bakhâ`obukhulu. Sisithi:..
P. Ndlovu
B.title: Besithi Hosana

B.lyrics:
1. Baba Somandla unguMenzi wethu, wasidala ngamandla akho.
Chorus: Si, siyabonga Nkosi,
Si, siyabonga Baba, uthando lwakho. (2x)

2. Wasithumela iNdodana yakho, yasihlenga ngeGazi layo.
3. Uthandâ`olunje luyamangalisa, lokubâ`umuntu azidele.
4. UMoya wakho uyasingcwelisa, wamthumela kwabakholwayo.
5. Ngakho makholwa bongani uMdali, ngomusa wakhâ`omkhulu kithi.
P. Mthombeni
B.title: Baba Somandla unguMenzi wethu

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Bayethe bayethe, Nkulunkulu wamaxuku. (2x) 1. Nkosi Nkulunkulu, zwanâ`abantu bakho
bayazinikela kuwe Nkosi.
2. Nkosi Jesu Kristu, wenâ`uyasithanda,
wasifela esiphambanweni.
3. Ngokuvuka kwakho, wasivusa lathi, ekubhubheni kwesono.
4. Sixolelâ`izono, esikona ngazo, inhliziyo zethu zibe mhlophe.
5. Sifundise Nkosi, ukukuthanda, lokukwazi wena sikubonge.
6. Sivikelâ`izilingo, zesitha sethu, sifinyelele ezulwini.
7. Labasosizini, siyabakhulekela, akube lomusa kibo Nkosi.
8. Lalâ`iBandla lakho, elisemhlabeni, akuliphathise Nkosi Baba.
9. Lezihlobo zonke, labangane bethu, akubabusise Nkulunkulu.
10. Ilizwe lethu, siyalikhulekela, siphe ukuthula lokulunga.
11. Adunyiswe uYise, layo iNdodana, adunyiswâ`uMoya oyiNgcwele.
W. Hlabano
B.title: Bayethe, bayethe Nkulunkulu (97)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Baba ngincedisa,
Kangingaphambuki elizwini lakho Nkosi Isi, isihawu sakho Baba kasihlale kimi Ukuze, ngikukhonze Nkosi ngenhliziyo eqotho.
1. Nkosi ilizwi lakho,
Nkosâ`ilizwi lakho kalibuse, kalibuse enhliziyweni yami. Qondisa inyawo zami,
Qondisâ`inyawo zami Baba zingasuki, zingasuki
endleleni yakho.
2. Baba ngiphathisa,
Baba ngiphathisa ngigcine izimiso zakho zonke. Vula amehlo ami,
Vulâ`amehlo ami Nkosi, ngibone ubukhulu bakho.
3. Baba uthando lwakho,
Babâ`uthando lwakho kaluhlale, luzinze emoyeni wami. Nkosi iqiniso lakho,
Nkosi iqiniso lakho kalingasuki, emlonyeni wami.
4. Baba, omubi ungithiyile,
Omubâ`ungithiyile, Baba ngivikela, ukuze ngisile. Baba isandla sakho,
Babâ`isandla sakhâ`asibe phezu kwami, ngisize njalonjalo.
M. Chifana
B.title: Baba ngincedisa (593)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Baba siyakuncenga, Hlambulula imizimba yethu
Bass: Ibengcwele, Ngoba ilithempeli lakho. (2x) 1. Ezonweni zethu, Nkosi,
Sihlambulule, Sihlambulule Sibe ngcwele. Oh siyakuncenga, Baba,
Sihlambulule, Sihlambulule, Sibe ngcwele. Usâ`khululâ`ezonweni zethu,
Sihlambulule, Sihlambulule, Sibe ngcwele.
2. Ebubini bethu Nkosi...
3. Enhliziyweni zethu Nkosi...
C. Nyoni
B.title: Baba siyakuncenga (584)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Buya, buya ndodana buya buyele khaya, buya, ulahlekile kude, wozâ` ekhaya!
1. Ezweni lezihambi laphâ`oyakhona, izwa izwi lithi, ndodana yami!
2. Ezweni lendlala uphelâ` amandla, wozâ`uzojabula, ndodana yami!
3. Woza ekudleni, hawâ` ukhohliwe,
woza edilini, ndodana yami! 4. Uzulele kude, woqhubeka na?
ngikuthethelele, ndodana yami! 5. Awula zihlobo, awulakhaya,
ngikuthandâ`unjalo, ndodana yami!
(c/f Luka 15,11-32) C. Zikhali
B.title: Buya ndodana (106)

B.lyrics:
Baba yenza umlomo wami
Baba, yenza umlomo wami ube lichacho lakho. Nkosi, utsho ilizwi lakho lona elimnandi. Ngifisâ`ukuba ngumalusi wakho.
Baba, yenza...
Nginikâ`amandla ngibambelele kuwe.
Nkosi, utsho...
B.title: Baba yenza umlomo wami (123)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Babusisiwe; (8x)
1. Babusisiwe abangabayanga emoyeni,
ngoba umbuso wezulu ungowabo. 2. Babusisiwe abamnene,
ngoba bazakulidla ilifa, ilifa lomhlaba. 3. Babusisiwe abakhalayo,
ngoba bazakududuzwa bazakududuzwa. 4. Babusisiwe abalambela,
besomela ukulunga ngoba bazakusuthiswa. 5. Babusisiwe abalesihawu,
ngoba bazakuhawukelwa bazakuhawukelwa.

6. Babusisiwe abalenhliziyo ezimhlophe, ngoba bazakubona uNkulunkulu.
7. Babusisiwe abazingelwa ngenxa yokulunga, ngoba umbuso wezulu ungowabo.
8. Babusisiwe abalamulayo,
ngoba bazakuthiwâ`abantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
(c/f Mat 5,1-12) L. Sidambe
B.title: Babusisiwe (192)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Babusisiwe - abalenhliziyo Babusisiwe - ezihlambulukileyo
abalenhliziyo -bazakubona
ezimhlophe - uNkulunkulu.
1. Babusisiwe abahlala endlini yakho Nkosi,
bazahlala bekudumisa.
2. Abahlanyela bekhala, bazavuna
ngokuthokoza Nkosi. 3. Bayakhula emandleni,
babonakale phambi kukaNkulunkulu weZiyoni. 4. Kungcono ukuba ngihlale emnyango,
wendlu kaNkulukulu wami.
5. Umphefumulo wami uyalangatha womelâ`amaguma
endlu yakho Nkosi.
6. Udumo kalube kuYise,
lakuNdodana loMoyâ` oNgcwele. Amen.
(Mat 5,8;Hubo 84 &126) N. Lunga
B.title: Babusisiwe abalenhliziyo ezimhlophe (605)
Bazakudla ilifa (196)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Bonganâ`iNkosi, Bonganâ`iNkosi, Bonganâ`iNkosi, ngobâ`ilungile.
1. Bonganâ`uNkulunkulu wabo nkulunkulu, ngoba uthando lwakhe olungapheliyo lumi kuze kube nininini.
2. Bonganâ`iNkosi yamakhosi,
yona yodwa eyenza izimangaliso ezinkulu.
3. Eyenza izulu ngokuhlakanipha, eyenza umhlaba phezu kwamanzi.
(c/f Hubo 118.1.29)A. Nkomazana
B.title: Bongani iNkosi (197)

B.lyrics:
Baba lalelâ`abantu bakho bayacela. Sicela ngoJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu. Akusâ`hawukele, Hawu, Hawu! Akusisize Bonke: Uhum, Uhum, Uhum
1. Jesu wena Nkosi yamakhosi,
wena olithemba lethu, wena oyintuba yezulu, Siyakhala, siyamemeza, siyacela Akusi! hawukele, Akusisize, Nkosi Elomusa.
2. Siphe umoya wokuthandana sibe munye, Singamakristu akho, sithembe Wena qha!
Watsho wathi Wena, uyiNdlela, lokuPhila leQiniso Hamba lathi Nkosi, sihambe lawe Nkosi.
3. Nkosi siyabonga konke osipha khona, Sithi, Mayenziwe intando yakho.
M. Moffat
B.title: Baba lalelâ` abantu bakho bayacela (609)

B.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu, bahawukelâ`abantu Ndodana, zwana ukukhala kwabo. (2x).
1. UPhapha wethu, akumqinise, akhokhele kuhle iBandla lakho.
2. Thelâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele, kumBhishopi wethu, eluse kuhle izimvu zakho.
3. Siyabacelela, abapristi bonke, emsebenzini wabo, ubakhokhele.

Bahawukele Nkosi, bahawukele. Nkulunkulu Ndodana, Msindisi womhlaba, bahawukele Kristu, bahawukele.
2. Nkulunkulu Moya, Moya oNgcwele, bahawukele Nkosi, bahawukele.
Buthathu obuNgcwele, obunguNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu munye, bahawukele.
3. Abaleleyo, belethemba,
ithemba lokuvuka, bevukela eNkosini. Susa kibo, konke okubi, leyezâ`elisithayo, bavukele eNkosini
S. Magonya
B.title: Bahawukele (542)

C.lyrics:
1. Celani, celani lizakuphiwa qoqodani, qoqodani lizavulelwa. Kutsho wena, Nkosi yamakhosi, Jesu kutsho wena Nkosi yamakhosi.
Chorus: Siphe, Siphe Baba, Siphe Baba, izulu siphile. (2x) 2. Bona Nkosi, bona Nkosi sisondela
kuwe Nkosi, kuwe Nkosi osinanzayo. Abadingayo bayazuza,
Nkosi bengathandabuzi bayazuza.
3. Abacelayo, abacelayo ngokuphelele abacelayo, abacelayo awubakhohlwa. Lenelwe zekhanda uyazazi,
Nkosi uyazazi zonkâ`izenzo zethu.
4. Abalambayo, abalambayo bayasuthiswa abalambayo, abalambayo bayeneliswa. Busisa Nkosâ`imithombo yethu, ibelamanzi ahlanzekileyo.
5. Busisa, busisa amasimu ethu, busisa, athelâ`izithelo ezinhle, sizocelâ`izulâ`elisizayo.
Nkosi sizocelâ`izulu elisizayo.

6. Busisa, busisa amadlelo ethu, amadlelo, amadlelo abelohlaza. Akusiphe izulu elihle,
njalo izulu eliphilisayo.
L. Sidambe
C.title: Celani lizakuphiwa (230)

D.lyrics:
Chorus: Dumisani, Lina zinceku zeNkosi , Dumisani, ibizo leNkosi. (2x)
1. UJesu Kristu yiNkosi yethu, wazalelwa eBethlehema. 2. Wazalwa kithi enjengathi, wehlukana lathi ngokuba
msulwa.
3. Bonganinâ`iNkosi ngalumkhosâ`omkhulu bonganinâ`iNkosi uJesu Kristu.
4. Yasimisela iBandla layo yasimanyanisa ngeSidlo sayo.

L. Mguni
D.title: Dumisani iNkosi

D.lyrics:
1. Dumisâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`, bonga iNkosi wena, we nhliziyo yami. Babazâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`, yazisâ`iNkosi wena, we nhliziyo yami. Uyabongeka, Nkosi, phezulu ezulwini, lasendaweni zonke, kuze kube lanini. Ngobakho ubuNgcwele, lomusa lesihawu, lamandla lobukhosi, nini lanininini.

2. Thabisâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`,
thanda iNkosi wena, we nhliziyo yami. Hloniphâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`, hamba leNkosi wena, we nhliziyo yami. Bayethe, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu uBaba! Bayethe Jesu Kristu, kanye loMoyâ`oNgcwele. Hosana, Menzi wethu, Hosana Mhlengi wethu, Hosana Mthokozisi, kuze kube lanini!

3. Lalelâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`,
khonza iNkosi wena, we nhliziyo yami. Landelâ`iNkosi yakho, we nhliziyo yamâ`, uzâ`ufelâ`eNkosini, wena we nhliziyo yami. UNgcwele, Nkulunkulu, Baba!
uNgcwele, Nkulunkulu, Ndodana!
UNgcwele, Nkulunkulu, Moyâ`oNgcwele, nini laninini. Hosana, Nkulunkulu, Baba!
Hosana, Nkulunkulu Ndodana!
Hosana, Nkulunkulu, Moyâ`oNgcwele, kuze kube lanini.
D.title: Dumisâ`iNkosi yakho

D.lyrics:
Dumisani, dumisanâ`ibizo leNkosi

lina zinceku zeNkosi. (2x)
1. Linâ`elime ndlini yayo, iNkosi ilungile.
2. Hlabelelanâ`ibizo layo, iNkosi ilomusa.
3. Ngobâ`iNkosâ`ilikhethile, ukuba libe ngabayo. 4. Siyazâ`ukuthi yinkulu, iNkosi iphezu konke. 5. INkosi ilamandla, olwandle lasenzikini.
6. Ibizo leNkosi limi, kuze kube nininini.
7. Udumo lwayo lumi, kuzizukulwana zonke. 8. Kayibongwe emhlabeni, iNkosi ilungile.
(Hubo 113) M. Majahana
D.title: Dumisanâ`ibizo leNkosi (98)

D.lyrics:
Chorus: Dumisani, dumisanâ`uNkulunkulu (3x) endlini yakhâ`eNgcwele.
1. Mdumiseni ngenxa yezenzo, zakhe zamandla, limdumise ngenxa yobukhulu, bakhe
obungelinganiswe. 2. Mdumiseni ngokukhalisa uphondo,
limdumise ngomhubhe lechacho.
3. Limdumise ngokutshaya isigubhu langokusina,
limdumise ngechacho langomhlanga. 4. Limdumise ngokutshaya izigubhu,
limdumise ngezigubhu ezikhala kakhulu.
5. Konke okuphefumulayo kakudumise iNkosi.
Dumisani iNkosi.
(Hubo 150) D. Moyo
D.title: Dumisanâ`uNkulunkulu (99)

D.lyrics:
1. Dumisani, dumisani, dumisani,
dumisani, dumisani iNkosi. (2x)
Dumisani iNkosi ezulwini,
idumisenâ`iNkosi kweliphezulu! (2x)
Lina zithunywa zayo zonke: lina maBandla ayo onke.
Chorus: Dumisani, dumisani, dumisani, iNkosi emhlabeni, emhlabeni lasezulwini. (2x)
2. Amakhosi, amakhosi, lababusi, lababusi, lezinsizwa lezintombi. (2x)
Dumisani iNkosi ezulwini,
idumisenâ`iNkosi kweliphezulu. (2x)
Wena langa lawe nyanga lina nkanyezi zezulu.
3. Amaxhegu, amaxhegu, labantwana, labantwana dumisani iNkosi. (2x) Dumisani iNkosi ezulwini, idumisenâ`iNkosi kweliphezulu. (2x)
Lina mazulu, aphezulu, lina manzi ezulu.
(c/f Hubo 103,20-21) L. Sidambe
D.title: Dumisani, iNkosi (199)

D.lyrics:
Chorus: Dumisani iNkosi Dumisani uNkulunkulu
endlini yakhe eNgcwele
mdumiseni emazulwini akhe amandla. 1. Mdumiseni ngenxa yezenzo zakhe zamandla,
limdumise ngenxa yobukhulu bakhe obungelinganiswe. 2. Mdumiseni ngokukhalisa uphondo,
limdumise ngomhube lechacho.
3. Limdumise ngokutshaya isigubhu langokusina,
limdumise ngechacho langomhlanga. 4. Limdumise ngokutshaya izigubhu,
limdumise ngezigubhu ezikhala kakhulu.
5. Konke okuphefumulayo kakudumise iNkosi.
Dumisani iNkosi.
(c/f Hubo 150) D. Moyo
D.title: Dumisani iNkosi endlini eNgcwele

D.lyrics:
Dumisani, dumisani Nkosi,
bonganini, bonganini Nkosi,
ilamandla, ilamandla ilomusa kithi,
Siyabonga, siyabonga Nkosi umsebenzi wakho isibane, oyisibane phakathi kwethu.
Yasehlisela, yasehlisela iVangeli, iVangeli layo; ngokuthumela ngokuthumela aba, bafundisi. Siyagiya! Siyagiya, siyathaba ngalâ`iVangeli! Lilodumo! Lilodumo, liloxolo, lilothando!
Sibusise! Busisa iBandla, likhule linabe njalo njalo. Masibonge! Masibonge iVangeli likaJesu Kristu.
L. Sidambe
D.title: Dumisani, bonganini (198)

D.lyrics:
Chorus: Dumisani libongâ`iNkosi.
Dumisani, dumisani lilokuthaba. (2x)
1. Ngoba yembethâ`ubukhosi lodumo; yembatha lokukhanya njengengubo.
2. Ihlengilâ`abantu bayo ezonweni; yabahlanza ngeGazi layo elilamandla.
3. Iniselâ`izulu zonke izidalwa zayo; iziphe ukudla ngesikhathi esifaneleyo.
4. Umusa wayo umiselwe abangabayo; labaphendukayo bayakuyifumana.
5. Abamnenâ`izabaphâ`intokozo yaphakade; lokuhlupheka abasayikukubona.
6. Izizwe zonke azihlokome zijabule; ngoba ubukhosi bayo bumi kokuphela.
D.title: Dumisani libongâ`iNkosi (517)

D.lyrics:
1. Duduza abafelweyo Nkosi, Akusizwe, Nkosi 2. Yesula izinyembezi zabo, Akusizwe Nkosi. Chorus: Sizwe Nkosi, Sizwe Nkosi,
Bahawukele Baba, Akusizwe Nkosi. (2x)
3. Xotsha inhlungu zonke, Akusizwe Nkosi
4. Yamukela inceku yakho, Nqaba, Akusizwe Nkosi. (c/f Isa 25,6-8) S. Magonya
D.title: Duduza abafelweyo Nkosi (576)

E.lyrics:
1. Wabalayisisa ukuba bangatsheli muntu.
2. Wathi iNdodana yomuntu imele ihlupheke kakhulu. 3. Ukuze idelwe ngabadala labapristi abakhulu
Chorus: Kwathi ekhuleka uJesu ekusithekeni abafundi bakhe babe laye. (2x)
4. Ngemva kwalokho ibulawe ivuke. Ngosuku lwesithathu kwabafileyo.

 R. Ndlovu
E.title: Ekusithekeni

E.lyrics:
1. E! Siphambanâ`esihle, okwabethelwa kiso, uNkulunkulâ`uqobo, ngezono zethu zonke.
2. E! muthi wokuphila, wathela isithelo, esinguJesu Kristu, oyikuphila kwethu.
3. Uyisivulo wena, sentuba yaphezulu, esizangena ngayo, ekhaya elimnandi.
4. E! themba labezono, okwahlawulelwa ngawe, onkâ`amacala ethu. E! siyakudumisa.
5. Msindisi wethâ`omuhle, owaf esâ`phambanweni, ake usixolele, izono zethu zonke.
E.title: E! Siphambanâ`esihle

E.lyrics:
1. E! woza, woza Moyâ`oNgcwele, hlala kithi njalo njalo, khanyisâ`ingqondo zethu, siqonde O! sazisa khona.
2. Udumo kuwe, Mthokozisi, unguMthombo wokuphila,
uMninimphefumulo, iGugu loMlungisi wethu.
3. E! Munwe kaNkulunkulu, sihambise thina Bantu,
sihambe endleleni, esisa kuwe ezulwini.
E.title: E! Woza, woza Moyâ`oNgcwele

E.lyrics:
1. ENkosini yethâ`uJesu, kukhona okuhle konke,
nguye kuphela oyiNdlela eya kuBaba wethu ezulwini. 2. ENkosini yethu, akuswelakali lutho; nguye oyiNdlela.
3. Kasiceleni kuye; isipho sokulunga; sibe njengaye.
4. Uthi kithi sonke: Landelani Mina; laphâ`engiyakhona. 5. Kasimlandeleni; njengokutsho kwakhe; ngobâ`uyasithanda. 6. Kasithembe kuye; ngoba wasifela; wasinika impilo. 7. Lamhla sifayo; thina sileQhawe lethu; eselanqobayo.
B. Ncube
E.title: ENkosini yethu uJesu

E.lyrics:
Chorus: Endlini yakho Nkosi ngizimisele, ngizakuwenza umsebenzi wakho (2x)
1. Mina inceku yakho, akungiphathise Baba Somandla. Okhethiweyo wakho, akungiphathise Baba Somandla.
2. Emsebenzini wakho, Ebunzimeni bonke.
3. Ekulingweni kwami, Ekuhambeni kwami.
4. Ekukholweni kwami, Ekukuthembeni kwami.
5. Ekukhulekeni kwami, Emicabangweni yami.
6. Ekutshumayeleni kwami, ekukhulekeni kwami.
C. Nyoni.
E.title: Endlini yakho Nkosi (550)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkosi, Menzi wethu, sibone thinâ`abakho, siguqa phansi lapha, eAlithareni lakho, sivuma phambi kwakho, izono zethu zonke; sesizisola ngazo, sidabukilâ`impela.
O! Menzi wethu, usixolele Baba.
2. O! sasilahlekile, sachithâ`izipho zakho,
sesibuyela kuwe: O! Menzi wethu, Baba. Akusivume futhi, sibe ngabantwabakho, singabe sisaphinda, sikwone futhi Baba. O! Menzi wethu, usixolele, Baba.
3. E! Baba olomusa, ubone umthethelo, akunikela wona, uJesâ`esâ`phambanweni. Nguye owahlawulela, onkâ`amacala ethu, sesilethembâ`elihle ngeGazi loMsindisi. O! Menzi wethu, usixolele, Baba.
E.title: E! Nkosi, Menzi wethu (107)

E.lyrics:
Chorus: Esokunene, seNkosi-siyanqoba Esokunene seNkosi, siphakanyisiwe (2x)
1. INkosi ingakimi, ukungisiza Ngizakubona, engikufisayo Ngalabo, abangizondayo.
2. Kuhle ukuphephela eNkosini, kulokuthemba umuntu. Kuhle ukuphephela eNkosini kulokuthemba izikhulu.


3. Zonke izizwe zangihanqa, ebizweni leNkosi ngazichitha Zangihanqa inxa zonke, ebizweni leNkosi ngazichitha.
4. Zangihanqa njengenyosi, ebizweni leNkosi ngazichitha
Zavutha njengomlilo wameva, ebizweni leNkosi
ngazichitha.
5. Zangihlasela ngamandla, ebizweni leNkosi ngazichitha.
Zangihlasela ngaze ngaphosâ`ukuwa, ebizweni leNkosi ngazichitha.
(c/f Hubo 118,15-16) R. Ndlovu
E.title: Esokunene seNkosi siyanqoba (594)

E.lyrics:
B&S : EAlitharenâ`lakho Nkosi, silethâ`izipho lezi zethu,
T. : Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu. Baba. (2x)
A. : Nanzoke, Nanzoke, zemukele Baba.
S. : Ngokuthaba, langentokozo, langokubonga. 
 
B. Ndlovu
E.title: EAlitharenâ` lakho Nkosi (523)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkosi wohluvume, isinkwa lewayini, okuzakubâ`umzimba legazi loMsindisi.
2. Vuma ke umthethelo, wasesiphambanweni, ophindwa lapha futhi, nguJesâ`eAlithareni. 3. Sivuma lathi, Nkosi, kuvume konkâ`okwethu,
4. Kubâ`ngumnikelo wakho, omnandi ngokuyikho.
E.title: E! Nkosi wohluvume

E.lyrics:
Chorus: Esibingelelweni seNkosi, size lezipho (2x) Sikupha ngenhliziyo zethu (2x)
Baba zamâ`kele, Baba zithathe Baba zamâ`kele zibe ngezakho.
(Zulu song)
E.title: E Alathareni leNkosi (524)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Hostiya elihle, sisusa sosindiso, Msindisi wethu Jesu, osivulelâ`izulu. Sibandezelwa yimpi, yezitha ezinengi. Akusinikâ`amandla, akâ`usisize Jesu!
2. KuNkulunkulu munye, iNkosâ` eloButhathu, alubâ`udumo kiyo olungela kuphela. Ayisinike sonke, ngomusa wayâ`omkhulu, impilo yaphakade, ekhaya laphezulu.
E.title: E! Hostiya elihle (154)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Sikhuleka kuwe, Nkosi yethu,
sikudumisa, Sinkwa sezithunywa.
Chorus: Jesu, Jesu, Jesu wenâ`uNgcwele njalo.
Sikukhonza Jesu wethu, oseAlithareni. 2. Sicela kuwe, Jesu, Nkosi yethu,
sikudumisa thina sonke ngomsa. Jesu Jesu... 3. E! Sinkwa esivela ezulwini,
awubâ`ngumphako wethu mhla sifayo. Jesu Jesu...
E.title: E! Sikhuleka kuwe

E.lyrics:
Chorus: E! Wozanini lonke, lina elisindiweyo. 1. Wozanini lina elikhatheleyo,
wozanini lina elisindwayo,
wozanini ngizakuliphumuza.
2. Yetshathani ijogwe lami phezu kwenu,
lifunde kimi inhliziyo ethobileyo,
khona lizafumana ukuphumula. 3. Mina yimi uMalusi olungileyo,
ngizakulisa emadlelweni aluhlaza,
ngizakulisa emanzini aphumuzayo. 4. Thathani lidle uMzimba wami,
thathani linathe iGazi lami,
lize libe lokuphila okulaphakade.
(c/f Mat 11,28-30) B. Ndlovu
E.title: E! Wozanini lonke (200)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkosi yobukhosi, ngaphambi kobukhulu langobukhosi bakho kuthuthumela konke.
2. E! Nkosi yokulunga, ngaphambi kobungcwele, lobuhle lomsa wakho, kuguqa phansi konke.
3. E! Nkosi yokukhanya, ngaphambi kobungcwele, lenkazimulo yakho, kunyamalala konke.
Sr. M. Desderia O.P.
E.title: E! Nkosi yobukhosi

E.lyrics:
1. Ezulwini ngiloBaba, lelibizo liyiNqaba, kodwa sibanengi thina esicela Baba wethu, ngicelela labo.
2. Nxa ngicela, ngikhumbula, abazali labakithi, labangane bami bonke, ngikhumbula lomfundisi osifundisayo.

3. Bona futhi abahlezi, ebusuku obumnyama, ngiyacelaâ`kuba beze, bakubone ukukhanya, beze kuyâ`uJesu.
E.title: Ezulwini ngiloBaba (201)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkosi sihawukele, thinâ`esiphila ngawe, ungakhumbulâ`izono, lokuphambeka kwethu.
2. Khangela ngomsa kithi, esingabantwabakho; usithumelâ`izulu, lisize amasimu.
3. Usivikelâ`ingozi, zonkâ`ezingasehlela, singonwa yisiqotho, ngumbane langokunye.
4. Okungasilimaza, kuboxotshelwa konke, khatshana kwamakhaya, lemasimini ethu.
5. Ngomusa wakhâ`omkhulu, usibusise sonke, size sikhonze kuwe, silokuthula njalo.
6. Sinike zonkâ`izinto, eziswelekileyo, size sinanzelele, ezakho lazo futhi.
7. Sibonge sidumise, uYise leNdodana, loMoyâ`ongcwele futhi, abaluqobo lunge.
E.title: E! Nkosi sihawukele (231)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Bandla lamakholwa, wozani simbonge, uNinâ`ongelacala kaJesu iNkosi.
Chorus: Ninâ`olungileyo woMsindisi wethu, sithi: E! Nkosikazi, mana kokuphela.
2. Njengoba isithunywa sakubingelela, kanjalo lamakholwa atsho njalo njalo.

3. Ugcwele igrasiya, iNkosi ilawe, ubusisiwe wena esifazaneni.
4. Uwedwa ebantwini, ongangcoliswanga, ngesono sokuvela, mhla usemukelwa.
5. Akusikhulekele, thinâ`esingaboni, usicelele lamhla, lekufeni kwethu.
E.title: E! Bandla lamakholwa (247)

E.lyrics:
Chorus: Ekuhle, ekuhle, ekuhle, ekuhle,
ekuhle, ekuhle Nkosikazi, Mama olomusa.
1. Wena oyisiphephelo sethu, Mama olomusa, lobumnandi lethemba lethu, Mama olomusa.
2. Siyamemeza kuwe thina, ... abakaEva abaxotshiweyo.:.
3. Siyabubula kuwe sikhala, ... kulelilizwe lenyembezi...
4. Ngalokhuke, wena mkhulumeli wethu ... uphendulele kithi...
5. Amehlo akho alomusa ... usitshengise uJesu...
6. Inzalo ebusisiweyo ...
yesisu sakho mhla sifayo...
7. Wena Mariya Virigo elilomusa ...
elichumileyo, elimnandi
J. Vallescas
E.title: Ekuhle, Mama olomusa (248)

E.lyrics:
1. Ekuhle Mariya, Mzali leVirigo, sitshengise phela, uMntanakhâ`uJesu.
2. Wenâ`ongelacala, uyacwazimula, unjengenkanyezi, esebumnyameni.
3. Mkhulumeli wethu, usikhulekele, sizonde izono, sithande okuhle.


4. Uyayazâ`indlela, eya ezulwini,
yiyo yomntanakho, owamzala wena. . UnguMama wethu, londoloza kuhle,
abantwana bakho, abasengozini.
6. Adunyiswâ`uYise, leNdodana yakhe,
loMoya oNgcwele, baluqobo lunye.
E.title: Ekuhle Mariya, Mzali leVirigo (249)

E.lyrics:
1. Ekuhle Mariya, ugcwelâ`igrasiya, ulawe uJesu, iNkosi yethu.
Chorus: Ave, ave, ave Mariya! (2x)  2. Ubongiwe wena, esifazaneni, ibongiwâ`inzalo, yesisu sakho.
3. Mariya oNgcwele, Nina kaJesu, usikhulekele, thina aboni.
4. Ngelanga lokufa, usikhumbule, size singeniswe, sonkâ`ezulwini.
E.title: Ekuhle Mariya (250)

E.lyrics:
Ekuhle Mariya, Ekuhle, ekuhle.
1. Ekuhle Nkosikazi, ekuhle Mariya, ekuhle Virigo
elilomusâ`omkhulu, mananjalo Nkosikazi yezithu-
nywa wena Virigwâ` elithembekayo elingelasici.
2. Mariya Msizi wami, Virigwâ` elilungileyo sikhulekele
Virigo. Singabantwana bakho mana njalo Mama wethu, Mariya Mana njalo Nkosikazi yezithunywa zaphezulu.
3. Khangela phansi kithi Mama weBandla, alimisâ`u- Jesu Kristu ngenxa yethu, emhlabeni Qinisâ`ukholo lwethu. Nkosikazi yezithunywa, Qinisâ`ukholo lwethu Nina woMsindisi wethu.
4. Virigwâ` elilamandla, Virigo elilodumo sibonelo sokulunga, Nina woMdali wethu Mthabisi wethu lubâ`elingumangaliso; Themba labezono Msizi wamakholwa wonke.
C. Zikhali
E.title: Ekuhle Nkosikazi (251)

E.lyrics:
Ekuhle,
Nkosikazi mamâ`olomusa oyisiphephelo sethu Lobumnandi bethu,
Lethemba lethu ekuhle Mama olomusa Siyamemeza,
Kuwe thina abakaEva abaxotshiweyo
Siyabubula,
Kuwe sikhala kulelilizwe lezinyembezi
Ngakho-ke wena,
Mkhulumeli wethu phendulela kithâ`amehlo akhâ`alomusa Usitshengise,
UJesu oyinzalo ebusisiweyo yesisu sakho
mhla sifayo,
Wena Mariya Virigâ`elilomusa elichumileyo elimnandi.
R. Phiri
E.title: Ekuhle Nkosikazi (629)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkanyezi enhle, ntuba yaphezulu, Ninâ`obongekayo, kaJesu Kristu.
Chorus: Usikhangele ngomusa, usicelele kuJesu, wena Mama wethu.
2. Siyaphindâ`ilizwi, lesithunywa sithi: wenâ`ubusisiwe, Nina woMsindisi. 3. Akusikhulule, kukho konkâ`okubi,
esibanjwe yikho, ngamacala ethu. 4. UnguMama wethu, osithanda njalo; sicelelâ`uthando, kumntanakhâ`uJesu.
5. Wena, mpoko enhle, nanzi inhliziyo, zethu thina zoni, zenze zibe mhlophe.
6. Ukhanyisâ`indlela, esihamba ngayo, sifumanâ`uJesu sithokoze njalo.
E.title: E! Nkanyezi enhle (252)

E.lyrics:
1. E! Nkosikazi yaphezulu: O! Mariya! Virigo kumavirigo onke: O! Mariya.
Chorus: Thokozanini zingelosi, sidumise sonke sithi:
Yethi, yethi, yethi Mariya!
2. Sivume sibâ`ngabantwabakho: O! Mariya!
Thinâ`esikholwa kuMntanakho: O! Mariya! 3. Mhla sisukayo emhlabeni: O! Mariya! Usise kuMntanakhâ`uJesu: O! Mariya!
E.title: E! Nkosikazi yaphezulu (253)

E.lyrics:
1. Ekuhle, Mondli woMsindisi, ekuhle mgcini woMkhululi. Josef,â` wenâ`othandekayo, Josef,â` wenâ`othandekayo.
2. Ekuhle, myeni kaMariya, ekuhle, nceku yophezulu.
Josef odumisekayo, Josefâ`odumisekayo.
3. E, yayimnandi iminyaka, lazo insuku zakho zonke,
ekondleni uMsindisi, ekondleni uMsindisi. 4. E, sasisihle, silodumo, lesisikhundla sakho,
Josefa, sokugcina uSomandla, sokugcina uSomandla.
E.title: Ekuhle, Mondli woMsindisi

E.lyrics:
1. E! Theresia, mpoko enhle, mthandi owobuncinyane. Wabulondoloza kuhle ubumhlophe benhliziyo. Wathandeka kuMsindisi, onguMthandi wabantwana. Sicelele, siyancenga, sithandeke lathi kuye.
2. Wawumuhlâ`umoya wakho, wazithoba ngenhliziyo, wamlandela uMsindisi, usithwelâ`isiphambano. Wawumthandâ`uJesu yedwa, ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, lathi sibe lokumthanda, ngokuba wawumthanda.
3. E! Theresia, sehlisele, amaluba akhâ`amnandi, ugcwalisâ`isithembiso owasenza ungakafi: Wathi: Lapho ezulwini uzahlalâ`usikhumbula usenzelâ`okuhle njalo, ngokucela kuMsindisi
4. E! Theresia, lubâ`elihle, sicelele kuMsindisi,
asisize engozini, singaweli ezonweni, silingise wena njalo, siseselapha emhlabeni. Khona kothi sifayo, singeniswe ezulwini
E.title: E! Theresia, Mpoko enhle

E.lyrics:
1. E! sithunywa esingigcinayo, ebusuku lasemini, ulomusa, ngiyabonga.
Ngesinanzo sakho kimi, ngesinanzo sakho kimi.
2. Nxa ngiduha, ungavumi, uqondisâ`indlela yami; lapha kungiyengâ`okubi,
ngivikele msizi wami, ngivikele msizi wami.
3. Uphumuzâ`umoya wami, lapha sengisekufeni, ungise ekhaya lami,
ngiphumule ebuhleni, ngiphumule ebuhleni.
E.title: E! Sithunywa esingigcinayo

E.lyrics:
Chorus: Ezandleni zakho Nkosi
ngiyawubeka uMoya wami. (2x)
1. UJesu wathi: Inhliziyo zenu kazingathazeki,
kholwani kuNkulunkulu, likholwe lakimi. . Ekhaya likaBaba kukhona izindlu ezinengi,
ngiyahamba ukuyalilungisela indawo. 3. Ngiyabuya futhi ngilamukele,
ukuze lapho ngikhona libekhona lani.
4. Nkosi muphe ukuphumula okungapheliyo,
lokukhanya okulaphakade kumkhanyele.
(c/f Joha 14,1-6) P. A. Ndlovu
E.title: Ezandleni zakho (235)

E.lyrics:
Nansi lesisidlo, ngumzimba wami Watsho uJesu kubafundi.
Dlanini lesisidlo, ngumzimba wami Yenzani lokhu ngize ngibu...ye Nanti iGazi, iGazi leMvana... Watshâ`uJesu kubaFundi...
Lowo owomileyo, keze anathe... Yenzani lokhu ngize ngibu...ye
M. J. Moffat
E.title: Eyokuphendukisa

G.lyrics:
1. Gazâ`elihle leNkosi, elasusa izono izono zomhlaba, akusigezise lathi
2. Gazâ`elihle leNkosi, elopha ezandleni, zeNkosi yethu uJesu, akusigezise lathi.
3. Gazâ`elihle leNkosi, elopha enyaweni, zeNkosi yethu uJesu, akusigezise lathi. 4. Gazâ`elihle leNkosi, elopha ohlangothini,
lweNkosi yethu uJesu akusigezise lathi.
V. Hlabano
G.title: Gazâ`elihle

H.lyrics:
1. Hlokomani, aleluya, lithokoze, aleluya, ngalolusuku, aleluya sidumise!
Chelesani, aleluya; kuzelwâ`iNkosi, aleluya, yezulu lomhlaba! aleluya sidumise!
Chorus: Ndodana, Ndodana aleluya; Eyodwa, eyodwa, aleluya
ekaNkulunkulu uBaba, aleluya, siqinise! 

2. Lina makholwa, jabulanini, nangâ`uMsindisi, sidumise. Esamthenjiswa, nguNkulunkulu, yena uqobo, sidumise.
3. Mariyâ`oNgcwele, Josef âoNgcwele, nansâ`iNdodana, sidumise. UJesâ`uKristu, olelâ`emgwembeni esitebeleni! sidumise.
4. Lazâ`izithunywa, ziyadumisa, udumo lweNkosi, sidumise. EBetlehema, labâ`abelusi, badumisâ`iNkosi, sidumise.
5. Yiyo iNkosi, iNkosi yamakhosi, yezulu lomhlaba, sidumise, Wena nkanyezi, ekhazimulayo, kulâ`umntwanâ`omuhle, sidumise.
6. Ngesandla sakho, usibusise, Msindisi womhlaba, sidumise. Siphâ`ukuthula, lothando lwakho kiwo wonkâ`umhlaba, sidumise.

W. Hlabano
H.title: Hlokomani

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hosana hosana, hosana kweliphezulu, hosana. (2x)
1. Ubusisiwe wena ozayo kithi, hosana ugcwele uthando lesihawu, hosana.
2. INkosi yaya emzini waseJerusalema, hosana sekusele insuku eziyisithupha,
zomkhosi omkhulu wePhasika, hosana.
3. Abantwana bayihlangabeza, hosana bezunguza amahlamvu amalala, behlokoma bedumisa iNkosi besithi, hosana.
(Hubo 24,7-10) B. Ndlovu
H.title: Hosana, hosana

H.lyrics:
Hosana, hosana, hosana
Hosana, hosana, kweliphezulu Ubusisiwe, ozayo, ngebizo leNkosi ozayo, ozayo, ngebizo leNkosi.
1. Hosana kuyo iNdodana iNdodana kaDavida, hosana. 2. Hosana kuyo iNkosi yakolsrayeli, hosana.
3. Ubusisiwe ozayo kithi, hosana.
B. Ndlovu
H.title: Hosana kuyo iNdodana

H.lyrics:
1. Hambanini, emazweni, lifike, libatshele
lithini na? sekuvukile, ngani na? ngobukhosi.

2. Hambanini, lijabule ngokuba, sevukile njengoba, kulotshiwe ngaphi na? embhalweni.
C. Zikhali
H.title: Hambanini lifike libatshele

H.lyrics:
1. Hubelani iNkosi ngokuthokoza, uNkulunkulu olesihawu. Wozani bantu lani zidalwa zonke, libonge umusa kaNkulunkulu.
INkosi ibahlengile.
Chorus: Nkosi, INkosi ibahlengile, abantu bayo, aleluya. Bass: INkosi ibahlengile abantu bayo aleluya
Phumani,
Phumani limemezele lokhu ngelizwi lokuthokoza, aleluya.
B: Phumani limemezele lokhu ngelizwi lokuthokoza, aleluya.
2. Wozani libone izenzo zeNkosi, emangalisayo, uNkulunkulu. Useyiphilisile iNdodana yakhe, efele thina abonileyo.
3. Bonganâ`uNkulunkulu lira zizwe zonke, oyiSimakade uyesabeka.
Usisindisile ngeNdodana yakhe, ethandekayo kuye uBaba.
4. NgolwesiHlanâ`iNkosi uJesu yafa, yasisindisa ngesiphambano. Ngosuku lwePhasika wavuka njalo, engonqobâ`ukufa lakho konkâ`okubi.

B. Ncube
H.title: Hubelani INkosi ngokuthokoza

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hlabelelani, iNkosi ngokuthaba, hlabelelani, lina Bantu bomhlaba wonke. (2x)
1. Ikhonzeni iNkosi, ngokujabula, lize phambi kwayo, ngokuhlabela.
2. Yazini ukuthiâ`iNkosi, nguNkulunkulu, yiyo eyasenzayo, singabayo.
3. Ngenani emasangweni, ethempeli lakhe, lasemagumeni, alo ngokudumisa.
4. Bongani lidumise, ibizo layo, ibongeni iNkosi, ngobâ`ilungile. 5. Uthando lwayo, alulakuphela,
lobuqotho bayo, kuzizukulwane.
6. Udumo alube kuYise, beleNdodana.
Udumo alube kuMoya oyiNgcwele.
7. Njengoba kwakunjalo, ekuqaleni, kusenjalo
lakhathesi, kuzakuba njalo laphakade.
(Hubo 100) A. Gwenelo
H.title: Hlabelelani, iNkosi ngokuthaba (202)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hlabelelani iNkosi, Hlabelelanâ`iNkosi mhlaba wonke
Ikhonzeni iNkosi,
ikhonzenâ`iNkosi ngokujabula.
1. Ngoba yiyo, Eyasenzayo singabantu bayo,
singabayo lezimvu zedlelo layo.
2. INkosi iyabusa, iphakeme phezu kwezizwe zonke,
Zidumisâ`ibizo layo, zidumisâ`ibizo layâ`elingcwele.
3. Zonke zithi, ingcwele ingcwele iNkosi yamabandla,
izulu lomhlaba kugcwele inkazimulo yayo.
4. UMose loSamuyeli, babe phakathi kwabakhulekayo.
Ebizweni leNkosi. Bakhulekâ`eNkosini yabaphendula. 5. Yakhuluma yakhuluma labo iphakathi kwelifu,
Nkosi khumbulâ`endulo uthele umusa wakho.
(Hubo 100) C. Zikhali
H.title: Hlabelelani iNkosi mhlaba wonke

H.lyrics:
1. Hlala, hlala, hlala lathi, Nkosi, zitshi, zitshi, zitshiseke njalo,
inhli, inhli, inhliziyo zethu
ngomli, ngomli, ngomlilo wothando!
Chorus: Seku, sekuhlwile, seku, sekuhlwile! Siyesaba, awu, hlala lathi Nkosi!
Siyakuncenga, sithi, hlala lathi Nkosi!
Jesu Kristu, awu, hlala lathi Nkosi! 2. Woba, woba, woba lathi Nkosi,
zitshi, zitshi, zitshiseke njalo, inhli, inhli, inhliziyo zethu,
woba, ngomli, ngomlilo wothando.
3. Nqoba, nqoba, nqoba lathi Nkosi! zitshi, zitshi, zitshiseke njalo,
inhli, inhli, inhliziyo zethu
ngomli, ngomli, ngomlilo wothando!

4. Hamba, hamba, hamba lathi Nkosi zitshi, zitshi, zitshiseke njalo,
inhli, inhli, inhliziyo zethu
hamba, ngomli, ngomlilo wothando!
(c/f Luka 24,13-34) B. Ndlovu
H.title: Hlala lathi, Nkosi (155)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hosana, hosana hosana, hosana, kweliphezulu! (2x)
Ubusisiwe,ubusisiwe odlayo, uMzimba, uMzimba weNkosi! Ubusisiwe, ubusisiwâ`onathayo, iGazi, iGazi leNkosi!
Dlanini lokhu, nguMzimba wami. Nathani lokhu, liGazi lami. Yezani lokhu, lingikhumbula. Yenzani lokhu, ngize ngibuye. UMzimba wami ungokudliwayo; leGazi lami lingokunathwayo.
1. UJesu wathi kubaJuda:
Mina ngiyiSinkwa esehla sivela ezulwini, Hosana2. Wathi: Uba umuntu esidla lesiSinkwa uzakuphila kokuphela, Hosana...
3. Wathi: Odla iNyama yami, anathe iGazi lami, uhlala kimi lami ngihlala kuye, Hosana...
4. Wathi: iNyama yami iyikudla isibili, leGazi lami lingokunathwayo sibili, Hosana...
5. Wathi: Uba lingadli iNyama yeNdodana yomuntu, linganathi iGazi layo kalilakuphila phakathi kwenu, Hosana...
6. Wathi: Odla iNyama yami anathe iGazi lami ngizakumvusa ngosuku lokucina, Hosana...
B. Ndlovu
H.title: Hosana, Hosana, ubusisiwe odlayo (156)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi hamba lathi, hamba lathi Nkosi, hamba lathi, emakhaya ethu (2x)
1. Nkosi siyakuncenga, usilondoloze Sivikele, Nkosi engozini zonke.
2. Kristu siyacela, siphathise Nkosi,
ebuhlungwini, siphâ`impilo enhle.
3. Lani zithunywa zezulu, lisikhulekele
Moya oyiNgcwele, hlala lathi njalo. 4. Kristu, susa kithi izikhubekiso
Ekhayâ`elihle, singenise sonke.
N. Lunga
H.title: Hamba lathi emakhaya

H.lyrics:
1. Hamba lathi Nkosi, emakhaya, hamba lathi Nkosi emakhaya. (2x)
2. Sikhokhele Kristu, Ndodana eyodwa, ezelwe nguMariya, Mariya oyiNgcwele. (2x)

3. Sivulelâ`indlela, eya ezulwini,
kuBaba wethu, iNkosi yodumo. (2x)
B. Maseko
H.title: Hamba lathi Nkosi (180)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hambani liye, emazweni wonke, lenze izizwe, zibe ngabafundi bami, Aleluya, Aleluya.
1. Okholwayo kimi, abhabhathizwe, uzasindiswa, aphile njalo.
2. Ongakholwayo, uzakulahlwa, ayâ`ekufeni, kwalaphakade.
3. Libafundise, ukwenza konke,
engalitshela, ukuba likwenze. 4. Khangelani mina, ngilani njalo,
insuku zonke lasekucineni.
5. Njengoba uBaba, wathuma mina,
kanjalo lami, ngithuma lina.
6. Kodwa ngilithuma, linjengezimvu,
phakathi kwempisi, eziphangayo. 7. Lizasiwa phambi, kwabahluphayo,
balihluphele, iGama lami.
8. Ofuna ukuba, ngumfundi wami,
kathwalâ`isiphambano, angilandele. . Isivuno sami, sikhulâ`impela;
izisebenzi, ziselutshwana. 10. Celani kuMninisivuno lesi, athumele kiso, izisebenzi.
(Mat 28,19-28;Joha 20,21;Luka 10,16-23) B. Ndlovu
H.title: Hambani liye emazweni wonke (181)

H.lyrics:
1. Hambanini, hambanini, hambanini,
emazweni wonke. (2x)
2. Libatshele, ukwenza konke,
engalilaya ukuba likwenze. 3. Libhabhathize, ebizweni,
likaYise, leleNdodana.
Libhabhathize, ebizweni leNdodana, loMoya oNgcwele. 4. Khangelani, Mina ngilani,
insuku zonke lasekucineni.
M. Majahana
H.title: Hambanini (182)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hambanini loJesu, Hambanini,

Lina makholwa, Hambanini loJesu. (2x) 1. Ekuhluphekeni... Ekuthokozeni...
Ekusebenzeni... Ekuphumuleni...2. Ekuguleni... Ekukhathaleni...
Ekuphileni... lasekucineni...
B. Sawada
H.title: Hambanini loJesu (183)

H.lyrics:
Okhalelayo:  Hlala lathi, (2x)
Abavumayo:   Hlala lathi litshonile ilanga.
 Okhalelayo:   Tshonilâ`ilanga.
  Abavumayo:  Ubusuku sebufikile Nkosi.
  Okhalelayo:  Mangingasali. (2x)
  Abavumayo:   Mangingasali ngingelaMsizi.
  Okhalelayo:   NgingelaMsizi.
  Abavumayo:   UMsizi wami nguwe Jesu wami.

  C. Zikhali.
H.title: Hlala lathi (595)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hamba kuhle, Hamba kuhle
mhlobo wethu, mhlobo wethu Sobonana, Sobonana, kwelizayo Lala kuhle, Lala kuhle
mhlobo wethu, mhlobo wethu Sobonana, Sobonana, kwelizayo.
1. Mariyâ`oNgcwele, Nina kaJesu, Hamba laye kuNkulunkulu.
2. Josefâ`oNgcwele, Mondli kaJesu, Hamba laye kuNkulunkulu.
3. Sithunywa sakhe, lomngcwele wakhe, Hambani laye kuNkulunkulu.

4. Lina zithunywa zasezulwini, Hambani laye kuNkulunkulu.
5. Lina bangcwele elisezulwini, Hambani laye kuNkulunkulu. 6. Bokhokho bakhe elisezulwini,
Hambani laye kuNkulunkulu 7. Zinini zakhe elisezulwini,
Hambani laye kuNkulunkulu. 8. Bangane bakhe elisezulwini,
Hambani laye kuNkulunkuluV Dube
H.title: Hamba kuhle (603)

H.lyrics:
Chorus: Hamba kuhle, hamba kuhle sihlobo sethu. (2x). Utshiyile lumhlaba, uphumulile ebunzimeni.
1. Makholwa asimkhulekeleni omunye wethu.
2. Singamkhaleli okwakhe kuphelile.
3. Sizikhaleleni thina labantwabethu. Chorus:
4. Ngoba ziyeza insuku kithi, abazakutsho ngazo.
5. Ukuthi zibusisiwe inyumba lamabele angamunywanga6. Nkulunkulu mhlangabeze umntanakho. Chorus:
E. Nkomo
H.title: Hamba kuhle sihlobo sethu (543)

H.lyrics:
1. Mariya oNgcwele nangu umntanakho.
Chorus: Hamba laye kuNkulunkulu.
2. Wena mngcwele wakhe, lawe sithunywa sakhe
esimlondolozayo, nangu umuntu wenu...
3. Lina zithunywa labangcwele bonke, nanso isinini
senu...
4. Lina bokhokho bakaYise abasitshiyayo, nangu
umntanenu...

5. Lina bokhokho bakhe laboyisemkhulu bakhe bonke, lazo zonke izihlobo zikaYise ezafayo, nangu umntanenu...
6. Lina abakonina wakhe bonke abafayo, nangu umntanenu...
7. Lina lonke bomalumakhe, labogogo labokhulu babokhulu bakhe, nangu umntanenu...
8. Lina zihlobo zakhe zonke labangane bakhe bonke, abafayo nansi isihlobo senu...
H.title: Hamba laye kuNkulunkulu

H.lyrics:
1. Hamba leNkosi nhliziyo yami, Chorus: Uhlale layo, Nkosi, uhlale layo,
Nkosi, Nkosi Nkosâ`elamandla. 2. Hamba leNkosi lasekujabuleni.
3. Hamba leNkosi lasosizini lwakho. 4. Hamba leNkosi lasekuhluphekeni. 5. Hamba leNkosi lasekuguleni6. Hamba leNkosi lasekufeni kwakho. 7. Hamba leNkosi mphefumulo wami. 8. Hlala leNkosi kuze kube lanini.
H.title: Hamba leNkosi (236)

I.lyrics:
1. INdodana, INdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Yaba ngumntwa, yaba ngumntwana ngenxa yethu.
2. Nangâ`uJesu, nangâ`uJesu usezelwe eBhetlehema,
esitebeleni.
Obhalweni, obhalweni, singeke sonke.
3. Ugoqelwe, ugoqelwe ngengubâ`emhlophe. Usemtshoko, usemtshokotshweni ulele.
4. Asimenze, asimenzelâ`amehlâ`amhlophe, UNinâ`uMa, uNinâ`uMariya oNgcwele.


5. Wena Mama, wena Mama othandekayo. Usilondo, usilondoloze loJesu.
6. Thandanani, thandananâ`ezintweni zonke. Lizakuba, lizakuba ngabantwabami.
7. Libatshele, libatshele abantu bonke.
Sesizale, sesizalelwe uMkhululi.
I.title: INdodana kaNkulunkulu

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosâ`uJesu inguMahluleli, inguMkhululi, iyingaba. (2x)
1. Ingumkhululi wabasosizini. InguMsilisi wabagulayo. INkosâ`uJesu...
2. InguMduduzi wabasengozini. InguMalusi wezintandane. INkosâ`uJesu...
3. InguMeluleki wabathandabuzi.
InguMkhokheli wabasemnyameni. INkosâ`uJesu...
E. Nkomo
I.title: INkosâ`uJesu inguMahluleli (77)

I.lyrics:
1. Inhliziyo yakho Jesu, ilomusa, ithobile, ingumthombo wokuthanda. Akuzenzâ`ezethu lazo, ziyifuze, ziyithande, njengalokhu isithanda.
2. Ngiyakhala inyembezi, Jesu omuhle othandwayo, ngoba inhliziyo yakho yadabuka yahlupheka, ngenxa yamacala ami, yafa kabuhlungu ngami.
3. Mfeli wami, Jesu omuhle, ake ngangi izandla zakho, lezinyawo lenhliziyo, ngoba wophi iGazi ngami, ubethelwâ`esiphambanweni, uhlawulelâ`izono zami.
4. Wangidinga ngiduhile, wangikhupha ngibotshiwe, wangikhupha emnyameni; sengibongâ`uthando lwakho, owangisindisa ngalo, mina engingabongiyo.
5. E! Nhliziyo yoMsindisi, wena themba labafayo, besabambelele kuwe; mhla sisuka kulumhlaba, uzusamukele sonke, embusweni wezulwini.
I.title: Inhliziyo yakho Jesu

I.lyrics:
1. ILizwi lakho, Nkosi, yisibane esilaphakade. (2x)
2. ILizwi lakho, Nkosi, yikukhanya okulaphakade. (2x)
3. Ilizwi lakho, Nkosi, yikuphila okulaphakade. (2x)
4. ILizwi lakho, Nkosi, liqiniso elilaphakade. (2x)
5. Aleluya, Aleluya, Amen (3x) Aleluya, laphakade.
B. Ndlovu (South African Tune)
I.title: Ilizwi lakho, Nkosi (555)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INdodana, iNdodana yoMuntu izahlala esihlalweni sayo
esobukhosi, esobukhosi bayo,
yahlukanise ababi kwabalungileyo. 1. Njengomalusi, esehlukanise izimvu lembuzi,
abeke izimvu ngakwesokunene, imbuzi ngakwesokhohlo. 2. INkosi izakuthi kwabangakwesokunene,
wozani kimi lina elibusisiweyo,
lidle ilifa elililungiselwe nguBaba.
3. Ngoba ngangilambile, langinika ukudla
ngangomile langinathisa,
ngangingowemzini langingenisa endlini. 4. INkosi izakuthi kwabangakwesokhohlo,
sukani kimi lina eliqalekisiweyo,
liye emlilweni kaSathane lezithunywa zakhe. 5. Ngoba ngangilambile, alinginikanga ukudla
ngangomile alinginathisanga, ngangingowemzini alingingenisanga endlini.
S. Dube
I.title: INdodana yoMuntu (512)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi ingithumile,

ukuba ngitshumayelâ`iVangeli, Bass: Ithi yona.
Bonke: Kakusini elingikhethileyo, Bass: Kodwa, ngomusa wami. Bonke: Yimi engilikhethileyo.
1. Okhalelayo: Wabalaya ukuba bangaphathi lutho lwendlela
Bonke: Kodwa - ilizwi lodwa.
Okhalelayo: - Lapho lingena endlini hlalani kiyo

Bonke: Lize - lisuke khona.
2. Okhalelayo: Hambani liyo tshumayelâ`iVangeli
Bonke: Emhla - beni.
Okhalelayo: Bakhupha omoya ababi kwabanengi
Bonke: Bahlanjuluwa.

3. Okhalelayo: Basilisa abanengi abagulayo,
Bonke: Basi - liswa.
Emhla - beni.
 


4. Okhalelayo: Basiliswa ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele
 Bonke: Aba - kholwayo.
(c/f Joha 15,16; Isa 61,1) C. Nyoni
I.title: INkosi ingithumile (585)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: Aleluya, iNkosâ`uNkulunkulâ`inginikile Aleluya, ulimi lofundisayo,
Aleluya, lokwazâ`ukuba ngiduduze, abakhatheleyo. (2x)
1. INkosi ingivusâ`ekuseni nsuku zonke. Ukuba ngeze njengofundisiweyo.
2. UNkulunkulâ`uvulâ`indlebe yami, Lami angihlamukanga.
3. Lowo ophakathi kwenu owesabâ`iNkosi, kalalele ilizwi lenceku yayo.
4. Ohambâ`emnyamenâ`ongelakukhanya, kathembele ebizweni leNkosi.
(Mat 13,55) C. Gumbo.
I.title: INkosâ`uNkulunkulu inginikile (583)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi ingumalusi wami, kangiyikuswela lutho.
1. INkosi iyangelusela emadlelweni aluhlaza, ingise endaweni elamanzi amahle.
2. Ivuselela umphefumulo wami,
ingihole endleleni zokulunga ngenxa yebizo layo.
3. Loba ngidabula esihotsheni esimnyama, kangesabi okubi, ngoba wena ulami.
4. Uyalungisa itafula phambi kwami, laphambi kwezitha zami.
5. Ugcoba ikhanda lami ngamagcobo, umganu wami ugcwele uyaphuphuma.
6. Impela okuhle lesihawu kuzangilandela, insuku zonke zokuphila kwami.
7. Ngizahlala endlini yeNkosi, kuze kube nininini.

(Hubo 23)
I.title: INkosi ingumalusi wami (124)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi ithi: Memeza ngelizwi, elikhulu ungathuli (2x)
Bass: Memeza (2x) elikhulu ungathuli. 1. Utshelâ`abantu bami, iziphambeko zabo,
lendlu kaJakobe izono zayo.
2. Bayangidingâ`insuku zonke,
Bathandâ`ukwazi indlela zami.
3. Bebuza kimi izahlulelo zokulunga,
Bethandâ`ukusondela, kuNkulunkulu.
4. Kuthi ukulunga kwakho kuhambe phambi kwakho,
Lenkazimulo yeNkosi ihambe, ngemva kwakho. 5. Kuthi lapho ukhuleka iNkosi ikuphendule.
Lalapho umemeza, izakuthi ngilapha
Isa 40,6) T.Mlilo
I.title: INkosi ithi memeza (556)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: Woba ngoNgcwele - woba ngoNgcwele - njengoMose (2x)
1. Ngizakuhlabela... ngothando lwakho olungapheliyo, Nkosi kuze kube nininini.
2. Ngomlomo... ngizakwazisa,
ubuqotho bakho kuzozonkâ`izizukulwane.
3. Ngoba uthando lwakho... olungapheliyo, lumi kuze kube nini lanini.
4. Izimangaliso - zakho, Nkosi, zidunyiswa ngamazulu. 5. Kayibongwe iNkosi - kuze kube, nini lanini Amen.
I.title: INkosi yangiphakamisa

I.lyrics:
Chorus: Izulu, Izulu lomhlaba kuzaphela, kuzaphela, kodwâ`amazwi akho kawapheli.
1. Ilizwi lakho lilunge kakhulu, yakho isikhonzi sakho silifuna.
2. Imilayo yakho ilunge laphakade, ingifundisâ`ukuthi ngisindiswe. 3. Inhliziyo yami iqalisâ`ebusuku,
ukucabanga amazwi akho.
c/f Luka 21,33)
I.title: Izulu lomhlaba kuzaphela (125)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi kayemukele
lumthethelo, lumthethelo ezandleni zakho ukuze, ukuze kubongwe kudunyiswe ibizo, ibizo layo
lokuba, lokuba kusizakale thina
lalolonke iBandla layo elingcwele.
B. Ncube
I.title: INkosi kayemukele lumthethelo (140)

I.lyrics:
P. INkosi kayibe lani
B. Kayibe lawe njalo
P. Phakamisani inhliziyo zenu B. Siziphakamisele eNkosini
P. Asibongeni iNkosi, uNkulunkulu wethu Bass: Kufanele sibili, Kufanele Nkosi, Kufanele
kulungile. (2x)
Ngempela kufanele njalo kulungile, Ukuba ngezikhathi zonke sikubonge sikudumise Wena Baba. NgoJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu, Ngoba wasitshengisa uthando lwakhe olukhulu.
Ngokuzalwa kweNdodana yakho eyaba ngumuntu njengathi, Ukuza kwayo kithi kusenza silangathele ukufika kuwe eZulwini.
Ngalokhu-ke, zonke izidalwa eziseZulwini, Lezise- mhlabeni, ziyakuhubela, ihubo elitsha lokukudumisa. Lathi sikanye lezithunywa zaseZulwini, sihubela ubu- khosi bakho obungapheliyo, iHubo lendumiso sisithi
V. W. D. Hlabano
I.title: INkosi kayibe lani â1â (558)

I.lyrics:
Inkosi kayibe lani
Kayibe lawe njalo
Phakamisani, inhliziyo zenuSiziphakamisele eNkosini
Asibongeni iNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu Kufanele, kulungile
Umpristi:
1. Ngempela kufanele, njalo kulungile, ukuba ngezikhathi zonke lasezindaweni zonke, Ngempela, kufanele, njalo kulungile, ukuba, sikudumise laninini.

2. Sikubonge, sikudumise Baba, ngoJesu Kristu
iNkosi yethu.
3. Ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele aba nguMuntu,
wazalwa liVirigo uMariya.
4. Ngenxa yethu welula izingalo zakhe eSiphambanweni, wanqoba ukufa, wabonakalisa amandla okuvuka ekufeni.
5. Ngalesosenzo waphelelisa iNtando yakho, wakumisela isizwe esingcwele.
6. Ngakho-ke, sihlanganyela lezithunywa zasezulwini, ndawonye labangcwele bonke, sihubela ubukhosi sisithi.
Bonke: Ngempela, kufanele, njalo kulungile, ukuba, sikudumise laninini-ni.
B. Ndlovu
I.title: INkosi kayibe lani (613)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: Iyukaristiya yini na? YiSidlo esiNgcwele. (2x)
LinguMhlatshelo wokubonga LinguMthethelo wesikhumbuzo YiSidlo esiNgcwele. (2x)
1. NgoLwesine lokucina, uJesu wamisa, lesiSidlo; wathatha isinkwa, wasibusisa wabapha wathi: Dlanini lokhu, nguMzimba wami; (2x)
Yenzani lokhu, lingikhumbula
Yenzani lokhu, ngize ngibuye.
Wathatha lenkezo, wayibusisa, wabapha wathi:
Nathani lokhu, liGazi lami, (2x) Yenzani lokhu, lingikhumbula Yenzani lokhu, ngize ngibuye.
2. Odlayo lesiSinkwa, ulokuphila kwalaphakade; lonathayo linkezo, ulokuphila kwalaphakade, ngoba wathi: Dlanini lokhu...
3. Uma lisabelana, lesâ` iSidlo esinguKristu, libobusisana, lixolelane, ngokuthandana, ngoba wathi: Dlanini lokhu...
Wathatha lenkenzo, wayibusisa wabapha wathi: Nathani lokhu...
4. Libe lokumanyana, kulesiSidlo lokuthandana. Lingakhohlwâ`abayanga, abaswelayo,
ngoMzimba wakhe, ngoba wathi: Nathani lokhu... IYukaristiya yini na?
M. Majahana
I.title: IYukaristiya yini na? (638)

I.lyrics:
1. Izindimi zabo bonke. Zidumisâ`iSakramente, okukilo nguMsindisi owahlatshwa ngenxa yethu. wophi Gazi kabuhlungu ehlawuleli izono zethu.
2. Wayevele ezulwini - wabâ`ngumuntu ngenxa yethu. Wayehamba emhlabeni ehlanyelâ`ilizwi lakhe. Usehlezi lathi njalo kuleli Sakramente.
3. Ekudleni kokucina walimisâ`iSakramente, elisondla endleleni eya le khaya lethu. LiyiNyama yoMsindisi, liliGazi lakhe futhi.
4. Yenâ`uJesu olamandla - waphendula ngezwi lakhe wenzâ`isinkwa sabâ`yiNyama lewayini labaliGazi. Yikukholwa okungcwele okusifundisa lokhu.
I.title: Izindimi zabo zonke

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi yezulu ilibusise, libe lempilo enhle, libe lomuzi omuhle, libe lempilo enhle.
1. Uba iNkosi, ingayakhi indlu yabo, basebenzela ize abayakhayo.
2. Uba iNkosi, ingawulondolozi umuzi wabo kulize ukulinda komlindi wawo.
3. Kakube khonâ`ukuthula kubo Baba lokulondolozeka phakathi kwabo.
4. Amadodanâ`ayisiphâ`esivelâ`eNkosini abantwana bangumvuzo ovela kiyo.
(c/f Hubo 127,1-2) J. Masotsha
I.title: INkosi yezulu ilibusise (537)

I.lyrics:
1. Inhliziyo ngumfakazi, yiyo engitshelayo. Ngizamazâ`uMdali wami, loba sengihlupheka. Kuthonisa emoyeni, izazela zethu,
Kufanele simcenge, sizahlambuluka.
2. Ngikhuthaza nhliziyo yami, ngidumise iNkosi. Ngiqondisâ`indlelâ`eyiyo, eya ekukhanyeni. Khona kothi mhla ngifayo, ngemukelwe kuhle. Ngingeniswâ`ezulwini, ekhayâ`elimnandi.
3. Nhliziyo yami, nhliziyo yami, lamhla ngithembe wena. Engikwenza kulumhlaba, kufakazelwa nguwe. Angisoze ngenze lutho, ongalwazi wena. Umkhokheli nguwe wena, ngilandela emva.
W. Hlabano
I.title: Inhliziyo ngumfakazi (203)

I.lyrics:
Chorus:
Sakâ`bona / Melusi / zikaKristu / iNkosi
Siyakâ`bulisa / Melusi wezimvu/ zikaKristu / iNkosi yethu. Sakubona /Mhlekazi / Sakubona / Mbhishopi Siyakâ`bulisa / Mhlekazi wethu /siyakâ`bulisa /Mbhishopi wethu. 

1. Bass: Sakâ`bona, sakâ`bona, sakâ`ubona Melusi weBandla!
 All: Sakâ`bona, sakâ`bona, Melusi weBandla! 
 All: Sakâ`bona, sakâ`bona, Mbambeli kaPhapha!
 Bass: Sakâ`bona, sakâ`bona, Mbambeli kaPhapha! Siyakâ`jabulela, Mhlekazi wethu
      Siyakwamukela, Mbhishopi wethu. 


2. Bass: Siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga ngalâ`musa wakho!
All:     Siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga ngalâ`musa wakho!
All:     Siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga, ngalâ`musa wakho!
All:     Siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga, ngomsebenzi wakho! 
Bass: Siyakâ`bonga, siyakâ`bonga, ngomsebenzi wakho! Siyakâ`jabulela Mhlekazi wethu. Siyakwamukela Mbhishopi wethu.

3. Bass: Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela ukubonga kwethu
All:  Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela, ukubonga kwethu! 
All: Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela, intokozo yethu!
All: Yamâ`kela, Yamâ`kela, intokozo yethu. Siyakujabulela Mhlekazi wethu. Siyakwamukela Mhlekazi wethu.

4. Bass: Siyacela, siyacela, siyacela, iNkosi ikuphe;
All: Siyacela, siyacela iNkosi ikuphe:
All:  Amandla, lempilo enhle, egcweleyo! 
Bass: Amandla, lempilo, enhle egcweleyo Siyakujabulela Mhlekazi wethu. Siyakwamukela Mbhishopi wethu.

B. Ndlovu
I.title: Ingoma yokubingelela umbhishopi (562)

I.lyrics:
1. 

 Umkhaleli: INkosâ`uJesu yakhuluma yathi 
 Bonke: Akusibo bonke, akusibo bonke 
 Bass: Watshâ`uJesu, watshâ`uJesu 
 Bonke: Abatshoyo kimâ`ukuthi
       Kimâ`ukuthi Nkosi, Nkosi, Abazakungena, Abazakungena - embusweni wezulu.
2. Wasesithi kodwa kuphela
Owenzâ`intando kaBaba, owenzâ`intando
kaBaba nguye kuphela
Watshâ`uJesu, watshâ`uJesu Nguye kuphela
Ngoba akusibo, bonke abazakungena. Abazakungena - embuswenâ`wezulu.
3. Lizakubazi ngezithelo zabo
Isihlahlâ` esihle singethelâ`okubi
singethelâ`okubi lesihlahlâ`esibi Singethelâ`okuhle
Isihlahlâ`esibi singethelâ`okuhle.
(c/f Mat 7,21-33ff} M. Chifana
I.title: INkosi uJesu yakhuluma yathi (563)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosâ`isibekelâ`amazulu (2x) ngamayezi, ilungisele,
iNkosi isibekela mazulu
ngamayezi ilungisele, umhlaba izulu. 1. INkosi kayibe njengezulu elehlela otshanini,
lanjengezihlambo ezithambisa umhlaba. 2. Kakube khona inala yamabele elizweni,
izithelo zihatshazele njengeLebanoni!
3. Imizi kayigcwale abantu njengomhlaba ogcwele utshani,
ibizo leNkosi lime kuze kube nini lanini! 
4. Ngoba iNkosi ilungile; iphumisela ilanga abahle lababi. Inisele izulu layo abalungileyo labangalunganga.
P. Khumalo
I.title: INkosi isibekela amazulu (636)

I.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosi, uNkulunkulu ikukhethile, ube yisibonelo eBandleni layo,
ube yisibonelo emulini zethu. (2x) 1. Wena qhawe leNkosi elikhethiweyo,
fundisa ukholo eBandleni, insuku ngensuku. 2. Thandâ`umsebenzi wakho, owukhethelweyo,
uthande iNkosi yethu, uBabâ`uSomandla. 3. Nkulunkulu Baba, umgcwalise ngolwazi,
wenze inhliziyo yakhe, itshisekele ukulunga.
I. Sikhosana
I.title: INkosi uNkulunkulu ikukhethile (539)

I.lyrics:
1. Izulu lilikhaya engilifunayo.
Kumnandi enhliziyweni ukulikhumbula.
Chorus: Izulu, izulu; izulu lilikhaya, izulu lilikhaya, lilikhaya.
2. Izulu liyintuso uJesâ`uthi kithi: lahlanâ`izono zonke, liyakulizuza.
3. Izulu lilikhaya likaNkulunkulu. Abafikayo kilo bayathaba laye.
I.title: Izulu lilikhaya (237)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu ngiyeza loba ngonile, wena Msindisi ungemukele. Ngoba ngicela kuwe umusa,
Chorus: Ngiphathe ngomusa Jesu. (2x) 2. Khala nhliziyo, khala kakhulu,
kuye othanda bonkâ`abezono.
Uselomusa sisaphilile.
3. Walinyazelwa thina aboni,
wasisindisa ngeGazi lakho. Wawusithanda thina kangaka.
J.title: Jesu ngiyeza

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu wami, Jesâ`omuhle, sengifunâ`ukukubonga. ngamanxeba amahlanu, osulawo ngenxa yami.
2. Ngikhumbulâ`inxebâ`elihle, lesandla sokudla sakho. Ngibusise ngalo Jesu, ngikuthande, ngikukhonze.
3. Ngikhumbulâ`inxebâ`elihle, lesandla sokhohlo sakho. Ngivikele ngalo Jesu, ezitheni zami zonke.
4. Ngikhumbulâ`inxebâ`elihle lonyawo lokudla lwakho. Ngihambise ngalo Jesu, endleleni yokulunga.

5. Ngikhumbulâ`inxebâ`elihle lonyawo lokhohlo lwakho. Ngivimbele ngalo Jesu, ngingasuki kuwe futhi.
6. Ngikhumbulâ`inxeba lakho lasohlangothini lwakho. Ngicatshise kilo, Jesu, ungilondoloze khona.
J.title: Jesu wami, Jesâ`omuhle

J.lyrics:
1. Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani Jabulani Makholwa,
Libongâ`iNkosi ngobâ`ivukile,
Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya (2x)
2. Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani
Jabulani zinsizwa,
lani zintombi litshayâ`amachacho Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya (2x)
3. Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani Jabulani maKristu,
bantwana babantu lithi Aleluya Alelu-ya,
Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya (2x)
4. Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani, Jabulani
Jabulani zinlwandle,
lani Mahlathâ`omhlaba, iNkosâ`inqobile. Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya, Alelu-ya (2x).
C, Zikhali
J.title: Jabulani libonge

J.lyrics:
1. Jabulani lonke ngalolusuku ngobâ`ivukile iNkosi yamakhosi.
Chorus: Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya ivukilâ`iNkosi!
Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya; Aleluya, Aleluya,
iNkosi yamakhosi.
2. Lamhlâ`ungobile ukufa konke, uvukâ`ekufeni, iNkosi... 3. Uhlale lathi kulezinsuku, sikuthande, iNkosi...
4. Kiwo wonkâ`amazwe, kwaba lodumo ngokuvuka
kwakho, iNkosi... 5. Izizwe zonke ziyakwesaba wena Msindisi, iNkosi...

6. Kwakusemnyama besiyâ`elibeni baficâ`lvukile, iNkosi... 7. Bathi kuPhetro eloJohane: Bayikhuphile, iNkosi... 8. Hambani liye kwelaseGalili lizayifica, iNkosi...
W. Hlabano
J.title: Jabulani lonke ngalolusuku

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Jabulani, jabulani lonke, thokozanini Nkosâ`ivukile. Aleluya.
1. INkosâ`ivukile lamhla. Aleluya. Ngobukhosi obukhulu. Aleluya.
2. Inqobilâ`ukufa konke. Aleluya. Yasilethelâ`ukuphila. Aleluya.
3. Sihlabele ngokuthaba. Aleluya. Sidumisâ`uJesu Kristu. Aleluya. 4. Bona kwedlulilâ`ukufa. Aleluya.
Kakuphindâ`afe uKristu. Aleluya. 5. Uzaphila elodumo. Aleluya.
Lobukhosi lenkazimulo. Aleluya. 6. Kadunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu.
Aleluya. Kuze kube laphakade. Aleluya
A. Mahlangu
J.title: Jabulani lonke thokozanini

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Jabulani makholwa, jabulani zizwe zonke ivukilâ`iNkosi yaphumâ`elibeni. (2x)
1. Jabulani lina mandla ezulu, hlokomani, lina maxukâ`ezithunywa, mdumiseni, uNkulunkulu, esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi.
2. Jabulani lina zidalwa ezikuye, mtshayeleni, amatolophito osindiso, uJesu, Kristu, iNkosi yethu isivukile.

3. Jabula wena mhlaba ngenkazimulo, ukhanyisele,ngenkazimulo yeNkosi yakho, uKristu usenqobile,
ubumnyama sebunyamalele kokuphela.
4. Jabula wena Mama oliBandla,
uMsindisi, ovukileyâ`usekhazimula phezu kwakho. Indawo le kayihlokome,
kuzwakalâ`ingomâ`enkulu yabantu bakaNkulunkulu.
A. Gwenelo
J.title: Jabulani makholwa

J.lyrics:
1. Jabulani makholwa lithabe,
limhlabelele ingoma emnandi.
Ngoba uJesu, umfeli wabantu usevukile, waphumâ`elibeni. Usevukile, waphumâ`elibeni.
2. Selikhululwe latholâ`ukuphila, ngaye uJesu, owalisindisa. Ake litshiye ukona sibili,
lize ukumkhonza ovukâ`ekufeni.
3. Lingabuyeli koyisitha kini,
esesinqotshiwe nguJesâ`uMsindisi.
Libolandela owalikhulula, lize lifike kuye ezulwini. Lize lifike kuye ezulwini.
J.title: Jabulani makholwa lithabe

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Jabulanini zizwe zonke, Aleluya lamhla, ngalolusukâ`oluhle, uvukile, uvukilâ`uMsindisi! Jabulanini makholwa lonke, Aleluya lamhla ngalolusukâ`oluhle, uvukile uvukilâ`uMsindisi!
1. Sihlabele ngokuthaba okukhulu, Aleluya lamhla ngalolusukâ`oluhle uvukile uMsindisi
bona kwedlulilâ`ukufa kwakhe! Aleluya
Nguye onguMninimandla onke, Aleluya

2. INdodana yakho, Nkulunkulu, Aleluya yeza lapha kithi emhlabeni, Aleluya izofela thinâ`abantu bakho, Aleluya
3. Nangâ`usephilile futhâ`uKristu, Aleluya owabekwa Yena elibeni! Aleluya Kakuphinda afe futhâ`uKristu. Aleluya
