4. Uzaphila njalo elodumo. Aleluya Asibonge, sidumisâ`iNkosi, Aleluya sidumisâ`iNkosi yethu sonke., Aleluya
J. Mkhwebu
J.title: Jabulanini zizwe zonke

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu ngiyakuphilela, Jesu ngizakukufela. Jesu ngingowakho, khathesi lasekufeni.
2. Ake usihawukele, ake usiphathe ngomusa.
Singenise Jesu, ekhaya lakhwâ`elihle.
3. Jesu wami ngingowakho, lapha phansi emhlabeni.
Ngibe njalâ`owakho, lasezulwini lakho.
4. Jesu, akusiphâ`uxolo, empilweni yethu yonke.
Ngokusixolela, izono zethu zonke.
J.title: Jesu, ngiyakuphilela (78)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu nguwe ongithanda, wazidela ngenxa yami. Weza lapha kulumhlaba, wangifelâ`esâ` phambanweni.
2. O! Angathi ngingathanda, wena Jesu omuhle wami, njengalokhu ungithanda, wenâ`owafa ngenxa yami!
3. Ngikuthande ngokuthanda, ngenhliziyo yami yonke; ngikuthande langamandla, langengqondo yami
yonke. 4. Ngikuthande ngiphilile, ngikuthande ngithabile; ngikuthande ngilusizi; ngikuthande nxa ngigula,
ngikuthande ekufeni.
J.title: Jesu nguwe ongithanda (79)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu Nkosi, Jesu Nkosi. yokuthula, yokuthula Mluleki, Mlulekâ`omangalisayo wezizwe.
Chorus: Siphâ`ukuthula (6x); kanye loxolo. 2. Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu; olamandla,
Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu Nkulunkulu; olamandla. L. Sidambe
J.title: Jesu, Nkosi (80)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu, sengikunikela, inhliziyo yami, ngoba wena uyifuna inhliziyo yami.
2. Nguwe othi: Ngipha yona, kade ngayifisa, Ibâ`ngeyami njalo njalo lapha laphambili.
3. Ilungise, Jesu wami, iyifuzâ`eyakho,
ibe mhlophe, ibe ngcwele, ifanele wena.
J.title: Jesu, sengikunikela (81)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu wami, ngingowakho, uyiNkosi yami, ulithemba lami lonke, ngoba wangifela.
2. Ibizo lakho liNgcwele, livelâ`ezulwini. Limnandi linjengenyosi, emlonyeni wami.
3. Lapho ngifunda ugwalo, amehlo adingani? Lesandla sigwalani na? IBizo lâ`kaJesu.
4. Angikwazi ukuthaba, ngimswela uJesu; ingoma yami inye nje: Yingoma kaJesu.
5. Ngelakho Jesu ibizo, engilibizayo, emini lasebusuku, lamalanga onke.
6. Ulimi lwami luyezwa, ubumnandi halo; lenhliziyo iyathaba, ikhumbula lona.
J.title: Jesu wami, ngingowakho (82)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu nampa thinâ`abakho, size eMiseni, laphâ`uphinda umhlabiso, wasesiphambanweni.
2. Siyavuma phambi kwakho, amacala ethu, sesidabukilâ`impela, ngoba sikonile.

3. Sihawukele Jesâ`omuhle, akusixolele, ugezisâ`izono zethu, eGazini lakho.
4. Senze Nkosi sibe mhlophe, emehlweni akho, usivuse sikukhonze, ngezikhathi zonke.
J.title: Jesu nampa thinâ`abakho (100)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu Mthethi, wamacala, ngixolela izono zamâ`.
2. Ngembesa Nkosi, ngothando lwakho, olungapheliyo wena Jesu wam.â`
3. Ngiyathaba mina,
ngaxolelwa izono zami zonke ngoJesu wami.
Chorus: Ngihawukele, ngixolela, ngisindise Nkosi yami. D. Mungofa
J.title: Jesu Mthethi wamacala

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Jabulani, nantâ`usuku olukhulu,
jabulani, nankâ`umkhosi omuhle, jabulani, nantâ`usuku olumnandi, alelu, aleluya sithokoze (2x). Wozani, wozani lonke kulumthimba Wozani, wozani lonke kulesiSidlo, Wozani, wozani lonke kulumkhosi, alelu, aleluya sithokoze.
Wozani, wozani lonke lina babiziweyo, Wozani, wozani lonke lingabophutha, Wozani, wozani lonke linâ`abathandiweyo, alelu, aleluya sithokoze. (2x)
1. INkosi, yathuma izinceku zayo zithi: kwabanxusiweyo, wozani konke sekulungile. Jabulani...
2. Nantu, usuku, olumangalisayo, wozani konke sekulungile. Jabulani...
3. UJesu, uyasimema,
thinâ`abafundi bakhe uthi: wozani...
4. Nkosi siyakubonga ngokusinxusa kwakho usithi: wozani...
5. Nkosi Jesu Kristu ngosuku lokucina, ubosinxusa futhi usithi: wozani...

B. Ndlovu
J.title: Jabulani nantâ`usuku olukhulu (157)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu, Jesu, woza kimi, ngiyakukhanuka wena. Woza, Jesu, uphangise. Woza, woza, ungaphuzi.
2, Inhliziyo yami, Nkosi, ingcolile ngengcekeza. Lapha ukhuluma wena, izakuba mhlophe njalo.
3. Wathi wena usekhona: âWozanini lonke kimi, ngilinike ukuphila, ngilibuyiselâ`uxolo.â
4. Sengizasondela mina, eAlithareni lakho;
O! Mariya lezithunywa, lingikhokhele kuJesu.
J.title: Jesu, Jesu, woza kimi (158)

J.lyrics:
Bass: Jesu Nkosi
Chorus: Jesu Nkosi sesikwamukele, uhlale lathi Bass: hlala lathi, njalo njalo. (2x)
1. UJesu uthi kithi: Mina ngilivini,
uBaba ungumlimi, lina lizingatsha. 2. Hlalani kimi, lami ngihlale kini,
ukuze lithele izithelo ezinhle.
3. Njengobâ`ugatsha lungatheli nxa lulodwa,
linjaloke lina nxa lingekho kimi. 4. Lolo lalolâ`ugatsha olungatheliyo,
uBabâ`uzaluthathâ`alutshisâ`emlilweni. 5. Lolo lalolâ`ugatsha oluthelayo,
uBabâ`uzaluthena luthele kakhulu. 6. Uma ligcina imilayo yami,
ngizalingenisa ebukhosini bami.
7. Udumo alube kuYise, beleNdodana,
loMoyâ`oNgcwele, kuze kube laphakade.
(c/f Joha 15,1-11). BNcube
J.title: Jesu Nkosi sesikwamukela (159)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu, Nkosi ukulinga, kukaSathanâ`kuyatshisa: siphamandla singanqotshwa. Nguwe ozakusisiza.
2. Jesu, Nkosi sidiniwe, aphelilâ`amandla ethu, akusiqinise Jesu. Wena oyiSinkwa sethu.
3. Watsho waqinisa wathi: Uyikudla okuyikho,
okuvela ezulwini, esasithenjiswe khona.
4. Jesu, Sinkwa sezithunywa. Woza kithâ`usiphâ`amandla,
ngoba sithi nxa silawe. Kasehlulwa yikulingwa. 5. Jesu, sikhuleka kuwe, okuleli Sakramente,
senze sikuthande njalo. Njengokuba usithanda.
J.title: Jesu, Nkosi ukulinga (160)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesâ`omuhle othandwayo, woza nginxwanele wena. E. Sithandwa esimnandi, woza Jesu woza kimi.
2. Inhliziyo yami, Jesu, ingathokoziswâ`yilutho; nguwe Jesu, wena wedwa, ongayipha ukuthaba.
3. Lokukukhumbula njalo, kuyiluju olumnandi;
woza kimi, Jesu, Jesu wami, ngizwe ubumnandi bakho.
4. Jesu wozuhlale kimi, ungasuki laphakade,
yiba yikuthaba kwami, ngibe yisithandwa sakho.
J.title: Jesu omuhle othandwayo

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu omuhle uhlale kimi,
wena sithandwa sami esihle. Jesu oMnandi othandekayo, nguwe kuphela, engimthandayo.
2. Nxa ngilusizi, ngizakuchatsha, enhliziyweni, yakho Msindisi. Jesu omnandi, akungisize, ungivikele ekulingweni.

3. Ngizinikela, kuwe Msindisi, akungithathe, ngibe ngowakho. Ngingasasuki, kuwe lanini, Wena Melusi wami omuhle.
4. Lamhla ngisifa, ungemukele, ngize ngihlale, lawe Msindisi; ungithabise, kweliphezulu, ngezintokozo, zasezulwini.
J.title: Jesu omuhle, uhlale kimi (161)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu Sinkwa sezithunywa, woza, nginxwanele wena.
Jesu wami Jesâ`omuhle, woza, woza kimi. (2x)
2. Jesu, Sinkwa sokuphila, woza akungiphumuze;
Jesu, kudla okumnandi, woza woza...
3. Jesu Nkosi, Nkulunkulu wami, woza,
ungithokozise. Jesu, Jesu mfeli wami, woza, woza...
J.title: Jesu sinkwa sezithunywa

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Jabulani eNkosini lina abalungileyo ukudumisa Kubafanele labo abalungileyo - ukudumisa Kubafanele labo abaqotho.
1. Sâ`thembelâ`eNkosini ngoba ilusizo lwethu.
2. Sâ`busisiwâ`isizwe esiNkulunkulu waso yiNkosi. 3. Yesabani iNkosi lina abalungileyo.
4. Ngebizo leNkosi enziwa amazulu.
(c/f Hubo 33,1.20.12.6) J. Masotsha
J.title: Jabulani eNkosini (564)

J.lyrics:
1. Jabulâ`ebutsheni bakho nhliziyo yami, ukhonzâ`iNkosi ngensuku zempilo yakho. 2. Wena Bandla, Bandla leNkosi hlabelela,
uzubonge ubongâ`uMdali wakho, uzubonge, ubonge ngokuthakazela, ikhulu, elikhulu iminyaka.
Chorus: Ngalâ`umkhosi, ngalo umkhosâ`omkhulu, weminyakâ`elikhulu, busisa amakholwa, busisa amakholwa, sesicela, sicelâ`abafundisi.
3. Dumisani lonke makholwa, ukwanda kobukhosi, litsho kanye labangcwele, kulemnyakâ`elikhulu.
4: ILizwe lakithi eZimbabwe, thokozelâ`iVangeli, lafikelâ`Empandeni, kuleminyaka elikhulu.
5. Hlambulâ`inhliziyo zethu, zibemhlophe zithi qhwa! Uxotshe ubumnyama bonke, kukhanye umhlaba wonke.
6. Thokozani sizwe sonke, olaMadlâ`ulenzele, wehlisa uMoya oNgcwele, wasifundisa ukholo.
L. Sidambe
J.title: Jabulâ`ebutsheni (204)

J.lyrics:
1. Josefa, E! siyakubonga, Mondli kaJesu, uMsindisi, usâ`uphakeme ulodumo, usezulwini kumntanakho.
2. Josefa, E! siyakuncenga, usicelele thina zoni, inhliziyo ezimhlophe kuye uJesu, umntanakho.
3. Josefa, bona siyaswela, singabayanga, silusizi, sibalekela kuwe, Josefâ`wenâ`ongumsizi wamakholwa.
4. Josefa, Mondli woMsindisi, akusilondoloze lathi, ekulingweni kwethu konke, size sifike ezulwini.
J.title: Josefa E! Siyakubonga

J.lyrics:
Chorus: Josefa oNgcwele uMondli kaJesu Kristu woza, Josefa, usicelele.
1. Bona singabayanga siyaswela, silusizi sibalekela kuwe.
2. Mondli woMsindisi akusivikele, ekulingweni kwethu konke.
3. Josefâ`uthando lwakho olukhulu, olwamondla uMariya loJesu.
4. Josefâ`usikhulekele thina zoni, siyakhala kuwe ezulwini.
T.Mlilo
J.title: Josefa uMondli kaJesu (624)

J.lyrics:
1. JosefâoNgcwele, ukhethiwe wena, phakathi kwamadoda onke, ukumkhulisa uMsindisi wethu, lokumondla enguMntwana nje.
T.Mlilo
496
2. Josefâ`oNgcwele, wena walamlela, uMariya loMntwana wakhe. Ungumyanga nje, wabasebenzela ukudla kwakho ngezandla zakho.
3. Josefâ`oNgcwele, mondli woMsindisi, siyabonga sikuhlonipha, sikhulekele kulumtwana wakho, asiphe sonke izipho zakhe.
4. UMntwana wakho walalela kuwe, esahlezi laphâ`emhlabeni, uyalalela njalo ezulwini,
ngokuba yena, eluthando qho!
J.title: Josefâ`oNgcwele ukhethiwe wena (271)

J.lyrics:
1. Jesu, siyancengâ`ukuba, upholise ubuhlungu,
bemiphefumulo leyo, ehlupheka emlilweni. 2. Thelâ`igazi lakho Jesu, endaweni yobuhlungu, liphumuze imimoya, ehlawulelâ`izono zayo.
3. Xola Jesu mfeli wayo, zwana ukukhala kwayo, ixolele inhlawulo, wena olomusâ`omkhulu4. Ikhulule ngomsa wakho, ingenise ezulwini, ikuthande, ikubonge, ithokoze kanye lawe.
J.title: Jesu, siyancengâ` ukuba (238)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Khothamisa amazulu akho, Nkosi; (3x) Bass: akho Nkosi (3x)
wehlele phansi kithi.
1. Nkosi bona ubumnyama, obusemhlabeni wonke.
Akuthume umkhanyisi, oza kusikhanyisela.
2. Bheka nansi isithunywa, sindizela ngasendlini,
kuMariya eguqile, sathâ`ekuhlâ`othandiweyo.
3. Ulenhlahlâ` enkulu wena, ngoba nanku ukhethiwe.
ngezwi likaNkulunkulu, wobâ` nguNina wakhe Wena. 4. Wathi ukubâ`ezwe lawo mazwi, uMariya emangele
wathobelâ`uNkulunkulu, wathâ`akwenzeke kimi phela. 5. Jabulani zizwe zonke, ngoba nanku kusondele,
isikhathi sokufika, koMsindisi womhlaba wonke.
C. Zikhali
K.title: Khothamisâ`amazulu akho Nkosi

K.lyrics:
1. Khangela iNkosi yakho, esesiphambanweni! Ibethelwe ngenxa yakho wena oyisoni. âBuyâ`ubuye, âitsho njalo: âBuya uze kimi, nxa uthanda ukuphila, buya uze kimi.
2. Mana, soni, akulizwe izwi loMkhululi. Okubizâ`esithi: âBuya, phuma engozini. Buya, O! buyela kuye: thathâ`indlela yakhe, uzâ`uthole ukuphila kuye ngomusa wakhe.
3. Jesu wamâ`ilizwi lakho lingibuyisile. Sengikhala phambi kwakho: O! ngangiduhile. Sengincenga ngenhliziyo: uzâ`ungamukele, ulesulâ`icala lami; akungixolele.
K.title: Khangela iNkosi yakho

K.lyrics:
Khumbu, khumbula muntu, khumbu, ukuthâ`uluthuli. (2x)
Othulini, othulini uzabuyela futhi. (2x) Emlotheni, umlothâ`emlotheni, uthulâ`ethulini, umhlabathâ`emhlabathini. (2x)
L. Sidambe
K.title: Khumbula muntu

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kufanele siziqhenye, ngesiphambano, siziqhenye ngesiphambano seNkosi.
1. SeNkosi yethu, kufanele siziqhenye ngesiphambano seNkosi.
UJesu Kristu... Yenâ`osindisayo..: Asikhulule...

2. Ngaye sifumana... Ngaye uâ`sindiso... Ngaye kulempilo... Ngaye sizavuka ...
A. Gwenelo
K.title: Kufanele siziqhenye

K.lyrics:
Chorus:Baba, Baba, Baba, kuphelilâ`emhlabeni
 Tenor:Owangithuma khona emhlabeni
 Bonke:Kuphelilâ`emhlabeni. (2x)
 1. Bass:Mama nansâ`iNdodana, Mfundi nangâ`uNyoko 
 Bonke:Kuphelilâ`emhlabeni.
 2. Bass.Ukuze kugcwaliseke 
 Bonke:Umbhalo wathi kibo
 Tenor:Ngomile
 Bonke:Baba kuphelilâ`emhlabeni.
 3. Bass.Emva kokwamukela 
 Bonke:Iwayini wasesithi:
 Tenor:Baba
 Bonke:Baba kuphelilâ`emhlabeni 


(c/f Joha 19,26-30) S. Magonya
K.title: Kuphelile

K.lyrics:
UJesu wathi:
Chorus: Kakusini lonke lapha, elihlambulukileyo
Elihlambukileyo, elihlambulukileyo. (2x) 1. Wasukuma ekudleni, wakhuphâ`ingubo zakhe. 2. Waqalâ`ukugezisâ`inyawo, zabafundi bakhe.
3. Wazesula ngelembu, ayezikhwice ngalo.
4. Ngenxa yalokhu uJesu wathi kibo.
5. Esegezisilâ`inyawo zabo, wathathâ`ingubo zakhe.

6. Liyakwazi yini, engikwenzeâ` kini na?
7. Lingibiza lithi Mfundisi, Nkosi, liqinisile ngiyikho. 8. Ngoba odla lami, ungivukele.
9. Ngoba wayemazi, lowo ozakumnikela.
10. Owamukela mina, wamukelâ`ongithumileyo.
(c/f Joha 13,4-20) N. Lunga
K.title: Kakusini lonke elihlambulukileyo

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Khangelani, khangelani, mina ngilani, insuku zonke
Insuku, nini lanini, kuze kube nini. 1. Inhliziyo zenu, inhliziyo zenu mazingakhali,
mazingakhali,
kholwani kuBaba kakulitshiya liyizintandane. 2. UMoya wami, umoya wami uzakuhlala,
lani uzahlala kokuphela
ulifundise, konkâ`engakutshoyo.
3. Hlalani kimi, lami ngihlale kini kokuphela,
ngoba ngaphandle kwami, kalila lutho.
(Johane 14)A. Mahlangu
K.title: Khangelani mina ngilani

K.lyrics:
1. Kalazi yinâ`ukuthi, thinâ`esabhabhathizelwa kuKristâ`uJesu, sabhabhathizelwa ekufeni kwakhe na?
Chorus: Kristâ`uvukile, uvukile, uvukile, Aleluya, uvukile, aleluya uvukile (2x)

2. Ngalokhu-ke sambelwa laye, ngokubhabhathizelwa ekufeni.
3. Ukuba uKristu wavuswa, kwabafileyo ubukhosi ngobukaYise.
4. Ngokunjalo lathi sihambe, ekuphileni okutsha. 5. Siyazi ukuthi uKristu wavuswa kwabafileyo,
kasoze afe futhi.
K.title: Kalazi yini

K.lyrics:
1. Kwafika uJohane uMbhabhathizi enkangala, etshumayela uMbhabhathizo wokuphenduka:
Chorus: Kube yikuthethelelwa, yikuthethelelwa kwezono. (2x)
2. Kwaphumâ`abeJudiya leJesuralema, enkangala, bezofunâ`ukubhabhathizwa, lokuphenduka.
3. Baqonda iJordani, umfula omkhulu, belezono, bezobhabhathizwa nguJohane, bevumâ`izono.
4. Wayembethâ`ingubo yoboya bekamela, elozwezwe okhalweni lwakhe, esidlâ`intethe.
5. Wathi: Mina angifanele, angifanele, phambi kwakhe, ukuthukulula imichilo yamanyathelo akhe.
W. Hlabano
K.title: Kwafika uJohane umBhabhathizi (108)

K.lyrics:
Udumo, kalube, kalube kuNkulunkulu,
kalube, kalube kweliphezulu
kalube kuNkulunkulu, kweliphezulu. 1. Kube lokuthula emhlabeni,
emhlabeni ebantwini bakhe.
Nkosi Nkulunkulu Nkosi yasezulwini, Nkulunkulâ`uBaba Somandla. Udumo...
2. Siyakubabaza, siyakwazisa, siyakuguqela Baba. Siyakudumisa, siyakubonga, ngenxa yobukhosi bakho. Udumo...
3. Nkosi Jesu Kristu Ndodanâ`ezelwe yodwa,
Nkosi Nkulunkulu.
Mvana kaNkulunkulu Ndodana kaNkulunkulu, kaNkulunkulu uYise. Udumo...
4. Wenâ`osusâ`izono, izono zomhlaba, usihawukele.
Wenâ`ohlezi kwesokunene sikaYihlo, zwana ukukhala kwethu. Udumo...
5. Nguwe wedwâ`oNgcwele, nguwe wedwâ`oyiNkosi, nguwe onguPhezukonke.
Wena Jesu Kristu undawonye,
loMoya oNgcwele. Udumo...
6. Ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu, bukaNkulunkulâ`uBaba. Amen. Udumo...
J. Masotsha
K.title: Kalube, kalube kuNkulunkulu (120)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: INkosiingumalusi,malusiwami,malusiwami Bass: Angiyikuswela (2x)
Angiyikuswela lutho,
zonkâ`insuku zokâ`hamba kwami. (2x) 1. Ingalusela emadlelweni aluhlaza,
emadlelweni amahle! 2.Ingisa endawenielamanzi,
elamanzi amahle!
3. Ingiholela endleleni zokulunga,
ngenxa yebizo layo.
4. Ivuselela umphefumulo wami, iwuvuselela ngokholo.
5. Noma ngidabula esihotsheni, esihotsheni esimnyama.
6. Angiyikwesaba okubi, ngoba wena ulami, ngoba wena ulami.
7. Intonga yakho lodondolo lwakho kuyangivikela Nkosi.
8. Uyalungisa itafula phambi kwami laphansi kwezitha zami.
9. Ugcoba ikhanda lami ngamagcobo, alephungâ`elimnandi.
10. Umganu wami ugcwele uyaphuphuma, uphuphumâ`okumnandi.
11. Impela okuhle lesihawu sakho, kuyangilandela, zonkâ`insuku.
12. Insuku zonke zokuhamba kwami, ngithembelâ`eNkosini.
13. Ngiyakuhlala endlini yeNkosi, kuze kube nininini.
(Hubo 23) A. Gwenelo
K.title: Kangiyikuswela lutho

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kabakubonge, abantu Nkulunkulu kabakubonge, abantu bonke. (2x)
1. Nkulunkulu yiba lomusa kithi usibusise, khanyisa ubuso bakho phezu kwethu.
2. Ukuze indlela yakho yaziwe emhlabeni, losizo lwakho ezizweni zonke.
3. Izizwe kazijabule zihlabele ngokuthokoza, ngoba wena uyabehlulela abantu ngokulunga.
4. Umhlaba uthelile izithelo zawo, iNkosi uNkulukulu wethu usibusisile.
5. UNkulunkulu ubusa izizwe emhlabeni, kayimesabe imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba.
6. Udumo kalube kuYise leNdodana, lakuMoya oNgcwele.
7. Njengoba kwakunjalo ekuqaleni, kusenjalo lakhathesi kuzakuba njalo kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
(Hubo 67) F. Nhlabano
K.title: Kabakubonge (126)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kabongwâ`uNkulunkulu, Aleluya. Aleluya! (2x) 1. Qakezanâ`izandla zenu lina zizwe zonke
hlokomani kuNkulunkulu ngamaHubo.
2. Hubani eNkosini yethu, hubani amahubo.
P. Ndlovu
K.title: Kabongwâ`uNkulunkulu, Aleluya

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kayibongwe iNkosi uNkulunkulu womhlaba, Ngoba yasithumela uMkhululi olamandla.
1. Njengoba yathembisa, kubaprofethi endulo, ukuba sikhululwe, emandleni ababi.
2. Wabalesihawu, ngenxa yothando lwakhe, ukuba siyikhonze, singelakwesaba.
3. Langobâ`ungcwele, zonke insuku, langokulunga, empilweni yethu.
4. Uzathiwa lumntwana, ungumprofethi, uzalungisa, indlela yeNkosi.
5. Ngokuthethelelwa, kwezono zethu, lokusiphâ`ulwazi, lokusiliswa.
6. Akubakhanyisele, abahlezi emnyameni, lasethunzini, lokufa kwaphakade.
7. Lokusikhokhela,endleleni yayo, eyokuthula, kuze kube nini.
8. Udumo kuwe Baba, kuwe Mdali wethu, lakuNdodana, lakuMoya oNgcwele.
(c/f Luka 1,68-79)M. Chifana
K.title: Kayibongwe iNkosi (206)

K.lyrics:
Chorus:
S. Nkosi khuluma inceku yakho iyezwa 
T. Nkosi, khuluma
B. Khuluma
S. Nkosi, khuluma inceku yakho iyezwa
A. Nkosi, khuluma inceku yakho iyezwa 
B. Nkosi, khuluma inceku yakho iyezwa 
1. Bass: Umuntu kaphili ngesinkwa sodwa, Nkosi; uphila ngalelo lalelo lizwi, Nkosi.
Bonke: Eliphumâ` emlonyeni wakho, Nkosi (2x)
       Ale, ale, ale, ale, ale aleluya. (2x)
2. Limnandi lelo lalelo lizwi, Nkosi, (2x) eliphumâ`...
B. Ndlovu
K.title: Khuluma Nkosi (127)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Okhalelayo: KuBaba, labo khona,
Bonke: Kuyangena
Bonke: Abazimiseleyo
Bonke: Ekhaya labangcwele. 1. Babusisiwe abayanga emoyeni
ngoba umbuso wezulu ungowabo.
2. Babusisiwe labo abazakudla ukudla embusweni
kaNkulunkulu.
3. Babusisiwe abakhalayo, ngoba bazakududuzwa.
4. Babusisiwe abamnene, ngoba bazakudla ilifa lomhlaba. 5. Babusisiwe abalambela, bomela ukulunga ngoba
bazakusuthiswa.
6. Babusisiwe abalesihawu, ngoba bazakuhawukelwa. 7. Babusisiwe abahlutshelwa ukulunga,
ngoba umvuzo wabo umkhulu ezulwini.
(c/ f Mat 5,1-12) C. Nyoni
K.title: KuBaba kungena labo abazimiseleyo (580)

K.lyrics:
1. Khangela, Nkosi, sifika sijabula (2x)
Tenor: Sizo...
Bonke: Sizokwethula izipho zethu. (2x) 2. Siholwa luthando lwakho, Nkosi,
Sesifikile lamagugu ethu;
siwanikela kuwe. (2x) 3. Amagugu, emukele,
Ethu, emukele,
Nkosi, emukele, akuthokozise. (4x)
B. Ndlovu
K.title: Khangela Nkosi (588)

K.lyrics:
1. Kumagrebisâ`lenqoloyi, sikupha iHostiya linye.
Guqulâ`umhlabiso wethu, ube nguMzimba kaJesu. 2. Lalesi sinkwa lewayini, siyanikelâ`ubomi bethu,
siphâ`impilo yobuNkulunkulu, owaba lathâ`ekhatshana. 3. Sicelelâ`iBandla lonke, likhokhele ngaphophezulu.
SibeMzimba munye sonke, othandweni lukaKristu. Sr. Desderia, OP
K.title: Kumagrebisâ`lenqoloyi

K.lyrics:
1. Kasithandanenâ` yiwo lowâ`umlayo weNkosi. Kasithandanenâ` ngoba yiwo lowâ`umlayo weNkosi. Umlayo weNkosi, yiwo lowâ`umlayo weNkosi.
2. Kasixhawulaneni, kasixhawulaneni, Kasibingelelaneni.
3. Ngumlayo weNkosi, yiwo lowâ`umlayo weNkosi, Ngumlayo weNkosi ukuba thina sonke sithandane.
B. Ndlovu
K.title: Kasithandaneni (149)

K.lyrics:
1. Khangela kuhle, kangaka kumnandi, ukubâ`abazalwane
Bass: Amen, kangaka, kumnandi amen, Amen bahlale ndawonye, kufane lamazolo,
aseHermoni, awela entabeni, zaseZiyoni, iNkosi yalaya, khona isibusiso, esiyikuphila, kwalaphakade.
Chorus: Bonganâ` iNkosi, ngoba ilungile, uthando lwayo lumi, kuze kube ninini
Bonganâ`uNkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wabokhokho, uthando lwakhe lumi, kuze kube nininini. (2x)

2. Bazalwane thandanani, kufane lamafutha, athelwâ`ekhanda, ehlele phansi.
INkosâ` ilibusise, eyenzâ`izulu lomhlaba, ngobâ` ilikhethile, ukuba ngabayo.
3. Inhle ngokuphakama, intaba yaseZiyoni, iyikuthokoza, kuwo wonke umhlaba.
Zwanâ` amazwi ami, Nkosi ngikhuleka kuwe, ekuseni uyalizwa, ilizwi lami.
C. Zikhali
K.title: Khangela kuhle (612)

K.lyrics:
1. Okhalelayo: UNkulunkulu (3x)
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe uNkulunkulu 

2. Okhalelayo: Kalidunyiswe ibizo lakhe eliNgcwele(3x) 
Bonke: Kalidunyiswe, kalidunyiswe, Kalidunyiswe ibizo lakhe eliNgcwele. 
3. Okhalelayo: Kadunyiswe uJesu Kristu, uNkulunkulu lomuntu sibili. 
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe,
kadunyiswe uJesu Kristu. 
4. Okhalelayo:Kalidunyiswe ibizo likaJesu (3x) 
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe uJesu Kristu
5. Okhalelayo: Kadunyiswâ`uJesu Kristu eSakra- menteni LeAlithare, eliNgcwele sibili.
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe uJesu Kristu

6. Okhalelayo: Kayidunyiswâ`inhliziyo
kaJesu eNgcwele sibili, kaJesu Kristu
Bonke: Kayidunyiswe, kayidunyiswe, kayidunyiswe inhliziyo kaJesu.
7. Okhalelayo: Kadunyiswâ`uMoya oNgcwele, uMthokozisi, uMoya oNgcwele.
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, uMoya oNgcwele.
8. Okhalelayo: Kahlonitshwe uMariya oNgcwele, uNina kaNkulunkulu oNgcwele sibili. 
 Bonke: Kahlonitshwe, kahlonitshwe, kahlonitshwe, uMariya oNgcwele. 
 9. Okhalelayo: Kakuhlonitshwe, ukwemula kwakhe okungcwele, okungelacala  Bonke: Kakuhlonitshwe, kakuhlonitshwe, kakuhlonitshwe, ukwemulwa kwakhe. 
10. Okhalelayo: Kakuhlonitshwe, ukwenyuselwa kwakhe, ezulwini, ngobukhosi. 
Bonke: Kakuhlonitshwe (3x) ukwenyuselwa kwakhe.
11. Okhalelayo: Kalihlonitshwe, ibizo likaMariya, iVirigo elingumzali, ibizo likaMariyaBonke: Kalihlonitshwe, kalihlonitshwe, kalihlonitshwe, ibizo likaMariya.
12. Okhalelayo: Kahlonitshwe uJosefâ`oNgcwele, umkakhe olenhliziyo, emhlophe sibili.
Bonke: Kahlonitshwe, kahlonitshwe, kahlonitshwe, uJosefâ`oNgcwele.
13. Okhalelayo: Kadunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu,
kuzithunywa zakhe, lakubangcwele bakhe.
Bonke: Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe uNkulunkulu.
V Dube
K.title: Kadunyiswe uNkulunkulu (592)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kade singabakho, Jesu Nkosi yethu,
siyahamba ngendlela yakho ubosiphâ`amandla okulahlâ`isono; qinisa ukukholwa kwethu. Yebo, qinisa ukukholwa kwethu.
1. Amandla ethu mancinyane. Sipha sonke igrasiya lakho. Umlawulo wakho awunzima, siyawuthanda, siyawubonga.
2. Wena ulithemba labantu, wahlawulela izono zabo, ufela esiphambanweni, wabavulelâ`ikhaya lakho.
3. Lelilizwe kalithabisi, ligcwele ukuhlupheka konke.
Ikhaya lethu liphezulu, kulelo siyakujabula.
K.title: Kade singabakho, Jesu Nkosi yethu

K.lyrics:
1. Kade sengimlahlile uSathane, ngokuba engumkhohlisi. UJesu yedwa ngimlandele; ilizwi lakhe liqiniso.
Chorus: Izwi likaKristu ngilondoloze, ngisekhona ngize ngife; (2x)
2. Bantu lingabokhonza kowo mlilo, ngokuba esizonda nje, efunâ`ukusithiya sonke, asingenise esonweni.
3. UmDiyabholi ulamanga kuphela, ukhohlisile uEva. UJesu yedwa simlandele, indlela yakhe iqondile.
K.title: Kade sengilamhlile uSathane

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kasimdumisenâ`uNkulunkulu,
lina Bandla le Afrika Kasimbongeni uNkulunkulu, lina Bandla leAfrika (2x)
1. Lina Bandla leAfrika - kasimdumiseni uNkulunkulu. Asenze, sibe ngabantwana, bokutshumayela iVangeli.
2. Sidumise endlini yakhe engcwele, Sidumise leNdodana, loMoya oNgcwele.
3. Simdumiseni ngokutshaya amachacho - sisine, Simdumiseni ngokutshaya izigubhu - langezenzo.

4. Kasemukeleni ukukhanya lina Bandla leAfrika Saze safica iminyaka ezinkulungwane ezimbili siseBandleni likaKristu5. Konke, okuphefumulayo - kakudumise iNkosi ngoba inkulu iNkosi - ifanele ukudunyiswa ngodumo olukhulu.
(c/f Hubo 150) R. Ndlovu
K.title: Kasimdumiseni uNkulunkulu (623)

K.lyrics:
1. Kawudunyiswe Nkulunkulu wabokhokho bethu. Ubatshazwe uphakanyiswe, kuze kube,
kuze kube nini, kuze kube nini lanini.
2. Kalidunyiswe iBizo lakho eliNgcwele, Libatshazwe liphakanyiswe, kuze kube...
3. Lina mimoyâ`evunguzayo, dumisani iNkosi, Liyihubele liyiphakamise, kuze kube...
4. Dumisani iNkosi zidalwa zeNkosi, Liyihlabelele indumiso, kuze kube...
5. Lina zithunywa zeNkosi dumisani iNkosi, Liyibabaze lihlabelele, kuze kube...
6. Lina bapristi beNkosi, idumiseni iNkosi, Liyihlabelele, liyiphakamise, kuze kube...
7. Lina zikhonzi zeNkosi, idumiseni iNkosi, Liyihlabelele liyiphakamise, kuze kube...
C. Zikhali
K.title: Kawudunyiswe Nkulunkulu (205)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kayibongwe
Kayibongwe iNkosi kule indlu yomusa wayo.
1. Nkosi, wena omise ilanga phezulu,
iBizo lakho alidunyiswe,
kule indlu yakho,
ulalele lokukhala kwethu phambi kwakho.

2. Amehlo akho kawakhangele kule indlu, yomusa wakho,
Lapho usizwa, Jesu Kristu,
sisize usithethelele.
3. Loba sihlutshwa yikuphâ`ukufa, sivuswa zihlunpheko losizi, siphakamisela izandla zethu kulindlu, akusizwe.
4. Amazwi okukhuleka kwethu phambi kweNkosi, uNkulunkulu, abeseduze layo emini lebusuku.
5. Ngoba iBizo lakho likhulu, lesandla sakho silamandla, lengalo yakho ilamandla, Jesu Kristu Nkosi yethu.
6. Ngakho inhliziyo zethâ`azibeku Jesu iNkosi yethu ngokupheleleyo sihambe ngezimiso zayo kuze kube nininini.
M Mkandla
K.title: Kayibongwe (632)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Kule, kulelizwe lenjabulo,
kule, kulelizwe lentokozo engapheliyo. Kule, kulelizwe lokuphila,
kule, kulelizwe lokuthaba kwalaphakade.
1. Abaya khona ngabangcwele, abalempilo engelasono. Abalempilo yobumnyama, bengekungene kulelolizwe.
2. Babusisiwe abafika, kulelokhaya lasezulwini, balokuthula lenjabulo, lokuthokoza kwalaphakade.

3. Akukabonwa layilihlo, konkâ`okumnandi kwasezulwini. Akukangeni lendlebeni, lasenhlizâ`yweni zethu zenyama.
4. Babusisiwe abafayo, belokukholwa kuJesu Kristu; kutsho uMoya oyiNgcwele, kabaphumule lanini nini.
5. Kayikwâ`intengo yokungena, kulelokhaya eliphezulu. Landelâ`iNkosâ`uJesu Kristu, lesiphambano sakhe silula.
6. Konkâ`okomhlaba kuyadlula, kunjengomoya odlulayo. Zonkâ`intokozo zalumhlaba, zingamafu nje adlulayo.
7. Kulelolizwe lenjabulo, ukuhlupheka akusangeni. Lakho ukufa akufiki, kiwo umuzi wasezulwini.
B. Ndlovu
K.title: Kulelizwe lenjabulo (207)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Khangela, Nina kaJesu, khangela phansi kithi.
Uzwe, Nina olomusa, ukukhuleka kwethu. 1. Nguwe owamzalayo, uMsindisi wabantu.
Sikhulumele kuye, asiphâ`igrasiya lakhe. 2. Izono zethu zinengi, zinkulu siyavuma.
Umusa woMntwana wakho, umkhulu kawupheli. 3. Siyakhumbula Mariya, ukufa kukaJesu,
wathi yena kuBaba: âBaxolelâ`izono zabo.
K.title: Khangela, Nina kaJesu (254)

K.lyrics:
Chorus: Khumbula muntâ`ukuthâ`uluthuli,
khonâ`ethulini uzaphindela. 1. Weza emhlabeni ungelalutho,
uzaphindela ungelalutho.
2. UngokaNkulunkulu usaphila,
ungowakhe usufile.

3. Wakudala wakubeka emhlabeni, nguye futhi osekususe kuwo umhlaba.
4. INdodana yakhe yakufela esiphambanweni, ukuze ube yindlalifa yezulu5. Wenzani lapha emhlabeni, okutshengisa uthando lwakho kuye.
(c/f Gen 3,19)
K.title: Khumbula muntu

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lina mayezi ezulu, mehliseni uMsindisi,
lina mayezi mehliseni uMsindisi. 1. Batsho njalo abantu labo,
ababemelele uMsindisi.
2. Nkosi ake umthumele lowo esimthenjisiweyo,
aze kusisindisa.
3. Baba olamandla wonke,
zwana umkhuleko wethu.
4. Wathumela isithunywa sakho kuMariya,
sathi: âUzakuzala iNdodana.â
5. Amakhosi omhlaba azakumkhonza,
lezizwe zonke zizakumdumisa.
(c/f Luka 1,26-38) P. Mthombeni
L.title: Lina mayezi ezulu

L.lyrics:
1. Tshonini kuZiyoni ukuthi, B: Ziyoni
Chorus: Ngubani lo? Lo nguJesu umprofethi (2x)
NguMprofethi! NguMprofethi waseNazaretha NguMprofethi! ENazaretha kwelaseGalileya NguMprofethi! OyiNkosi yezizwe zonke OyiNkosi yamakhosi.
2. Khangela iNkosi yakho, Ziyoni; INkosi yakho iyeza, Ziyoni...
3. Iyeza kuwe imnene, Ziyoni;
Ikhwele ithole likababhemi, Ziyoni...
4. Hosana kuyo iNdodana. INdodana kaDavida. Ziyoni...
5. Ubusisiwe ozayo, Ziyoni;
Oza ebizweni leNkosi, Ziyoni; Hosana kweliphezulu, Ziyoni...
(Mat 21,11) A. Gwenelo
L.title: Lo nguJesu uMprofethi

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lapho kukhonâ` uthando, lomusa, kukhonâ`uNkulunkulu, lomusa. (2x)
1. Uthando lukaKristu luyasihlanganisa sibe munye, sibe lomusa.
Asijabuleni sithokoze sonke sikuye, sibe...
2. Asimesabeni simthande uNkulunkulu ophilayo, sibe...
Sithandane ngobuqotho, sibe...
3. Ngakho-ke nxa sibuthene asiqapheleni, ukuba, sibe...
Singabandlululani engqondweni zethu, sibe ....
4. Akuphele phakathi kwethu ukuzondana, lokulwa
lokuphithizela, sibe... UKristu iNkosi yethu abe phakathi kwethu, sibe ... 5. Angathi singabona kanye lexuku labangcwele, sibe...
ubuso lodumo lwakho Kristu Nkosi yethu, sibe ... 6. Sibe lenjabulo epheleleyo, sibe ...
kuze kube nini lanini, sibe...
B. Ndlovu
L.title: Lapho kukhonâ`uthando

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lapho, laphâ`okulothando kanye, kanye lomusa, Nkulunkulu khona, uNkulunkulu ukhona laye. (2x)
1. Uthando lukaKristu, luyasihlanganisa sibemunye, kasijabuleni sithokoze, sikuye.

2. Kasimesabeni, simthande uNkulunkulu ophilayo lathi sithandane, ngezinhliziyo, eziqotho.
3. Ngakho nxa sibuthene, kasiqapheleni singabandlululani, kakuphele phakathi kwethâ`ukuxabana, lokuphithizela.
4. UKristâ`iNkosi yethu, ahlale phakathi phakathi kwethu, angathi singabona ubuso lodumo, lukaNkulunkulu 5. Kristâ`iNkosi yethu, sikanye labangcwele, abangcwele
bakho, sibe lenjabulo epheleleyo, kuze kube lanini.
(c/f 1 Joha 4,8-16) L. Sidambe
L.title: Laphâ`okulothando

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lithandane njengoba ngilithandile
1. Lapho kulothando lomusa, uNkulunkulu ukhona laye. 2. Ngakho-ke, nxa sibuthene, asiqapheleni ukuba
singabandlululani.
3. Akuphele phakathi kwethu ukuxabana lokuphithizela,
uKristu iNkosi yethu ahlale phakathi kwethu.
4. Lapho okulothando lomusa, uNkulunkulu ukhona laye. 5. Angathi singabona ubuso lodumo lwakho Kristu
Nkosi yethu, sikanye labangcwele bakho.
6. Sibe lenjabulo epheleleyo, kuze kube nini lanini. a. Uthando lukaKristu luyasihlanganisa sibe munye,
kasijabuleni sithokoze kuye.
b. Kasimesabeni sithande uNkulunkulu ophilayo
lathi sithandane ngenhliziyo eziqotho.
(c/f Joha 13,34)
L.title: Lithandane njengoba ngilithandile

L.lyrics:
1. Lamhlâ`uvukile uJesu, ongumehluli wokufa, lolusuku unqobile. Sithokoze, aleluya. Tenor: Wena Jesu, Ndodana kaMariya,
Amen, aleluya
2. Isithunywa sikhulumile, kakho lapha uvukile,
njengokutsho kwakhe kini. Sithokoze, aleluya. 3. Wozani libone indawo, lapho abelele khona.
Hambanini libatshele. Sithokoze, aleluya. 4. Ukunqobile ukufa, usindisile umhlaba,
ngokuvuka elibeni. Sithokoze, aleluya.
5. Wathâ`usuphumâ` elibeni, kwazamazama umhlaba,
Kwathithibalâ`abalindi. Sithokoze. Aleluya. 6. Sivusa lathi Ndodana, sikhokhelele kuBaba
siyebonâ`ubuso bakhe. Sithokoze. Aleluya
C. Hlabano
L.title: Lamhlâ`uvukile uJesu

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lolu lusuku olumiswe yiNkosi Asithabe sithokoze ngalo. (3x)
1. UJesu Kristu uyiMvana kaNkulunkulu; eyanikelwa ngenxa yethu. Aleluya.

2. UngumPristâ`oMkhulu kaNkulunkulu; osinikelâ`umhlabiso wakhe. Aleluya.
3. Kasibeni lempilo enhle kuNkulunkulu; ukuze sithokoze kuye. Aleluya.
4. Savuswa kanye loJesu Kristu; kasixwayeni isono. Aleluya.,
(c/f Hubo 118,23-24) J. Masotsha.
L.title: Lolu lusuku olumiswe yiNkosi

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lolu lusuku olumiswe yiNkosi Asithabe sithokoze ngalo. Aleluya (2x)
1. UJesu Kristâ`uyiMvana, kaNkulunkulâ`eyanikelwa ngenxa yethu.
2. Nguye umPristi omkhulu, osinikelelâ`umhlabiso wakhâ`oNkulunkulu.
3. Kasibeni lempilo enhle,
ukuze sithokozisâ`uNkulunkulu wethu.
4. Savuswa kanye loJesu Kristu,
ngakho-ke kasixwayenâ`izono sithandâ`okulungileyo.
5. Singabokhohlwâ`ukuzwana lokusizana, ngoba saphiwâ`usindiso lunye sibe munye.
(c/f Hubo 118,23-24) P. A. Ndlovu
L.title: Lolu lusuku

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lina liluhlanga
lina liluhlanga olukhethiweyo (2x)
1. Abapristi lamakhosi. 2. Lesizwe esingcwele
3. Abantâ`abamisiweyo. 4. Babe ngabakaNkulunkulu.
Chorus: Lina liluhlanga, lina likhethiwe.
5. Ukuze litshumayele. 6. Kuyizenzo ezimangalisayo. 7. Zalo owalikhuphâ`emnyameni. 8. Walisâ`ekukhanyeni. 9. Bakhe obumangalisayo.
D. Moyo
L.title: Lina liluhlanga olukhethiweyo

L.lyrics:
1. Lina, lina zimpophoma zamanzi, dumi, dumisanâ`iNkosi.
Ibongeni, ibongeni liyidumise, kuze, kuze kube lanini.
2. Nkosi, Nkosi busisa la amanzi,
ase, asenze sihlanzeke.
Ngamanzi, ngamanzi wakhululâ`abantu, waci, wacitshâ`ukoma kwabo.
3. Usuwenze, usuwenze abayilisu,
loku, lokusipha.
Usiphe, usiphâ`uthando lomusa wakho, kuze, kuze kube lanini.

4. Ngalobu, ngalobubusuku silindele, uku, ukuvuka kweNkosi. Silindele, silindele ngokukhuleka, yiba, yiba lathi Nkosi.
L. Sidambe
L.title: Lina zimpophoma zamanzi (91)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lonke zizwe zonke, mdumisenâ`uNkulunkulu. Lonke zizwe zonke, thembaninâ`uNkulunkulu.
Lonke zizwe zonke, thandaninâ`uNkulunkulu. 1. Abakuthandayo Nkosi, bazakuza bakhonze kuwe,
abakuhloniphayo wena, babusise ngesandla sakho,
babusise...
2. Ubakhokhelâ`ekukhanyeni, ubadonse ngesandla sakho
ubakhuphe ebumnyameni, babusise...
3. Ubakhululâ`ebunzimeni, bathandane ngebizo lakho,
balihloniphe kokuphela, babusise...
4. Udumo alube kuYise, leNdodana to Moyâ`oNgcwele,
abanguNkulunkulu munye, babusise...
P. Hlabano
L.title: Lonke zizwe zonke (101)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Leli, leliVangeli leli, leliVangeli leli, leliVangeli ngelabakholwayo.
1. LeliVangeli lileqiniso, ngoba nguMsindisi owalakha edwaleni.
2. Dumisanâ`iNkosi, ngoba kulotshiwâ`
ukuthi wonke amadolo, azaguqa phambi kwayo.
C. Zikhali
L.title: Leli Vangeli (128)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lina sizwe esikhethiweyo,
lina sizwe esikhethiweyo wozani kuJesu Ye... Baba siyeza ngokujabula
Ye... Baba siyeza langokubonga.
1. Funanâ`iNkosi insuku zonke, dingani yona njalonjalo.
2. Ngizakulandelâ`indlela elungileyo, ngizahamba ngobuqotho endlini yakho.
3. Ngizakuhlabela ngokulunga langesihawu, Ngizakuhlabela kuwe Nkosi.
4. Uthando lweNkosi olungapheliyo, Lumi kubo abayesabayo.
5. Bonganâ`iNkosi lina zithunywa zayo, Lilalelâ`ukukhuluma kwezwi layo.
6. Bonganâ`iNkosi lonke misebenzi yayo, Endaweni zonke zombuso wayo.
(c/f Hubo 33) C. Nyoni
L.title: Lina sizwe esikhethiweyo (619)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Leli, leliVangeli leli, leliVangeli leli, leliVangeli ngelabakholwayo.
1. LeliVangeli lileqiniso, ngoba nguMsindisi owalakha edwaleni.
2. Dumisanâ`iNkosi, ngoba kulotshiwâ`
ukuthi wonke amadolo, azaguqa phambi kwayo.
C. Zikhali
L.title: Leli Vangeli (128)

L.lyrics:
Chorus:
Lalelâ`abantu bakho Nkosi, Nkulunkulu Baba,
uzwe ukukhala kwabo, Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla. 1. Siyaguqa phambi kwakho...
sâ`yethulâ`izikhalazo zethu...
2. Yelulâ` iZandla zakhwâ`eziNgcwele...
ubusise uPhapha wethu...
3. Siyamcelela uMbhishopi wethu...
umlondoloze insuku zonke... 4. Intandane zonke Nkosi... akuzigcine Nkosi yethu...
5. Abasengozini Nkosi... bavikele ngamaphiko akho...
6. Siyabacelela abagulayo... ubasilise Nkosi yethu...
7 Hlala ezinhliziyweni...
zalabo abatshumayela iLizwi lakho...
8 Siyakuncenga Baba... yamukela izikhalazo zethu...
N. Lunga
L.title: Lalelâ`abantu bakho Nkosi (136)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lesi, Lesisinkwa lewayini,
sikwe, sikwethula kuwe Baba; kanye, kanye loMntanakhâ`uJesu, konke siyakunikela.
1. Siletha izipho zethu, lakho konke esilakho, kuwe Nkulunkulu wethu.
2. Sinikelâ`izindlu zethu omama kanye labobaba labantwana lamasimu.
3. Laphâ`uletha umhlabiso, ulethe ngenhliziyo yonke, uNkulunkulâ`uzawamâ`kela.
L.title: Lesisinkwa lewayini (141)

L.lyrics:
Bass: WoMsindisi
B.T: LesiSidlo esingelantengo.
1. LesiSidlo, esingelantengo, nguMzimba woMsindisi. Abasidlayo, balokuphila, okungapheliyo..
B.T.- Abasidlayo.
2. Le - yiMana, evelâ`ezulwini, nguMzimba woMsindisi Abayidlayo, balokuphila, okungapheliyo.
3. LesiSidlo, esingelantengo, nguMzimba okaJesu Abawudlayo, balokuphila okungapheliyo.
4. Abasidlayo,ngokufaneleyo,iSidloesiNgcwele, bazakuvuswa, babelokuphila okungapheliyo.
5. Abasidlayo, ngokungafanele, iSidlo esiNgcwele, Bazakujeziswa, esihogeni, ngokungapheliyo.
6. Wozanini lonke, linâ`abalambileyo, kuJesu uMsindisi; Wozanini lonke, linâ`abalambileyo, kuJesu
uMsindisi, uMsindisi Uzakulisuthisa, aliphâ`ukuphila okungapheliyo.
Ukulisuthisa, aliphâ`ukuphila okungapheliyo, kungapheliyo.
7. Wozanini lonke, lina elomileyo, kuJesu uMsindisi, aqede umhawu, aliphâ`ukuphila, okungapheliyo.
8. Abalenhlupheko, lokukhathazeka, wozani kuMsindisi; Uzaliduduza, aliphâ`ukuphila, okungapheliyo.
9. Adunyiswâ`, uYise, leNdodana yakhe, loMoya oyiNgcwele, kuze kube nini, lanini lanini, ngokungapheliyo.
B. Ndlovu
L.title: LesiSidlo (600)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lifanele
Lifanele, iwundlu elahlatshwayo ukudunyiswa (2x)
1. Ngoba lahlatshwa ngenxa yezono zethu, lawunqoba umhlaba ngamandla eGazi lalo.
2. Ngoba lamukelâ`amandla lenotho, ukuhlakanipha lodumo kanye lobukhosi.
3. Izidalwa zonke zidumisâ`iWundlu, Ngoba yilo iNkosi yamakhosi.
4. Lihlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi,
umbuso walo ngowâ`okukhanyâ`okungapheliyo.
(Isam 5,12) M. Mkandla.
L.title: Lifanele (565)

L.lyrics:
Litshadile, Selihlanganisiwe
litshadile, selinyamanye
Lina lamhla, Lize lehlukaniswe yikufa (2x) 1. Kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu,
ukuba litshade eBandleni. 2. Ngizakuba qotho kuwe,
ekuthokozeni lenhluphekweni. 3. Ekuguleni lempilweni enhle,
ngizakuthanda ngikuhloniphe. 4. UKristâ` uyiNhloko yeBandla,
ngokunjalo indoda yinhloko yomfazi. 5. Madoda thandanâ`omkenu,
njengoKristu walithanda iBandla. 6. Thandanani lihloniphane,
ukuze liphile impilo enhle. 7. Lithandane ekuthokozeni,
lithandane lenhluphekweni. 8. Kasiceleni kuNkulunkulu,
ukuba abusise abatshadileyo. 9. Uba iNkosi ilinika abantwana,
libakhulise ngesihle.
10. Sâ`yamcela uMoya oNgcwele,
kehlele phezu kwenu.
N. Lunga
L.title: Litshadile (606)

L.lyrics:
1. Lapha ungithanda, ngilandela, thwalâ`isiphambano seNkosi. Ungezwa ngiqoqoda, ungivulele, sithwale ngokubekezela.
Chorus: Ale, aleluya, ale, landelâ`iNkosi a, a! aleluyaâ`subiziwe.

Ale, aleluya, ale, landelâ`iNkosi, awu,
aleluya suthandiwe.
2. Ngikwethekelele njengoMose, thwalâ`isi...
Yamukela imithetho yami, sithwale... 3. Ilandele yonke uzasindiswa, thwalâ`isi... Uzafikâ`ekhaya elimnandi, sithwale...
4. Uma ngikubiza, ungiphendule, thwalâ`isi... Ungalahlâ`ithemba eNkosini, sithwale...
5. Uzabakhokhelâ`abantu bami, thwalâ`isi...
Uzabatshengisâ`indlela yami, sithwale... 6. Uzabafundisâ`intando yami, thwalâ`isi...
Uzababonisâ`indlela yami, sithwale...
W. Hlabano
L.title: Lapha ungithanda ngilandela (188)

L.lyrics:
1. Lapho inhliziyo yami, ilusizi, ibuhlungu,

UnguBaba olomusa, ongisiza ongigcina.
2. Nxa kungathi ngitshiyiwe, ngizingelwa yibo bonke,
ngizakukhumbulâ`uMenzi, ongilondoloza kuhle.
Angesabi ngingowakhe, unguMsizi wami Yena. 3. Nxa ngigula ngibuhlungu, ngizabekezela njalo,
ngoba lobuhlungu lobo, buyisipho sakhâ`esihle.
Ngilethemba kuye njalo, kuhle konke akwenzayo. 4. Kuzakuthi ekufeni, ngingesabi lakancane.
Ngizahlangabezwa nguye, ongumfeli wamâ`omuhle. Angilande emhlabeni, ayengisa ezulwini.
L.title: Lapho inhliziyo yami (208)

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lina Bandla leAfrika lizimiselâ`ukutshumayelâ`iVangeli na?
Emazweni onke, aseAfrika. (2x) 1. Khangelani, isivuno sikhulu,
abavuni bayingcosana, celani kuMninisivuno
ukuba athume abavuni ensimini yakhe, yaseAfrika. 2. Woza, Moya oNgcwele, sifundise ukubumba icebo,
lokwandisa ukholo ebantwini, baseAfrika.
3. Siphe ulwazi, siphâ`isibindi,
Siphe uthando lokuhloniphana, Laphâ`okulenkani lokuphikisana, Siphâ`ukuthula, eAfrika.
4. Sisebenzele bonke abantu,
ukuba babe ngabalandeli bakho.
Sibafundise, ukugcina owasilaya, owasilaya ngakho.
5. Akusenze sibe ngamanxusa, eVangeli leNdodana yakho, okwathi izingelwa nguHerodi Yasikhethâ`ukuphephela kulelilizwe, laseAfrika.
M. Majahana
L.title: Lina Bandla leAfrika (532)

L.lyrics:
1. Loyola (Phetro Klauer, Fransisi) siyahlabela,
udumo lwakho kithi nje:
wenake (Ignasiyo) baba omnandi, wemukelâ`ingoma yethu.
2. UyiNkosâ`eyayilwelâ`izizwe, wehlulâ`abafo bakho; wabuya waba ngokaMdali, wehlulâ`abadiyabholi.
3. Bonake, wayevusâ`abanye,
yena waphelekezela nje, esithi: Limlandelâ`uJesu, liqedâ`impi kaSathane.
4. Ngabakho abaJesuita, bahambâ`ezizweni zonke, bafela ukukholwa kwabo, bafakazâ`uNkulunkulu.
L.title: Loyola siyahlabela

L.lyrics:
Chorus: Lindela, lindela ukufa kwakho
Lindela, lindela ukufa kwakho
Lindela, lindela ukubizwa kwakho, 1. Abanye babizwa bengakazalwa,
abanye babizwa besesengabantwana. abanye babizwa bengamajaha, abanye babizwa besesezintombi.
2. Abanye bathathwa besenothweni, abanye bathathwa bengabayanga. Abanye bathathwa besengutsheni, abanye bathathwa besendleleni3. Kawazâ`ukuthi nini, loba kanjani. Kawazâ`ukuthi ngaphâ`uzafela khona. Into inye esiyaziyo;
ukuthi sonke kuzasitholâ`ukufa.
(Luka 17,23-37)
L.title: Lindela ukufa kwakho

L.lyrics:
1. Lolo suku olumnyama, luzakuphendulâ`umhlaba, ubâ`ngumlotha wona wonke. Konke kuza thuthumela, nxa efika uMthonisi, ezehlolisisa konke.
2. Amabhoso azabiza, bonke abangcwatshiweyo, beze phambi koMthonisi. Zizafika ngokwesaba, izidalwa zonkâ`zomhlaba, ziphendule amacala.
3. Izakuvulwa incwadi, okubhalwe kiyo konke, okuswela ukuqunywa. Konkâ`okufihlakeleyo, konke kuzakubâ`obala, kungasali lokuncane.
4. Ngingathini mina soni, nxa sengimi phambi kwakho, oyiNkosi yobuNgcwele? Nkosi yobukhosi bonke, uzungisindise ngomsa, elangeni lenyembezi.
5. Jesu wami, ukhumbule: waba ngumuntu, ngenxa yami, ube nguMsindisi wami. Wenâ`owangihluphekela, wangifela kabuhlungu, ungavumi ngilahleke.
6. Wena Mthethi, wamacala, akungixolelâ`izono, kungakabi lolusuku. Sengikhala ngilusizi, ngikhumbulâ`izono zami: ngihawukele, Jesu wami.
7. Wamhawukelâ`u Magadalena, waxolela, njalâ`isela: lami ngilethemba kuwe. Loba, ngingakufanele, ngisindise, kodwa Jesu, emlilweni, waphakade.
8. Nxa behlukaniswa bonke, ungibeke, lami Jesu, eceleni lokunene. Nxa ababi, bephoselwa, emlilwenâ`ongacitshiyo, ungibize, ngize kuwe
9. Sengincenga, ngithobile, ngenhliziyo, elusizi, ungisize, mhla ngifayo. Elangeni, lokucina, lapha bazavuka bonke, ngingenise, ezulwini
10. Ikhulule, imimoya, esekhona, emlilweni, iphumule kuwe Jesu. Ingenise, ezulwini, ithokoze kanye lawe, kuze kube laphakade.
(c/f Zefaniya 1,14-18)
L.title: Lolo suku (240)

M.lyrics:
Chorus: Madodakazi,
Madodakazi aseJerusalema
Lingangikhaleli,
lingangikhaleli mina kodwa zikhaleleni lina, labantwana benu.
1. Ngikhulume obala emhlabeni; emhlabeni,
Ngezikhathi zonke bengifundisa. Madodakazi lingangâ`khaleli (4x) Bengifundisâ`emasinagogeni; sinagogeni,
Ngafundisa futhi ethempelini. Madodakazi... 
2. Laphâ`okubuthana khona abakoJuda; kwelakoJuda
Ngafundisa bonke abakoJuda. Madodakazi... Kangikhulumanga lutho ensitha; kwabakoJuda,
Ngakhuluma obala ebantwini. Madodakazi.. 3. Buzani labo abakuzwayo;
abangizwayo,
Engakukhuluma kibo bayakwazi. Madodakazi... Uba besenza lokhwâ`esihlahleni esimanzi; esimanzi,
Bazakwenza njani na kwesomileyo? Madodakazi...
(c/f Luka 23,28;23,31;Joha 19,20-21) A. Gwenelo
M.title: Madodakazi aseJerusalema

M.lyrics:
Chorus: Madoda aseGalili, limeleni
lijolozelâ`ezulwini na? (2x)
1. UJesu wakhutshulwa abafundi bemkhangele;
Iyezi lamsusa emehlweni abo.
2. Bathi bejolozele ezulwini esenyuka,
kwafikâ`izithunywa zabatshela zathi:
3. UJesu lo osuswe wenyuselwa ezulwini,
uzabuya njalo, njengokutsho kwakhe.
(c/f Seb 1,11) A. Mahlangu
M.title: Madoda aseGalili

M.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngena lathi Nkosi, ngena lathi Nkosi
Siye ezulwini, ekhaya elimnandi.
1. Mhla usiyâ`eZulwini, usibize lathi, silandele wena2. Ungafikâ`ezulwini, uzatshelâ`izithunywa, zisihlangabeze. 3. Khonalâ`ezulwini, kulabokhokho bethu, basikhulekele. 4. Othanda iNkosi, uzakuya kuBaba, ekhaya labangcwele. 5. Sidumisâ`uBaba, uYise leNdodana, loMoya oNgcwele.
W. Hlabano
M.title: Mhla usiya ezulwini

M.lyrics:
Chorus: Moya kaKristu, hlala kithi
woza moya, hlala enhliziyweni zethu zonke Moya kaNkulunkulu, hlala lathi
woza Moya, hlala lathi enhliziyweni zethu zonke.
1. Siyakuncenga, akâ`usisize, sihlakaniphe, siqedisise, useluleke, sibe lesibindi.
2 Siyakunxusa akâ`usincede, sibe lolwazi, silunge, sesabâ`iNkosi, sibe lothando.
3. Siyakuncenga akâ`usisize, sithabe njalo,
sibe loxolo, sibekezele, sibe ngabangcwele. 4. Siyakuncenga akâ`usincede, sibe lomusa,
sibe lokholo lembeko, lokunyamezela.
5. Siyakuncenga akâ`usisize, sinqobâ`umzimba,
sinqobâ`umzimba, lemoyâ`emibi, sibe ngabangcwele.
B. Ndlovu
M.title: Moya kaKristu hlala lathi

M.lyrics:
Mina, ngiyiKukhanya komhlaba lowo ongilandelayo, uzathola ukukhanya okungapheliyo, okungapheliyo. (4x)
Mina ngiyikuPhila... Mina ngiliQiniso...
Mina nginguMalusi... Mina ngiliSango...
Mina ngingâ`Olungileyo... Mina nginguMsindisi...
(c/f Joha 8,12; Joha 14,6; Joha 10,9-14) D. Moyo
M.title: Mina ngiyiKukhanya (83)

M.lyrics:
1. Msindisi wethu Jesu, ibizo lakho lihle: livela ezulwini, limnandi kithi sonke. Alikhwâ`elinye futhi, elihle nj engelakho: yilona nje kuphela, esingasinda ngalo.
2. Ngebizo lakho Jesu, kuguqa phansi konke, ligcwele ubukhosi, lokwaziseka kwakho. Lihawâ`ibizo lakho, esingavika ngalo,
nxa sihlaselwa yimpi, kaSathanâ`elwa lathi.
3. Limnandâ`ibizo lakho, lithabisâ`uNkulunkulu, angasinika konke, esikucela ngalo. Lasekufeni kwethu, sizaqiniswa yilo,
ibizo lakho Jesu, Msindisi wethu sonke.
M.title: Msindisi wethu (84)

M.lyrics:
1. Makesisukumeni semukeli iNkosi. Esihlangene ngayo khona laphâ`endlini.

Chorus: Sithi: Bayethe weZulu, Nkosi yamakhosi. Sithi Bayethe wena Zulâ`eliphezulu. (2x).
2. Siyakhuleka sithi, bayethe weZulu. Sithi bayethe wena, Zulâ`eliphezulu.
3. Singamabutho akho, wena Ndabezitha Siyakhuleka kuwe, sitemelezela.
(Zulu song)
M.title: Makesisukumeni (513)

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, (2x)
wenâ`osusa izono zomhlaba.
Sihawukele (2x) sihawukele Nkosi; (2x) Mvana kaNkulunkulu (2x)
wenâ`osusa izono zomhlaba
Siphâ`ukuthula (2x) siphâ`ukuthula Nkosi (2x)
V W. D. Hlabano
M.title: Mvana kaNkulunkulu (561)

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, wena osusâ`izono (2x) izono zomhlaba, usihawukele (2x)
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, wena osusâ`izono (2x) izono, zomhlaba siphe ukuthula.
M.title: Mvana KaNkulunkulu

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu
wena osusa izono zomhlaba sihawukele (2x) Mvana kaNkulunkulu
wena osusa izono zomhlaba siphâ`ukuthula.
M.title: Mvana kaNkulunkulu

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu wenâ`osusa (2x)
wenâ`osusa, wenâ`osusa, osusa izono zomhlaba, Sihawukele, osusa, izono zomhlaba, sihawukele. wenâ`osusa izono zomhlaba, siphe, siphâ`ukuthula (2x).
S. Moyo
M.title: Mvana kaNkulunkulu (598)

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, wena osusa izono zomhlaba baphe ukuthula (2x)
Mvana kaNkulunkulu wena osusa izono zomhlaba baphe ukuthula okulaphakade.
P. Mthombeni
M.title: Mvana kaNkulunkulu (Eyabafileyo)

M.lyrics:
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, kaNkulunkulu (2x) wena osusâ`izono kaNkulunkulu (2x)
izono zomhlaba sihawukele
Mvana kaNkulunkulu wena osusâ`izono kaNkulunkulu
izono zomhlaba siphe ukuthula, izono zomhlaba siphe ukuthula.
M.title: Mvana kaNkulunkulu

M.lyrics:
1. Moya, moya kaKristu, ungi,ungilungise,
Mzimba, Mzimba kaKristu, ungi, ungisindise. Gazi, Gazi likaKristu, ungi, ungijabulise. (2x) Manzâ`aphuma, manzâ`aphumâ`ehlangothini lukaKristu, Hlangothini, hlangothini lukaKristâ`ungigezise.
2. Nhluphe, Nhlupheko kaKristu ungi, ungiqinise, Jesu, Jesu omnandi aku, akungizwe.
Ungi, ungibekâ`ema, nxebeni, nxebeni akho. (2x) Ungavumi, ungavumâ`ukuba ngehlukane lawe, esitheni, esitheni samâ`esibâ`ungivikele. (2x)
3. Ngesikha, ngesikhathi sokufa, kwami, kwamâ`ungibize, khuluma, khuluma uthi, ngize kuwe.
Ukuba, ukuba hlangane, labangcwele, labangcwele
bonke. (2x) Ngidumise, ngidumise kuze kube laphakade,
kuze kube, kuze kube laphakade. Amen. (2x)
L. Sidambe
M.title: Moya kaKristu (162)

M.lyrics:
1. Mdumiseni, limbabaze, emhlabeni wonke: olodumo lubatshazwa, ngamaxukwâ`ezithunywa.
2. Ngesibindi lenjabulo, bongani iNkosi: eyisimanga lamandla, kuzozonkâ`izindawo.
3. Siyabonga; siyacela inhliziyâ`emnene: vuselelâ`ingqondo zethu, kanye lenhliziyo. 4. Akuphoselâ`ubuhlungu, lokuzidla kwethu:
lokwesaba kwenhliziyo, enzikinâ`zolwandle. 5. Ukuthula kube kithi, lelizweni lethu:
phumelelisâ`imisebenzi; busâ`isizwe sethu. 
M. Desideria
M.title: Mdumiseni, limbabaze (147)

M.lyrics:
1. Mdali wethu, Mdali wethu siyakubonga, uyiNkosi, Wenâ`osivikela ngamaphiko akho. Ulamandla, uthando lwakho lubanzi, ulomusa, uthando lwakho lujulile.
Chorus: Siyabonga,
siyakubonga Nkosi, Siyabonga
siyakubonga Nkosi (2x)
2. Siyabonga, sibongâ` isivunâ` osipha sona,
uyiNkosi, wasipha izulu, wasipha amandla, ulamandla, siyakubonga Nkosi, ulomusa, siyakubonga Nkosi.
3. Siphilile, sibonga ukusiphilisa kwakho, uyiNkosi, sibonga ukudla okuvela kuwe.
Ulamandla, sibonga intokozo, ulomusa
sibonga intokozo lenjabulo.
4. Ubusisile, ubusisilâ`imithombo lamadlelo, uyiNkosi ubusisilâ`izifuyo lamasimu. Ulamandla, usibusisile, ulomusa, emsebenzini wethu siyabonga.
L. Sidambe
M.title: Mdali wethu (234)

M.lyrics:
1. Mama Mariya, Nina kaJesu kuwe siyeza lamhlanje, uMntwana wakho uyakuthanda; ubosikhulekela kuye. Zilungiswe inhliziyo, ezigcwele amacala.
2. Thina sonile wena uNgcwele. Ungelasono, ngitsho lasinye. Uyacwazimula njengelanga, ugcwelâ`umusa kaNkulunkulu. Zilungise inhliziyo, ezigcwele amacala.
3. Nina kaKristu, Nina kaJesu usivikele esonweni. Mnyango wezulu, nkanyezi enhle, ukhombâ`indlela yezulu. Zilungise inhliziyo, ezigcwele amacala.
M.title: Mama Mariya, Nina kaJesu
Mama Mariya Nkosikazi (255)

M.lyrics:
1. Mama Mariya Virigo elihle, wakukhethâ`uMdali, ukuba ubâ`uMama wethu.
2. Mariya, sisize Mariya usicelele thina kumntanakhâ`uJesu.
3. E! wena luba elimangalisayo, Lubelâ`iyinqaba, akusikhangele ngomusa.
4. Nkanyezi enhle, nkanyezi yokukhanya, sitshengise phela, uJesu iNkosi yokukhanya.
P. Mthombeni
M.title: Mama Mariya Virigo elihle (256)

M.lyrics:
1. Mama wethu, olungileyo, wena olomusa, wenâ`okhethiweyo, odumisekayo.
Chorus: Akâ`usize, thinâ`esingabakho.
2. Msizi wethu, sikhangele, usisize Mariya,
sicelelâ`umusa, kumntanakho uJesu.
3. Nanku thina, sihlupheka, sikhathazwa lusizi,
siduduze, Mama, osizini lwethu.
M.title: Mama wethâ`olungileyo (257)

M.lyrics:
1. Mariya mandla ami, ake ungiqinise, ngibambelele kiyo indlela yokulunga.
Chorus: Khangelâ`umoya wami, akungilondoloze, ukubâ`ungangcoliswa yisono esikhulu.
2. Mariya msizi wami, ake ungivikele,
mhla ngisehlelwa yingozi yomphefumulo wami.
3. Mariya themba lami, ake ungicelele, eNdodaneni yakho, ingise ezulwini.
M.title: Mariya mandla ami (258)

M.lyrics:
1. Mariya oNgcwele, kabakuthande, bonkâ`abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, owasifela esiphambanweni, ngenxa, ngenxa yothando lwakhe, asithanda ngalo. (2x)
2. Mariya oNgcwele, kabakwazise, bonkâ`abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, owasifela esiphambanweni, ngenxa ...
3. Mariya oNgcwele, kabakuhloniphe, bonkâ`abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, owasihlenga esiphambanweni, ngenxa ...
484
4. Mariya oNgcwele, kabakubabaze, bonkâ`abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, owahlawulela izono zethu zonke, ngenxa ...
5. Mariya oNgcwele, kabakubonge, bonkâ`abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, lowo owamzala,
umzalela thina, thina abalezono izono, kuNkulunkulu thinâ`abalezono, izono kuNkulunkulu.
6. Mariya oNgcwele, akâ`usincengele, kuNkulunkulâ`uBaba lakuNdodana,
loMoya oNgcwele, basixolele izono zethu zonke, ngenxa...
7. Mariya oNgcwele, usikhulekele,
thina abakholwayo kuMntanakhâ`uJesu, onguNkulunkulu, sifinyelele ekhaya lasezulwini, sihlale laye kuze kube nininini. (2x)
B. Ndlovu
M.title: Mariya oNgcwele, kabakuthande (578)

M.lyrics:
1. Mariya, sikuncenga, Mariya, sisize. Singabayanga sonke, Mariya sisize.
E! siyathemba kuwe, Mariya, O! Mariya, Ngobâ`nguMama wethu.
2. Mariya, themba lethu, Mariya sisize, nguwâ`oyinqaba yethu, Mariya sisize. Sibalekela kuwe, Mariya, O! Mariya, Sigcine thinâ`abakho.
3. Virigo, Msizi wethu, Mariya, sisize. Sibone thinâ`abakho, Mariya, sisize.
E! nqaba yabezono, Mariya, O! Mariya, Sisize kokuphela.
M.title: Mariya sikuncenga (259)

M.lyrics:
1. Mariya ugcwelâ`umusa. Nkanyezi yekuseni, ulithemba lethu lonke, uyakhanya ezulwini. Singabahambayo nje, singaboni indlela, xotsha ubumnyama singeze salahleka.
2. Siyasindwa kuleli lizwe, ingozi kazipheli: Siyaswela amandla, okulahla isono. Ubosikhulekela ungasitshiyi sodwa. Siphelekezele, sifike ezulwini.
3. Khumbulâ`ukuhamba kwakho, loJesu eGibithe. Wamisa, wambuyisela uJosefa ekhona.
O Herode banengi, abasekhona lamhla, abasizondayo, befunâ`ukusilahla.
M.title: Mariya ugcwelâ`umusa

M.lyrics:
1. UMoses wayeyisikhonzi sikaNkulunkulu
esikhethiweyo.
Chorus: Asimlandele othandiweyo okhethiweyo
2. UAbrahama...  
3. UMariya...  
4. UElizabethi... 
5. UBernardi...
6. ULazaro...
7. UMagadalena...
8. UCeciliya...
9. UPius...
J. Nyathi
M.title: Moses (273)

M.lyrics:
Moses, Moses,
1. Khokhelâ`abantu bami ubase eKhenani. Chorus: Wasesithi, ngizwile Nkosi,
ngilapha Nkosi,
ngizakwenza ongithume khona. 2. Fundisâ`abantu bami indlela yokulunga.
3. Khuthazâ`abantu bami bathande iNkosi.
4. Vikelâ`abantu bami izingozi zalumhlaba.
(Eks 3, 7ff) W. Hlabano
M.title: Moses, Moses (274)

M.lyrics:
1. Mikhayeli, ndunâ`enkulu, sizekubonga wena,
ngoba uphakemâ`impela le emzini waphezulu.
Mana njalo, ndunâ`enkulu yamabutho aphezulu2. Sizekukubonga futhi, ngobâ`umkhulu eBandleni,
alimisâ`uJesu Kristu, ngenxa yethu emhlabeni.
Mana njalo, ndunâ`enkulu yamakholwa aliBandla. 3. Nansi impi kaSathane ihlaselâ`iBandla njalo.
Mikhayeli mthandi wethu, uyixotshe siyancenga.
Mana njalo, mvikeli weBandla eliNgcwele. 4. Nguwe oyindunâ`enkulu yemimoya yabafayo;
Uyisize, ekufeni, ingenise ezulwini.
Mhla ngifayo ndunâ`enkulu, wemukelâ`umoya wami.
M.title: Mikhayeli, ndunâ`enkulu (272)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nantâ`ilizwi elimnandi
livela kuMphilisi wethu. (2x) 1. Elehliswa nguNkulunkulu
kuMariya ngesithunywa uGabriyeli. 2. Wathumela isithunywa
ukuthi siyekutshela leliVirigo. 3. Isithunywa samethusa
uMariya uMama wethu wasezulwini. 4. Sathi kuye isithunywa:
Sakubona Nkosikazi elomusa.
5. Sasesisithi: Ngithunyiwe nguNkulunkulu
kuwe wena oliVirigo. 6. Uzakuzala iNdodana
uMkhululi wabantu bonke. 7. Wamangala uMariya kodwa yena ethokoza enhliziyweni.
8. Akwenzeke kimi phela
njengokutsho lokuthanda kwayo iNkosi.
9. ULizwi waba yinyama,
yabelethwa iNdodana phakathi kwethu.

P. Hlabano
N.title: Nantâ`ilizwi

N.lyrics:
1. Nampâ`ubusuku obuNgcwele kuyathula kuthi zwi. UJosefa loMariya, sebehlezi belomntwana. NguMsindisi wabantu, nguMsindisi wabantu.
2. Nampâ`ubusuku, obuNgcwele, zwanini indaba le: Sifikilâ`iNkosi yethu, eyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu. NguMsindisi wabantu, nguMsindisi wabantu.
3. Nampâ`ubusuku obuNgcwele sizwile ingoma le, izithunywa zihlabela, zidumisa ozelweyo. NguMsindisi wabantu, nguMsindisi wabantu.
N.title: Nampâ`ubusuku

N.lyrics:
1. Ngokujabula Baba Nkulunkulu,
Siyakubonga Nkulunkulu Baba
Ngokuvutha kothando lwakho, sibonga Sikhumbula ukuzalwa kweNkosi uJesu Kristu.
Chorus: Ngokuzalwa kukaJesu Kristâ`iNkosi Siyakubonga Nkulunkulu Baba.
2. Uyikukhanya wena Nkosi,
Ntuba yaphakade Nkosi
Ngokujabula sithi kawubongwe kawubongwe kawubongwe laphakade. (2x)
Bass: Kawubongwe, bongwe,
Nkosi kawubongwe laphakade.

S. Moyo
N.title: Ngokujabula Baba Nkulunkulu

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi Jesu ngalolusuku S/T. Siyakubonga Nkosi
Ngobuqhawe bakho Nkosi
S/T. Selokhu wazalwayo. (2x)
Alto: Kristu uyiNkosi, uyiNkosi yamakhosi. Bass: Uliqhawe lamaqhawe, siyakubonga Kristu
uliqhawe.
1. IBandla liyahlokoma, liyagiya ngalumkhosi omuhle,
Kristu siyakubonga.
2. Ngokuzalwa kwakho wasisindisa ezonweni zethu,
Kristu siyakudumisa.
3. Ekuzalweni kwakho, wazehlisa, wazithoba, Kristu
uyiNkosi.
4. Kristu uthando lwakho olungapheliyo lukhulu kithi,
Nkosi ulomusa.
5. Esiphambanweni wasifela, wasihlenga ngeGazi
lakho, Nkosi ngeGazi eliNgcwele.
6. Kristu wasifela, wabuya wavuka ngelanga
lesithathu, Kristu uliqhawe.
7. Kristu waba ngumuntu, wahlala lathi wehlukana
lathi ngokungabi lesono.
8. Mama Mariya, siyakubonga, ngokusizalela,
uMsindisi. 
N. Lunga.
N.title: Nkosi Jesu ngalolusuku

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi yezulu, uhlezi esithebâ`leni. Kuyini lokhu? Inje indlu yakho.
Mntwana omuhle wazalelwani lapha? Uzikhethelelani ubuyanga?
Chorus: Mntwana omuhle, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu ngibe ngowakho ngikulandele, ngikuthande.
2. Nkosi yezulu, mntwana uyagodola.
Ukhala nje, ulele otshanini. Ukhalelani? Uzondiwe ngabantu, abalezono, bengelanhliziyo.
3. Nkosi yezulu, wavumâ`ukuba nguMuntu.
Izinhliziyo zethu ziyathaba. SiloMsindisi owathenji-
swa kade.
Uzakusivuleli zulu lakhe.
N.title: Nkosi yezulu

N.lyrics:
1. Nangu Nina ebuhlungu, emi esiphambanweni, kuMntanakhe ebethelwe.
2. Esakhala, O! kwangathi, uhlatshiwe ngesihedla, yathi saka inhliziyo.
3. O! ngosizi lobuhlungu, abuzwayo uMariya, esefelwa nguMntanakhe.
4. Wema khona, elusizi, ekhalela iNdodana, ihlupheka, ibuhlungu.
5. Kambe kungabe ekhona, ongambonâ`uNina lowo, elusizi engakhali.
6. O! ngubani ongahawulwa, nguMariya elusizi, ekhalela uMntanakhe.
7. UMntanakhe amthandayo, owambona ebulawa, ngenxa yamacala ethu.
8. Wayibona iNdodana, idanile, ilayela, isifela thing zoni.
9. Nina mthombo wokuthanda, ake wenze ngimhawukele, ngizwe lawe ubuhlungu.
10. Basâ`enhliziyweni yami, ilangabi lokuthanda, uMsindisâ`uJesu wami.
11. Mama unamathisele, amanxeba oMntanakho, ezinhliziyweni zethu.
12. Yenzâ`ukuba ngimkhumbule, owafela mina soni, ngingamkhohlwa ngize ngife.
13. Akuvume ngime lami, esiphambanweni lawe, simkhalelâ`olenga kiso.
14. Ekuhluphekeni kwami, kangibekezele lami, njengoJesu, lanjengawe.
15. Yenzâ`ukuba ngisithande, isihlahla soMntanakho, alengayo kiso ngami.
16. Mhla kutshonâ`umzimba wami, akuse umoya wami kumntanakho ezulwini.
N.title: Nangu Nina ebuhlungu

N.lyrics:
1. Nanku, Jesu ngiguqa ngedolo phansi kwesiphambano sakho.
Ngiyakukhalela olinyaziweyo, ngiyamangaliswa ngamanxeba akho. Ngiyakukhalela.
2. Uyabulawa ungelacala. Okuhlabayo yikwona kwami, owabethela izandla zakho, yimi, ngithi yimi, umntwana wakho. Owabethela...
3. Inhliziyo yami ibuhlungu. Uyikhangela ngomusa wakho; ungazikhumbuli izono zami.
Khumbula nje kodwa ukungithanda. Ungazikhumbuli...
N.title: Nanku, Jesu ngiguqa ngedolo

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyakubonga, ngiyakubonga Jesu wami wenâ`owafa ngenxa yami (2x)
1. Wangihlenga ngomusa wakho, ezonweni zami zonke.
2. Ngokufela izizwe zonke, esiphambanweni, Jesu wami.
3. Ngiyakuncenga ngihawukelâ` insuku zonke, lamhla ngifayo. 4. Nkosi yami, sengiphila ngawe, lasekufeni Msindisi wami. 5. Ngingowakho, lapha emhlabeni, insuku zonke, laphakade.
V. Dube
N.title: Ngiyakubonga Jesu wami

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi yami, Nkosi ngizathwalâ`isiphambano, Nkosi yami, angisoze ngisibeke phansi.
Bass: Kusukela lamhlanje, ngizathwalâ`isiphambano, Bass / Tenor: Nkosi, Angisoze ngisibeke phansi.
1. Loba ngisehlelwa yibunzima kuyisipho sakho,
ngizasemukela, Nkulunkulu wami.
2. Nxa ngithukwa ngebizo lakho ngizaziqhenya,
ngoba yikho ukuthwalâ`isiphambano. 
3. Ngicelâ`amandla akho Nkosi okukudumisa, ukuze ngibambelele kiso isiphambano.
4. Loba sinzima kangakanani ngizasithwala, ngiziqhenye ngaso insuku zonke.
5. Ngokuthwalâ`isiphambano sami ngizasindiswa, ngingeniswe embusweni wakho.
6. Impilo yami yonke Nkosi ngizakudumisa, ngithwale isiphambano sami kokuphela.
(c/f Joha 14,26-27) N. Lunga
N.title: Ngizathwala isiphambano

N.lyrics:
1. Ngubani lo okhulekayo ensimini yaseGetsemani? Chorus: YiNkosi, YiNkosi yezulu,
yiNkosi, yiNkosi yomhlaba.
2. Ngubani lo onikelweyo ukuba abulawe?
3. Ngubani lo othwelâ`isiphambano esinzima kangaka?
4. Ngubani lo owayo esindwa yisiphambano?
5. Ngubani lo ohlangana loNina endleleni?
6. Ngubani lo othwalelwayo nguSimonâ`isiphambano?
7. Ngubani lo owesulwa ubuso nguVeronika?
8. Ngubani lo owayo futhi esindwa yisiphambano?
9. Ngubani lo okhalelwayo ngabesifazana
beJerusalema?
10. Ngubani lo owa ngokwesithathu esindwa
yisiphambano?
11. Ngubani lo ohlutshulâ`izembatho zithunuka
amanxeba akhe?
12. Ngubani lo obethelwayo exolela abambethelayo?
13. Ngubani lo ofayo kabuhlungu esiphambanweni?
14. Ngubani lo osefile ezandleni zikaNina?
15. Ngubani lo oselibeni sekungathi usenqotshiwe?
C. Zikhali
N.title: Ngubani lo okhulekayo

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi Jesu, Mntwana kaMariya, ubethelwe esiphambanweni. Ubulewe yibo abezono,
ufile njengokuthanda kwakho.
Chorus: Msindisi wethu, siyabonga; sesikuthanda wena, sitsho wena wedwa! Sesikuthanda wena, sitsho wena wedwa.
2. Amanxeba agcwelâ`emzimbeni; lonâ`iGazi liphelile lonke! Lonâ`ikhanda lihlatshwe ngameva, zibotshiwe izandla lenyawo.
3. Ulukhuni lowâ`ongakhaliyo ekhangela ukuhlutshwa kwakho, lodelayo uthandâ`olungaka ekhumbula izono zabantu.
N.title: Nkosi Jesu, Mntwana kaMariya

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, Nkosi
ungikhumbule laphâ`usembusweni wakho (2x)
1. Ixuku lakumangalela, phambi kukaPhilathu, kodwa yena kakufumananga, ulecala lokufa.
2. Lapho wayethandâ`ukukukhulula, bakulahla njengesoni. bakhetha ukukhululelwa, uBarabasi umbulali.
3. Ngakho watshaywa wanikelwa, ekufeni ungelacala, wetheswa umqhele wameva, wathwala isiphambano.
4. Jesu ngisize ngisithwale isiphambano ngokubekezela, ngoba esakho wasithwala uthule okwemvana.
5. Msindisi, mina soni, nginjengomunye wabaphangi, wathi kuye ngiqinisile, ngizakuba lawâ`empharadisweni.
S. Magonya.
N.title: Nkosi ungikhumbule

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, Nkosi Nkosi, Nkosi Nkosi,
Nkosi, Nkosi, Nkosi, wens ugezisa inyawo zami na? mina soni, wens ugezisa inyawo zami na?
1. INkosi uJesu Kristu isiqedile ukudla labafundi bayo, yathela amanzi emganwini. Nkosi...
2. Yaqala ukugeza inyawo zabafundi bayo isithi: Lesi yisibonelo engilinika Bona. Nkosi...
3. Wafika kuSimoni Phetro, uSimoni Phetro wathi kuye: Nkosi...
4. UJesu wathi kuye: Uba ngingakugezisi, kawulasabelo lami. Nkosi...
5. Engikwenzayo awukwazi khathesi,
kodwa uzakuqedisisa emus kwalokho. Nkosi...
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Nkosi wena ugezisa inyawo zami na?

N.lyrics:
1. Ngilinika, umlayâ`omutsha; (3x) 2. Wokuba, lithandane lonke; (3x) 3. Njengoba, ngilithanda mina; (3x)

4. Ngilipha, ukuthula kwami; (3x)
5. Inhliziyo, zingakhathazeki; (3x)
6. Ekhaya, ekhaya likaBaba; (3x)
7. Kukhona, izindlu ezinengi; (3x)
8. Ngiyahamba, ngililungisele indawo; (3x) 9. Ngizabuya, ngilithathe njalo; (3x)
10. Kuze kuthi, lapho engikhona; (3x) 11. Libe khona, libe khona lani; (3x) 12. Ngothumela, uMoya oNgcwele; (3x) 13. Yena uza, uzakuliduduza. (3x)
(c/f Joha 13,34;14,2-3) J. Villescas
N.title: Ngilinika umlayâ`omutsha

N.lyrics:
1. NgePhasika ekuseni, kwezwakala ukuduma, wavukake uMsindisi, walitshiyâ`iliba lakhe.
Chorus: Jesu Nkosi Msindisi wethu, uvukile ekufeni, sikhumbule thina bakho, sibusise thina sonke.
2. Sasisehla isithunywa, sikhanyisa njengelanga sizogiqâ`ilitshe lelo, elalivale iliba.
3. Amabutho ayemlinda, athâ`ebona isithunywa, ezwa lokuduma lokho, awa phansi ethukile.

4. Kwababesiyâ`elibeni, isithunywa sathi kibo: Kakho lapha uvukile, njengokutsho kwakhe kini.
5. Wasebonakalâ`uJesu, kubafundi bakhe bonke. Bathokoza, bajabula, beyibonâ`iNkosâ`iphila.
6. Jesâ`omuhle, mhla sifayo, akusise ezulwini; Size sikubone njalo, sithokoze kanye lawe.
N.title: NgePhasika ekuseni

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosikazi yaphezulu, Aleluya, aleluya! Thaba ujabule wena, Aleluya, aleluya!
Chorus: Nkosikazi yaphezulu, Aleluya, aleluya! Thaba ujabule wena, thaba ujabule wena. Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya!
2. Ngoba lowâ`owamzalayo, Aleluya, aleluya! Uvukile ekufeni, Aleluya, aleluya!
3. Wena olomusâ`omkhulu, Aleluya, aleluya! Usikhulekele sonke, Aleluya, aleluya.
N.title: Nkosikazi yaphezulu

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosikazi yezulu uthokoze, aleluya.
Ngoba lowâ`owawufanelâ`ukumbeletha, aleluya. Chorus: Aleluya (5x).
2. Uvukile njengokutsho kwakhe, aleluya. Usikhulekele kuNkulunkulu, aleluya.
J. Villescas
N.title: Nkosikazi yezulu

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Thumelâ`uMoya oyiNgcwele.
1. Nkulunkulu (3x)
2. Ngegama likaYise, leleNdodana loMoyâ`oNgcwele.

3. Kumaqaba ... 4. Kwabakholayo...
5. Kilolonkâ`iBandla... 6. Kithi thina zoni...
N.title: Nkulunkulu thumela uMoya oyiNgcwele

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngithemba kuwe Nkosi, Wena Nkulunkulu wami. (2x)
1. Ngiphephela kuwe Nkosi, ungikhulule ngokulunga kwakho.
2. Beka iNdlebe yakho kimi, ungikhulule ngokulunga kwakho.
3. Ube liDwala lesiphephelo sami; iNqaba yokungisiza.
4. Ngikhuphe embuleni engithiywe ngalo, ngoba Wena uyiNqaba yami.
5. Woba lomusa kimi Nkosi; ngoba ngiyahlupheka.
6. Ngizathaba ngithokoze, ngothando lwakho olungapheliyo.
7. Ngâ`khona uzaj abulela, iminikelo efaneleyo, phezu kweAlithare lakho.
P. A. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngithemba kuwe Nkosi (85)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyakubonga Nkosi, zonke insuku, (2x) njengezithunywa ezisezulwini ngiyakudumisa, (2x) Ngiyakhuleka kuwe, zonke insuku, (2x) njengezithunywa ezisezulwini, ngiyakudumisa. (2x)
Chorus: Lifanele iWundlu, lifanele iWundlu. lifanele iWundlu, ukudunyiswa,
lifanele iWundlu, elahlatshwayo.
2. Jesu Msindisi wami, ngiyakudumisa, (2x) nje.
Ngihlabelelâ`iNkosi zonke insuku, (2x) nje. 3. Ngidumisâ`iNkosi, zonke insuku, (2x) nje.
Ngizakuguqela ngibabaza, zonke insuku, (2x) nje.... (c / f Isam 5,12) C. Zikhali
N.title: Ngiyakubonga Nkosi (86)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyalidumisâ`iGazi, likaJesu uMsindisi, alichitha kabuhlungu lapho wajulukâ`iGazi. Walijulukiswa yimi, ngazo zonkâ`izono zami.
Chorus: Gazâ`elihle loMsindisi, elachithwa ngenxa yami. 2. Nantâ`iGazi loMsindisi, langophela kabuhlungu,
Lopha ezandleni zakhe, lopha njalâ`ezinyaweni,
Ngoba ebethelwe ngami, ehlawulelâ`izono zami. 3. Lonâ`iGazi likaJesu, liyangivulelâ`izulu.
Lingumthombo wokuphila, lentokozâ`elaphakade.
Ngilethemba losindiso, ngenxa yalolelâ`iGazi. 4. Babusisiwe labobantu, abagezâ`izono zabo,
eGazini lalâ`iMvana, eyahlatshwâ`esâ`phambanweni.
Zonkâ`izono ziyesulwa, ngalo leliGazâ`elihle! 5. Lelâ`iGazi loMsindisi, lalifanekiswâ`endulo,
lapho kwakuhlatshwâ`imvana, engelasici yePhasika. Liyangisindisâ`impela, ekufeni kwaphakade!

6. Liyangitholisâ`umusa, nxa kwethulwa umthethelo, wesiVumelwanâ`esitsha, eMiseni eliNgcwele. Linginikâ`inhlanhla yonke, nxa ngikhona eMiseni.
7. Inhliziyo yami, Jesu, iyalinxwanelâ`impela, ukulamukelâ`iGazi, losindiso oluyilo, owalophâ`esâ`phambanweni, ngokuthanda mina soni.
N.title: Ngiyalidumisâ`iGazi (87)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyamthanda uMsindisi, ngiyamthandâ`uJesu wami, obethelwe ngenxa yami, ngiyamthanda yena yedwa. Angithandi okomhlaba, lentokozo ezilize.
UMsindisi ngiyamthanda, ngiyamthandâ`uJesu wami.
2. Ngiyamthanda uMsindisi, ngiyamthanda ngisekhona. Ngizamthanda laphambili, ngazo zonke izikhathi. Angesabi lutho mina, nxa ngilondolozwa nguye. UMsindisi ngiyamthanda, ngiyamthandâ`uJesu wami.
3. Ngiyamthanda uMsindisi, ngiyambonga, ngiyamkhonza. Sengizonda wena sono, owangenzâ`isitha sakhe. Wangehlukanisa laye, oyimpilo yami yedwa. UMsindisi ngiyamthanda, ngiyamthandâ`uJesu wami.
N.title: Ngiyamthanda uMsindisi (88)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi, Msindisi wethu, bona abantu bakho, siyathanda ukulunga lokulandela wena.
Chorus: Siyaswela amandla, amandla egrasiya lakho: Owalithembisa labo abalicelayo. (2x)
2. Ukhona ohluphayo ezondâ`abantu bonke, ebadonsa ngamandla ukwenza konkâ`okubi...
3. Siyamazi umDiyabholi, yena uyasilinga; kodwa kasisamfuni; uyakhohlisa kodwa...
N.title: Nkosi, Msindisi wethu

N.lyrics:
1. Nhliziyo yoMsindisi, sihlalo sokulunga,
angathi wonkâ`umhlaba ungakwazisâ`usithi: Udumâ`a-lube kuwe nhliziyo yoMsindisi, ubongwe, udunyiswe, uthandwe njalo njalo, (2x)
2. Bonani liNhliziyo, egcwelâ`umusa wonke, yagwazwa ngenxa yethu, yaphumâ`iGazi lonke. Udumâ`alube kuwe...
3. E! Jesu, yinye into engiyicela kuwe; enhliziyweni yakho, ungiphe lamâ`indawo. Udumâ`alube kuwe...
N.title: Nhliziyo yoMsindisi

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyazinikela enhliziywenâ`eNgcwele kakhulu, yeNkosi yethu, uJesu Kristu. (2x).
1. Nginikela kuyo lonkâ`uqobo lwami, impilo lezenzo lezinsizi zami zonke.
2. Ngizakhuthalela ikakhulu ukuyithanda linhliziywâ`eNgcwele lokuyidumisa njalo.
3. Ngezikhathi zonke ngiyaqinisa ngithi ngifunâ`ukuba ngowayo kokuphela.
4. Konkâ` engikwenzayo ngikwenze ngothando ngilahlâ`ukuyicunula linhliziywâ`eNgcwele kaJesu. 5. Kayidunyiswe, linhliziywâ`eNgcwele sibili kaJesu
uMsindisi iNkosi yethu.
C. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngiyazinikela enhliziywenâ`eNgcwele (548)

N.lyrics:
1. Nhliziyo eNgcwele kaJesu, mthombo wokuthanda konke, kuwe kuphuma konkâ`okuhle, amandla lomusa wonke. Siyakhuleka kuwe lamhla, ulithemba lethu kuphela. Wasihlatshelwa entabeni, wasusâ`izono zethu.

2. Nhliziyo eNgcwele kaJesu, uzwe ukukhala kwethu. Usikhulumele kuYihlo, asamukele ngomusa. Wathi wenâ`usemhlabeni: wozanini lingabosaba, beze bonkâ`abehlulekayo, bathole ukuphumula.
3. Nhliziyo yoMsindisi wethu, uhlatshelwa thina sonke. Kwaphumâ`igazi lamanzi, bamangaliswa abantu. Igazi lamanzi athini? Athi: Nankâ`amaSakramente: elinye liyagezisa, elinye liyasuthisa.
N.title: Nhliziyo eNgcwele kaJesu

N.lyrics:
1. Nhliziyo kaJesu, Mthombo wokuthanda. Khangela ngomusa, thinâ`abakholwayo: Siguqa ngedolo, phansi phambi kwakho, amehlo abona, amanxeba akho.
2. Nhliziyo kaJesu, eyasihlatshelwa, wavulelwa bonke, abakuthandayo. Vumake singene, sihlale sikuwe, size sifele kuwe, sifikâ`ezulwini.
3. Nhliziyo kaJesu, ugcwelâ`ubuhlungu; abantu ababi, basakudelela. Bayaphindâ`ukona, bethandâ`uSathane. Thina siyabonga, ngenhliziyo zethu.
4. Nhliziyo kaJesu, nhliziyo eNgcwele, siyakunikela, inhliziyo zethu. Zadatshulwa nguwe, ngezakho impela; ziqinise njalo, zingakuhlamuki.
N.title: Nhliziyo kaJesu (89)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngenanini, ngenanini endlini yeNkosi, hlalanini, hlalanini ezandleni zeNkosi. (2x)
1. Ngathokoza, ngathokoza lapho, besithi kimi: kasiye, kasiye endlini yeNkosi.
Izinyawo, izinyawo zethu, sezimi kuwe, wenandlu, wenandlu eNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.
2. Sicelela, sicelela amalunga amatsha, abambelele, abambelele ekulungeni. Lathi sonke, lathi sonke asibasize, banqobe, banqobe ekulingweni.
3. Kusukela, kusukela lamhla selingabe Nkosi, kalisekho, kalisekho emandleni esono. Hlalanini, hlalanini ekulungeni,
lize lifele, lize lifele kuNkulunkulu.
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngenanini endlini yeNkosi (92)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngombhabhathizo, sizalwa kakutsha Ngombhabhathizo, sizalelwa kuJesu.
1. Sibangamalunga leBandla IakaKristu, impilo kaKristu ithelwa kithi.
2. Sibe yizitho zoMzimba wakhe, sizalwa ngamanzi langoMoya.
3. Siyembelwa loKristu, sife esonweni, sivukele impilo yokholo.

4. Siyafa sivuke loKristu,
njengoba sisifa laye sizavuka laye.
5. Vukani makholwa lisebenzele ukholo, lithele izithelo lifakazele uKristu,
6. Lenze abanye balandele uKristu, Libe yindlu eNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.
N.title: Ngombhabhathizo sizalwa kakutsha

N.lyrics:
1. Ngikuthembisa, Nkosi yami, phambi kweBandla lonke. Ngithi: ngizakukhonza Nkosi, ngibâ`umntanakho omuhle.
O! Jesu wami ngiyabonga, ngobâ`ungilethe eBandleni, ngaze ngakholwa kuwe.
2. Ngizalalelâ`iBandla lakho, owalimisa Jesu, elitshengisâ`indlelâ`eyiyo, eza iqonda kuwe. Ngizakubambelela kilo, ngingehlukani lalo futhi, ngize ngifele kilo.
3. Wangemukela ngomâ`sa wakho, ngabâ`ngumntanakho Jesu. Uzungilondoloze njalo, ezingozini zonke.
O! Jesu olomusa wonke, akungigcine ungibuse, ngize ngifike kuwe.
N. Lunga
N.title: Ngikuthembisa, Nkosi yami (93)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngokubhabhathizwa kwami, ngaphenduka ngabâ`likholwa.
Ngaphunyiswa emnyameni, embusweni kaSathane. Chorus: Sengikholwa eBandleni, likaJesâ`iNkosi yethu. Yebo ukukholwa kwami yikho ukuthaba kwami.
2. Ngilikholwa, ngiloBaba oyiNkosâ`enkulâ`impela, ongigcina njengowakhe, ongibusisayo njalo.
3. Ngilikholwa, sengiyeka zonkâ`indlela zobumnyama, intokozo yami manje, yibungcwele benhliziyo.
4. Ngilikholwa, ngiyathemba, kuSomandla onguBaba; angisize ekufeni, ngingeniswe ezulwini.
N.title: Ngokubhabhathizwa kwami (94)

N.lyrics:
1. Laphâ`okuhlangene khona, ababili, ababili labathathu, ngegama lami.
Chorus: Ngegama lamâ`, ngegama lami, lami ngoba khona lami.
2. Ngizolinika konke okuhle, konkâ`okuhle, ngizolinikâ`elikucelayo, kucelayo.
3. Landelanini yonkâ`imilayo, imilayo, landelanâ`imilayo kaBaba, ekaBaba.
4. Ngizalinikâ`uMoya oNgcwele, Moyâ`oNgcwele, ngizalinikâ`alikhanyisele, khanyisele.
5. Lizafikâ`ekhaya likaBaba, likaBaba, lijabule kanye labangcwele, labangcwele.
W. Hlabano
N.title: Ngegama lami (102)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngenani, ngenani ngendumiso, ngendumiso, emnyango kaNkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, sondelani ngenjabulo, emthunzini wendlu yakhe.
2. Sondelani, sondelani Bantu lonke, Bantu lonke, kulinkonzo ezothileyo, zothileyo, sondelani ngendumiso, sondelani ngokuthaba.
3. Usekade, usekade laphâ`uKristu, laphâ`uKristu, ongumnini wayo lindlu, wayo lindlu, sinikezwa kuye manje, ngalinkonzwâ`esiyenzayo.
4. Amakholwa, amakholwa amanengi, amanengi, kawazalwe kuyo lindlu,
kuyo lindlu, ngokutshunyayelwa kwezwi, elimnandi losindiso.

5. Nxa sehlelwa, nxa sehlelwa zinhlupheko, zinhlupheko, kuvaleke lezulu, lezulu, kasikhulekeni kulâ`indlu,
umenzi uyosiphendula.
C. Zikhali
N.title: Ngenani ngendumiso (103)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngizakuya eAlâ`thareni likaNkulunkulu, kuNkulunkulu, ongithabisa ebutsheni bami.
1. Kwangithokozisa nxa kuthiwa kimi, asihambe siye endlini yeNkosi. Izinyawo zethu sezimi kuwe, Wenaâ`ndlu engcwele kaNkulunkulu.
2. Zinhle kanganani izindlu zakho wena Nkulunkulu wamaxuku. Vulekani lina masango amahle, kungene iNkosi yobukhosi.
3. Ngubani Iâ`iNkosi yobukhosi na! YiNkosi enkulu elamandla onke. Ngubani Iâ`iNkosi elamandla onke! NguJesu iNkosi elamandla onke.
(Hubo 122) B. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngizakuya eAlâ`thareni

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi sivulele, sivulele singene wena, Nkosi Sizithoba sizekhuluma lawe. (2x)
1. Sesiqoqoda phela emnyango, akusizwe - akusizwe, sivuleleke singene, sikukhonze sikudumise.
2. Siqalisa inkonzo yosuku lwalamuhla silalele, siphamandla sizithobe, uyiNkosi Somandla onke.
3. Wena Nkosi yezulu lomhlaba, Nkanyezi ekhanyayo, sikhanyisela-ke singene, Nkulunkulu wezizwe zonke.
W. D. Hlabano
N.title: Nkosi sivulele (551)

N.lyrics:
Ngangibotshiwe, yizono zami,
ngingakhululwa ngubani na?
Wehla uJesu lenkululeko, ngikhululiwe nguyâ`uJesu, yekâ`ubumnandi benkululeko,
ngikhululiwe, ebugqilinâ`nguJesu,
wayenza inkululeko ngikhululiwe nguyâ`uJesu.
N.title: Ngangibotshiwe

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngenze ngibe mhlophe
Nkosi ngenze ngibe mhlophe.
B: Ngibe mhlophe, hlophe, ngibe mhlophe ngibe mhlophe, ngibe mhlophe emoyeni.
1. Akuxole Nkosi ugcwalisâ`inhliziyo yami ngegrasiya lakho ngibemhlophe.
2. Wena kukhanya okukhanyisela wonke umuntu Nkulunkulu wami.
3. Ngithokozela ukuhlala kuwe insuku ngensuku ngikudumisa. Ngenze ngibe mhlophe.
4. Ngisesandleni sakho, ngiyisikhonzi sakho.
5. Kawubongwe wena ngeGrasiya lakho, Nkulunkulu
wami. 6. Ukuze ingqondo yami igxile ngithembele kuwe. 7. Ngithokozela ukuhlala kuwe insuku ngensuku,
ngikudumisa, ngisesandleni sakho, ngiyisikhonzi sakho. S. Moyo
N.title: Ngenze ngibe mhlophe (566)

N.lyrics:
Ngihawukela, Ngihawukela, Nkulunkulu
ngothando lwakho olungapheliyo. (2x)1. Yesula iziphambeko zami
ngobubele bakho obukhulu. 

Chorus: Khangela, ngazalelwa ebubini lomama wangomulela esonweni (2x)
Ngonile kuwe wena wedwa, Nkosi
ngenza okubi emehlweni akho.
 2. Ngigezisa ebubini bami,
ngihlambulula esonweni sami. 3. Ngiyazazi iziphambeko zami,
lezenzo zami zihlala ziphambi kwami. 4. Ngigezise ngehisophe, ngigezise,
ngizakuhlambuluka, Ngigezise ngibemhlophe,
ngibemhlophe njengongqoqwane.
5. Ngigcwalise ngentokozo yakho Nkosi,
athabe amathambo owaphulileyo.
(c/f Hubo 51) M. Majahana
N.title: Ngihawukela (615)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiphathisa Baba,
Ungangixotshi, ungangitshiyi, ungangifihleli, Nkosi yamâ` ubuso bakho.
Ngikhokhela Baba. Ungangixotshi
ungangitshiyi...
1. Ngizwa Nkosi lapho ngikubiza,
Baba ungangitshiyi, Nkosi yami ngiphathisa. Wena Nkosi ulusizo lwami, Baba ungangitshiyi...
2. Laphâ`umama loBaba bengitshiya, Baba ... Wena Nkosi uzangilondoloza, Baba...
3. Unganginikeli ezitheni zami, Baba... Ngifundisâ`indlela yakho Nkosi, Baba...
4. Ungihole endleleni yakho, Baba...
Ngithembe wena Nkosi Mhlengi wami, Baba..
M Chifana
N.title: Ngiphathisa Baba (514)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngixakulula,
Mdali Mvelingqangi, Nkulunkulu. Ebubini bonke,
O! Nkulunkulu Wena Somandla! Ngikhulula Baba,
Mdali Mvelingqangi, Somandla, Ezonweni zonke,
O! Nkulunkulu Simakade! Ngihlambulula,
Mdali Mvelingqangi, wamaxuku, Ekungcoleni,
O! Nkulunkulu, Baba Somandla!
Chorus: Ngihawâ`kela Baba / Ngihawâ`kela Baba. Ngomusa wakho, / E! - - - - E!
Ngihawâ`kela, / Ngihawukela, Nkulunkulu, Ngithethelele / Ngithethelele
Ngesihawu sakho. / E! - - - - E!
Esikhulu! / O! Nkulunkulu, Baba Somandla.
2. Ngiqinisa Baba, Mdali Mvelingqangi, Nkulunkulu! ngamandla akho,
O! Nkulunkulu, Wena Somandla!
Ngilondoloza, Mdali Mvelingqangi, Somandla! Ngihlale kuwe, O! Nkulunkulu, Simakade! Ngivikela Baba, Mdali Mvelingqangi, wamaxuku! Engozini zonke, O! Nkulunkulu, Wena Somandla.
3. Ngilungisisa, Mdali Mvelingqangi,
Nkulunkulu, ngoMoya wakho,
O! - Nkulunkulu, Wena Somandla!
Ngiyacela Baba, Mdali Mvelingqangi, Somandla, Amandla akho, O! - Nkulunkulu Simakade! Ngikhokhelela, Mdali Mvelingqangi, wamaxuku! Endleleni zakho, O! -Nkulunkulu, Baba Somandla! Ekufeni kwa-mi, Mdali Mvelingqangi, Nkulunkulu, ngifikâ`ezulwini, O! Nkulunkulu Wena Somandla.
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngixakulula (109)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyavuma, Nkosi mina ngiyisoni Ngiyavuma, yebo phambi kobuso bakho. (2x)
1. Emicabangweni yami Nkosi ngikhumbulela abanye okubi.
Bass: Nkosi yami Ngithethelela, Nkosi yami (2x) Tenor: Ngithethelela, Nkosi,
Ngithethelela Nkosi yami, Ngithethelela
Ngomusa wakho.
Tenor: Ngithethelela Nkosi, Ngithethelela
Nkosi, Ngithethelela Nkosi, Nkosi, Nkosi yami. 2. Ukholo lwami Nkosi,
kaluqinanga ngoba ngidelela ilizwi lakho. 3. Ithemba lami Nkosi,
kalijulanga ngoba ngindlela mbili. 4. Uthando lwami Nkosi
luyaxega ngenxa yobuthakathaka bami.
C. Nyoni
N.title: Ngiyavuma Nkosi mina ngiyisoni (552)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngecala lami (2x)
1. Ngiyavuma - kuNkulunkulu, uMninimandla wonke, ngiyavuma ngecala lami.
2. Ukuthi ngonile, ngokucabanga, langokukhuluma, langokwenza, langephutha, ngiyavuma...
3. Ngecala lami, ngecala lami, ngecala lami elinzima kakhulu sibili (2x), ngiyavuma...
Chorus: Ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngecala lami (2x)

4. Ngakho ngiyancenga, uMariya, obusisiweyo, oliVirigo kokuphela, ngiyavuma...
5. Lezithunywa, zasezulwini, labangcwele bonke lani bazalwane, ngiyavuma...
6. Lingikhulekele eNkosini, uNkulunkulu wethu (2x), ngiyavuma...
D. Moyo
N.title: Ngiyavuma ngecala lami

N.lyrics:
Nkulu, Nkulunkulu ngecala lami. (2x)
1. Ngiyavuma kuNkulunkulu uMninimandla wonke, Nkulu...
Lakini bazalwanâ`ukuthi ngonile kakhulu, Nkulu... Ngokucabanga, langokukhuluma, langokwenza, langephutha, Nkulu...
Chorus: Cala lami, ngecala lamâ`; ngecala lamâ`, lami, ngecala lamâ` elinzima sibili. (2x) Nkulu, Nkulunkulu ngecala lami (2x)
2. Ngakho-ke ngiyancengâ`uMariya obusisiweyo, Nkulu... OliVirigo kokuphela lezithunywa zezulwini, Nkulu... Labangcwele bonke, lani bazalwane, Nkulu... Lingikhulekele eNkosini uNkulunkulu wethu, Nkulu...
W. Hlabano
N.title: Nkulunkulu ngecala lami

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma lakini bazalwane.
1. Ngiyavuma kuNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke... 2. Ukuthi ngonile kakhulu ngokucabanga
langokukhuluma langokwenza langephutha.
3. Ngecala lami, ngecala lami, ngecala lami elinzima
kakhulu sibili.
4. Ngakho-ke ngiyancenga uMariya obusisiweyo oliVirigo kokuphela lezithunywa zonke zasezulwini...
5. Labangcwele bonke, lani bazalwane
ukuba lingikhulekele eNkosini uNkulunkulu wethu. (ekucineni) Ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma lakini bazalwane.
N.title: Ngiyavuma lakini bazalwane

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyavuma, ngiyavuma,
ngiyavuma ngecala lami (2x)
1. Ngiyavuma kuNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke,
ngiyavuma ngecala lami.
2. Lakini bazalwane ukuthi ngonile kakhulu
ngokucabanga... 3. Langokukhuluma langokwenza langephutha...
4. Ngecala lami, ngecala lami, ngecala lami elinzima kakhulu sibili....
Chorus:
5. Ngakho-ke ngiyancenga uMariya obusisiweyo
oliVirigo kokuphela...
6. Lezithunywa zonke zasezulwini... labangcwele bonke... 7. Lani bazalwane ukuba lingikhulekele eNkosini
uNkulunkulu wethu... Chorus:
N.title: Ngiyavuma

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyazisola, ngicelâ`amandla Nkosi,
ngezono zami, ngihawukele Baba, Nkosi yami, ngicelâ`amandla Nkosi yami, ngehlukane lezono zami.
2. Angisilutho... ngaphandle kwakho... Nkosi yami... 3. Ngithethelela... ngomusa wakho... ungiqinise...
4. Ngiphakamisa... ngesandla sakho... ungivikele... 5. Lamhla ngifayo... ngihlangabeza... ngizekhaya...
B. Ncube
N.title: Ngiyazisola (110)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi yiba lesihawu kithi Chorus: Sonile Baba siyacela,
sithethelele Nkulunkulu Nkosi,
sithethelela sesizisola.
Bass: Khanyisâ` umusa wakho kithi Bass: Usiphe usindiso lwakho.
A. Gwenelo
N.title: Nkosi yiba lesihawu kithi (111)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkulunkulu ngangiduka, ngakushiya wena Nkosi,
sengibuya ngiyivuma, intando yakho.
2. Noma bengingathobeli, imiyalo yakho Nkosi,
manje ngithi: Mayenziwe, intando yakho. 3. Noma uthi angiyeke, okufiswa yinhliziyo,
ngenjabulo ngiyavuma intando yakho.
4. Kothi noma ngihlupheka, ngilosizi lobuhlungu
ngenamele loko njalo, intando yakho.
5. Yilungisâ`intando yami, izâ`iyekâ`inkani yayo,
ithobele njalo njalo, intando yakho.
Zulu song
N.title: Nkulunkulu ngangiduka (112)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngihawukele, Ngihawukele
ngihawukele, ngihawukele (2x)
1. Nkulunkulu ngothando lwakho, olungaqamukiyo
