yesula iziphambeko zami, ngobubele bakho obukhulu, Ungigezise ebubini bami, ungihlambulule, esonweni sami.
2. Ngoba ngiyazazi, iziphambeko zami, lesono sami, sihlala siphambi kwami.
3. Ngigezisa ngibe mhlophe, kulongqoqwane ngigcwalisa ngentokozo, langokujabula, ukuze athabe amathambo, owaphulileyo.
N.title: Nkulunkulu ngothando lwakho

N.lyrics:
Nkosi sihawukele, Nkosi, Nkosi, Nkosi sihawukele (2x) Kristu, Kristu, Kristu
Kristu, Kristu sihawukele. (2x) Nkosi sihawukele, Nkosi Nkosi, Nkosi sihawukele. (2x)
N.title: Nkosi sihawukele, Nkosi (553)

N.lyrics:
Nkosi, Awu - Awu Nkosi Nkosi, Nkosi sihawukele. (2x) Kristu, Awu - Awu Kristu Kristu, Kristu sihawukele. (2x) Nkosi, Awu - Awu Nkosi Nkosi, Nkosi sihawukele. (2x)
N. Lunga
N.title: Nkosi, Awu Nkosi

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, siyakubabaza, Nkosi, siyakwazisa, Nkosi, siyakuguqela, siyakudumisa.
1. Udumo alube kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu,
kube lokuthula emhlabeni ebantwini bakhe, Nkosi... 2. Nkosi Nkulunkulu Nkosi yasezulwini,
Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla, Nkosi...
3. Siyakubonga ngenxa yobukhosi bakho obukhulu,
Nkosi Jesu Kristu Ndodana ezelwe yodwa,
Nkosi Nkulunkulu. Nkosi...
4. Mvana kaNkulunkulu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu uYise
Wena osusa izono zomhlaba,sihawukele. Ngoba, Nguwe wedwa oNgcwele
ngoba, nguwe wedwa oyiNkosi
ngoba, nguwe wedwa onguPhezukonke, wena Jesu Kristu.
5. Wena ohlezi kwesokunene sikaYihlo, zwana ukukhala kwethu, Ngoba...
6. Undawonye loMoya oNgcwele,
ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu uBaba. Amen. Ngoba...
C. Baleni
N.title: Nkosi siyakubabaza (118)

N.lyrics:
Bass: Siyakubonga
Soprano: Ngelizwi lakho leli eliNgcwele, Nkosi
Siyakubonga ngomusa wakho lo. Alto: Ngelizwi - lakho, Nkosi,
Bass: Siyakubonga, ngelizwi lakho, Nkosi,
Soprano: Ngomusa wakho lokulunga kwakho kithi Alto: Baba ngomusa - wakho kithi Nkosi
Bass: Siyakubonga ngomusa wakho kithi.
1. Khuluma kithi, njengaku Abrahama, owambusisayo waba ngukhokho wethu sonke Khuluma kithi, njengakuMoses, Nkosi, owambusisayo waba yisandla sakhwâ`esingcwele.
2. Khuluma kithi njengakuSamuweli ongcwele, owamkhethela ukuba ngumkhulumeli wakho ongcwele Khuluma kithi, njengakubaprofethi bakho abangcwele. sifakaze ngeqiniso lonke ilizwi lakho elingcwele - Ngcwele.
3. Khuluma kithi, njengakuMariya oNgcwele, samukele ngenhliziyo intando yakho eNgcwele. Khuluma kithi, ngempela siyezwa, Nkosi, Limnandi kithi sonke, ilizwi lakhwâ`eliNgcwele.
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngelizwi lakho elingcwele siyakubonga (611)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngezwa, ngezwa ilizwi livelâ`ezulwini, linjengomdumo wamanzâ` amanengi, Lisithi: Ukunqoba lobukhosi ngokukaNkulunkulâ`iNkosi yethu,
Bass: Lisithi: Aleluya, aleluya, Amen aleluya. 2. Izithunywa, izithunywa zazimi,
zihanqâ`isihlalo sobukhosi. Zihuba, zihubâ`ihubo lokubonga zidumisa njalo njalo;
Bass: Zisithi, Aleluya...
3. Izidalwa, izidalwa eziphilayo,
zakhothamela phansi kuye.
Labo yibo, yibo abagezâ`ingubo zabo eGazini leWundlu, besithi:, Aleluya.
(c/f Isam14,2) C. Zikhali
N.title: Ngezwa ilizwi liveâ`ezulwini (519)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngilondoloza, Nkulunkulu, Nkosi ngoba ngiyaphephela kuwe.
Chorus: Nkosi uyisabelo sami lenkezo yami. 2. Ngithâ`eNkosini Wenâ`uyiNkosi yami,
kangilakhâ`okuhle ngaphandle kwakho. 3. Wenâ`ophethâ`ukuphila kwami konke,
Imingcele yesabelo sami.
4. Ngiyayibongâ`iNkosi engelulekayo,
lasebusuku ilayâ`inhliziyo yami. 5. Ngikhangelâ`eNkosini njalonjalo,
ngoba ingakwesokunene sami.
6. Ngakhokâ`inhliziyo yamâ`iyathokoza,
lomphefumulo wamâ`uyajabula.
7. Ngoba kawungiyekelanga, ngiyâ`endaweni yabafileyo.
8. Uzakungazisâ` indlela yokuphila, phambi kwakho kugcwelâ`ukuthokoza.
9. Langakwesokunene sakho kukhona, intokozo kuze kube nininini.
Hubo 16) M. Mkandla
N.title: Ngilondoloza Nkulunkulu (533)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngizayijabulelâ`iNkosi Ngizayijabulela ngokuzincoma
ngobuthakathaka bami.
Umusa weNkosi awube kimi, kususwe uSathani. (2x) Ukuzâ`amandla, amandla kaKristu, ahlale, ahlale phakathi kwami. (2x)
1. Thumelâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele, ungikhanyisele, ungihole Nkosi, endleleni.
2. Ngiphâ`amanzâ`akhwâ` angcwele, angumthombâ`ogobhozayo,
ayimpilo Nkosi, elaphakade. Ngijabule ngikuwe, lawe Nkosi ukimi, sibe munye, Nkosi, ekuphileni.
3. Ngikhohlwe yibuthakathaka, lokuhlekwa lobunzima,
lokulingwa Nkosi, lokuzingelwa; uthando lwakho Nkosi, maluhlale kimi, ngikukhonze Nkosi, ngokujabula.


S. Dube
N.title: Ngizayijabulelâ`iNkosi (534)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngizakuyihlabelela iNkosi, Ngizakuyihlabelela iNkosi ngoba ingenzele okuhle okukhulu (2x).
1. Ngiyakuthanda Nkosi, mandla ami, Ngoba ungenzele okuhle okukhulu...
UliDwala lami laMandla ami, loMkhululi wami... UyiSi-phephelo sami leSihlangu sami...
2. Ngizakhuleka eNkosini - Ngoba... Efanelâ`ukudunyiswa ngikhululwe ezitheni zami... Ngayo iNkosi ngingehlula izimpi... NgoNkulunkulu wami ngingeqa umthangala...
3. Ngoba ngubani onguNkulunkulu ngaphandle kweNkosi na? Ngoba...
Ngubani oliDwala ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu na?... INkosi ikhona kalidunyiswâ`idwala lami... Kaphakanyiswâ`uNkulunkulu wokukhululwa kwami...
(c /f Hubo 13, 6;Hubo 18,3) M. Mkandla
N.title: Ngizakuyihlabelela iNkosi (633)

N.lyrics:
1. Njengalokhu impala inxwanela imifula yamanzi, ngokunjalo lomphefumulo wami, unxwanela Wena Nkulunkulu.
2. INkosi inguMalusi wami, angiyikuswela lutho. Ingisa emadlelweni aluhlaza, ingisa emanzini aphumuzayo.
3. Ilungisa itafula phambi kwami, ebusweni bezitha zami. Igcoba ikhanda lami ngamagcobo, igcwalise inkezo yami.
4. Loba ngingaze ngihambe ethunzini lokufa, angiyikwesaba okubi, ngoba Wena ulami, udondolo lwakho lentonga yakho, kulami njalo kungiduduza.
(c/f Hubo 42;Hubo 23) B. Ndlovu
N.title: Njengalokhu impala

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi khuluma, inceku yakho iyezwa (2x) 1. Umuntu kaphili ngesinkwa sodwa,
kodwa uphila ngalelolizwi,
eliphuma emlonyeni wakho Nkosi. 2. Limnandi lelo lizwi,
Nkosi limnandi lelo lizwi, eliphuma emlonyeni wakho Nkosi.
(1 Sam 3,10) E. Nkomo
N.title: Nkosi khuluma inceku yakho iyezwa (520)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi uyisabelo sami, leNkezo yami, Ngoba uphethe konke okokuphila kwamâ`.
1. Ngilondoloza Nkulunkulu ngoba ngiphephela kuwe, yonkâ`intokozo yamâ`ikuwe.
2. Abangcwele ezulwini yibo abayizikhulu, yonkâ`intokozo yami ikubo.
(Hubo 16) A. Hlabano
N.title: Nkosi uyisabelo sami

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Baba, Baba Somandla, Nkosi, Nkosi yosi-ndiso (2x)
1. Zwana amazwi ami Nkosi, ulalelâ`ukububula kwami.
2. Zwana izwi lokukhala kwami, Nkosi yami Nkulunkulu wami.
3. Nkosi ekufeni uyalizwa izwi lami, ngoba ngokhuleka kuwe.

C. Hlabano
N.title: Nkosi yoSindiso

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu wami, unguNkulunkulu wami Nkulunkulu wami ngiyakudinga (2x)
1. Umphefumulo wami, womele wena
lomzimba wami, womele wena,
Njengelizwe elomileyo laphâ` okungelamanzi khona.
2. Ngithanda, ukukukhangela endaweni engcwele, ngibona, amandla akho lobukhosi bakho.
3. Uthando lwakho olungapheliyo lungcono, kulokuphila, Umlomo wami uzakukudumisa.
4. Ngizakubonga, ngisaphila ngiphakamise, izandla zami Ngikhuleke ebizweni lakho.
5. Umphefumulo, wami uzakusutha kungathi, usuthi umnkatsho lamahwahwa ngezingoma,
ezithabisayo.
6. Lapho ngikhumbula wena ekulaleni kwami,
ngicabanga ngawe emilindelweni yasebusuku.
(c/f Hubo 63) R. Ndlovu
N.title: Nkulunkulu wami (618)

N.lyrics:
Ngiyakholwa kuNkulunkulu, ngiyakholwa, uYisâ`uMninimandla onke, ngiyakholwa. UMdali wezulu lomhlaba, ngiyakholwa, uYisâ`uMninimandla onke, ngiyakholwa. Yebo, ye, ye ngiyakholwa. (2x)

LakuJesu Kristu...
iNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa iNkosi yethu... Owemulwa ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele... Wazalwa liVirigo uMariya...
Wahlutshwa ekubuseni kukaPhonsiyo Philathu... wabethelwa esiphambanweni...
Esiphambanweni wafa wangcwatshwa...
Wehla waya kwabafileyo...
Yebo, ye, ye, ngiyakholwa. (2x)
Ngelanga lesithathu wavuka ekufeni...
wenyuka waya ezulwini...
Uhlezi esandleni sokunene sikaYise...
lapho azakuvela khona...
Ezothetha amacala...
amacalâ`abaphilayo labafileyo...
Yebo, ye, ye, ngiyakholwa. (2x)
Ngiyakholwa kuMoyâ`oNgcwele...
iBandla eliNgcwele eliKhatholika...
Ukwazana kwabangcwele...
ukuthethelelwa kwezono...
Ukuvuka koMzimba ekufeni...
lokuphilâ` okulaphakade. Amen ...
Yebo, ye, ye ngiyakholwa. (2x)
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Ngiyakholwa kuNkulunkulu (131)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa,
Ngiyakholwa, Oh ngiyakholwa, (2x) ngiyakholwa ngiyakholwa.
kuNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke...
UMdali wezulu lomhlaba...
LakuJesu Kristâ`iNdodana yakhe eyodwa... Owemulwa, ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele...

Wazalwa liVirigo uMariya...
Wahlutshwa ekubuseni kukaPonsiyo Philathu... Wabethelwa esiphambanweni...
Wafa wangcwatshwa...
Wehla waya kwabafileyo... Chorus
Ngelanga lesithathu wabuya wavuka ekufeni... Wakhwela waya ezulwini...
Uhlezi esandleni sokunene sikaYise...
Lapho azavela khona...
Ezothetha amacala...
Abaphilayo labafileyo... Chorus
Ngiyakholwa kuMoya oNgcwele...
IBandla eliNgcwelâ`eliKhatholika... Ukumanyana kwabangcwele...
Ukuthethelelwa kwezono...
Ukuvuka komzimba ekufeni...
Lokuphila okulaphakade. Amen. Chorus
M. Majahana
N.title: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa (132)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyakholwa... Ngiyakholwa ... Ngiyakholwa... Ngiyakholwa.
1. Ngiyakholwa kuNkulunkulu... uYise uMninimandla wonke... uMdali wezulu lomhlaba.
2. LakuJesu... iNdodana yakhe eyodwa... iNkosi yethu...
3. Owemulwa ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele... wazalwa liVirigo uMariya...
wahlutshwa ekubuseni kukaPhonsiyo Philathu.
4. Wabethelwa esiphambanweni...
wafa wangcwatshwa... wehla waya kwabafileyo...

5. Ngelanga lesithathu wabuya wavuka ekufeni... wakhwela waya ezulwini, uhlezi esandleni sokunene sikaYise...
6. Lapho azavela khona... ezothetha amacala... abaphilayo labafileyo...
7. Ngiyakholwa kuMoya oNgcwele... iBandla eliNgcwele eliKhatholika... ukwazana kwabangcwele.
8. Ukuthethelelwa kwezono... ukuvuka komzimba ekufeni... lokuphila okulaphakade. Amen.
N.title: Ngiyakholwa

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa kuNkulunkulu
1. Ngiyakholwa kuNkulunkulu,
uYise uMninimandla wonke, uMdali wezulu lomhlaba.
2. LakuJesu Kristu, iNdodana yakhe eyodwa, iNkosi yethu.
3. Owemulwa ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele, wazalwa liVirigo uMariya.
4. Wahlutshwa ekubuseni kukaPhonsiyo Philathu, wabethelwa esiphambanweni, wafa, wangcwatshwa.
5. Wehla waya kwabafileyo, ngelanga lesithathu wabuya wavuka ekufeni, wakhwela waya ezulwini.
6. Uhlezi esandleni sokunene sikaYise,
lapho azavela khona, ezothetha amacala abaphilayo labafileyo.
7. Ngiyakholwa kuMoya oNgcwele; iBandla eliNgcwele eliKhatholika; ukwazana kwabangcwele.
8. Ukuthethelelwa kwezono, ukuvuka komzimba ekufeni, lokuphila okulaphakade. Amen.
W. Hlabano
N.title: Ngiyakholwa, ngiyakholwa...

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyakholwa kuMdabuli, olamandla onke, onke, othandayo bonkâ`abantu, bajabule laphakade.
Chorus: Babawethuophezulu,usilondolozekuhle, singabongeniswa thina, ekulingweni kwesono.
2. Ngiyakholwa lakuJesu, iNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa, owazalwa nguMariya, wasifela thina sonke.
3. Ngiyakholwa lakuMoya, eBandleni labangcwele, ukuxolelwa kwezono, ukuvuka kwemizimba.
N.title: Ngiyakholwa kuMdabuli (71)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu Baba, zwanâ`abantu bakho,
ubahawukele.
Nkosi elamandla akusixolele...
Zwana siyakhala ngezinswelo zethu... Labâ`abagulayo benze basiliswe...

Abasentolongweni benze baxolelwe... Labayizigoga benze balulame... Bonâ`abakhokheli, abaphethâ`iBandla... Loba sesilamba, ube lathi Nkosi... Sinikâ`izulu lakho, eliphilisayo... Sizakubabaza, Nkosi yamakhosi... Phendulâ`inhliziyo, zabaduhileyo... Siphe ukuthula, elizweni lethu... Abadubekayo, akubaduduze...
Lazo intandane, akuzibusise... Abakufunayo, bazakufumana... Xotshâ`ububi bonke, obukhona kithi... Yelusâ`izimvu zakho, Malusi omuhle...
W. Hlabano
N.title: Nkulunkulu Baba (137)

N.lyrics:
1. Nansâ`isinkwa sethu, nansi, nansâ`isinkwa sethu, nansi
siyasinikela, kuwe, kuwe, Baba
Nkosi, Baba, Nkosi Nkulunkulu wethu. Nkosi yethu.
2. Nansâ`iwayini yethu. 3. Nanzâ`izipho zethu. 4. Nanzâ`izithelo zethu. 5. Nansâ`impilo yethu.
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Nansâ`isinkwa sethu (142)

N.lyrics:
1. Nanzâ`izipho zethu, zincane, sizethula kuwe. (2x) Lamhla, wenjabulo sizethula kuwe.
2. Sizohamba naye, uJesu sizohamba naye. Lamhla... 3. Nanzâ`izipho zethu, zincane, sizethula kuwe. Lamhla... 4. Sizothwalâ`umqhele, owethu sizothwalâ`umqhele.
Lamhla...
Zulu Song)
N.title: Nanzâ`izipho zethu (525)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngenhliziyo yethu yonke, siyancenga, uwuvuma lumnikelo uwamukele. Nkosi eNgcwele, ephezulu, sihawukele, Ngomthethelo onikelwâ`eAlithareni.
2. Lathi siyazinikela, thina zoni, semukele, Baba wethu, ngomsa wakho. Nkosâ`engcwele, ephezulu, sihawukele, Ngomthethelo onikelwâ` eAlithareni.
(Zulu Song)
N.title: Ngenhliziyo yonke

N.lyrics:
1. O! Nkulunkulu Nkosi, zivume lezizipho, ezinikelwa kuwe, ngumpristi eAlithareni. Akwenze kuphenduke, iNyama yoMsindisi, leGazi lakhe futhi kubâ`ngumthethelâ`omuhle.
2. Uvume lumthethelo, usihawukele ngawo, lalabâ`abageziswa, izono emlilweni. Ungabâ`usakhumbula, izono zethu manje, njengoba sicelelwa, nguJesâ`eAlithareni.
N.title: Nkulunkulu ophezulu Nkosi

N.lyrics:
Leader: Nkosi, Nkulunkulu, uNgcwele, All: UNgcwelâ`uNgcwelâ`uNgcwele! Leader: UNgcwele, Nkosi Nkulunkulu All: UNgcwelâ`uNgcwelâ`uNgcwele! Leader: Nkosi Nkulunkulu wamaxuku All: Nkulunkulu wamaxuku Leader: UNgcwele Nkosi, Nkulunkulu All: UNgcwelâ`uNgcwelâ`uNgcwele! Leader: Izulu lomhlaba
All: Izulu lomhlaba, kugcwele Leader: Kugcwelâ`ubukhosi bakho All: Kugcwele ubukhosi bakho Cantor: Hosana kweliphezulu
Hosana kweliphezulu, Hosana, Hosana, Hosana! (2x)

Ubusisiwe ozayo, ubusisiwe ozayo,
ozayo ngebizo leNkosi, (2x)
Hosana kweliphezulu, Hosana kweliphezulu (2x) Hosana, kweliphezulu hosana, hosana, hosana. Izulu lomhlaba, Izulu lomhlaba kugcwele, kugcwele ubukhosi bakho,
hosana kweliphezulu, hosana kweliphezulu, Hosana, hosana, hosana.
B. Ndlovu (Sotho melody)
N.title: Nkosi, Nkulunkulu, uNgcwele (559)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nangâ`uJesu Kristu, uMsindisi wethu, wehlelâ`eAlthareni; asimdumise.
1. Asikholwe kuye, uliqiniso, asithembe kuye, nguBaba wethu.
2. ESakramenteni, uMzimba wakhe, ukhona sibili. Asemukele.
3. Uyakhulekela, abantu bonke, lathi simdumise, insuku zonke.
4. Wafikâ`ukuhlala phakathi kwethu, asisize sonke, siyâ`ezulwini.
N.title: Nangâ`uJesu Kristu (163)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nangu Jesu, nangu Jesu, nangu Jesu Kristu. (2x) 1. Wozanini, wozanini, wozanini kuJesu.
2. Asimbonge, asimbonge, asimbonge uJesu.
3. Hlala lathi, hlala lathi, hlala lathi Jesu.
P. Ndlovu
N.title: Nangu Jesu (164)

N.lyrics:
1. Nansâ`iSidlo seNkosi, enguphezu konke konke, sondelani lamukele, lizatholâ`ukuphila.
2. Lawe soni zisole, sondela kuJesu Kristu, agezisâ`izono zonke, uthole lesiSidlo.
3. Sondelani makholwa, samukelâ`iNkosi yethu, ihlalâ`enhliziyweni zethu, lemoyeni yethu.
4. Wena Sidlo esiNgcwele, qinisâ`imimoya yethu, hlala lathi emakhaya, busisâ`imizi yethu.
5. Adunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu, adunyiswâ`uJesu Kristu, loMoyâ`oNgcwelâ` ezulwini, ekhaya labahle.
W. Hlabano
N.title: Nansâ`iSidlo seNkosi (165)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngikhuleka kuwe, Nkulunkulu,
wenâ` ofihlakelâ`eAlthareni. Ngizithoba ngenhliziyo yonke, phambi kwakho Nkosi yobukhosi.
2. Loba ucatshelâ`amehlo ami, inhliziyo iyakuzwa lokho. Ngikholiwe izwi lakho Jesu, Nkulunkulu Mninimandla onke.
3. Kwakufihlakelâ`esâ`phambanweni, ubuNkulunkulu bakho bodwa, ngaseAlithareni lucatshile, lonkâ`uqobo lwakho, Jesu Nkosi.
4. Ngokukholwa kuwe Jesu wami, ngikhuleka njengesela lelo, elabethelwa kanye lawe,
ngithi: ngihawukele, Jesu wami.
5. Angiboni amanxeba akho, njengoThomasi, umphostoli wakho. Kodwa ngitsho kanye layâ`ukuthi:
Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi yami. 6. Ake uqinisâ`ukholo lwami,
uqinise ukuthemba kwami, uvuthelâ`enhliziyweni yami, ilangabi lokuthanda wena. 7. E! sikhumbuziso esiNgcwele, sokuzinikela kukaJesu, ehlawulelâ`izono zethu zonke, esifela esiphambanweni.
8. Sinkwa semiphefumulo yethu, esiphila, siphilisa futhi: ngiphilisa ngokuphila kwakho, ngize ngiphilele wena wedwa.
9. Jesâ`owophâ`iGazi lonke ngami, akungigezisâ`izono zami,
ngalo leliGazi eliNgcwele, elaphumâ`eNhliziyweni yakho.

10. Ngitsho lethosana elilodwa, lingahlambulula bonkâ`abantu, libagezise ezonweni zabo, babemhlophe nke! njengezithunywa.
11. Nkosi, Jesu wenâ`okhona lapha, nginxwanele ngenhliziyo yonke, ukukhonza ubukhosi bakho, obufihlakelâ`eAlthareni.
12. O! angathi ngingafika kuwe, lephezulu embusweni wakho, ngithokoze ngenhliziyo yonke, ngokubona ubukhosi bakho. Amen.
N.title: Ngikhuleka kuwe, Nkulunkulu. (166)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngingowakho Jesu wami, ngingowakho njalo; ngingehlukaniswa lawe,
loba ngisahamba, loba sengisifa.
2. Angilakumnikâ`omunye, inhliziyo yami; ngekaJesu yena yedwa,
kuze kube nini, kuze kube nini.
3. Jesu Nkulunkulu wami, hlala lami njalo, ngibe yisithandwa sakho,
kuwe ezulwini, kuwe ezulwini.
N.title: Ngingowakho Jesu wami (167)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngomoya wonke,
Samukelâ` isinkwa, sasezulwini,
Sihube sisithi, Nkosi angifanele. (2x) 1. Dumisâ`iNkosi mphefumulo wami
Ngizakuyidumisa ngisaphila. 2. Lingathembi izikhulu,
lomuntâ`okungekho kuye usizo.
3. Ubusisiwe lowo osizwa nguNkulunkulu,
othemba lakhe liseNkosini. 

4. Nguye uNkulunkulu owenzâ`izulu lomhlaba, lolwandle lakho konke okukukho.
5. Ungothembekileyo kuze kube nini nini, uphakamisa abacindezelweyo.
6. INkosi ikhulula izibotshwa, ivulâ`amehlo eziphofu.
7. INkosi iyabalulamisa, bona abawileyo, iNkosâ`iyabathanda abalungileyo.
8. INkosâ`ilondoloza izihambi, isekelâ`abafelwakazi lezintandane.
N. Lunga
N.title: Ngomoya wonke (614)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi angifanele, Nkosi angifanele,
ukwamukela wena. Ungenze ngifanele,
ungenze ngifanele, ngicela kuwe, Nkosi.
Vumake ukungena kimi engiyisoni.
Wozake Jesu wami, wozake Jesu, uhlale njalo kimi.
2. Ngizinikela kuwe, ngizinikela kuwe,
ukuba ngibâ`ngowakho. Ngiphila ngawe Nkosi, ngiphila ngawe Nkosi, uyintokozo yami.
E! Kudla okumnandi, O! Sinkwa sezithunywa, ngigcina ngisekhona, ngigcina ngisekhona lasekufeni
kwami.
N.title: Nkosi angifanele

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi, Jesu Kristu, likhona lapha, iSakramente loMzimba wakho. Yebo wonâ`ukhona, uMzimba wakho, leGazi lakho eliNgcwele.
Uhlalela abezayo, Nkosi Jesu.


2. Nkosi Jesu Kristu, uhlezi lapha, ukhulekela abakholwayo;
Msindisi wabantu, Mkhulumeli wethu, uzenzâ`ukudla komphefumulo. Ukuthanda okungaka, Nkosi Jesu.
3. Wozake, kithi legrasiya lakho, uwaqinise amandla ethu. Siyakuthanda siyathemba kuwe, sizinikela kuwe lamhla. Singabakho laphakade, Nkosi Jesu.
N.title: Nkosi Jesu Kristu, likhona lapha

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi, sesikwamukele, hlalâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Chorus: Aleluya, aleluya.
2. Dumisani iNkosi, lina zidalwa zeNkosi.
3. Liyihlabelele indumiso, liyiphakamise kuze kube
nininini. 4. Lina lonke zithunywa zeNkosi, dumisanâ`iNkosi.
5. Lina langa lenyanga, idumiseni yona.
6. Lina zinkanyezi zezulu, dumisanâ`iNkosi.
7. Lina Bantu lonke, dumisanâ`iNkosi.
8. Liyihlabelele, liyibabaze kuze kube nininini.
R. Phiri
N.title: Nkosi sesikwamukele (168)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi sinike, Nkosi sinike lesi,
lesisinkwa, njalo, njalo, njalo njalo njalo. (2x)
1. UBaba usinika iSinkwa soqobo, esivela ezulwini. 2. Mina yimi iSinkwa sokuphila, lowo oza kimi
kazukulamba. 3. Yena okholwa kimi, ulokuphila okungapheliyo.

4. Mina ngizakumvusa, ngosuku lokucina.
5. ISinkwa engizakulinika sona, siyiNyama yami. 6. Odla inyama yami, anathe iGazi lami,
ulokuphilâ`okungapheliyo. 7. Njengalokhu lami ngiphila ngoBaba, ongidlayo
uzaphila ngami. (c/f Joha 6,34) J. Villescas
N.title: Nkosi sinike (169)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi yami, Jesu, Nkosi yamakhosi. Suhlezâ`emoyeni wami.
Lenhliziyo yami izwile phakathi, ukuza kweNkosi
yami, ukuza kweNkosi yami.
2. Kuyamangalisa labasezulwini, ukufika kwakho kimi.
Kanti ngingubani uzilenje kimi,
uyiNkosi yezithunywa, uyiNkosi yezithunywa. 3. Ngiyakholwa kuwe, Nkosi yami, Jesu,
loba ngingubani mina, inhliziyo iyezwa,
iqonda ukuhlala kwakho kimi, ukuhlala kwakho kimi.
N.title: Nkosi yami Jesu

N.lyrics:
1. Nkulunkulu, Jesu wami, ungibizile lamhla. Ngizakukwemukela Nkosi, ngeSakramente lakho. O! Jesu ngiyakholwa kuwe, ngiyazithoba phambi kwakho, wenâ`oyiNkosi yami.
2. Yilo iSakramente leli, eliyikudla kwethu; liyisisusa sokusila, lisivimbelâ`ukwona.
O! Jesu, ngiyathemba kuwe, ngiyavikelwa nguwe wedwa, onguMsindisi wami.
3. Nansi iSinkwa sezithunywa, esitholisâ`impilo; ngiyayithola leyo mpilo, ngokwamukela sona. O! Jesu ngokuthanda njalo, ngingehlukani lawe futhi, wenâ`oligugu lami.
N.title: Nkulunkulu Jesu wami (170)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, siyakubonga, Nkosi!
Siqhube siyâ`emakhaya. 1. Hamba lathi, Nkosi.
2. Inkonzâ` isiphelile3. Sivikelâ`engozini.
4. Sifike siphilile.
5. Busisa labantwana. 6. Bahlale belokholo. 7. Busisâ`imizi yethu. 8. Busisa labazali.
9. Baholâ`izimvu zabo.
P. Hlabano
N.title: Nkosi siqhube

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngoba kuphambene lomlayo kaNkulunkulu,
owadalâ`indoda yinye, lomfazi munye njalo, wabenza baba nyamanye, ukuthatha njalo, owesibili loba, ukwendela kwenye indoda, umkakhwâ`esaphila.
1. Lizimiselâ`ukugcinâ`izinjongo lezibopho zomtshado, lokuhlala lithandana, lingumzimba munye,
lize lehlukaniswe yikufa na?
429
IZINGOMA
N. Lunga
IZINGOMA
2. Wena myeni, uzikhethele ngentando yakho, ukutshada lomlobokazi lo olapha, kumbe usiselelwe na?
3. Wena mlobokazi, uzikhethele ngentando yakho, ukutshada lomyeni lo olapha, kumbe usiselelwe na?
4. Uba uNkulunkulu elinikâ`abantwana,
lizabemukela, libakhulise njengokuthanda kwakhe na?
5. Lina Bandla elilapha, lina zinini labangane babo angithi lizwile ukuthembisana kwabo na?
P. Khumalo
N.title: Ngoba kuphambene lomlayo (185)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngithi kuwe: unguPhetro phezu kwakho

ngizakwakhi Bandla lami.
Chorus: Nangu, jabulani lithokoze makholwa,
nangu, nanguke umpristi wethu! Nangu, esimphiwe nguNkulunkulu, nangu, ozanikelelâ`izono zethu!
2. Ngizakunika izivulo, ezombuso wasezulwini.
3. Ozakubopha emhlabeni, kuzakubotshwa lasezulwini. 4. Ozakukhulula emhlabeni, kuzakukhululwa lasezulwini. 5. Asimbonge uJesu, ngoba nguye umPristi omkhulu.
(c / f Mat 16,18) A. Tshabalala
N.title: Ngithi kuwe unguPhetro (189)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngizathuma bani, thuma mina Nkosi yami,
ozasiyela na? Ngilapha thuma mina. (2x) 1. INkosi ithi kithi isivuno sikhulu,
kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana. 2. Makholwa asilandeleni uIsaya,
owathi Nkosi yami thuma mina. 
3. Mina ngiyinceku yakho Nkulunkulu, ngimele ukuthunywa nguwe Nkosi.
4. Nkulunkulu wami ngizakuhambela, Nkosi yami ngizimisele.
5. Ngizakwenza intando yakho Nkosi yami, ngizabatshela abantu bakho.
6. Ngizazinikela Nkosi kuwe, ngizazinikela njengoIsaya.
7. Makholwa sabelani uma libizwa yiNkosi, vumani uma ilithuma.
8. Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi yami, ngingowakho nini lanini.
(c/f Isa 6,8; Luka 10,2) N. Lunga
N.title: Ngizathuma bani (190)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu,
Busisa abakhethiweyo bakho
labo bonke abasebenzela iBandla lakho (2x) 1. Babe yikukhanya komhlaba wonke Nkulunkulu. 2. Balungise ngamandla obabizileyo.
3. Inhliziyo zitshisekele ukulunga.
4. Bathandane insuku ngensuku,
5. Bakuthande insuku ngensuku.
D. Nyathi
N.title: Nkulunkulu busisa (616)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nankâ`umuzi, nankâ`umuzi umuzi, nankâ`umuzi nankumuzi, nanku umuzi
Soprano l.Owakhiweyo, owakhiweyo (4x) owakhiweyo, oyingcwele
Soprano 2.Owakhiweyo, owakhiwe-yo-Owakhiweyo edwale-niAlto: Owakhiwe-yo- Owakhiweyo edwaleni Tenor 1. Owakhiweyo, owakhiweyo
owakhiweyo edwaleni.
Tenor 2. Owakhiwe yo- owakhiweyo edwaleni Bass: Nanku muzi. Nankumuzi,
Nankumuzi edwaleni.
1. Abangena kiwo, lo umuzi oyingcwele!
Bayahlanjululwa, kulumuzi oyingcwele!
NgeGazi leMvana, kulumuzi oyingcwele! 2. Abahlala kiwo, lo umuzi oyingcwele!
Badla imana, kulumuzi oyingcwele!
UMzimba kaKristu! kulumuzi oyingcwele! 3. Ngowabo bonke, lo umuzi oyingcwele.
Abakholwayo, kulumuzi oyingcwele.
KuJesâ`uMsindisi! kulumuzi oyingcwele. 4. Abawufumeneyo lo umuzi oyingcwele!
Bafumenâ`intuba, kulumuzi oyingcwele!
Intuba yezulu! kulumuzi oyingcwele6. Abafela kiwo, lo umuzi oyingcwele,
befelâ`eNkosini, kulumuzi oyingcwele, bayâ`ekusileni, kulumuzi oyingcwele!
B. Ndlovu
N.title: Nankâ`umuzi oyiNgcwele

N.lyrics:
1. Nankâ`umuzâ` oqinileyo, owakhwâ`entabeni. Awusoze uchitheke, kuze, kube laphakade.
Lowo muzi uliBandla, laseRoma, likaJesu. Elakhiwe edwaleni, elinguyâ`uSimoni Phetro. Lomlandeli wakhe njalo enguPhapha waseRoma.
2. LeliBandla leqiniso, alisoze liphambeke.
Nguye uMsindisâ`ngokwakhe owalakha edwaleni. Wathi: Simoni okaJohane, unguPhetro ulidwala phezu kwakho ngizalakha, nantâ`iBandla lamakholwa; izintuba zehadesi, kazisoze zilehlule.
3. UMalusi wethâ`omkhulu, owamiswa nguMsindisi, kunguPhetro, kunguPhapha, oyinhloko yamakholwa. Yenâ`uJesu wathi kuye: nanzâ`izimvu zami zonke, uzigcine uzaluse, uziyise emadlelweni eliyimfundiso yami, yosindiso lwaphakade.
4. Mlondolozi wezivulo, ndunâ`enkulu yoMsindisi, asisoze sehlukane, lawe, nsika yeqiniso.
Mqumi wezindaba zonke eBandleni likaJesu, silalâ`ilizwi lakho, wena onguThulasizwe. Okubotshwa nguwe lapha, kubotshiwe ezulwini.
5. Nkosi, siyakuncengâ`ukuba, ubusisâ`uPhapha wethu, ube laye, mvikele, ezitheni zakhe zonke.
Lathi thinâ`abantwabakhe, akusiphe inhliziyo yokumthanda, simlalele, sibe nhliziyonye sonke; sibâ`ngumhlambi munye kodwa, kube lomalusi munye.
N.title: Nankâ`umuzâ`oqinileyo

N.lyrics:
Uthando - uthando
Nantu, nantu, salutholâ`, uthando ngothando, ngothando.
1. Siyakubonga Nkosi, siyakubonga Baba
Siyakubonga Somandla, ngothando olukhulu olungaka

2. Sikhonza kuwe Baba, siguqa kuwe Nkosi,
Size kuwe Somandla, ngothando (3x) olukhulu olungaka
Tenor: Nkosi uthando (2x), Sibongâ`uthando
3. Busisâ`iBandla Nkosi, iBandla lakho eliNgcwele
IBandla lakho labaphostoli, ngothando.
4. Walakha leli Bandla, Walithumela uMoya oNgcwele,
ukuba aliqinise.
5. Usinikâ`isikhonzi sakho uPhapha,
usinikile abafundisi, usinikile amadikoni.
6. Usinikile abatshumayeli, usinikile izidelamhlaba,
Usinikile ababumbi bezingoma.
7. Selatshunyayelwa leliVangeli, kwelakithi eAfrika,
lakumagumbi amane omhlaba, Ngothando (3x)
olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu.
8. Siyajabula thina, siyathokoza thina, sidumisâ`iNkosi,
ngothando (3x) olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu.
N.title: Nantu uthando (559)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nantu-ke uthando, nantu uthando, salutholâ`uthando lukaNkulunkulu. Nantuke uthando, nantu-uthando,
salutholâ`uthando olungaka. 1. Siyakubonga Baba ngothando, siyakubonga Nkosi ngothando.
Siyakubonga Somandla ngothando olukhulu. 2. Size kuwe Nkosi ngothando,
sikhonza kuwe Baba ngothando,
sithemba kuwe Somandla ngothando olukhulu. 3. Nkosi uthando olukhulu,
sibongâ`uthando olukhulu,
Nkosi uthando olukhulu lukaNkulunkulu. . Busisâ` iBandla lakho Nkosi,
iBandla lakho eliNgcwele,
iBandla lakho labapostoli - ngothando olukhulu.

5. Walakha leli iBandla,
walithumela uMoya oNgcwele ukuba aliqinise.
6. Usinikile isikhonzi sakho uPhapha, usinikile abafundisi, usinikile abadikhoni.
7. Usinikile abatshumayeli, usinikile izidelamhlaba, usinikile ababumbi bezingoma.
8. Selatshunyayelwa lelâ`iVangeli,
kwelakithi eAfrika lakumagumbi amane omhlaba.
9. Siyajabula thina, siyathokoza thina, siyadumisa Nkosi.
R. Ndlovu
N.title: Nantuke uthando (651)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngipha lami, ngipha lami, igrasiya lakho, O! Nkosi, lingisize lingilungise.
1. Ngiyawucelela O! Nkosi, umphefumulo wami, ukuba usindiswe.
2. Ngiyakuvuma ukuba ngibuthakathaka, Mdali wami Somandla.
3. Ngikhokhele Jesu wami endleleni zonke, ngihambe ngobungcwele.
4. Ngithumela, ngothando, uMoya oNgcwele, angiphe imfundiso.
5. Ngihlambulula ngilungele ukutshiyâ`umhlaba, ngiye ezulwini.
B. Ncube
N.title: Ngipha lami (214)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi yami Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyakubonga Nkosi, Nkulunkulu wami (2x)
1. Dumisanâ`iNkosi lina zizwe zonke, lidumise kuze kube nininini.
2. Bonganini iNkosi ngoba ilungile, ngothando lwayâ`olungapheliyo.
3. UNkulunkulu uliDwala lami, UNkulunkulu ungamandla ami.
4. Khulula Nkosi inhliziyo yami, ungikhuphe ezinhluphekweni.
A. Mkwananzi
N.title: Ngiyakubonga Nkosi (620)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyakukhuleka, Nkosi ekuseni:
yenza ngikuthande, ngenhliziyo lamhla.
2. Ngiyabonga kuwe, ngokulondoloza, ongenzele khona, lamhla ebusuku.
3. Konkâ`engizakwenza, ngifunâ`ukwenzela, ukukudumisa, lokuthanda wena.
4. Konkâ`ukuhlupheka okuzangehlela, ngikubekezele, ngenxa yakho Nkosi.
5. Ungilondoloze, lamhla Baba Nkosi, ungisize phela, ngingaphindâ`ukona.
6. Londoloza futhi, bonkâ`engifanele, ukubacelela, akubabusise.
7. Ngiyacela lawe, Mariya oNgcwele, ungilondoloze mina umntanakho
8. E! Sithunywa sami, akuhlale kimi,
kuthi nxa ngilindwa nguwe, ngingesabi lutho.
N.title: Ngiyakukhuleka (215)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngiyaphakamisa, inhliziyo yami,
kuwe Nkulunkulu ngingakayilala.
2. Ngiyabonga kuwe, ngakho konkâ`okuhle,
onginike khona, kilo lonkâ`usuku. 3. Ngikonile Baba, ungabokhangela,
amacala ami, engiwakhalela. 4. Ungilondoloze, kulobâ`ubusuku,
engozini zonke, ezingangehlela. 5. Ngiyacela futhi, ungisize Baba,
ngilungelâ`ukufa, izikhathi zonke. 6. Ukhumbule futhi, imimoya yonke,
esahluphekayo, uyithokozise.
7. Ngiyacela lawe, Mariya oNgcwele, ungilondoloze, mina umntanakho.
8. E! Sithunywa sami, akuhlale kimi.
kuthi nxa ngilindwa nguwe, ngingesabi lutho.
N.title: Ngiyaphakamisa (216)

N.lyrics:
1. Nhliziyo yami, khumbula konke, okukhona kulumhlaba; impahla yonke, ngitsho lemfuyo zinjanike zona zonke?
Ukujabula lokuthokoza, lapha kukhona kunganani, kuzakuphela konke masinya, kunjengomoya odlulayo, ubozidela nhliziyo yami. Izinto zomhlaba.
2. Nhliziyo yami, ungaphambeki, ukhohliswa ngalumhlaba, qaza kakhulu, indawo zonke: Ubonani?
Uthinike: Ukuhlupheka kwabantu bonke, yikho okubo- nakalayo. Kuleli lizwe elokukhala, kasisakwazi uku- thaba. Ungabothiywa nhliziyo yami, yizinto zomhlaba.
3. Bheka phezulu, nhliziyo yami, ezulwini likaBaba. Ukhona Yena okubizayo, ethi kuwe: Qonda kimi. Konkâ`ukuthaba lokujabula, ekhaya lami kakupheli, ukudubeka lokufa konke, kakusangeni ezulwini. Dela lumhlaba, nhliziyo yami, qonda ezulwini.
N.title: Nhliziyo yami khumbula konke (218)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi busisâ`iBandla lakhwâ` eAfrika Lenze libe Moya munye Baba
Linakekelâ`abahluphekayo,
njengoJesu Kristu iNdodana yakho. (2x) 1. Bonkâ`abantu bathembâ`iNkosi - siyacela.
2. Sibe litswayi lomhlaba - siyacela.
3. Sibe yikukhanya kwawo - siyacela.
4. Suthisâ`iBandla ngothando - siyacela.
5. Sondle izidelamhlaba - siyacela.
6. Baba ulithemba lethu - siyacela.
C. Ndlovu
N.title: Nkosi busisâ`iBandla (617)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi yami, Ngenze ngibe linxusa Nkosi yami, lokuthula kwakho (2x)
1. Laphâ`okulokuzondana, ngilethe ukuthandana.
2. Laphâ`okulokuthandabuza, ngilethe ukukholwa.
3. Kwabasemnyameni, ngilethe ukukhanya.
4. Kwabadanileyo, ngilethe ukuthaba.
5. Ngingadingiâ`ukududuzwa, ngidinge ukududuza.
6. Nxa sifela eNkosini, siqalisâ`impilo entsha.
N.title: Nkosi ngenze ngibe linxusa (643)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi Nkulunkulu,
Nkosi Nkulunkulu, qinisâ`abantu bakho bakholwe kuwe Baba. (2x)
1. Bagcwalise ngoMoyâ`oNgcwele, Nkosi... Baqinise ngezipho zakho,qinisa...
2. Ngobâ`usizo lwethu lungebizo lakho... Wena Mdali wezulu lomhlaba, qinisa...
P. Mthombeni
N.title: Nkosi Nkulunkulu qinisa abantu (219)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, Nkosi, Nkosi siyakubonga, Somandla
Bass: Somandla siyakubonga Somandla. (2x)
1. Siwuphethile umnyaka lo, silokhe singabaphilayo,
zonkâ`izidalwa zakho Nkosi, ziyakubonga Nkulunkulu. 2. Ngakho sonke siyababaza, ngesinanzo sakho olaso.
Wathembisa abasendulo, wathi uzakubaphilisa. 3. Sesiqala umnyakâ`omutsha, sicela usilondoloze.
Senze phela intando yakho, intando yakho ayenziwe. 4. Sikhokhele ekukhanyeni, xotsha umnyama phambi kwethu.
Ngoba Wena uyikukhanya, sikhanyisela Nkulunkulu. 5. Usinike izulu Baba, umhlaba wakho ube manzi.
Amanzi aligugu lethu, siyawaswela empilweni.
6. UyiNkosi yamakhosi, Nkulunkulu ongelamphetho.
Zonkâ`insuku sithembe wena, sicela esikuswelayo.
W. D. Hlabano
N.title: Nkosi siyakubonga Somandla (535)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi siyakubonga, wathandâ`umhlaba kangaka, waze wawuthumela iNdodana yakho eyodwa, Nkosi siyakubonga, Nkulunkulu Mninikulunga, Uthando lwakho lusenhliziyweni zethu.
Tenor: Nkosisiyakubonga,NkosingeNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa, Nkosi siyakubonga, Nkulunkulu Mninikulunga konke.
Bass: Nkosi siyakubonga wathandâ`umhlaba waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa. Nkosi siyakubonga Mninikulunga, uthando lwakho luthululelwa enhliziyweni zethu.
1. Ukuphilâ`okulaphakade, yikwazi uNkulunkulu loJesu Kristu amthumelayo kithi.
2. Ngokufa kwakho Nkosi, wabhubhisâ`ukufa kwethu, ngokuvuka kwakho, wasiphâ`impilo entsha.
3. Sincedise ukwazi, ukuthi wena ulathi, siqondise endleleni zokulunga lokuthula.
4. Senze sibezindlela, zokulethâ`ukuthula kwakho, sithole ukuphila okulaphakade.
5. Busisâ`iBandlâ`eliKhatholikâ`ulenze libe Ngcwele, limanyanâ`okholweni, liphilisane ngokuthula.
V. Ndabezwe
N.title: Nkosi siyakubonga (649)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu Baba, siyakholwa ukuthi Ukuphila, ukuphilâ` okungapheliyo
Yilokhu, ukukwazi wena
Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu munye weqiniso, LoJesu, loJesu Kristâ`omthumelayo kithi. (2x)
1. Akusisize, sibambelele ngokholo langethemba, langothando, usiphe ukuhlakanipha.

Ukuze sazi wena Nkulunkulu munye weqiniso. Sehlukanisele, eqinisweni leLizwi lakho, eliyikuphila kwethu kuwe,
sikudinge ngenhliziyo zonke, ukuze... Sitshengisâ`uJesu Kristu iNdodana yakho, Baba, ukuze sibe kanye layo sibonâ`inkazimulo yayo, ukuze...
2. Baba oNgcwele, silondolozâ`eBizweni lakho, sikuJesâ`iNkosi yethu, sibemunye ebizweni lakho, ukuze...
Akusisize, usiphe uMoya oNgcwele, asiqondisâ`endleleni, zokulunga lokuthula kwakho, ukuze...
Akusenze sibe ngamanxusâ`okuthula kwakho, kuthi sikanye loKristu, silethâ`izibusiswâ`ebantwini, ukuze...
3. Silandelâ`isibonelo, sikaMariya uMama wethu,
senze sibe ngabafundi, abaqotho phambi kwakho Baba, ukuze...
Ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele, angathi singakuvulela, inhliziyo zethu Nkosi, kanye labomakhelwana bethu, ukuze...
Baba olungileyo, umhlaba kawukwazi,
njengoJesu iNdodana yakho, owayithumelayo kithi, ukuze...
Akusiphelelise, ekubeni munye kwethu, sithandane ngobuqotho, njengalokhu usithandile, ukuze...
M Mkandla
N.title: Nkulunkulu Baba (640)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi usihawukele,
Bonke: Wena gugulethu usithokozise
Singamagugu akho usithokozise. (2x) 1. Adunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu uYise,
alidunyiswâ`ibizo lakhe eliNgcwele. 2. Nanku muzi omuhle owakhiweyo
osipho sabakholwayo wokuthokoza. 3. Muli eNgcwele yaseNazaretha,
lisikhulekele kuNkulunkulâ`uBaba asithokozise. 4. Sibonga uYise, leNdodana yakhe,
loMoya oyiNgcwele uMthokozisi.
S. Moyo
N.title: Nkulunkulu Gugu lethu (567)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nqayi nqayi, nqayi nqayi, siyathaba thina
Nqayi nqayi, nqayi nqayi ngalolusuku lweNkosi
Nqayi nqayi, nqayi nqayi sithakazelela, ukuzalwa kweNkosi uJesu.
1. Siyathaba, ngalolusuku lweNkosi, Siyathaba, ngokuzalwa kukaKristu, Siyathaba, selokhâ`uJesu azalwayo, eBetlehema eJudiya.
2. Jabulani, jabulani zizwe zonke, Jabulani, ngalumkhosi omkhulu Jabulani, wokuzalwa kukaJesu eBetlehema eJudiya.
3. Phakama, phakama Afrika,
Phakama, ufune uMsindisi
Phakama, ungatshiywa ngezinyâ`izizwe. Oh! Afrika Vuka.
4. Woba, liqhawâ`eAfrika, Woba, ufuze uKristu, Woba, owakuhlengayo, wakufelâ`esiphambanweni.

5. Khanyisa, isibane Afrika Khanyisa, kwezokholo lemfundo Khanyisa, hlangabezâ`iNkosi yakho. Oh! Afrika vuka.
C. Zikhali
N.title: Nqayi Nqayi (652)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, Nkosi sicelâ`amayezi ezulu, Nkosi, sicela amayezu ezulu. (4x)
1. Nkosi, siyizidalwa zakho, Nkosi, lapha emhlabeni. Nkosi, sicelâ`izulu lakho, Nkosi, elisizayo.
2. Umbusâ`ungowakho, Nkosi, izulu lingelakho.
Nkosi, umusâ` ungowakho, Nkosi, uthando lungolwakho.
3. Umhlaba womile, Nkosi, sicelâ`izulu lakho. Nkosi, lisize amasimu, Nkosi, lisize yonkâ`imfuyo.
4. Izinanakazana zakho, Nkosi lezinyamazana zakho. Nkosi, seziswela ukudla, Nkosi, umhlaba womile.
R. Ndlovu
N.title: Nkosi sicela amayezi ezulu (540)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi pholisa, ubuhlungu lobo,
Nkosi pholisa, uba kuyintando yakho (2x)
1. Nkosi nangâ`umuntu wakho, uyehluleka, uzwa ubuhlungâ`obukhulu, mhawukele Baba.
2. Msilise Nkosi kuphela, uba kuyintando yakho, mhawukele Baba.
3. Lani bokhokho bakhe msizeni, limcelele impilo kuBaba wethu, mhawukele Baba.
Chorus:
4. Lathi siyakubonga Nkulunkulu, hawukelâ`isidalwa
sakho, mhawukele Baba.
5. Khulumâ`ilizwi lodwa kusilâ`umphefumulo wakhe; mhawukele.
6. Ubuhlungu lobu buyisipho sakho esihle, menzâ`abekezele.
N.title: Nkosi pholisa

N.lyrics:
1. Nantu usuku lokudumisa, iNkosikazi uMama wethu. Asithokozeni sijabule, yiNkosikazi yokuthula.
Sibonelo sokulunga. Amen. Amen. Aleluya.
2. Sisukumela ukudumisa, wenâ`owazala iNdodana.
Eyasindisa ngokubhubhisa, bonke ububi balumhlaba.
Siphâ`uxolo siqinise. Amen, Amen, Aleluya.
3. Sikhokhele ekhaya elitsha, ikhayâ`elitsha losindiso.
Laphâ`okuhlala iNdodana, owayithwala esiswini sakho.
Wenâ`uNgcwele, wenâ`uNgcwele. Amen, Amen, Aleluya. 4. Vikela Mama abantwabakho, abaphakathi
kweziphithiphithi. Ubaduduze enhluphekweni, ubaphâ`isibindi
lokubekezela. Baduduze ubathobe, Amen, Amen, Aleluya.
W. D. Hlabano
N.title: Nantu usuku lokudumisa (545)

N.lyrics:
1. Nhliziyo kaMariya, emhlophe, njengeliqhwa. Ngicela lami njalo emhlophe inhliziyo. Ngicela inhliziyo efuze yonâ`eyakho. Engcwele njalonjalo, exwayâ`izono zonke. (2x)
2. Nhliziyo kaMariya, wahlatshwa yisihedla,
ufelwa ngumntanakho, uphansi kwesâ`phambano. E! Nina obuhlungu, wo ngiyakukhalela,
Ngingabe ngisaphinda, ngihluphe wena, Mama. (2x)
3. Nhliziyo kaMariya, nginikâ`indawo kuwe, engizacatsha kiyo, ngesikhathi sokulingwa. Lamhla ngisuka lapha, eyami inhliziyo, ihlanganiswa lawe, Nhliziyo kaMariya,
ngicelâ`indawo kuwe.
N.title: Nhliziyo kaMariya

N.lyrics:
1. Wozanâ`esithebenâ`somusa, wozanâ`enhliziyweni, emhlophe, eNqabeni uMariya, uMama wethu sonke.
Chorus: Nkosikazi yeFatima ekuhle,
Nina owamagrasiya, sikhulekele sincede, wena themba lethu.
2. Enhliziyweni yakho, siyazinikela sonke, ekuthabeni lensizini, sincede, Nkosikazi.
3. Ngesandlâ`esingcwele sakho sinikâ`iRosali engcwele, size sibe lamandla, okungaguqulâ`umhlaba.
4. Ilanga lasemkhathini, lamaluba onke omhlaba. Kuzafakazelâ`inkazimulo okiyo, Mama wethu! 5. E. Nina wezinhlupheko, sikhalelâ`izono zethu,
ake usizwe, Mariya usise kuMntanakho.
6. O. Nina wabantu bonke. Holelâ`iRussia kuJesu.
Kuze lokuthula ezizweni zomhlaba.
N.title: Nkosikazi yaseFatima

N.lyrics:
Nkosikazi, Nkosikazi yaphezulu Bass: Nkosikazi yaphezulu Nkosikazi yaphezulu
1. Sisemhlabeni - siyahlupheka - yaphezulu Bass: Nkosikazi;
Sicelâ`usizo -sikhulekele Bass: Nkosikazi, yaphezulu
2. Usicelelâ`ukuthula, sicela umusa Usicelelâ`ukulunga, sicelâ`uthando.
3. Nina, oNgcwele kaNkulunkulu Virigo, eligcwele ukuhlonipheka.
4. Sibonelo, sokukhanya Sihlalo, sokuhlonipheka.
5. Mthombo, wokomoya wena sitsha, ezazisekayo.
6. Mvikeli, wenzalo kaDavida Luba, elingumangaliso.
7. Ndlu, eyakhiwe ngezibalazo Ndlu, eligugu yegolide.
8. Khwezi, lokusa laphezulu Wena ntuba, yezulu.
9. Wena, kusila kwezigulane Wena, msizi wamakholwa
N.title: Nkosikazi yaphezulu (642)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosikazi yezithunywa siyakubingelela. Sikhulumele kuJesu, asivulelâ`izulu.
Nkosikazi yezithunywa siyakubingelela.
Ave, Ave Mariya, Ave Ave Mariya 1. Nkosikazi yezithunywa, siyeza kuwe, nje;
unguMama wamakholwa, kawudeli muntu... 
2. Siyesaba silovalo, samona uJesu, ongesabi nguwe wedwa ongopheleleyo...
3. Sifundise ukulunga, lokulahlâ`isono, siyalingwa ngumDiyabholi, labantu ababi...
N.title: Nkosikazi yezithunywa

N.lyrics:
Nkosikazi yokuthula Mariya, Nkosikazi yokuthula Mama Mariya. Siphe ukuthula. (2x)
1. Siyakubingelela Mariya, Siphe ukuthula. Siphâ`uthando enhliziyweni zethu, Siphe ukuthula. Nkosikazi yezulu, uceciswe ngomqhele wenkanyezi ezilitshumi lambili.
2. Siyakubonga wena Mariya,
Mvikeli wabasosizini,
Wanikela abantwana bakho,
Nkosikazi Mama wethu wadiliza ingxabano, lezondano, siyakuthanda.
3. Vikela iBandla Mama Mariya,
Sizo lwabakhalayo kuKristu,
Vikela ilizwe lethu Mariya,
Sikhala kuwe Mama olesihawu, thulisa abantwabakho abakhalayo sithemba kuwe. Woba lathi empilweni yethu;
Kwabagulayo labaswelayo; Woba labo siphephelo sabo.
M. Majahana
N.title: Nkosikazi yokuthula (260)

N.lyrics:
1. Ngathi ngisahamba emhlabeni ngahlalelâ`ithuna lami la. Njengembali eqhakaza lamhla, ngakusasa isibune nya.
2. Ngokunjalo kwangizumâ`ukufa ngisemusha, ngiyingane nje; Kanti qhabo, ngiyaphila futhi, ngitshiyilâ`umzimba wodwa la.
3. Sengiphiwe ukuhlalâ`okuhle, laphâ`ukufa kwahluliwe nya; Sengibongâ`iNkosi yaphezulu kanye lezithunywâ`ekhaya le.
4. Ningakhali bazalwane bami, sahlukene umzuzwana nje; Ezulwini sobonana futhi zonkâ`insizi seziphele nya.
Ingoma yesiZulu
N.title: Ngathi ngisahamba emhlabeni (241)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, Nkosi alubana ubukhona lapha, ngabe umfowethu kafanga. (2x)
1. UJesu waya eBhethani, wafumana uLazaro esefile, sekungamalanga amane.
2. UMartha wathi kuye: Nkosi ngabe ubukhona, ngabe umfowethu kafanga.

3. Kodwa lakhathesi ngiyazi ukuthi, loba ucelani kuNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uzakunika khona.
4. UJesu wathi kuye: Umnewenu uzavuka.
5. UMartha wathi kuye: ngiyazi ukuthi uzavuka
ngosuku lokucina.
6. UJesu wathi kuye: Mina ngiyikuvuka lokuphila,
okholwayo kimi uzaphila lanxa efile.
7. UMartha wathi kuye: Impela Nkosi ngiyakholwa
ukuthi unguKristu iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo. 8. UJesu waya elibeni wathi susani ilitshe.
9. UMartha wathi kuye: Nkosi usenuka ngoba
uselensuku ezine eselibeni.
10. UJesu wathi kuye: angitshongo yini ukuthi uba
ukholwa uzabona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu. 11. UJesu wakhuleka wasememeza esithi:
Lazaro phuma, waphuma uLazaro ephila.
(c/ f Joha 11,1-48) A. Tshabalala
N.title: Nkosi aluba ubukhona lapha (242)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, baphe ukuphumula okungapheliyo, lokukhanya okulaphakade kubakhanyele.
1. Zwana ngomusa umkhuleko wami, yonkâ`inyama izakufika kuwe.
2. Nkulunkulu uDumo kuwe eZiyone, lomnikelo esakuthembisa wona; sizaletha kuwe eJerusalema.
P. Mthombeni
N.title: Nkosi, baphe ukuphumula (243)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi, Nkulunkulu olomusa, bahawukelâ`abantu bakho, abasahlawulelâ`izono, emlilweni wenhlawulo.

2. Siyancenga Jesâ`omuhle, ngenxa yobuhlungu bakho, owabuzwâ`esiphambanweni, qeda ubuhlungu babo.
3. Nkulunkulu Mninimusa, zwana ukukhala kwabo, ubakhuphe emlilweni, bangenise ezulwini.
4. Ukukhanya kwaphakade, akubakhanyele njalo, baphumule ebuhleni, bawubongâ`umusa wakho.
N.title: Nkosi Nkulunkulu olomusa (244)

N.lyrics:
1. Nkosi sisesililweni, ngoba sumthethâ`umfowethu, kulumhlaba wenhlupheko, wamâ`sa kwelizayo.
2. Lamhlâ`uhambile sihlobo, suyâ`ekhaya, lakhâ`elitsha usitshiyele usizi, kuwo to mhlaba.
3. Sesikufihla sihlobo, inyama luthuli, umoya uye kuBaba, ozawemukela.
4. Salusulele sihlobo, laphâ`endlini yalumhlaba, uze usihlangabeze lathi mhla sifayo.
5. Sikucelela kuBaba, akungenise ezulwini, uhlale lezithunywa, kanye labangcwele.
N.title: Nkosi sisesililweni

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu umhawukele (3x) 1. Mama olungileyo nangu umntanakho.
Hamba laye kuNkulunkulu.
Josefa ongcwele, Mondli kaJesu nangu umntanakho Hamba laye...
2. Sithunywa sakhe lawe mngcwele waklie nangu umntanenu. Hambani laye...
Lina zithunywa zasezulwini nanso isinini senu. Hambani laso...
3. Lina bangcwele elisezulwini nanso isinini senu. Hambani laso...
Bokhokho bakhe bendlu kaYise elisezulwini nangu umntanenu. Hambani laye...
4. Lina bendlu kaNina elisezulwini nangu umntanenu. Hambani laye...
Lina lonke zinini, labangane bakhe elisezulwini nanso isinini senu. Hambani laso...
5. Nkosi muphe ukuphumula okungapheliyo lokukhanya okulaphakade kumkhanyele.
R. Ndlovu
N.title: Nkulunkulu umhawukele (577)

N.lyrics:
Chorus: Nxa lokhu okubhubhayo sekwambethe okungabhubhiyo,

kuzakugcwaliseka okulotshiweyo. (3x) 1. Ukufa kuginywe ekunqobeni.
Kufa, kungaphi ukunqoba kwakho na? 2. Kufa, lungaphâ` udonsi lwakho na?
Udonsi lokufa yisono lamandlâ` okufa ngumlayo. 3. Uba, sifile kanye loKristu,
sizakuphila futhi kanye laye. 
(c/f 1 Kor 15,53) A. Ndlovu
N.title: Nxa lokhu okubhubhayo (544)

N.lyrics:
Chorus:
Nkosi wena ugezisa inyawo zami na? Nkosi (2x) Wena ugezisa inyawo zami na?
mina soni wena ugezisa inyawo zami na?
1. INkosi uJesu Kristu isiqedile ukudla labafundi Bayoyathela amanzi emganwini.

2. Yaqala ukugeza inyawo zabafundi bayo isithi: Lesiyisibonelo engilinika sona
3. Wafika kuSimoni Phetro, uSimoni Phetro wathi kuye: Nkosi wena ugezisa inyawo zami na4. UJesu wathi kuye:
Uba ngingakugezisi kawulasabelo lami.
5. Engikwenzayo awukwazi khathesi, kodwa uzakuqedisisa emva kwalokho.
R. Hadebe
N.title: Nkosi wena ugezisa inyawo zami

N.lyrics:
Sp: Ngaye uKristu ukuye uKristu
T/B: Ukanye laye, ukuye uKristu, uthola lonke
(udumo lobukhosi)
SpA: UDumo lobukhosi, Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla BT. UDumo lobukhosi Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla (2x)
Ndawonye LoMoya oNgcwele kuze kube lani...ni, Ndawonye loMoyâ`oNgcwele kuze kube laninini. Amen.
V. Ndabezwe
N.title: Ngaye uKristu

O.lyrics:
Chorus 2: O Bantu bami! Ngenzeni kini? Ngilicunule ngani na? Ngiphenduleni!
1. Ngalikhupha elizweni laseGibithe,
kodwa lina lenzele uMsindisi wenu isiphambano.
Chorus 1: O Nkulunkulu oNgcwele, Wena Somandla! O Nkulunkulu ongafiyo, oNgcwelâ`olamandla! oNgcwelâ`ongafiyo, akâ`usihawukele! (2x)
2. Ngalikhokhela enkangala iminyaka engamatshumi amane, ngalondla ngemana, ngalingenisa elizweni elilokuhle okunengi, kodwa lina lenzele uMsindisi wenu isiphambano!
Chorus 1. O Nkulunkulu...
3. Kuyini okunye ebengifanele ukulenzela khona,
ngazabe ngisakwenza na? Lokhu ngalihlanyelela ivini lami eliligugu!


4. Kodwa lina labamunyu kakhulu kimi.
Ekomeni kwami langinathisa iwayine elimunyu, lagwaza inhliziyo yoMsindisi wenu ngomkhonto!
Chorus 1 O Nkulunkulu...
5. Ngatshaya iGibithe lamazibulo alo ngenxa yenu,
kodwa lina linginikele abatshaya ngemichilo!
O Bantu bami...
6. Ngalikhupha eGibithe, ngaminzisa uFaro
ngoLwandle oluBomvu,
kodwa lina linginikele kubapristi abakhulu! O Bantu bami...
7. Ngavula phambi kwenu uLwandle
kodwa lina lavula isifuba sami! O Bantu bami...
8. Ngahamba phambi kwenu ngensika yeyezi, kodwa lina lingikhokhâ`elele endlini kaPhilathu yokuthetha amacala. O Bantu bami...
9. Ngalisuthisa ngemana enkangaleni,
kodwa lina lingikhabile langitshaya ngemichilo! O Bantu bami...
10. Ngalinathisa amanzi osindiso avela edwaleni, kodwa lina lingikhabile langitshaya ngemichilo! O Bantu bami...
11. Ngatshaya amakhosi aseKhanani ngenxa yenu, kodwa lina litshaye ngenduku ikhanda lami! O Bantu bami...
12. Ngalipha intonga yobukhosi,
kodwa lina libeke ekhanda lami umqhele wameva! O Bantu bami...
13. Ngaliphakamisa ngamandla amakhulu,
kodwa lina lingiphanyeke esiphambanweni! O...
(Dute 8,2; Eks 17,1-7; Mika 6,3-5) B. Ndlovu
O.title: O! Bantu bami

O.lyrics:
Chorus: O Bantu bami, ngenzeni kini na? Ngalicunula ngani na? Ngiphenduleni.
1. Ngenxa yenu ngatshaya amaGibithe lamazibulo awo, kodwa lina langinikela ekutshayweni.
2. Ngalikhupha ebuggilini ngalisa elizweni lenkululeko, ngagalulisa izitha zenu olwandle, kodwa lina langinikela kubaPristi abakhulu.
3. Mina ngalivulela ulwandle,
kodwa lina lavula uhlangothi lwami ngomkhonto.
4. Mina ngalikhokhela endleleni yenu ngensika yeyezi, kodwa lina langikhokhela emthethwandaba kaPhilathu.
5. Mina ngalondla ngemana enkangala,
kodwa langihlakala ngawela phansi langitshaya.
6. Mina ngalinika amanzi aphuma edwaleni alisindisa, kodwa lina langinathisa inyongo leviniga.
7. Ngenxa yenu ngachitha ababusi baseKanani, kodwa lina lalimaza ikhanda lami ngomhlanga.
8. Ngalinika intonga yobukhosi,
kodwa lina langinika umqhele wameva.
9. Mina ngaliphakamisela esihlalweni sobukhosi, kodwa lina langilengisa esiphambanweni.
C. Mafurutu.
O.title: O! Bantu bami, ngenzeni kini na?

O.lyrics:
Chorus: Oâ`Jesu obethelweyo ngenxa yami; Yenzâ`ukuba ngikukhumbule owafela mina soni; Ngingamkhohlwa ngize ngife, ngingamkhohlwa, ngize ngife.
(Amavesi atholakala kunombolo 49)

R. Phiri
O.title: O! Jesu obethelweyo

O.lyrics:
Chorus: O! Nkulunkulu wami, ungitshiyelani na?
O! Baba Somandla, zwana ukukhala kwami.
1. Kungani ukhatshana lokungisiza ngiyabiza, awuphenduli angilakhâ`ukuphumula.
2. Okhokho bethu bathemba kuwe, wabakhulula, ngempela wabaphendula, kabayangekanga.
3. Lamhla bonke abangibonayo bayangihleka, besithi wathembâ`iNkosi; kayimkhulule!
4. Baba, nguwe owangikhuphayo esiswini sikamama. nganikelwa kuwe kusukela ekuzalweni kwami.
5. Izitha zingihanqile, musukungitshiya othulini lokufa, ngoba ngithembele kuwe.
6. Phangisa Baba ukungisiza, ngibuthakathaka, khululâ`umphefumulo wami; Oh, Mdali ngivikela:
7. Udumâ`alube kuYise, lakuNdodana.
lakuwe Moya oNgcwele, kuze kube lanininini.
(Hubo 22) M. Chifana
O.title: O! Nkulunkulu wami, ungitshiyelani na?

O.lyrics:
Chorus:
S. Thumâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele, ahlale kithi
Nkosi
A: Nkosi Thumelâ`uMoya - oNgcwele, Moya Bonke: Asigcwalise ngezipho zakhe (2x)
T. Thumela, Thumela, Thumela, Nkosi,
uMoya
B. Oh Nkosi, thumela, Oh Nkosi uMoya,
uMoya.
1. Asiphâ`ukâ`hlakanipha lokuqedisisa,
izambulo zakho lezimiso zakho. Bass: Oh Nkosi... 2. Uzaseluleka endleleni zakho,
asiphâ`isibindi singesabi lutho. O Nkosi... 3. Asiphe uLwazi, lokulunga, sonke,
sikwesabe, Nkosi, singakoni njalo. O Nkosi... 4. Asiphe uthando, lokuthula, lomusa,
asiphâ`intokozo lokubekezela. O Nkosi... 5. Asiphâ`ubumnene, lokulunga, lengqondo,
asiphâ`ubumhlophe, sizithinte njalo. O Nkosi... 6. Sihloniphâ`umzimba ngoba uyindlu yakho;
siziphathe kuhle, sibe lesizotha. O Nkosi...
B. Ndlovu
O.title: Oh! Nkosi, Thumela

O.lyrics:
Chorus: O! Siyabonga Nkulunkulu, sikhulekâ`ebizweni lakho. (2x)
1. Silandisâ`imisebenzi, eyakho emangalisayo, wasinikâ`iNdodana yakho, ukubâ`izosihlenga.
2. Ngakho-ke, ngikhangele, endaweni eyingcwele, ngibonâ`amandla akho, lobukhosi bakho.
3. Ngizabonga ngisaphila, ngiphakamisâ`izandla zami, ngihlabele, ngokuthokoza ngihlabele ingoma entsha.
C. Zikhali
O.title: O! Siyabonga Nkulunkulu

O.lyrics:
Chorus: Onikele ngalakho
Onikele ngakho konke alakho,
unikele ukwedlula bonke. (2x) 1. Ngizakuthatha inkezo yokukhululwa,
ngikhuleke ebizweni leNkosi.
Bonke: Ngizakuyinikani iNkosi, ngazo zonkâ`zenzo zayo, izenzo zayâ`ezinhle kimi na?
2. Ngizakugcwalisâ`izifungo zami eNkosini, phambi kwabantu bayo bonke.
3. INkosi ilungile, imnene ilomusa, uNkulunkulu wethu ulesihawu4. Ngiyathanda iNkosi, ngoba iyezwa ilizwi lami, lokukhuleka kwami.
5. Ngizanikela kuyo, iminikelo yokubonga, ngikhulekâ`ebizweni layo.
6. Mariya oNgcwele, Nina kaJesu, sahlukanisele kumntanakho, lakuNkulunkulâ`uBaba.
(c/f Marko 12,42-44) P. Khumalo
O.title: Onikele ngalakho (587)

O.lyrics:
Osidlayo lesiSidlo, uzaphila laphakade. (2x) Onathayo leliGazi, uzaphila laphakade. (2x)
B. Ndlovu.
O.title: Osidlayo lesiSidlo (527)

O.lyrics:
1. O! hamba kuhle, sihlobo sethu, usuphumile, osizini lwalumhlaba; suye ekhaya, le ezulwini, kuBaba wethu okubizileyo.
2. O! Siyakhala izinyembezi, sesibuhlungu,
ngoba sesikwemukiwe; kodwa intando kaBaba wethu, ayidunyiswe zonkâ`izikhathi.
3. O! hamba kuhle, sihlobo sethu, usubuyele, lapho owavela khona, salâ`usulele, laphâ`elibeni, uze uvuke, ngelokucina.
4. Sesicelela wena, sihlobo, kuNkulunkulu wethu, onguMninimusa wonke; Akuhawukele akungenise, ekukhanyeni, kwasezulwini.
O.title: O! Hamba kuhle

O.lyrics:
1. O! Jesu wena, oyikuvuka lokuphila. Lamhlanje sikhumbula isihlobo sethu, osusithethe phakathi kwethu.
Chorus: Nkosi, kahlale lawe, Baba, kahlale lawe, Nkosi, kahlale lawe
kahlale lawe Baba. (2x)
2. Izolo besilaye, lamhla usethethwe.
Lapha emhlabeni akukho ekhaya,
wasidalelâ`ukuhlala lawe.
3. Siyamcelela umusa omkhulu kuwe Baba.
Kathokoze ngobuhle phambi kwakho. Sicela abangcwele lezithunywa.

A. Tshabalala
O.title: O! Jesu wena oyikuvuka (245)

S.lyrics:
1.a. Safika, Mntwana Jesu,
sezwa isithunywa sakho, sivelâ`ezulwini.
b. Khangela, Mntwana Jesu, thinâ`abantwabakho, thina abelusi.
a. Jesu, ungumntwana nje.
b. UnguMsindisi wethu.
a. Satshelwa yisithunywa.
a&b. Sibili siyakholwa, Nkulunkulu Ndodana.
Chorus: Jesu, siyakhothama,
phambi kwakho esithaleni: Siyakuphâ`inhliziyo Wenâ`usiphe igrasiya.
2a Sithandâ`okuhle kodwa wavela ezulwini, akusisindise.
b. Ye, ngokuthanda kwakho,
wazenza umntwana nje, umyanga njengathi.
a. Thatha inhliziyo zethu.
b. Sizakulahlâ`okubi.
a. Sithandâ`ukufananaa&b. Lawe, Mntwana Jesu Kristu, Nkulunkulu iNdodana.
S.title: Safika, Mntwana Jesu

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sazalelwa, Sazalelwa sonke. Sazalelwa, uJesu Kristu. (2x)
1. Jabulani lonke, makholwa lamhlanje.
2. Isipho sethu sonke, nguMsindisi womhlaba.
3. Jabulani lonke, eBetlehema.
4. Jabulani mhlaba, wonke lamhla.
C. Baleni
S.title: Sazalelwa sonke

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Ukuzalwa kweNkosi, Sigubha

ukuzalwa koMsindisi,
Sezifikile, imigubho, ezingcwele, zoMsindisi, INkosi yethu,
INkosiyethâ`uJesu Kristu,
1. Owazalwa yiNcasakazi eNgcwele, UMariya eBethlehema, laseJudiya! Ngcingci, ngcingci, ngcingci, kaMdo-yi! eBethlehema laseJudiya!
2. Owasihlenga ngeGazi lakhâ`eliNgcwele, Esifela eSiphambanweni!
Ngcingci, ... Esifela eSiphambanweni!
3. Owasimisela iBandla lakhâ`eliNgcwele, EliKhatholika, ElinguNina wezizwe zonke! Ngcingci, ... ElinguNina wezizwe zonke!
4. Owasithumela uMoya wakhe oNgcwele, UMthokozisi,Ukusinika amandla akhe! Ngcingci,... Ukusinika amandla akhe!
5. Owasimisela iSidlo sakhâ`esiNgcwele, EsinguMzimba leGazi lakhe!
Ngcingci, ... EsinguMzimba leGazi lakhe!
6. Owathi uya, kusi, lungisela indawo, Ekhayâ`elihle elasezulwini!
Ngcingci, ...Ekhayâ`elihle elasezulwi-ni!

B. Ndlovu
S.title: Sigubha ukuzalwa kweNkosi

S.lyrics:
Chorus: âSiyibonile inkanyezi yakhe, size lezipho
ukumkhonza. Aleluya!â
1. Ngubani ongafaniswa lawe ezulwini, Nkosi,
ngubani phakathi kwezidalwa zasezulwini ofana leNkosi na?
2. Izimangaliso zakho, Nkosi, zidunyiswa ngamazulu; ubuqotho bakho badunyiswa emihlanganweni
yabangcwele. 3. Ngizakuhlabela ngothando lwakho olungapheliyo,
ngoba uthando lwakho lumi kuze kube nini lanini. (c/ f Mat 2,1-12) T. Nkomo
S.title: Siyibonile inkanyezi yakhe

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sizalelwe umntwana, siphiwe iNdodana (2x)
Sizalelwe uJesu uMsindisi womhlaba. 1. Asiguqe sikhuleke, sidumise ozelweyo
Amakholwa ahlabela, emdumisa ozelweyo. 2. Amakhosi, alandela inkanyezi eBethlehema,
lathi sonke sijabule siyibona iNdodana. 3. UMariya, loJosefa bajabula ngeNdodana,
Izithunywa zadumisa zizwâ`indaba yozelweyo.
R. Phiri
S.title: Sizalelwe

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siza, Sizalelwe uMntwana
siphiwe, siphiwe iNdodana (2x)
1. Izithunywa zahlabelela. Zidumisa, zidumisa ozelweyo. Abelusi bajabula. Bezwâ`ndaba, bezwâ`indaba yozelweyo.
2. Amakhosi empumalanga. Alandela, alandela inkanyezi Athokoza eyibona. Inkanyezi, imi phezu kweBetlehema.
3. UMariya loJosefa. Bajabula, beyibona iNdodana. Lathi sonke asithabe. Sidumise, sidumise ozelweyo.
P. Mthombeni
S.title: Sizalelwe umntwana

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sindisâ`abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x) Nkulunkulu sibusise, sisindise Baba.
1. Ngesiphambano, sakhwâ`esiNgcwele Sindisâ`abantu, ebunzimeni Siyakuncenga, Wena Somandla, Nkulunkulu, sibusise Baba
2. Ngamanxeba akho, amahlanu,
akupholise, inhlungu zonke,
laphâ`emhlabeni, Siyakuncenga, Nkulunkulu...
3. NgeGazi lakho, elachithwa
akugezise, izono zethu,
Wena Somandla, silondoloze, Nkulunkulu...

4. Qinisâ`abantu, bakuthande,
bakuhloniphe, ngokuthandaza,
kulelâ`ilizwe, lamanyâ`amazwe, Nkulunkulu...
W. Hlabano
S.title: Sindisâ` abantu bakho, Nkosi

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakuguqela Nkosi, sihlonipha isiphambano sakho,
Bass: Nkosi, siyakuguqela Nkosi.
1. Wenâ`owabhubhisâ`uSathanâ`isitha sethu,
wasikhupha ebugqilini,
wasisa elizweni lenkululeko.
2. Wenâ`owasivulelâ`izulâ`ikhaya lethu,
wasikhokhelâ`endleleni yosindiso,
wasinika ukudlâ`okuphilisayo.
3. Wenâ`owasondla ngemanâ`enkangala,
wasinikâ`amandlâ`asindisayo,
ngokungabongi sakunathisa iviniga. 4. Ngenxa yethu wanikelâ`impilo yakho,
wahlambululâ`ububi bethu ngeGazi lakho,
wasinikâ`intonga yobukhosi.
5. Wasiphakamiselâ`esihlalweni sobukhosi,
ngobubi bethu sakulengisâ`esâ`phambanweni, sakunikâ`umqhele wameva.
A. Gwenelo
S.title: Siyakuguqela Nkosi

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi Jesu, Sigcwalise ngoMoya wakho, Nkosi
siphenduke. Nkosi, siphenduke sibe batsha. Aleluya, Sigcwalise.
1. Ngiyakuthanda, Nkosi, ungaMandla ami! Nkosi, siphenduke sibe batsha.
Nkosi, uliDwala lami leNqaba yami. Nkosi...
2. UyiSiphephelo sami leSihlangu sami. Nkosi... uyiSivikelo sami leNqaba yami. Nkosi...
3. Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngakhuleka eNkosini. Nkosi... ngakhala kuNkulunkulu wami, wangizwa. Nkosi...
4. Umhlaba wazamazama wagedezela. Nkosi...lezisekelo zezintaba zaqhaqhazela. Nkosi...
5. Wadabulâ`amazulu wehlela phansi. Nkosi... amayezi akho athelâ`isiqhotho somlilo. Nkosi...
M. Chifana
S.title: Sigcwalise

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Woza kithi Moya oNgcwele, uhlale wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu Siyakuncenga hlala lathi.
Woza kithi Mkhanyiseli, uhlale... (2x)
1. Moyâ`oNgcwelâ`usiphâ`isibindi sokutshumayela iVangeli,
Wena Moya wokulunga, hlala lathi kokuphela. 2. Siqinise Moya oNgcwele, sinqobe, izilingo,
Siphâ`ulwazi Moya oNgcwele, khanyisela ingqondo zethu. 3. Bona Nkosi sibuthakathaka, akusiqinise kokuphela,
Yehla Moya wokulunga, ulungisâ`ingqondo zethu. 
4. Akusenze nazi njalo, yonkâ`indlela yokusila, Mduduzi Moya oNgcwele, duduza amakholwa onke
N. Lunga
S.title: Siyakuncenga hlala lathi

S.lyrics:
1. Siyakudumisa Baba, Nkulunkulu Nkosi yethu, wonkâ`umhlaba ukhuleka, kuwe Baba Mninikonke. UyiNkosi wena wedwa, ungâ`ophezu kwakho konke.
2. Izithunywa zakho zonke, ezikhona ezulwini, zihlabela phambi kwakho; zikubonga njalo zithi: UnguNgcwele, unguNgcwele, unguNgcwele, Nkulunkulu.
3. Nkosi Mninimandla wonke, Baba wethâ`osithandayo, wenâ`ogcinâ`izinto zonke, akusikhangele sonke: Usilondoloze ngomâ`sa, thinâ`esingabantwabakho.
4. Mhla sisuka kulumhlaba, uzusamukele Baba; sithokoze njalonjalo, embusweni waphezulu. Sikubonge ngokubonga kanye lezithunywa zonke.
S.title: Siyakudumisa Baba

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakudumisa, Jesu Kristu siyakudumisa siyakudumisa, nguwe oyiNkosi yodumo.
1. Nikani iNkosi lina sapho lwabantu, nikani iNkosi indumiso lamandla.
2. Nkosi ephethe ubukhosi bonke, Nkosi yamandla onke.
3. Nkosi edlula ukuduma kwamanzi amanengi, lamanzi alamandla olwandle.
S.title: Siyakudumisa Jesu Kristu

S.lyrics:
1. Siyizidalwa zakho, Nkosi, khonapha emhlabeni, Nkosi, xolelâ`ububi bethu, Nkosi,
woza Nkosi, sithethelele Baba.
Bass: Nkosi -
woza Nkosi, Nkosi,
Siphumuze Nkosi
sithethelele Baba!
2. Lolusuku lwalamhla, ... silunikela kuwe, ...
ake ulubusise, ...
3. Sicela ukutshona,... sisemuseni wakho,...
sikukhonze ngothando,...
4. Sicela ukulala,... sicelâ`ukuphumula,...
ubuthongo obuhle,...
5. Silondoloze sonke,.., sivikelâ`engozini,...
zomoya lezomzimba,...
6. Thina zidalwa zakho,... sikhothamela kuwe,...
ukuba usisize,...,
7. Yelulâ`ingalo zakho.... wemukelâ`izicelo,...
lezikhalazo zethu,...
W. Hlabano
S.title: Siyizidalwa zakho (113)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sâ`yakubabaza sâ`yakwazisa sâ`yakuguqela sâ`yakudumisa.
1. Udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu, kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu.
2. Kube lokuthula emhlabeni, ebantwini bakhe.
3. Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Nkosi yasezulwini.
4. Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla (2x) 5. Siyakubonga ngenxa yobukhosi
bakhâ`obukhulu.
6. Nkosi Jesu Kristu,
Ndodana ezelwe yodwa. 7. Nkosi Nkulunkulu,
Mvana kaNkulunkulu.
8. Ndodana kaNkulunkulu uYise,
wenâ`osusâ`izono zomhlaba. 9. Sihawukele (8x)
10. Wenâ`ohlezi kwesokunene, kwesokunene sikaYihlo.
11. Zwana ukukhala kwethu, ngoba nguwe wedwâ`oNgcwele. Nkosi yasezulwini.

12. Nguwe wedwa oyiNkosi, nguwe wedwâ`onguPhezukonke.
13. Ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu, bukaNkulunkulâ`uBaba. Amen.
L. Sidambe
S.title: Sâ`yakubabaza sâ`yakwazisa (121)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakholwa, (6x)
siyakholwa kuNkulunkulu munye.
O! Siyakholwa...
1. Siyakholwa kuNkulunkulu uYisâ`uMninimandla onke,
uMdali wezulu lomhlaba, siyakholwa kuNkulunkulu.
O! Siyakholwa
2. Siyakholwa kuJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu
eyodwa yodwa ezelwe nguye, siyakholwa
kuNkulunkulu. O! Siyakholwa
3. Siyakholwa kuMoyâ`oNgcwele, iBandlâ`eliNgcwele
eliKhatholika ukwazana kwabangcwele,
siyakholwa kuNkulunkulu. O! Siyakholwa
4. Ukuthethelelwa kwezono ukuvuka komzimba
okufeni lokuphilâ`okulaphakade. Amen. Siyakholwa kuNkulunkulu. O! Siyakholwa
B. Ndlovu
S.title: Siyakholwa (133)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkosi, sinikela kuwe Nkosi. (3x) Izithelo zamasimu ethu.
1. Inikeni iNkosi lina zizukulwana zezizwe, inikeni iNkosi udumo lamandla, Nkosi...
2. Inikeni iNkosi udumâ`olufanelâ`ibizo layo,
lethani umnikelo, ungenâ`ethempelini layo, Nkosi...
3. Kawathokozâ`amazulu, lomhlaba ujabule, kaluhlokome ulwandle, lakho konke okukulo, Nkosi...
4. Amaganga kawathabe, lakho konke okukuwo, ngoba inkulu iNkosi, ifanelâ`ukudunyiswa, Nkosi...
M. Majahana
S.title: Sinikela kuwe Nkosi (143)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakupha izipho zethu, sizethula phambi kwakho. Siyakuncenga usizwe, (2x)
1. Siyakuncenga ukuba wemukele lesiSinkwa leWayini, okuzaphendulwa kube nguMzimba leGazi likaJesu. 2. Siyakuncenga ukuba wemukele izipho zethu zonke,
usixolele izono zethu usiphe igrasiya lakho.
B. Ndlovu
S.title: Siyakupha izipho zethu (138)

S.lyrics:
Bass: Siyakupha, izipho,
zethu Nkosi zingcwelise. (2x)
1. Nansâ`isinkwa, nansâ`isinkwa; sethu Nkosi singcwelise, Iwayini, iwayini: yethu Nkosi ingcwelise.
2. Nansâ`imali, nansâ`imali: yethu Nkosi, ingcwelise. Nansâ`impahla, nansâ`impahla: yethu Nkosi ingcwelise
3. Imizimba, lenhliziyo, zethu Nkosi zingcwelise. Izifiso, lezicelo; zethu Nkosi zingcwelise.


4. Izigoga, izigoga; zethu Nkosi zisilise. Izigulane, izigulane; zethu Nkosi zisilise.
5. Abaswelayo, abaswelayo; bakho Nkosi baduduze. Abalesizungu, abalesizungu: bakho Nkosi baduduze.
6. Layâ`uPhapha, labancedisi; bakho Nkosi baqinise. Nantâ`iBandla, nantâ`iBandla; lakho Nkosi liqinise.
S.F. Dube
S.title: Siyakupha izipho (526)

S.lyrics: Sihlabele sonke njalo, lezithunywa zaphezulu, simdumisâ`ophezu konke, sithi: wenâ`uNgcwele Nkosi. Awubongwe, Jesu Kristu, oyiNkosi yamaxuku, awukhonzwe udunyiswe kuze kube laphakade.
S.title: Sihlabele sonke njalo

S.lyrics:
Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa
Baba siyakudumisa, ngomlomo kaKristu Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa,
Baba siyakudumisa, thina malunga kaKristu Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa,
Baba siyakudumisa, ngomoya ohlala phakathi kwethu. Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa
Baba siyakudumisa, kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
B. Ndlovu
S.title: Siyakudumisa

S.lyrics:
A -men
siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa...
1. Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa, siyakudmisa,
siyakudumisa...
A-men, A-men
siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa misa misa-Baba Siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa, siyakudumisa, Baba.
2. Ngomlomo kaKristu, ngomlomo kaKristu, thina malunga kaKristu.
malunga kaKristu, thina malunga kaKristu.
3. Ngomoya ohlala, ngomoya ohlala-ohlala ohlala, ngomoya ohlala ohlala phakathi kwethu.
4. Kuze kube, kuze kube-laphakade, laphakade, kube laphakade, laphakade. A-men.
S.title: SiyakudumisaBaba

S.lyrics:
Soprano:
Solo: Siyakudumisa Baba
Siyakudumisa Sithi
Amen Siyakudumisa 2nd Choir Soprano
Siyakudumisa Baba sithi
Amen, siyakudumisa. 1st Choir:
Amen, amen, amen, amen sithi
Amen siyakudumisa. 1. Ngomlomo kaKristu
2. Thinâ`amalunga kaKristu
3. Ngo Moyâ`hlala phakathi kwethu 4. Kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
S.title: Siyakudumisa

S.lyrics:
1. Siphiwe umlayo weNkosi, ukuba sithandane sonke, njengoba, wasithanda yena, uKristu, ongumfeli wethu. Chorus: Hosana, hosana hosana, hosana, hosana hosana,
Hosana, hosana hosana hosana kweliphezulu. 2. Zwanini, umlayo weNkosi, wokuba, sibe banye sonke,
njengoba, wasithanda yena, uKristu ongumfeli wethu. 3. Yenzani, elitshelwe khona, ukuba, libambane lonke,
njengoba, lehlula izitha, ezimbi, ezibhidlizayo.
4. Qalani, indlela ezintsha, ukuze, Eye ezulwini, lifike,
libâ`ngabantwabakhe, ekhaya, ekhayâ`elimnandi.
5. UJesu, wasifela sonke, ukuba, sigeziswâ`izono, ukuze,
siye ezulwini, ekhaya, khaya labangcwele.
6. Wozani, enkonzweni yethu, ukuze, sidumise sonke,
njengoba, singabantwabakhe, abakhe, abathandayo. W. Hlabano
S.title: Siphiwe umlayo weNkosi (220)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Samukele Mzimba wakho, Kristu Nkosi ngenhlonipho.
Samukele Gazi lakho, sibabaza, sikukhonza. 1. Yamukelani, nanku uMzimba wami,
yamukelani, nanti iGazi lami.
2. Yenzanini lokhu lingikhumbula, lingikhumbula ngize ngibuye.
3. Lowo odla lokhu uzakuphila, onathayo lokhu uzakuphila.
4. Babusisiwe abemukelayo, uMzimba wami leGazi lam
C. Baleni
S.title: Samukele uMzimba wakho (171)

S.lyrics:
1st Chorus: Nkosi samukelâ`uMzimba wakho, Nkosi samukelâ`uMzimba wakho (2x)
Nkosi siqinise Baba. Nkosi
samukelâ`uMzimba wakho, Nkosini. 2nd Chorus: Aleluya hlala lathi Nkosi ungasitshiyi Baba.
1. Nkosi sesikwamukele Baba siphe ukuphila kwakho Nkosi. 2. Samukele edilini lakho Kristu
size sithokoze kanye lawe.
3. Uhlale lathi njalo Nkosi yethu
ube kithi lathi sibe kuwâ`oNgcwele. 4. Lokhâ`ukudla akuqinisâ`imiphefumulo
uqinise kanye lemizimba yethu. 5. Lasekuhlweni kwempilo yethu
siphe uthando lomusa wakho.
6. Xotsha ubumnyama empilweni yethu
size sibe sekukhanyeni njalo.
M. Mkandla
S.title: Samukelâ`uMzimba wakho (601)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sanctuwari, wena odume,
ngezingoma ezimnandi, eziculelâ`uJesu Kristu, ohlezi eAlâ`thareni.
1. Wozani lonke, simdumise, ngezinhliziyo zethu zonke. Ukhona sibilâ`eAlthareni, uMzimba leGazi lakhe.
2. Jesu omnandi, sibusise, usixolelâ`izono zonke, esakona ngazo Nkosi yethu, ngobuthakathaka bethu.
3. Ziguli wozanini kuye, nguye inyanga yezinyanga! Wolibuyiselâ`impilo yonke, yomzimba lomphefumulo.
4. Zidani wozanini kuye, ongumthabisi wabo bonke. Nguye onikâ`intokozo yonke, uJesu iNkosi yethu.
5. Zoni wozani kuye lonke, nguye uMthandi wezoni. Lahlaninâ`izono zenu zonke, aliphe amandla akhe.
6. Bayanga wozanini kuye, nguye uMninizinto zonke. Nguye otholisâ`inhlanhla yonke, yasezweni elizayo.
7. Jesu omuhle, Nkosi yethu, akusisize thina sonke, ngegrasiya lakho elingcwele, size siye ezulwini.
B. Ndlovu
S.title: Sanctuwari (172)

S.lyrics:
1. Sizithobe, sikhothame, sidumisâ`iSakramente,
Elidlula ngobukhulu,
Yonkâ`inkonzo yasendulo, Alusibonisâ`ukholo elingekubonâ` ilihlo.
2. Adunyiswâ`uNkulunkulu
Yise, Kube kuye ubukhosi, eNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa, Ayibongwe kanye laye, LakuMoyâ`oNgcwele njalo. Kubâ`udumo laphakade. Amen.
1. Tantum ergo Sacramentum veneremur cernui: Et antiquum documentum - Novo cadet ritui: Praestet fides supplemetum - Sensuum defectui.
2. Genitori Genitoque - Laus et jubilatio,
- Salus, honor virtus quoque - Sit et benedictio - Procedent ab utroque - Compar sit laudatio. Amen.
S.title: Sizithobe sikhothame (Tantum ergo)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakubonga, Nkosi, siyakubonga, Nkosi siyakubonga, Nkosi siyakubonga, Nkosi
1. Sihlabele sikhuleka sithi:
2. Sikhuleke sihlabele sithi:
3. Sindawonye loMariya sithi:
4. Sindawonye labangcwele sithi: 5. Labasezulwini bonke sithi:
6. Ebusuku lasemini sithi:
7. Emakhaya labantwana sithi8. Phakathi kwabantu bonke sithi: 9. Emisebenzini yethu, sithi:
10. Ezinkonzweni zethu sithi:
11. Lasebunzimeni bethu sithi: 12. Ngesipho sakho sokholo, sithi: 13. Sikhuleka singadinwa, sithi: 14. Kuze kube laphakade, sithi:
C. Zikhali
S.title: Sihlabele sikhuleka sithi

S.lyrics:
1. Simoni kaJona, Nkosi, Simoni kaJona, Nkosi uyangithanda kulalaba na? (2x)

2. Wasesithi kuSimoni Phetro, Phanâ`amawundlu amâ`ukudla. (2x)
Simoni Phetro, phana amawundlu amâ`ukudla.
Chorus: Yebo Nkosi, Yebo Nkosi, Yebo Nkosi Ngiyakuthanda. (2x)

3. Wasesithâ`okwesibili,
Yelusâ`izimvu zami. (2x)
Simoni Phetro, Yelusâ`izimvu zami.
4. Wasesithi okwesithathu,
phana izimvu zamâ`ukudla. (2x)
Simoni Phetro, phana izimvu zamâ`ukudla.
(c/f 21,15-17) R. Ndlovu
S.title: Simoni kaJona (579)

S.lyrics:
Sithi bayethe, bayethe Kristu,
Sithi Bayethe, bayethe Kristu Nkosi (2x)
Ngoba, ungu Alpha loOmega kuqala lokucina. (2x) Baba, siyabonga, thina, siyabonga, Sithi, siyabonga, Baba, siyabonga (2x)
1. Baba siyabonga,
Baba siyabonga, ngokusipha uMsidisi uJesu Kristu,
onguLizwi, wabayinyama,
weza wahlala, phakathi kwethu (2x)
2. Baba yengeza,
Baba yengeza, uthando lwethu, sitshisekele, impilo enhle. Imâ`sebenzi yethu, lenkulumo zethu, zibe ngezithabisa wena (2x)
3. Nkosi ngikhumbula,
Nkosi ngikhumbula, uthwelâ`umqhele wameva, leliyanâ`ilanga, ngenxa yami.
Nkosi ngikhumbula, bekugwazâ`ohlangothini, leliyanâ`ilanga, ngenxa yami (2x)
3. Udumo kuwe,
udumo kuwe, lakuNdodana,
lakuMoya, oyiNgcwele.
Kwakunjalo, ekuqaleni, lakhathesi, lanininini (2x).
(Isam 1,18) M. Chifana
S.title: Sithi Bayethe (639)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakubonga, sikudumisa Baba Siyakubonga Baba, sikudumisa Nkosi. (2x)
1. Amandla onke asezulwini lasemhlabeni anikwe wena.
2. Ungumalusi olungileyo, owelusa kuhle izimvu zakhe.
3. Kasibongeni iNkosâ`uJesu, ongumalusi omuhle wethu.
4. Ngamandla akho Nkosi Jesu, abagulayo bayasiliswa.
5. Izigoga zelulanyiswa nguwe, abayanga bayatshunyayezwa. 6. Zonkâ`izidalwa zizaguqa kuwe,
sezivuma ubukhosi bakho.
(c/f Mat 28,18;Joha 10,11) M. Mkandla
S.title: Siyakubonga sikudumisa (569)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyabonga Nkosi, siyakubonga Somandla! Siyakubonga Nkosi, Baba wethu Nkulunkulu, Baba Somandla, siyakubonga Somandla, Nkulunkulu. (2x)
1. Silapha sonke, singabaphilayo, ngomusa wakho, Mdali wethu. Nguwe wedwa othembekayo, ophilisayo, abantu bonke.
2. Ekuqaleni, wamenzâ`umuntu, waba yinduna, phezu komhlaba. Emva kwalokho, wakuhlamukela, walahlekelwa, yimpilo yakhe.
3. Loba kunjalo, awuzange umlahle, waba lozwelo, Nkulunkulu Baba. Wasâ`umthumela, ngothando lwakho, uMsindisi, uJesu Kristu.

4. Lalamhlanje, ulokhâ`usiphethe, kule impilo, eyalumhlaba. Usipha konke esikuswelayo, usiphâ`ukudla, Nkosi yethu.
5. Siphe amandla, okufinyelela, kulelokhaya, lakho elihle. Laphâ`emhlabeni,
akukho okuhle, konke okuhle, kukuwe Baba.
B. Ncube
S.title: Siyabonga Nkosi (221)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sihawukele Baba, siyakhala Baba, Baba, sicela izulu, izulu, eliphilisayo Baba wethu.
Size sithokoze Baba, size sithokoze, Baba, size sikubonge,
ngesi, ngesihawu sakho, Baba wethu.
1. Thinâ`abantu, lazo inkomo, siyakhala, umhlabâ`ufile Sihawukele, Baba wethu, ngamazolo, aphilisayo. 2. Amadlelo, aluhlaza, siwaphiwa, nguBaba wethu.
UElija, wakhuleka, waphendulwa, ladumâ`izulu. 3. Izithelo, zalumhlaba, ziyikudla, kwempilo yethu
Inhliziyo, zethu zonke, zikhangela, kuwe phezulu.
S. Mazalu
S.title: Sihawukele Baba (232)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Singabantwabakho Nkosi, (3x) Sibheke kuwe, kuwe phezulu.
1. Umhlaba womile sokulugwadule Amasim-u omile sokuyinkangala.
2. Inyamazana ziyafa, kazisela manzi okunatha Thina Bantu, Nkosi - kasiselâ`ukudla, sicela izulu lakho, eliphilisayo.
4. Ocelayo - uyaphiwa akucelayo -
O qoqodayo - uyavulelwa - ngesihle.
5. Sicela line Nkosi - ligcwalise - imifula Abantu bakho Nkosi - bathabe bathokoze.
R. Ndlovu
S.title: Singabantwabakho (610)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Somandla, sicela izulu, Nkulunkulu Baba olesihawu,
Somandla, sinika izulu

elisiza impilo yethu; (elisiza amasimu). 1. Ndodana kaMariya, usicelelâ`izulu,
kuBaba ophezulu, lisuthise umhlaba.
2. Khangela umhlaba Nkosi, othembele kuwe Baba,
hawukela abantwabakho, ubaphe amazolo. 3. Philisa inyamazana, kuphile lezibungwana,
Nkosi siyakubabaza, wenâ`olomusa wonke. 4. Siyalamba sihawukele, siyagula siphilise,
siyahlupheka Nkosi, sikhuphe osizini. 5. Yesulâ`izinyembezi, lokusinama kwethu,
sinikâ`amanzi Baba, athambise umhlaba.

W. Hlabano
S.title: Somandla sicela izulu (233)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sukuma uhambe, khangela, ususilile.
Sukuma uhambe,
ukukholwa kwakho kukusilisile. 1. Wathi kuBartimewu indodana kaTimewu
Umphanzi oyisiphofu wayehlezi endleleni. 2. Esezwile ngoJesu, waseNazaretha,
waqala ukumemeza, wathi kuye,
Ndodana kaDavida akungihawukele. 3. Abanengi bamkhuza bathi kathule,
Kodwa wangâ`khona ememeza kakhulu. 4. Ndodana kaDavida akungihawukele,

Wamemeza esithi akungihawukele.
5. Ndodana kaDavida, ngiyakuncenga akungihawukele,
Mfundisi Jesu Kristu othemba kuwe uyasila6. UKristu nguye kuphela umthombo wokusila,
Kholwa ngenhliziyo yonke uzakuthola ukusila.
(c/f Luka 5,24-26) N. Lunga
S.title: Sukuma uhambe (625)

S.lyrics:
1. Sengikubingelela, Mariya Mama wethu.
O, inhliziyo yakho, imhlophe njengeliqhwa. Virigo oliluba, elihle elimhlophe, yenzâ`inhliziyo yami, ilunge njengeyakho.

2. Izinkanyezi lezo, ezikhazimula kambe; ubuhle bakho bodwa, buzifiphaza zonke. Nkanyezi yasolwandle, ekhanya laphezulu, akungikhanyisele, minâ`engisemnyameni.
3. Virigo elimhlophe, wena ongelacala; udlula izithunywa, ngobuhle lobungcwele. E! Nkosikazi enhle, yezithunywa zonke, ngisizâ`ukuba lami, ngifane lezithunywa.
4. E! Mama ophezulu, wenâ`olomusâ`omkhulu, ungikhethile kambe, ngibe ngumntwana wakho. E! ngivunyelwâ`ukutsho, ukuthi: unguMama; akungilondoloze, minâ`engingumntanakho.
S.title: Sengikubingelela (261)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakubingelela Mama wethu, Ekuhle Mariya siyakubingelela Mama wethu,
Ekuhle Mariya ugcwelâ` igrasiya:
iNkosi ilawe, iNkosi ilawe (2x) 1. Ubusisiwe wena, esifazaneni.
Mariya, Ekuhle Mariya.
2. Ibusisiwâ`inzalo, yesisu sakho Jesu.
3. Mariya oNgcwele, Nina kaNkulunkulu.
4. Usikhulekele, thina zoni.
5. Khathesi lasesikhathini, sokufa kwethu. Amen.
M. Majahana
S.title: Siyakubingelela (262)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Siyakuthanda Mariya, unguMama wethu; usikhulekele, thinâ`abantwabakho.
1. Ninâ`othembekayo, Nina kaJesu! Usikhulekele, kizo zonkâ`insuku.
2. Nina olomusa, Nina kaJesu! Ugiphathe ngomâ`sa, ungabosilahla.

3. Nina olamandla, Nina kaJesu! ekudubekeni akusivikele.
4. Nina ongelasono, Nina kaJesu! Usigcine kuhle, singagconâ`umoya.
5. Nina othandekayo, Nina kaJesu: lathi sikuthande kizo zonkâ`insuku.
S.title: Siyakuthanda Mariya (263)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sikhumbula abafundi beNkosi, aba, hlanyelâ`ilizwi layo,
ukuze, sisindiswe, silandele uKristu,
ukuze sisindiswe, siyebona uJesu. 1. UPhetro loPhawuli abangcwele, bathunywa
yiNkosi uJesu, baphiwa amandla okuthethelela, izono zethu abafundi bonke balandela, uKristu ngokwakhe, basabalala befundisa, ilizwi leNkosi.
2. Makholwa zwanini iVangeli, amazwi eNkosi, asencwadini eyingcwele, egcwelâ`ukuphila.
3. Wababuza wathi ngingubani, bathi: UnguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, eThandekayo.
W. Hlabano
S.title: Sikhumbula abafundi beNkosi (275)

S.lyrics:
Chorus: Sithunywa sami esingilondolozayo,
umiswe nguNkulunkulu,
ukuba ungilondoloze kuhle. Lamhla nje lamalanga onke, (2x)
1. Sithunywa sami, uthandekile wena, waphuma ezulwini le.
Wathunywa nguNkulunkulu
ukuba ungilondoloze kuhle.
2. Sithunywa sami ngivikelâ`esonweni amandla akhâ`amakhulu,
hlala ke, hlala kimi kuhle, ngelanga lokufika kwami.
3. Sithunywa sami, khuluma endlebeni. Ngilizwe ilizwi lakho.
Ngikwenze okulungileyo
ngifike ekhaya lakho.
S.title: Sithunywa sami

S.lyrics:
Chorus:
SoMandla, nginikela kuwe yonkâ`impilo yami. (2x) Uzungigcine, uzungigcine, soMandla kulâ`umsebenzi. (2x) Jesâ`wami, ithathe ibe ngeyakho yonkâ`impilo yami. (2x) Uzungigcine,... (2x)
1. Noma sekunzima, kulukhuni Baba, sengilingwa nguSathane, uzungigcine...
Ebubini bonke, ngiphathisa Nkosi,
ngingaze ngehlulwa, uzungigcine...

2. Woba amandla ami, isabelo sami, ngiwunqobâ`umhla-ba, uzungigcine... Thumâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele, angikhanyisele, angiphe isibindi, uzungigcine...
3. Ngiholwa luthando, lomâ`sa wakho Nkosi, lobumnene lobuqotho, uzungigcine...
S.title: Somandla nginikela kuwe (nhlobonhlobo)

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thokozani eNkosini,
Thokozani ngobâ`iNkosâ`isiseduze. 1. Izulu kalivuleke, liveze uMkhululi.
Khululâ`isizwe sakho Nkosi, kuzo zonke inkathazo. 2. Khizani uMkhululi lina mazulu,
lina mayezi mehliseni olungileyo.
3. Izizwe zonke zizamangala, lamakhosi athithibale,
ngoba sekusondele ukuza koMkhululi.
4. Hlokomani ngokuhlabela, kuzwakale indawo zonke.
Thokoza mphefumulo wami, ngobâ`iNkosi isiseduze. C. Zikhali
T.title: Thokozani eNkosini

T.lyrics:
1. Thabani, lesase, Bantu bamazwe onke! Aleluya,
Aleluya, lesase, lename, lidumisâ`iNkosi. Aleluya! Jabulani, lithokoze, sapho lweAfrika. Aleluya. Lesase, lename, lidumisâ`iNkosi. Aleluya! Chorus:
Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Aleluya, zinhle lezindaba zokuzalwa
kweNkosâ`uJesu Kristu. Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu,
Aleluya, zinhle, lezindaba ba zosindiso olwalethwa nguJesu Kristu! Awu.
NguKristu Aleluya.
Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu, Awu,
Aleluya zinhle lezindababa, zokungena ekhaya
ezulwini!
2. Jabulani lithokoze Bandla leAfrika! lithabelâ`ukuzalwa kukaJesu uMsindisi.
Wazalwa nguMariya eyintombi eGcweleyo, Aleluya Wazalelwa eBethlehema kwelaseJudiya. Aleluya.
3. Hlokomani, lithokoze-ke Bantu bamazwe onke. Aleluya, lesase, lename, lidumisâ`iNkosi. Aleluya, Dumisani libabaze, Bantu bamazwe wonke, Aleluya Lesase, lename, lidumisâ`iNkosi. Aleluya.
All: Aleluya,
B. Ndlovu
T.title: Thabani lesase bantwana beZimbabwe

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thina sidumisa, sidumisâ`ibizo lakho, Nkosi
wenâ`ongehlulwa lutho.
1. Ngokuvuka kwakho, sidumisâ`ibizo... 2. Ngokunqoba kwakho, sidumisâ`ibizo... 3. Ngobukhosi bakho, sidumisâ`ibizo...

F. Nyathi
T.title: Thina sidumisa

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thabanini, uKristu, zizwe zonke,
wenyuka, thabanini, waya ezulwini. (2x) 1. Uhlezi esandleni sokunene sikaYise.
2. UyiNkosi yakho konke.
3. Uzakusikhweza lathi.
4. Ubuntu bethu buphakanyiswe.
5. Ubukhosi bukaYise ngobakhe.
6. Nkulunkulu Baba, zwanâ`imikhuleko yethu.
7. Kanye loKristu iNdodana yakhâ`eyodwa.
8. Thumelâ`umoya wothando lwakho.
9. Uhlale lathi, asenze sibe munye.
F. Sitwala
T.title: Thabanini

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thumela Nkosi, thumelâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele owawuthumelâ`abaphostoli,
ngelanga lePhentekoste.
1. Lamhlanje yehlela kithi Moya oNgcwele,
usiphe isibindi sokutshumayelâ`iVangeli. 
2. Usiphe ukuhlakanipha Moya oNgcwele, ukuze sithele izithelo ezinhle.
3. Usiphe ukukhanya Moya oNgcwele, sibe yisibane kwabangakholwayo.
4. Woza kithi Moya wokulunga, woza uhlale lathi kokuphela. 5. Njengoba wehlela kubafundi,
lamhlanje yehlela kithi.
6. Usiphe ulwazi Moya oNgcwele,
khanyisela ingqondo zethu.
7. Siqinise Moya sinqobâ`uSathane,
Siqinise Moya sinqobâ`izilingo.
8. Nkosi Jesu Kristu thumelâ`uMoya oNgcwele,
thumela uMoya wakho wokuphila. 9. Usilondoloze Moya oNgcwele,
usivikele engozini zonke.
T.title: Thumela Nkosi

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thumela Nkosi, uMoyâ`ongcwelâ` (3x) ahlale kithi kokuphela.
1. Woza, Moya wokulunga,
senze, silunge njengoBaba osezulwini.
2. Woza, moya wothando, senze, sithande uNkulunkulu phezu kwakho konke.
3. Woza, Moya wobumnene,
senze, sibe msulwa njengoJesu Kristu.
4. Woza, Moya wesibindi,
siphe isibindi sokutshumayela iVangeli.
5. Woza, moya wenkalipho, sambulele, imfihlakalo ezingcwele.


L. Mguni
T.title: Thumela uMoya oNgcwele

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thengisa, thengisa impahla yakho, uphe abayanga
ngâ`khona uzakuba lenotho ezulwini. (2x) 1. Mfundisi ngizakwenza ulutho bani olulungileyo,
ukuba ngibe lokuphila, okungapheliyo na? 2. Ungibuzelani, ngokulungileyo na?
Munye kuphela, olungileyo.
3. Uba uthanda ukungenâ`ekuphileni, gcina imilayo.
Wothanda umakhelane wakho, njengalokhâ`uzithanda wena.
4. Insizwa yathi kuye, konke lokhu ngikugcinile. Kodwa isizwile lelilizwi, yasuka idanile.
5. Ngoba yayilenotho, enengi kakhulu.
UJesu wathi kubafundi bakhe ngiqinisile ngithi kini.
6. Onothileyo uzakungena, ngokulukhuni embusweni wezulu.
Sebezwile lokho abafundi bamangala kakhulu. 7. Abafundi bathi pho kungasiliswa bani na?
(c/f Luka 18,18-25) N. Lunga
T.title: Thengisa impahla yakho (521)

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, aleluya! (2x) 1. Thathani, lidle lesisinkwa esinguMzimba wami,
aleluya.
2. Nathani, lonke, kulesisitsha, esileGazi lami,
aleluya.
3. Yenzani, lokhu ukuba lize, lingikhumbule ngakho
njalo, aleluya.
4. Sinika lesi, isinkwa sakho, Nkosi, sisidla njalo
njalo, aleluya.

(c/f Mathewu 26,26-28) B. Ndlovu
T.title: Thathani lidle (173)

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thina sonke, thina sonke sijabule,
thina sonke, thina sonke sidumise,
sidumise, thina sonke sihlabele: Aleluya! 1. UJesâ`uyamemeza,
useAlithareni,
sondelâ`uyezizwela.
2. UJesu ngiyamthanda,
uthi dlanâ`uMzimba wami,
unathe leGazi lami. 3. Asâ`hambe samukele,
wonâ`uMzimba weNkosi,
leGazi leNkosi. 4. UJesu uyikudla,
kwemiphefumulo yethu,
okutholâ`isimpilo. 5. UJesâ`usethekele,
simsâ`emakhaya ethu,
abone labantwana.
6. Wena mthandi wabantwana,
busisâ`imuli zonke,
ukuze zikuthande.
7. UJesu ngumngane wami,
ngethekelela lami, sihlale sindawonye.
W. Hlabano
T.title: Thina sonke (174)

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Thabani lithokoze, thabani lithokoze ngalaba ababili abatshadayo.
Umyeni uzakuthanda, umkakhe
lomlobokazi ahloniphe umkakhe. (2x)
1. Lolo thando, lolothando bebambene banqobe loJesu.
Ababili, ababili bebambene banqoba loJesu.
2. Libambelele, libambelele ezimisweni zenu ezinhle.
Libambelele, libambelele emilayweni yeNkosi yenu. 3. Asiceleni, kuMoya oNgcwele ukuba abakhanyisele sibonge sisithi: udumâ` udumâ` udumo alube kuYise,
leNdodana loMoya oNgcwele.
S. Moyo
T.title: Thabani lithokoze (536)

T.lyrics:
Chorus: Themba iNkosi, mphefumulo wamâ` (4x) 1. Enhluphekweni, Ebuhlungwini,
Yenza lokho, Okusilungeleyo. 3. Asimbongeni, ebunzimeni,
lasentokozweni, lasekukhaleni. 4. Jesu wami, wangifela,
