esiphambanweni, lanxa wawungelacala. 5. Wahlupheka, ngenxa yami,
ngipha lami, amandlâ`okubekezela.
6. Ukuhlupheka, kusifundisa ukuzithoba,
kukho konke, intando yakho kayenziwe; 7. Ngiphâ`inhliziyo, enanzelelayo,
ngizondâ`intokozo yalumhlaba; ngiyimelele kwelizayo. B. Ncube
T.title: Themba iNkosi Mphefumulo wamâ` (222)

T.lyrics:
1. Thina Bantu asihlabele, abangcwele baseUganda. Bakholwa kuMdalâ`uSomandla,
balalela kuhle kuye, bafaka ithemba labo kuye, bamthanda ngamandla onke.
Chorus: Bayathaba ngokuthaba ezulwini laphakade. (2x)

2. Thina Bantu asihlabele, amabutho kaJesu Kristu behlula izilingo zonke, zenkosi embi sibili. Bazehlula inhliziyo zabo, zahlala zingelasono.
3. Thina Bantu asihlabele, amakholwa aqinileyo; badela umkhonto lenqamu, badelâ`induku lomlilo. Bakhanuka bonke ukufela uJesu, umfeli wabo.
T.title: Thinâ`abantu asihlabele (276)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Ungaphi, Ozelweyo. OyiNkosi yakoJuda na?
Ngoba, Siyibonile inkanyezi yakhe
kwelasempumalanga. Sizile ukumkhonza. 1. Lowo owakhulunywa yimibhalo, sizile ukumkhonza
oyinzalo yowesifazana,- sizile ukumkhonza. OyiNkosi loMkhululi, loMkhululi, ozachobozâ`ikhanda lenyoka (2x)

2. Yenâ`onguMthethelo kaAbrahamâ`; - sizile... oyisibonelo seNdodana yakhe - sizile... OyiNkosi loMkhululi, lomkhululi, ongayigodlanga iNdodana yakhe. (2x)
3. Nguye owaboniswa kuAbrahamâ`, sizile... oyinqama ayihlabayo; - sizile... OyiNkosi lomkhululi, lomkhululi, ozasindisa izizwe zonke. (2x)
4. Yenâ`owasilisa abakoJuda, sizile... OyiMvana engelasici; - sizile... OyiNkosi lomkhululi, lomkhululi, owavikelâ`isizwe sakoJuda (2x).
5. Yeno owathenjiswa kuDavida, sizile... Olihlumela likaJese; - sizile... OyiNkosi lomkhululi, Lomkhululi, ozabusisa izizwe zonke. (2x)
6. Nguye owakhulunywa ngabaprofethi, sizile... OyiNdodana kaDavida, sizile...
OyiNkosi lomkhululi, lomkhululi,
ozabusa izizwe zonke (2x)
(c/f Mat 2,1-12) A. Gwenelo
U.title: Ungaphi ozelweyo

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UKristu wazithoba,
walalela uNkulunkulu kwaze kwaba sekufeni, yebo lasekufeni kwasesiphambanweni.
1. Ngakho-ke, uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa, wamnika udumo olukhulu kumabizo wonke.

2. Ngakho-ke, izizwe zonke, âzizaguga ziborige, udumo lukaKristu ongumhlengi wazo.
3. Bazalwane asihube, sibonge,
iNkosi yethâ`uKristu ongumfeli wethu.
(c/f Fil 2,8) P. Mthombeni
U.title: UKristu wazithoba

U.lyrics:
Sithi, Hosana 

Chorus: Sithi Hosana, hosana, hosana, Kuwe Nkosi yamakhosi. (2x)
Bass: Hosana, hosana, hosana. Hosana, hosana, hosana, hosana.

1. Siyaguqa phambi kwakho, sizinikela lamuhla. Thumelâ`uMoya oNgcwele, uzasikhanyisela, Sithi...
2. Sicelâ`uthando, lomusa enhliziyweni zethu. Ibizo lakho, lidunyiswe, emhlabeni lasezulwini, Sithi...
3. Siyabonga, Baba wethu ngokusithanda kwakho konke, Sithi...
V. Dube
U.title: Untitled1

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu Kristu, uvukile aleluya, Asimdumise, ngokuhlokoma langokuthokoza, aleluya. (2x)
1. Uyabusa Nkosi, ngobâ`usunqobile; Uyikukhanya komhlaba wonke.
2. Izizwe zonke zizakuza kuwe; Zikukhonze zikudumise.
3. Abathandabuzayo, uyabakhokhela; Ubatshengise indlela yakho.
4. Uyabusa Nkosi, qhawe lamaqhawe; Ngiyakubabaza ngezenzo zakho.
E. Nkomo
U.title: Untitled2

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UKristu uvukile, asithokoze, sithabe sijabule aleluya.
UKristu unqobile asithokoze,

sithabe sijabule aleluya. (2x)
Alto: Aleluya uyiNkosi, sizakudumisa Jesu Kristu. 1. Nkosi Jesu Kristu Qhawe lamaqhawe,
Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya uvukile. Mehluli wokufa usuvukile, Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya uvukile.
2. Ekuvukeni kwakho umhlaba wazamazama, Aleluya... Amabutho awa abhazalala, Aleluya...
3. Wabonakala kuSimoni uPhetro, Aleluya... Waqinisa ukholo lwakhe, Aleluya...
4. Abafundi baseEmawusi, Aleluya... Bakwazi ekuhlephunenâ`isinkwa, Aleluya...
5. Wabonakala kubafundi bakho, Aleluya... Wakhuluma labo wadla bathokoza, Aleluya...

6. UThomasi othandabuzayo, Aleluya... Usuqinisile ukholo lwakhe, Aleluya...
7. Wathi Nkosi yami Nkulunkulu wami, Aleluya... Ihubelenâ` iNkosi ingoma entsha, Aleluya...
8. Siqinise lathi okholweni lwethu, Aleluya...
Singathandabuzi okholweni lwethu, Aleluya...
N. Lunga
U.title: UKristu uvukile, asithokhoze

U.lyrics:
UKristâ`uvukile, Aleluya, uvukile, aleluya!
Msindisi wethu, Aleluya, uvukile, aleluya! 1. Uzasivusa lathi.
2. Ekufeni kwethu.
3. Sithabe kanye laye.
F. Sitwala
U.title: UKristâ`uvukile, aleluya!

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu, usevukile asijabule. 1. Jabulani lina zithunywa zasezulwini,
hlokomani lina maxuku aphezulu.
2. Mdumiseni uNkulunkulu esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi,
lina lonke zidalwa zakhe.
3. UJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu usevukile,
mtshayeleni amatolopita abika usindiso
(Qhubeka uvule Rites of Holy Week)
U.title: Usevukile asijabule

U.lyrics:
1. Uvukile uMsindisi: Aleluya, sihlabele, ngokuthaba okukhulu. Aleluya, aleluya!
Bona kwedlulilâ`ukufa. Nguye onguMninimandla.
2. INdodana yakho, Baba, yeza lapha emhlabeni, izofela thinâ`abantu. Aleluya, aleluya! Nangâ`usephilile futhi, owabekwa elibeni!

3. Kakuphinda afe futhi, zzaphla njalo njalo, elodumo olukhulu. Aleluya, aleluya! Asimbonge, simdumise, oyiNkosi yethu sonke!
4. Nkosi Jesu, Mhlengi wethu, zwana ukucela kwethu, lamhlanje ngelanga lakho. Aleluya, aleluya.
Vusa lathi ekufeni, sitholâ`ukuphila ngawe.
U.title: Uvukile uMsindisi

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Amandla, aphiwe Mina Amandla, amandla wonke, (2x)
Amandla, ezulwini lasemhlabeni. (2x)
1. Ngakho ngithi kini, hambanini, lenze izizwe zonke,
zibe ngabafundi bami.
2. Libatshele ukugcina, engalilaya ngakho.
3. Libhabhathize ebizweni, likaYise leleNdodana lelikaMoya oNgcwele.
4. Khangelani Mina ngilani, insuku zonke, lasekucineni. (c/f Mat 28,18-20) M. Majahana
U.title: Untitled3

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UMoya weNkosi,
UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami,
Ingigcobile ukuba ngitshumayele
Izindaba ezinhle. Bass: Ngizaletha,
Izindaba ezinhle kubayanga. 1. Ingithumile, Ukumemezela ukuthula
Lokukhululwa kwabathunjiweyo.
2. Ngimemezele, Ukubona kwabayiziphofu.
Lokuzwa - kwabayizacuthe.
3. Izimungulu, Izimungulu ziza khuluma
Abalobulephero bahlanjululwe.
4. Abagulayo, labayizigoga bazagijima.
Labafileyo bazakuvuswa.
5. Kuzabikwa, Umnyaka womusa weNkosi,
Lokukhululwa kwezibotshwa.
6. IVangeli, lizatshunyayelwa kwabayizoni,
Abaphendukayo bazasindiswa.
(Luka 4,18-19) A. Gwenelo
U.title: UMoya weNkosi

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UNkulunkulu Baba,
Sidumise UNkulunkulu Ndodana,
Sidumise, UNkulunkulu Moyâ`oNgcwele Sidumise asidumiseni. (2x)
1. Ngebizo likaYise, leleNdodana, lelikaMoya oyiNgcwele.
2. Mzimeli wokuqala Nkulunkulu uBaba, lamhla sidumisa ubuNgcwele bakho.
3. Mzimeli wesibili Nkulunkulu Ndodana, lamhla sidumisa ubuNgcwele bakho.
4. Mzimeli wesithathu Nkulunkulu Moyâ`oNgcwele, lamhla sidumisa ubuNgcwele bakho.
5. UNkulunkulu munye, ungabazimeli abaThathu.
N. Lunga
U.title: UNkulunkulu uBaba

U.lyrics:
Bayethe Jesu Nkosi yamakhosi 
Chorus: Bayethe, Jesu Nkosi yamakhosi. (2x) Siyakudumisa, wena qhawe lamaqhawe ngempela Nkosi, uliqhawe lamaqhawe.
1. Wena nzalo kaDavida, Ngempela Nkosi... Zibulo lokufa lokuphila, Ngempela... Uyindlela leqiniso, Ngempela... Kukhanya lokuphila, Ngempela...

2. Wena Mfeli wabobonke, Ngempela... Mnqobi wakho konkâ`okubi, Ngempela... Wena Mbusi wababusi, Ngempela... Bayethe Nkosi yamakhosi, Ngempela...
3. Ngawe Nkosi sileqiniso, Ngempela...
Kuwe kakukho okwehlulayo, Ngempela... Mhlengi wethu kawudunyiswe, Ngempela... Ngalokhu Nkosi siyabonga, Ngempela...
M. Chifana
U.title: Untitled4

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Cantors: UKristu, All: UyiNdlela,
Cantors: UKristu,
All: uliQiniso, lokuphila okungapheliyo! 1. Ukuphila,
siphe Nkosi, ukuphila kwakho okungapheliyo! Ukuphila,
siphâ`ukuphila kwasezulwini. Ukuthaba,
siphe Nkosi ukuthaba kwakho okungapheliyo! Ukuthaba,
siphâ`ukuthaba kwasezulwini. 2. Ukuthula, ...
Ukukhanya... . Ukwesasa...
Ubukhosi.
B. Ndlovu
U.title: UKristu uyiNdlela

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Uthando! uthando lweNkosi (2x)
Udumo, udumo lweNkosi luhle kithi sonke udumo lweNkosi emhlabeni wonke. (2x)
1. Uthando lweNkosi yethu, asimbonge simdumise ngothando lwakhâ`olukhulu, asilondoloza ngalo.
2. Nguye oyisibane sethu, nguye oliqiniso Nguye oyiNdlela yethu, nguye ithemba lethu.
3. Kadunyiswe eningizimu, kadunyiswe enyakatho Adunyiswe enhla khonale, adunyiswe ezansi.
4. Thina sonke asibambelele, elizwini leNkosi Silandele isiphambano, kuze kube nininini.
5. Indaba enhle kaJesu, emhlabeni wonke Yiyo eyisibane sethu, yiyo elithemba lethu
M. J. Moffat
U.title: Uthando lweNkosi (564)

U.lyrics:
1. Siyacela kuwe Jesu, siyacela kuwe Jesu,
ngena lathi kulâ`indawo, Aleluya, ngena lathi kulâ`indawo.
2. Bona sisendlini yakho, bona sisendlini yakho, ngena lathi Nkosi yethu, aleluya, ngena lathi Nkosi yethu.
3. Sibuthene sikhuleka, sibuthene sikhuleka, sifunâ`ilizwi lakho, aleluya, sifunâ`ilizwi lakho.
4. Ngoba lona liyikudla, ngoba lona liyikudla, kwemiphefumulo yethu, aleluya, kwemiphefumulo
yethu. 5. Sidumisa siqakeza, sidumisa siqakeza,
sithi a, sithi aleluya. Aleluya, sithi a Aleluya.
C. Zikhali
U.title: Untitled5

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu uthi: khangela ngimi, ngasemnyango, Ngiqoqoda,
Ngimi ngasemnyango ngiqoqoda.
Ngimi...
1. Uba umuntu, ezwa izwi lamâ`avule umnyango,
ngizangena, ngidle, laye laye adle lami. 2. Onqobayo, uzakuhlala lami,
esihlalweni, esihlalweni sami sobukhosi. 3. Njengalokhu lami, nganqoba,
ngihlezi, ngihlezi loBabâ`esihlalweni sobukhosi. 4. Olendlebe kezwe, lokho umoya akutshoyo, emabandleni, lokho umoya akutshoyo. (2x)
(1 Sam 3,20-22) M. Chifana
U.title: UJesu uthi khangela ngimi (105)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Udumâ`alube, kuNkulunkulu, udumâ`alube, kweliphezulu,
kube lokuthula, emhlabeni,
kube lokuthula, ebantwini bakhe. (2x) Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Nkosi yasezulwini,
Nkulunkulâ`uBaba, Baba Somandla. Siyakubabaza, siyakwazisa,
siyakuguqela, siyakudumisa, siyakubonga, ngenxa yobukhosi yobukhosi, bakhâ`obukhulu. Udumâ`alube... Nkosi Jesu Kristu, Ndodanâ`ezelwe yodwa, Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Mvana kaNkulunkulu. Ndodana kaNkulu,kaNkulunkulu uYise, wena osusa, izono zomhlaba.
Sihawukele, sihawukele, sihawukele, sihawukele (2x) Wena ohlezi, kwesokunene sikaYihlo,
zwanâ`ukukhala, ukukhala kwethu.
Ngoba nguwe wedwa, wedwa oNgcwele
nguwe wedwa, wedwa oyiNkosi,
nguwe wedwa, onguPhezukonke,
wena Jesu, wena Jesu Kristu.
Undawonye, loMoyâ`oNgcwele ebukhosini, bukaNkulunkulu uBaba.
Amen, Amen,Amen, A-men, Amen, Amen-men. (2x)
B. Ndlovu
U.title: Udumâ`alube kuNkulunkulu (117)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Udumo, udumâ`alube Nkulunkulu udumo, udumâ`alube kweliphezulu. (2x)
Kube lokuthula, emhlabeni wonke. Ebantwini bakhe, abalentando enhle. Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Nkosi yasezulwini. Nkulunkulâ`uBaba, wenâ`odumisekayo.
Siyakubabaza, siyakwazisa, siyakuguqela. Siyakudumisa, siyakubonga, ngenxa yobukhosi.
Bakhâ`obukhulu, Nkosi Jesu Kristu, Ndodanâ`ezelwe yodwa.
Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Mvana kaNkulunkulu. Ndodana kaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uYise. Wenâ`osusâ`izono, izono zomhlaba.
Sihawukele, sihawukele. (2x)
Wenâ`ohlezi kwesokunene, sikaNkulunkulâ`uYihlo.
Zwana ukukhala, ukukhala kwethu.
Ngoba nguwe wedwa, nguwe wedwa oNgcwele, nguwe wedwâ`oyiNkosi.
UngoPhezu konke, Wena Jesu Kristu
loMoya oyiNgcwele.
Ebukhosini, bukaNkulunkulu, uBaba. Amen. (2x)
W. Hlabano
U.title: Udumo (119)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu, kweliphezulu. 1. Nkosi Nkulunkulu Nkosi yasezulwini,
Nkulunkulu Baba Baba Somandla siyakubabaza,
siyakwazisa.
2. Siyakuguqela, siyakudumisa,
siyakubonga ngenxa yobukhosi, yobukhosi. 3. Nkosi Jesu Kristu Ndodana ezelwe yodwa, Nkosi Nkulunkulu Mvana kaNkulunkulu.
Ndodana kaNkulu, kaNkulunkulu uYise. 4. Wena osusa izono zomhlaba,
sihawukele, Wena ohlezi kwesokunene sikaYihlo
zwana ukukhala kwethu.
5. Ngoba nguwe, wedwa oNgcwele,
nguwe wedwa oyiNkosi,
nguwe wedwa onguPhezukonke, wena Jesu Kristu. 6. Undawonye loMoya oNgcwele,
ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu uBaba. Amen.
U.title: Udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Udumâ`alube kuNkulunkulu, Udumâ`alube kweliphezulu;
kube, lokuthula emhlabeni;
eba, ebantwi-ni bakhe. (2x)
1. Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Nkosi yasezulwini;
Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla.
Siyakubabaza, Siyakwazisa;
Siyakuguqela, Siyakudumisa.
Siyakubonga ngenxa yobukhosi bakho; Obukhulu Nkosi Jesu Kristu. Udumo alube...
2. Ndodana ezelwe yodwa, ezelwe yodwa,
Nkosi Nkulunkulu.
Mvana kaNkulunkulu, Ndodana kaYise; Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla.
Wenâ`osusâ`izono, izono zomhlaba;
Sihawukele; Sihawukele Nkosi. Udumo alube...
3. Wenâ`ohlezi kwesokunene sikaYihlo
Zwana ukukhala kwethu.
Nguwe wedwâ`oNgcwele, nguwedâ`oyiNkosi; Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla. Udumo alube...
4. UngoPhezukonke, Wena Jesu Kristu: Undawonye loMoya oNgcwele. Ebukhosini buka, Nkulunkulu Baba: Nkulunkulu Baba Amen. Udumo alube...
W. D. Hlabano
U.title: Udumâ`alube kuNkulunkulu (554)

U.lyrics:
1. Uduma lu-be kuNkulunkulu, Udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu Uduma lu-be kweliphezulu, Udumo kalube kweliphezulu.
2. Kube lokuthula laphâ`emhlabeni, Kube laphâ`emhlabeni
Kube lokuthula ebantwini bakhe. (2x)
3. Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu, Nkosi yasezulwini.
4. Nkulunkulu Baba, Baba Somandla, Nkulunkulu Baba Somandla Siyakubabaza siyakwazisa. (2x)
5. Siyakuguqela, siyakudumisa, (2x) Siyakubonga ngenxa yobukhosi. (2x)
6. Ngenxa yobukhosi bakhâ`obukhulu, (2x) Siyakubonga Nkosi Jesu Kristu. (2x)
7. Ndodana ezelwe yodwa, ezelwe yodwa. (2x) Nkosi Nkulunkulu, Mvana kaNkulunkulu. (2x)
8. Ndodana kaNkulunkulu uYise, (2x) wena osusa izono zomhlaba. (2x)
9. Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele, Sihawukele.
10. Wena ohlezi kwesokunene, (2x) kwesokunene esikaYihlo. (2x)
11. Zwana ukukhala, ukukhala kwethu. (2x) Ngoba nguwe wedwa, wedwa ongcwele. (2x)
12. Nguwe wena wedwa, wedwa oyiNkosi. (2x) Nguwe wena wedwa onguPhezu konke. (2x)
13. Wena Jesu Kristu, wena undawonye, (2x) loMoya oNgcwele ebukhosini (2x)
14. Ebukhosini bukaNkulunkulu, (2x) bukaNkulunkulu uBaba. Amen. (2x)
U.title: Udumo kalube (634)

U.lyrics:
1. INkosi inguMalusi wami, angiyikuswela lutho, ingihlalise endaweni elamadlelo.
2. Ingisa emanzini akholisayo, iqinisa umphefumulo wami.
3. Ingihambisa ezindleleni zokulunga, ngenxa yebizo layo.
4. Loba ngingaze ngihambe ethunzini lokufa, angiyikwesaba okubi ngoba wena ulami.
5. Okuhle lesihawu, kuzakungilandela, zonkâ`izinsuku zokuphila kwami.
6. Ngize ngihlale endlini yeNkosi, insuku ngensuku.
7. Udumo alube kuYise beleNdodana, loMoya oNgcwele.
8. Njengoba kwakunjalo ekuqaleni, kusenjalo khathesi, kuzakuba njalo kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
U.title: Untitled6

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu wathi, kakusibo bonke, abatshoyo kimi ukuthi Nkosi Nkosi.
Abazangena, embusweni wezulu. (2x) Kakusibo bonke...
Kodwa kuphela owenza, intando kaBaba osezulwini, intando kaBaba, kuphela owenza, intando kaBaba osezulwini, uzakungena.
1. Lizakubazi ngezithelo zabo.
2. Isihlahla esihle, singethelâ`okubi. 3. Lesihlahla esibi, singethelâ`okuhle.
(c/f Mat 7,21-23) M. Chifana
U.title: UJesu wathi kakusibo bonke (225)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu, uJesu wathi kubo,
lina, lina lithi ngingubani?
1. USimoni Phetro waphendula wathi, unguKristu
unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, ophilayo.
2. Ubusisiwe wena Simoni kaJona, ngoba inyama legazi akukwembulelanga, kodwa uBaba osezulwini, kodwa uBaba osezulwini.
3. Lamike, ngithi kuwe, wena unguPhetro, okuyikuthi idwala okuyikuthi idwala.
Phezu kwalelidwala ngizakwakha iBandla lami.
4. Amasango endawo yabafileyo, kawayikulahlula, ngizakunika amakhiye, ombuso wezulu.
5. Lokho ozakubopha emhlabeni, kuzakuba kubotshiwe lasezulwini, ozakukhulula emhlabeni kuzakukhululwa lasezulwini.
c/f Mat 16,13-19) S. Dube
U.title: UJesu wathi kubo (226)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Umphefumulo wami
uyayidumisa iNkosi, uyayidumisa iNkosi. 1. Lomoya wami uyathokoza,
ngoNkulunkulu uMsilisi wami; (2x) 2. Ngoba yena uhawukele,
ubuphansi bencekukazi yakhe; (2x) 3. NgobuSomandla ungenzele,
izintwâ`ezinkulu ngiyamdumisa,
ibizo lakhe lingcwele. Chorus: 4. Isâ`hawu sakhe kuzizukulwane,
zalabo abamesabayo (2x)
5. Wenzile mandla ngengalo yakhe,
uhlakazile abazigqajayo, ekunakaneni kwenhliziyo zabo.
6. Wehlisâ`amkhosâ`ezihlalweni, uphakamisilâ`abantukazana; (2x) Chorus:
7. Abalambileyo basuthisiwe, abanothileyo baxotshwa beze; (2x)
8. Uyisizile inceku yakhe, ekhumbula, isihawu sakhe; (2x)
9. Njengokuthembisa kubokhokho, ukuthâ`uzakuba lesihawu,
kuAbrahama lenzalweni yakhe. Chorus:
(c/ f Luka 1, 46-55) M. Majahana
U.title: Umphefumulo wami (264)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu wathi: uba ekhona owomileyo
keze kimi, kimi anathe keze kimi kimi anathe.
1. Woza Mlungisi wakho konke; ubusisâ`imnikelo yethu le.
2. Siyethula kuwe ngokuzithoba, ukuzâ`ibizo lakho lidunyiswe.
3. Yamukelâ`impilo yethu yonke, lakho konke esilakho, kanye lomhlabiso lo.
4. Sifake ekhwapheni lakho,
sihlale khona size sifike ezulwini.
(c/f Joha 7,37;Isa 55,1) J. Masotsha
U.title: UJesu wathi (144)

U.lyrics:
uNgcwele Nkosi Nkulunkulu wamaxuku (2x) Izulu lomhlaba kugcwelâ`ubukhosi bakho, hosana kweliphezulu. (2x)
Ubusisiwâ`ozayo ngebizo leNkosi,
hosana kweliphezulu.(2x)
UNgcwele, uNgcwele,
uNgcwele Nkosi Nkulunkulu wamaxuku (2x)
J. Ngulube
U.title: UNgcwele, uNgcwele,

U.lyrics:
UNgcwele, uNgcwele, uNgcwele ...
UNgcwele, uNgcwelâ`uNgcwele
UNgcwele, uNgcwele 2x
Izulu lomhlaba kugcwele ubukhosi bakho, uNgcwele. Hosana kweliphezulu hosana, uNgcwele. Ubusisiwâ`ozayo ngebizo leNkosi, uNgcwele.

Hosana kweliphezulu hosana, uNgcwele. UNgcwele, uNgcwele, uNgcwele, uNgcwele UNgcwele, uNgcwelâ`uNgcwele, uNgcwele.
U.title: UNgcwele

U.lyrics:
UNgcwelâ`uNgcwele, uNgcwele, Nkosi Nkulunkulu (2x) UNgcwelâ`uNgcwele, uNgcwele, Nkosi Nkulunkulu
wamaxuku. (2x) Izulu lomhlaba, lomhlaba, kugcwelâ`ubukhosi bakho (2x)
Hosana, hosana, hosana, hosana, hosana, kweliphezulu (2x)
Ubusisiwâ`ozayo, ozayo ngebizo leNkosi, ubusisiwe ozayo, ozayo ngebizo leNkosi (2x)
Hosana, hosana, hosana hosana, hosana,
kweliphezulu (2x) P. Ndlovu
U.title: UNgcwele

U.lyrics:
UNgcwele uNgcwele Nkosi Nkulunkulu Ngcwele Ngcwele Ngcwele Ngcwele Nkosi
Nkulunkulu wamaxuku Izulu lomhlaba kugcwele ubukhosi bakho
zulu lomhlaba, ubukhosi, ubukhosi, bukhosi bakho. Hosana, hosana, hosana kweliphezulu,
hosana kweliphezulu
Ubusisiwe ozayo ngebizo
ubusisiwe oza ngebizo, oza ngebizo leNkosi Hosana, hosana, hosana
hosana hosana kweliphezulu hosana (2x) Busisiwe ozayo ubusisiwe, oza ngebizo leNkosi.
U.title: UNgcwele

U.lyrics:
UJesu Kristu, nguye owasifela UKristu, nguye owavuka,
UKristu, uzabuya njalo. (2x)
J. Magugu
U.title: UJesu Kristu nguye owasifela (528)

U.lyrics:
UKristu, uKristu wasifela UKristu, uKristu wavuka UKristu, uKristu uzabuya njalo.
 S. Magonya
U.title: UKristu wasifela (630)

U.lyrics:
1. UMzimba weNkosi
Ususa izono
Izono zonke zomhlaba. 2. IGazi leMvana
Ligezisi zono,
Izono zonke zomhlaba.

S. Magonya
U.title: UMzimba weNkosi (648)

U.lyrics:
1. UJesu wasifela, ngomusâ`esiphambanweni.
Wakhokha inhlawulo, yezono zethu zonke. E! Mvana ekaNkulunkulu, eyasifela sonke. Usigezisâ`izono, ngeGazi lakhwâ`elihle.
2. EAlitharenâ`uphinda, wonâ`umthethelo lowo, omuhle isibili. Wasesiphambanweni,
Jesu Msindisi wethu, owazidela ngathi, nanzâ`inhliziyo zethu, zithathe zibâ`engezakho.
U.title: UJesu wasifela

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Ungamandla Nkulunkulu, ungamandla enhliziyo yami,
lesabelo, lesabelo sami kuze kube nininini. 1. Uzakungihola, ngeseluleko sakho;
kuze kube nininini.
2. Emva kwalokho, ungamukele ebukhosini, kuze... 3. Kakukhwâ`engikufisayo, emhlabeni ngaphandle
kwakho, kuze... ngihlale lawe njalo, kuze...
4. Labâ`abakhatshana lawe, bazakubhubha kuze...
uzakubachitha bonke, abangathembekanga kuwe,
kuze...
5. Mina kungilungele, ukuba seduze loNkulunkulu,
kuze...
ukuze ngitshumayele zonkâ`izenzo zakhe, kuze...
(c/f Hubo 16,2-10) M. Chifana
U.title: Ungamandla (227)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Uyababazeka wena, Nkosi, udumiseka kuze kube laphakade.
1. Wasinika isinkwa sasezulwini, esilobumnandi bonke. 2. Wathi: Thathani lidle, lokhu kunguMzimba wami,
thathani linathe, lokhu kuliGazi lami.
3. Wathi: Odla iNyama yami, anathe iGazi lami,
uzaphila kuze kube laphakade.
4. Siyakubonga Nkosi Baba wasezulwini,
siyavuma phambi kwabantu bonke
ngoba usenzela isihawu sakho.
5. Dumisani iNkosi lina zithunywa zasezulwini,
liyibabaze kuze kube laphakade. 6. Dumisani iNkosi lina zizwe zonke,
liyibabaze lina Bantu lonke. 
7. Udumo alube kuYise, beleNdodana loMoya oNgcwele. 8. Njengoba kwakunjalo ekuqaleni, kusenjalo lakhathesi,
kuzakuba njalo kuze kube laphakade. Amen.
B. Ndlovu
U.title: Uyababazeka Wena Nkosi

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Ngilinika, ngilinika, umlayo omutsha, wokuba, wokuba lithandane,
njengalokhu, njengalokhu, ngilithandile.
lani, lani lithandane.
1. Umuntu uzatshiyâ`uyise lonina, anamathele
kumkakhe, bobabili, bazakuba nyamanye. 2. Ngalokhu, bazakwazi ukuthi,
lingabafundi bami, aluba lithandana.
(c / f Joha 13,34; Mat 19,5) S. Dube
U.title: Umuntu uzakutshiyâ`uyise lonina (186)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UNkulunkulu akubophileyo, makungakhululwa muntu. (5x) 1. Asâ`ambeni siyâ`eKana, loMariya loJesu,
siyebona lowomtshado. Makungakhululwa muntu... 2. Suka, Sathanâ`emuva kwabo, yekelela izithunywa,
loJesu iNkosi yabo. Makungakhululwa...
3. Babusise Nkosi Jesu, busisâ`abantwana bakho,
hlala phakathi kwabo, Jesu. Makungakhululwa... (c/f Mat 19,6) S. Mazalu
U.title: Untitled7

U.lyrics:
Chorus: 1. Bass:
UNkulunkulu akubophileyo makungakhululwa muntu. (2x) UNku, Nkulunkulu, akubophileyo makungakhululwa loba loba ngubani. Thandanani loba liseku jabuleni. Thandanani loba liseku-hluphekeni.
2. Wena myeni, thanda inkosi-kazi yakho.
Wena mlobokazi, hloniphâ`umyeni wakho.
Alto: Philani, philani impilo yamakholwa. (2x) Bass: Philani, philani, philani, philani impilo
yamakholwa. (2x)
3. Bekezelani lapho lihlangana lobunzima.
Thembelani eNkosini, eNkosini uNkulunkulu.
4. Fundisanâ` ingane zenu ukuthandâ`uNkulunkulu.
Fundisanâ` ingane zenu ukumthembâ`uNkulunkulu.
5. Fundisanâ`ingane zenu ukukholwa kuNkulunkulu.
Fundisanâ`ingane zenu ukumkhonzâ`uNkulunkulu.
6. Thandanani lize lehlukaniswe yikufa. (2x)
(c / f Mat 19,6) S. F. Dube
U.title: UNkulunkulu akubophileyo (538)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Nansâ`isiphiwo, isiphiwo seNkosi. Bass: Nansi, Asibongenâ`umusa wayo! Bass: Nansi nansi,
Nansi siphiwo, isiphiwo seNkosi,â` Nansi,
asibongenâ`umusa wayo.
1. S: Nikela ngenhliziyo yonke izinkwa lewayini,
eNkosini ekukhethileyo. Nansi nansi.
2. B: Ongathandi uYise loNina ongakâ`abe ngumfundi wami,
kutsho iNkosi. Nansi nansi.
3. B: Yalusâ`izimvu zami, uzise emadlelweni aluhlaza,
kutsho iNkosi. Nansi nansi.
A. Tshabalala
U.title: Untitled8

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu uthi: ngilandelani,
Bass: ngizakulenza libe ngabagoli babantu.
1. Isivuno sikhulu, kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana. 2. Ngakho-ke celani eNkosini yokuvuna,
ukuba ithumele izisebenzi esivunweni sayo.
3. Uba umuntu ethanda ukungilandela kazidele, athathe isiphambano sakhe insuku ngensuku
angilandele. . Lowo lalowo othanda ukusila kwakhe,
kuzakumlahlekela..
5. Olahlekelwa yikusila kwakhe ngenxa yami,
uzakufumana..
6. Kusizani ukuba umuntu azuze umhlaba wonke,
kodwa yena uqobo alahlwe.
7. Dumisani iNkosi lina zizwe zonke,
liyibabaze lina Bantu lonke.
8. Ngoba uthando lwayo olungapheliyo lukhulu kithi,
lobuqotho beNkosi bumi kuze kube nininini.
(c/f Mat 4,18-22;10,39;Luka 9,23-26;10,2-3) P. A. Ndlovu
U.title: UJesu uthi ngilandelani (224)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Nkulunkulu, Baba, Somandla, Nkosi yezulu lomhlaba,
nangumntanakho uyazinikela. 1. Uyazinikela kuwe Baba,
abe ngumelusi wezimvu zakho, Nkulunkulu Baba... 2. Hamba laye Baba,
abe nguMelusi wezimvu zakho, Nkulunkulu Baba... 3. Azeluse Baba eBandleni,
eBandleni lakho, Nkulunkulu Baba... 4. Umphathise Baba emsebenzini,
ombizele wona, Nkulunkulu Baba... 5. Umvikele Baba ezingozini zonke,
emsebenzini wakhe, Nkulunkulu Baba... 6. Isivuno sikhulu, kodwa izisebenzi zisengcosana, Nkulunkulu Baba...

F. Mpofu
U.title: Uyazinikela kuwe Baba

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Akukho okungasehlukanisa lothando lukaKristu. (2x)
1. Kungaba ngumango, kumbâ`isizungu uzasiduduza. 2. Noma indlala lokuhambaze, uzasisekela.
3. Kungaba usizi lezingozi, uzasisekela.
4. Noma izifo lezilingo, uzasisindisa.
5. Kungaba yikufa lokuzingelwa, uzasilondoloza.
A. Saco, svd
U.title: Untitled9

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Kabakubonge, abantu bakho, Nkosi, Nkulunkulu, emhlabeni wonke.
1. Nkosi, wasithumela ilizwi lakho, ukuba lisiqondise empilweni yethu.
2. Limnandi ilizwi lakho, sizalitshumayela silifundise.
3. Nkosi Jesu Kristu,
akâ`wenze sithole ukusila emhlabeni.
4. Nkosi, wena wathi,
ozwa ilizwi lakho aligcine uzahlala kuwe.
U.title: Untitled10

U.lyrics:
1. Ubagcine kuhle, abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x) Ubalondoloze kokuphela.
2. Ubathande bonke, abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x) 3. Ubalondoloze, abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x)
4. Ubajabulise, abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x)
5. Ubathokozise, abantu bakho Nkosi. (3x)
W. Hlabano
U.title: Ubagcine kuhle (223)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: UJesu uyanginakekela, uJesu uyanginakekela (2x)
1. Ungumalusi wami,
angiyikuswela lutho - uyanginakekela
2. Ungondla ngokudlâ`okusuthisayo komphefumulo wami - uyanginakekela.
3. Wangifelâ`esiphambanweni,
ukuze ngithole ukuphila - uyanginakekela.
4. Wangikhuphâ`ebumnyameni,
manje sengisekukhanyeni - uyanginakekela.
5. UMsindisi wami,
uzohlala lami njalo - uyanginakekela.
C. Zikhali
U.title: UJesu uyanginakekela (570)

U.lyrics:
1. UJesu wabafelâ`abantu, zonkâ`izizwe emhlabeni, abamhlophe labamnyama mabalazi lalibizâ`uJesu abafela bonke labantwana.
2. UJesu wababathandâ`abantu, zonkâ`izizwe emhlabeni, abamhlophe labamnyama mabalazi
lelibizâ`Jesu wabathandi bonke labantwana.
U.title: UJesu wabafelâ`abantu

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Ungikhumbule, Nkosi yamâ`. (3x)
1. Nkosi, ngiyakudinga, wena Nkulunkulu wami.
Umoya womele wena, inhliziyo iyalangatha.
2. Ngakho-ke ngiyakhangela, endaweni eyingcwele;
ngibona amandla akho, kanye lobukhosi bakho.
3. Uthando lwakho lukhulu, lungcono kulokuphila.
Umlomo uyababaza, udumo lwakhâ`olukhulu4. Ngizabonga ngisaphila, ngiphakamisâ`izandla zami. Ngebizo lakho ngikhuleka, kuwe ongaMandla ami.

5. Umoya wamâ`uzasutha, ngokudlâ`okuhlabusayo; lomlomo wamâ`udumise, ngendebe ezithabayo.
6. Ngikhumbule wena Nkosi, lasekulaleni kwami: ngicabanga ngawe wedwa, ebusuku lasemini.
7. Ngoba wena ulusizo, uyembesa ngamaphiko, usindisa engozini, lasebunzimeni bonke.
8. Ngiyanamathela kuwe, wena olithemba lami, lesandla sokudla sakho, sona siyangiqinisa.
Zulu song
U.title: Ungikhumbule Nkosi (228)
UFransisi weAssisi (546)

U.lyrics:
Nkosi sihawukele
Nkosi bahawukele
awu Nkosi, awu Nkosi bahawukele (2x)
Kristu bahawukele
awu Kristu, awu Kristu bahawukele (2x)
Nkosi bahawukele
awu Nkosi, awu Nkosi bahawukele (2x)
U.title: Untitled11

U.lyrics:
1. Cantor: Uya, kwazi yini, ungumhambi,

Bonke: Uyakwazi yini, ukuthi ungumhambi? emhlabeni, kawukho umuzi,
Lapha emhlabeni. Kawukho umuzi Cantor: Jesu wami, Jesu, ngisize ngifike, 
Bonke: Jesu wami, Jesu Ngisi
kulelo ikhaya, ngelakufa!
ze ngifikâ`e khaya! Bonke: elingelakufa!
2. Wathe, mbisa wathi, sibe lawe. Wathembisa wathi, ufuna sibe lawe okaYihlo, ongelandubeko. Jesu wami
emzini kaYihlo ongelandubeko. 3. Baba, bahawukele, belophawu,
bahawukele bonke, abafa belophawu, babhabhathizwa, eBizweni lakho, Jesu wami lokubhabhathizwa, eBizweni lakho.
4. Izi, hlobo zethu, tshiyileyo,
Izihlobo zethu ezisitshiyileyo ekhayâ`elimandi, Jesu wami, Jesu. zamukele ekhayâ`elimnandi. Akuzamukele.
5. Waha, kelâ`isela, thelwa - lawe, Wahawukelisela, elabethelwa lawe, lizangena, empharadisweni.
Jesu wami
6. Siha, sihawukele, kulumhlaba, sihawukele sonke, esisekulumhlaba, ezulwini, sihlale, lanini, Jesu wami - Jesu sifikâ`ezulwini, sihlalelanini.
7. Aku, baduduze, ubelabo,
Akâ`ubaduduze, bonke - abafelweyo, londoloze, lezimuli - zabo. Jesu - wami, Jesu. Ubalondoloze, lezimuli zabo.
B. Ndlovu (Tswana melody)
U.title: Ungumhambi lapha emhlabeni (571)

U.lyrics:
Chorus: Uthuli, uthuli lubuyela othulini
lapho olwavela khona,
umoya ubuyela kuNkulunkulu owawufaka emuntwini (2x)
1. Hamba kuhle, hamba kuhle sihlobo sethu, ngoba usususiwe phakathi kwethu (2x)
2. Kawujabule umphefumulo wakho, ngoba usuphumile kulolusizi (2x)
3. O! sobonana kwelizayo ezulwini lapho sothokoza laye uJesu.
S. Moyo
U.title: Uthuli (607)

U.lyrics:
Chorus:
Sithumela Nkosi
ekuthumeni kwakho uMoya wakho UMoyâ`oNgcwele
ekuthumeni kwakho uMoya oNgcwele Nko-si
Konke kuyadalwa wenza umhlaba ube mutsha (2x) 1. Woza Moya wokuhlakanipha, usenze sihlakaniphele
izinto zokoMoya, sitshisekele okwasezulwini.
2. Woza Moya wokuqedisisa, uvule ingqondo zethu
ukuze sizwisise imfundiswâ`engcwele.
3. Woza Moya wokweluleka, uqondise inhliziyo zethu
ukuze sithande okuhle sizonde okubi.
4. Woza Moya wesibindi, uqinise inhliziyo zethu
singalahli ithemba, ekulingweni lasebunzimeni.
5. Woza Moya wolwazi, siboni intando kaNkulunkulu,
kukho konke okusiveleleyo kulumhlaba. 6. Woza Moya wokulunga, usiphe ukulunga,
lobungcwele, empilweni zethu ukuze siye ezulwini. 7. Woza Moya wokwesabâ`iNkosi ugcwalise inhliziyo
zethu, ngokwesaba uNkulunkulu, singephuli imilayo yakhe.
N. Lunga.
U.title: Ukucela izipho zikaMoya oNgcwele

U.lyrics:
Chorus: 
Chant: Udumo kalube lakiyo
Sop: Alt,Bas: KuNkulunkulu iNdodana kanye loMoya oyiNgcwele
Tenor:  Kweliphezulu Kweliphezulu Kuzekubenininini
Chant: Ukuthula Ukuthula Ukuthula Emhlabeni Kini lonke Emhlabeni lasezulwini
Tenor: Emhlabeni Emhlabeni Kuzekubenininini
Khangela amavesi alingoma kukhasi 
Sr. C. Nyoni
U.title: Udumo

V.lyrics:
Chorus: Vukani, makholwa! Vukani, lilinde, ngobâ`ukukhanya kweNkosi kusondele (2x)
1. Nanzi, izindaba, ezinhle, zokukhululwa kwethu; Sizakukhululwa, ebugqilini, bezono zomhlaba.
2. Asilungise izindlela zeNkosi sizihlambulule; Ngoba sizabona umusa lothando lweNkosi.
3. Inkazimulo, kaKristu, isikhanya phezu kwethu; umnyama osibekele umhlaba, umhlaba uyedlula.
4. UKristu uzafika enguMhlengi, wezizwe zonke; Wozani sibonge uNkulunkulu ngeNdodana yakhe.
M. Mkandla
V.title: Vukani makholwa!

V.lyrics:
Chorus: Vulekani, kungene iNkosi yenkazimulo; kungene iNkosi yenkazimulo, kungene iNkosi.
1. Lina minyango emidala.
2. Ngubani liNkosi yenkazimulo na? 3. NguJesu iNkosi yenkazimulo.
4. NguNkulunkulu iNkosi uSomandla. 5. Hosana kweliphezulu.
6. Ubusisiwe wena ozayo!
7. Ugcwele uthando lesihawu.
A. Gwenelo
V.title: Vulekani

V.lyrics:
Chorus: Vuka , ekufeni vuka, ekufeni, uKristu uzakukhanyisela, Kristu,
uKristu uzakukhanyisela.
1. Phaphama wena oleleyo, uvuke kwabafileyo. 2. Wena osemnyameni, wozake eNkosini.
3. Nxa ufuna ukukhanya, iNkosi iyakubiza.
D. Moyo
V.title: Vuka ekufeni (114)

V.lyrics:
Chorus: Vumelani, vumelani abantwana, abantwana
beze kimi, beze kimi
Vumelani abantwana beze kimi. 1. Onina ba, onina balethâ`abantwana. kuJesuâ`uku, kuJesâ`ukubâ`ababusise.
2. Abafundi, abafundi bakhe bazonda. Babakhuza, babakhuza, babanqabela. 3. Kodwâ`uJesu, kodwâ`uJesu ebona lokho.
Wabakhali, wabakhalimela esithi:
4. Lingabanqa, lingabanqabelâ`abantwana.
Beze kimi, beze kimi bahlala lami.
5. Ngobâ`umbuso, ngobâ`umbuso kaNkulunkulu.
Ungowabo, ungowabo labancinyane.
6. Phendukani, phendukani libe njengabo.
Lizangena, lizangenâ`embusweni wami. 7. Wabagona, wabagona, wababusisa.
Wabavalelisa, wabavalelisa ngomusa.
8. Abantwana, abantwana bonke bahamba.
Bahlabela, bahlabelâ`amazwi kaJesu. 
9. Mariya ma, Mariya mamâ`othandekayo. usilondo, usilondoloze loJesu.
(c/f Mat 19,13-15; Luka 18,15-17) J. Villescas
V.title: Vumelani abantwana

V.lyrics:
Chorus: Vuma Nkosi, vuma Nkosi,
vuma Nkosi sidle uMzimba wakho.
Vuma Nkosi, vuma Nkosi,
vuma Nkosi sinathâ`iGazi lakho.
1. Siphe Nkosi iMana yakho, sitholâ`ukuphila; Vuma... 2. Busisa abaholâ`iBandla, sibusise lathi; Vuma...
3. Sixolele izono zethu, sitholâ`ukuphila; Vuma...
4. Busisa ilizwe lakithi, sitholâ`ukuthula; Vuma...
5. Siphe intelezi Nkosi yethu, siphephâ`engozini; Vuma...
(c/f Joha 6,31-36) S. Mazalu
V.title: Vuma Nkosi (175)

X.lyrics:
1. Xola Jesu, O! sonile! sadelelâ`ilizwi lakho, Asisafanelâ`ukuba, size ebusweni bakho.
2. Xola Jesu, siyakhala inyembezi phambi kwakho, ngoba sesilamacala, thinâ`esithi singabakho.
3. Xola Jesu, sesibuya, samukele ngomsa wakho, Akusixolelâ`izono, esazenza phambi kwakho.
4. Xola Jesu, Nkosi yethu, ngenxa yomsa wakhâ`omkhulu. Siqinise singaphindi silukhohlâ`uthando lwakho.
X.title: Xola Jesu O! sonile (115)

W.lyrics:
1. Woza, woza, Emanuweli, sikulindele, sikubone. Kade sabotshwa ngamacala: USathane wasikhohlisa. Chorus: Woza, woza, Emanuweli, usisindise,
usisize. (2x)
2. Woza, woza Nkosi yethu, sikhonze kuwe kokuphela.
Silondoloze imithetho: Sibe ngabantwabakho sonke. 3. Woza, woza Jesu wethu, akusiqinise ngamandla,
eSakramente leAlithare, elinguMzimba wakhâ`omuhle
W.title: Woza, woza Emanuweli
Wozani bantwana

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani makholwa, thokozani lamhla, wozani, asiye eBetlehema.
Lamhla kuzelwe oyiNkosi yethu.
Chorus: Asiye sikhuleke, asiye sikhuleke, asiye sikhuleke kuKristu!
2. INkosâ`elamandla, yehla ezulwini, ilelâ`emgwembeni eBetlehema! Nguye luMntwana ozasisindisa.
3. Wozani simkhonze, kanye lezithunywa, ezimhlabelela eBetlehema.
Nanku umgwembe alaliswe kiwo!
4. E! nangu uNina, nangâ`uMondli wakhe, beguqa ngakuye eBetlehema. Nampâ`abelusi bekhuleka kuye.
W.title: Wozani makholwa

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani sisondele, ngasesiphambanweni; simbone uMsindisi obethelelwe thina. Bonanâ`umzimba wakhe, utshaywe kabuhlungu; usumanxebanxeba, uphumâ`iGazi wonke!
2. Ikhanda liqheliswe, ngameva abuhlungu; izandla lezinyawo lazoke zibethelwe. Kantâ`uyabekezela, uhluphekela thina, ufelâ`esiphambanweni, ngothando olukhulu.
3. Msindisi wethâ`omuhle, ngubani olecala, lokufa kwakho lokho? Yithi abayizoni!
O! Jesâ`othandekayo, angathi ngingakhala ngezono zami zonke, owafa ngenxa yazo.
W.title: Wozani sisondele

W.lyrics:
1. Woza, woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhe, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Sipha, sipha ukuhlakanipha, sinxwanele, sinxwanelâ`okuhle kodwa.
Chorus: Woza, Moya, woza kithi Moya, Moya woza kithi. Moya, Moya, woza kithi Moya, Moya oyiNgcwele.
2. Siqondise, siqondise imfundiso, lemithetho, lemithetho yakho yonke. Seluleka, seluleka Mthokozisi, sikhalima, sikhalima nxa siduha.
3. Bona, bona sibuthakathaka, akusiqi, akusiqinise thina. Akusenze, akusenze sazi njalo, yonke, yonkâ`indlela yokusila.
4. Wena, wena Moya wokulunga, zilungisi, zilungisâ`intando zethu. Moya, Moya wokwesabâ`iNkosi, silahlise, silahlise konkâ`okubi.
L. Sidambe
W.title: Woza kithi Moya

W.lyrics:
1. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Siphe ukuhlakanipha, sinxwanelâ`okuhle kodwa. Woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele.
2. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Siqondise imfundiso lemithetho yakho yonke. Woza... 3. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Seluleke Mthokozisi; sikhalima nxa siduha. Woza...

4. Woza kithi, MoyoNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Bona sibuthakathaka akusiqinise thina. Woza...
5. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu. Akusenze sazi nj alo, yonkâ`indlela yokusila. Woza... 6. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu.
Wena Moya wokulunga, zilungisâ`intando zethu. Woza... 7. Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele, wakhâ`enhliziyweni zethu.
Moya wokwesabâ`iNkosi silahlise konkâ`okubi. Woza...
W.title: Woza kithi, Moyâ`oNgcwele

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele. Moyâ`oNgcwele, woza kithi uhlale lathi;
B: Woza kithi uhlale lathi
Hlala kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele, Moyâ`oNgcwele Hlala lathi njalonjalo.
B: Woza; Moyâ`oNgcwele. Hlala lathi njalo njalo.
B: Woza Moya oNgcwele. Hlala lathi njalo njalo. 1. Sipha ukuhlakanipha, sinxwanelâ`okuhle kodwa. 2. Siqondise imfundiso, lemithetho yakho yonke. 3. Seluleke Mthokozisi, sikhalima nxa siduha.
4. Bona sibuthakathaka, akusiqinise thina.
5. Akusenze sazi njalo, yonkâ`indlela yokusila.
6. Wens Moya wokulunga, zilungisâ`intando zethu.
N. Lunga
W.title: Woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele (510)

W.lyrics:
1. Woza Moya oNgcwele; phefumulela umhlaba; aleluya, aleluya.
Kukhanya kwakhâ`okuhle; ilangabi lothando; aleluya, aleluya.
Chorus: Aleluya. (4x)
2. Woza Yise wabayanga; woza muphi wezipho;
Mkhanyisi wenhliziyo; mlondolozi oqotho.
3. Sethekeli senhliziyo; kuthulâ`okuhlabusayo; Sidiniwe siphumuze; siyakhala sithulise.
4. Kukhanya okuNgcwele; Kukhanya kobuNkulunkulu Mngane womphefumulo; Mncedisi ophilayo;
5. Gcwalisa inhliziyo, zamakholwa akho. Uma Wena ungekho; umuntu kalamandla.
6. Gezisâ`okungcolileyo; nathisa abomileyo; Pholisa amanxeba; phendula ubukhuni.
7. Basela okuqandayo; qondisa okulahlekayo; Phana abakholwayo, iziphâ`eziyisikhombisa.
8. Siqondile, kulâ`omvuzo; singafa siyangeniswa, ezulwini lakho, siphile okulaphakade.
B. Ndlovu
W.title: Woza Moya oNgcwele phefumelela umhlaba

W.lyrics:
1. Woza Moya oNgcwele, Moya oNgcwele, woza hlala kithi, Mkhanyiseli wethu. (2x) Ngenâ`ezinhliziyweni zethu, ngena hlala, wakhe, Mduduzi Moya wokuphila. (2x)
2. Ungaphi Moyâ`oNgcwele? Sicelâ`ukukhanyiselwa. 3. Yehlake Moyâ`oNgcwele! Siphe ukuhlakanipha.
4. Ungekho singenzani? Nguwe uMkhokheli wethu. 5. Uhlale lathi njalo, size sifikâ`ezulwini.
B. Ncube
W.title: Woza Moya Mkhanyiseli wethu

W.lyrics:
1. Woza Moya oNgcwele, Woza woza Moya oyiNgcwele, Bass: Woza, woza, woza, woza
Moya wokulunga, woza siqinise usiphe isibindi.
siginise siginise.
2. Moya weqiniso, Woza, woza...
Moya weqiniso, Moya wokulunga, Woza, woza...
3. Moya wokukhanya, Woza, woza,
Moya wokukhanya, usikhanyisele, Woza,woza...
4. Mzimeli wesiThathu, Woza, woza,
hlala kithi wena, wena oyiNgcwele, Woza, woza...
5. BuThathu obuNgcwele, Woza, woza,
Nkosi yeqiniso, Nkosi yeqiniso, Woza, woza...
W. Hlabano
W.title: Woza Moya wokulunga

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Woza, woza, Moyâ`oNgcwele! (2x)
1. Emva kwensukâ`ezilitshumi uJesu enyukele ezulwini. 2. AmaJuda agcina usuku olukhulu lwePhentekoste. 3. Abaphostoli babebuthene ndawonye bekhuleka.
4. Kwasekuzwakala ukuduma okukhulu kuvela ezulwini. 5. Kwezwakala kungathi yikuduma koMoya omkhulu. 6. Kwagcwala indlu yonke ababehlezi kiyo.
7. Khonapho basebebona indimi ezahlukeneyo kungathi
ngezomlilo. 8. Zahlala phezu komunye lomunye wabo.
9. Bonke basebegcwala uMoya oNgcwele. 10. Baqalisa ukukhuluma indimi ngendimi.
B. Ndlovu
W.title: Woza, Woza Moya oNgcwele

W.lyrics:
1. Wehla ezulwini, Hosana hosana weza emhlabeni, Hosana hosana waba ngumuntu, Hosana hosana kuwe Mvana kaNkulunkulu.
Alto: Ndodana hosana weza emhlabeni,
waba ngumuntu! Hosana hosana Ndodana Ndodana.
2. Wafelâ`izizwe zonke, walethâ`umusa wonke, kaNkulunkulâ`uBaba!
3. Wakhwelâ`indundubala, wenyukelâ`ezulwini, kuNkulunkulâ`uBaba!
4. Wathumâ`uMoyâ`oNgcwele, eBandleni lakho, uNkulunkulâ`uMoya!
5. Lungisâ`indawo yethu, ezulwini lakho, kuNkulunkulâ`uBaba!
B. Ndlovu
W.title: Wehla ezulwini (76)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani, wozani, wozanini lonke kuJesu. (2x) Yenâ`uJesu, yenâ`uJesu, yenâ`uJesu, yenâ`uJesu kabancitshâ`abacelayo. (2x)
2. Thandananâ` thandanani, thandanani lonke kuJesu. (2x) Njengokuba, njengokuba, njengokuba,
njengokuba wasifelâ`esâ`phambanweni.
3. Celaninâ`, celanini, celanini lonke kuJesu. Konkâ`okuhle, konkâ`okuhle, okumnandi, okumnandi, sikuphiwa nguyâ`uJesu.
4. Khulekanâ`, khulekani khulekani lonke kuJesu. (2x) Ngomkhuleko, ngomkhuleko, ngomkhuleko, ngomkhuleko sizanqobâ`ekulingweni. (2x)
P. Mahlangu
W.title: Wozanini lonke kuJesu (90)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani Bantu, wozani, wozani emthonjeni (2x) 2. Emthonjeni, wami, wokuzalwa ngobutsha (2x) 3. Selizakuba, yini, ngabakaNkulunkulu (2x)
4. Selizakuba, yini, zindlalifa zezulu (2x)
W.title: Wozani emthonjeni

W.lyrics:
1. Woza, Woza, woza, Nkosi yokuthula, yokuthula, usiphe ukuthula kwakho.
Woza, Woza, woza, Nkosi yokuchuma, yokuchuma usiphe ukuchuma kwakho. Siyazisola ngezono, izono zamaphutha, Siyehluleka, (2x) ukuba lokuthula kwakho. Siyehluleka, (2x) ukuba lokuchuma kwakho.
2. Woza,Woza, Woza, Nkosi, yobumnene, yobumnene, usiphe ubumnene bakho. Woza,Woza, Woza, Nkosi yokulunga, yokulunga, usiphe ukulunga kwakho. Siyazisola ngezono, izono zamaphutha, Siyehluleka... ukuba lobumnene bakho. Siyehluleka... ukuba lokulunga kwakho.
3. Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi yothando, yothando, usiphe lonâ`uthando lwakho. Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi yoxolo, yoxolo, usiphe lonâ`uxolo lwakho.
Siyazisola ngezono, izono phambi kwakho Siyehluleka... ukuba lothando njengawe. Siyehluleka... ukuba loxolo njengawe.
4. Woza, Woza, Woza Nkosi, Nkosi yomusa, yomusa, usiphe wonâ`umusa wakho.
Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi eNgcwele, eNgcwele, usiphe ubuNgcwele bakho. Siyazisola ngezono, izono phambi kwakho Siyehluleka... ukuba lomusa njengawe. Siyehluleka... ukuba Ngcwele sinjengawe
5. Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi yamakhosi, yamakhosi, ubuse ukuphila kwethu.
Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi yaphakade, yaphakade, usise kwelilaphakade. Siyazisola ngezono, izono zesibomo Siyehluleka... ukukukhonza singakoni. Siyehluleka... ukulunga njengabaNgcwele
6. Woza, Woza, Woza, Nkosi, Nkosi yobumhlophe, yobumhlophe, usiphe ubumhlophe bakho. Woza,Woza, Woza, Nkosi,Nkosi yokucweba, yokucweba, usiphe ukucweba kwakho. Siyazisola ngezono, izono zokungcola, Siyehluleka... ukuba mhlophe kokuphela. Siyehluleka... ukuphila njengezithunywa. Akusisize, akusisize, sifikâ`ekhaya laphezulu. Akusisize, akusisize, sihlale lawe laphakade.

B. Ndlovu
W.title: Woza Nkosi yokuthula (515)

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Wozani kimi ngizakuliphumuza (2x) 1. Wozani kimi, (4x)
wozani kimi ngizakulibusisa. 2. Kalilahli, (4x)
kalilahli muntu iWundlu likaNkulunkulu. (2x)
S. Moyo
W.title: Wozani kimi ngizakuliphumuza

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Wozani, wozani lonke sizinikele eNkosini, eNkosini, wozani lonke sizinikele kuJesu. (2x)
1. Sinikele, sinikele lesisinkwa lewayini, sinikele, kube nguMzimba leGazi leNkosi.
2. Sinikele, sinikele imiphefumulo yethu, sinikele, sinikele kanye lemizimba yethu.
P. Mahlangu
W.title: Wozani lonke sizinikele (145)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozanini sinikele lesisinkwa lewayini. Kophendulwa kubâ`nguMzimba leGazi likaJesu. Sinikele loJesu, sinikele kuBaba!
Lesisinkwa lewayini, kube ngumthethelo wethu.
2. Wozanini sinikele amagugu ethu onke: awomoya lawomzimba, sinikele kuJesu. Lethanâ`izipho zenu; lilethe kuyâ`uJesu. Nikelani ngenhliziyo elilakho kuyâ`uJesu.
3. Wozanini sinikele ngenhliziyo zethu zonke. Okumnandi lokunzima okomoya lomzimba. Lethani indubeko! Lethani injabulo! lethanini konkâ`okunye elilakho kuyâ`uJesu.
B. Ndlovu
W.title: Wozanini sinikele (146)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani, sihlabele, ingoma yezithunywa,
simbonge ophezulu, simkhonze sonke sithi: Alubâ`udumo kuye. ONgcwele ngobeNgcwele, iNkosi yamakhosi, ophezu kwakho konke.
2. Siphinda nansi enye, yezithunywa sithi: Ukuthula emhlabeni kubantu bakhe bonke. E! Mvanâ`elungileyo, esusâ`izono zethu,
O! Jesu, sihawukele, usiphâ`uxolo lwakho.
W.title: Wozani sihlabele

W.lyrics:
1. Woza Jesu, woza Jesu wami,
woza Jesu, ngikwamukele, wena sithandwa, uzuhlale lami ngiyakuthanda Nkosi yami.
2. Woza Jesu, woza Jesu wami
woza Jesu, uzongelusa, wena sithandwa, wena themba lami nguwe wedwa Nkosi yami.
3. Woza Jesu, woza Jesu wami,
woza Jesu, ncedâ`impilo yami, wena sithandwa, wengeze ngamandla insuku zempilo yami4. Woza Jesu, woza Jesu wami
woza Jesu, themba labahle, wena sithandwa siza bonkâ`abantu abathemba iNkosi.
M. Nhlabano
W.title: Woza Jesu (176)

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Wozani makholwa, wozani makholwa, B. Wozanini, wozanini, eSidlweni seNkosi S: Wozani esidlweni
All: Wozani eSidlweni seNkosi (2x)
1. ISinkwa lesi singuMzimba wayo, iWayini le iliGazi layo.
2. Odla uMzimba wayo uzakuphila onatha liNkezo uzaphila njalo. 3. Othanda iNkosi uzahlala layo,
bonke abayithandayo bamanyane layo. 4. Imphefumulo yenu izakusiliswa,
imizimba yenu iqiniswe.
M. Mkandla.
W.title: Wozani lamukele (599)

W.lyrics:
1. Woza Jesu, Mhlengi wami, wakhe enhliziyweni yami. Angilakuphila mina, nxa ungekho Jesu wami.
2. Woza Jesu, Nkosi yami uzobusa kimi njalo.
Ngize ngale konkâ`okubi, ngenze konkâ`okuhle kuwe3. E!SisusasobuNgcwele,ngenzengibengcweleminasoni, wena Sinkwa sezithunywa, ngiphâ`amandla okulunga.
W.title: Woza Jesu, Mhlengi wami

W.lyrics:
1. Woza kimi lamhla, Msindisi wami.
Woza ngiyacela, woza masinya, inhliziyo yami, iyakudinga, ungafika Wena, izakuthaba. (2x).
2. Kade ngilahlile, izono zonke. Ungangideli, ngingumntanakho, woza Nkosi yami, yehla ezulwini. Lonkâ`ithemba lami, lonke likuwe. (2x)
3. Ngiyakholwa kuwe, Nkosi yezulu.
Ngiyathemba kuwe, Mdabuli wami. Baba ophezulu, ngiyakuthanda. Woza ke khathesi, ngikwamukele. (2x)
W.title: Woza kimi lamhla (177)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozani makholwa, eSidlweni;
wozani makholwa, eSidlweni seNkosi. (2x).
2. ISinkwa lesi, singuMzimba wami; iWayini le, iliGazi lami. (2x).
3. Odlayo lokhu, uzakuphila;
onathayo lokhu, uzaphila njalo. (2x).
4. Ngakho-ke, wozani lonke; ngakho-ke, lingamukele. (2x).
5. Ngakho-ke, wobani lothando; ngakho-ke, busisanani. (2x).
D. Moyo
W.title: Wozani makholwa (178)

W.lyrics:
1. Wozanini, Bantu bami, liyadubeka kulumhlaba. Wozanini, lingabophuza, ngilinike ukuthaba. Kalingazi kaliboni, ngiseduze lani lonke. Konkâ`okumnandi kukhona kimi, kakupheli
laphakade. (2x) 2. Liyesaba, lilovalo, liphambekile, liyakhala.
Ngikhohliwe izono zenu, buyanini, ngilomusa; ngiyadinga into inye, inhliziyo elothando. Angithabeli ukufa kwenu, lingabami ngingowenu.
3. Ngiyahlala endlwaneni yeAlithare, ngilimela. Sondelani lingesabi likhulume, ngilizwe kuhle. Celanini igrasiya, lona lodwa lilamandla.
Okwami konke ngizakulipha sithandane sithokoze. (2x
W.title: Wozanini Bantu bami

W.lyrics:
1. Wozanini lonke, nantâ`iSakramente, alimisâ`uJesu Kristu, size simkhumbule.
2. Nansâ`iNyama yakhe, nantâ`iGazi lakhe, oyidlayo, onathayo, uzaphila njalo.
3. Nguye osibizayo, uthi wozanini, lonkâ`elihluphekileyo, ngililulamise.
4. Sixolelâ`izono, esakona ngazo:
siqinise siphâ`amandla, singakoni futhi.
5. Sibusise Jesu, usigcine njalo;
kuze kuthi mhla sifayo, semukelwe nguwe.
W.title: Wozanini lonke (179)

W.lyrics:
Chorus: Tenor: Wena hlanyela, hlanyela ukholo,
Wena hlanyela, imihla ngemihla, qinisa ababuthakathaka, wena obiziweyo.
1. Hlanyela, hlanyela thethelela izono njengoKristu, owathethelela zonkâ`izono zomhlaba.
2. Hlanyela, zidele ungaziphileli; kodwa philela uNkulunkulu, iNkosi elodumo.
3. Hlanyela ithemba, insuku ngensuku, iNkosi izakuba lawe ize ikubusise.
4. Hlanyela uthando, lomusa, lokubobotheka, uzakwamukelwa zinhliziyo zonke, zabalungileyo.
5. Hlanyela, hlanyela, ububele, lobumnandi, uzagola imiphefumulo, ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
6. Hlanyela, hlanyela, uzwelo, lobungane, kwabalesizungu, baduduze, wena mduduzi wabo.
7. Hlanyela, tshiseka, hlanyela ukukhuthala, khuthala ungaze wadinwa, uzakuphakanyiswa.
8. Hlanyela, thokoza ngezibanga zonke,
ukuze ube ngumthokozisi wabo abantu bonke.
9. Hlanyela, hlanyela, yehlisa inyembezi,
ukuze abanye bajabule, bavume iGama leNkosi.
W. Hlabano
W.title: Wena hlanyela (191)

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Sisize, sisize, sisize
Yehla Nkosi yehlâ`uvelâ`emazulwini
uzokusisindisa.
Sisize, sisize, sisize
Sitsho njalo Sitsho njengabantu labo ababe kulindele.
1. Yehlisani, yehlisanâ`uMsindisi, yehlisani, lina mayezâ`ezulu. Siyakhala, sikhala inyembezi ezilosizi.
2. Batsho njalo, batsho njalo abantu,
batsho njalo, ababemelele yena.
UMsindisi, uMsindisâ`okwathiwa uzakufika.
3. Ezosindisa, ezosindisâ`abantu
ezonweni, ezonwenâ`zabo zonke.
Abasuse, Abasusâ`ebumnyameni bezilingo.
4. Olomusa, olomusa uBaba,
wezwâ`ukukhala, wezwâ`ukukhala kwabo. Wabathumela, wabathumelâ`iNdodanâ`uJesu Kristu.
5. Wathuma, wathuma isithunywa,
kuMariya, kuMama uMariya.
Sathi kuye, sathi uzazalâ`uMsindisi womhlaba.
6. Wavuma, wavuma uMariya,
wavuma, wathi ngiyincekukazi.
Wavuma, akwenzeke kimi, njengokutsho kwakho.
7. Wasusehla, wasumehlelâ`uMoya uMoyâ`oNgcwele, uMoya oyiNgcwele wathola, wathola iNdodana, uJesu Kristu.
P. Mahlangu
Y.title: Yehla Nkosi yehlâ`uvelâ`emazulwini

Y.lyrics:
1. Yena wathwala, izono zethu; ngoMzimba wakhe, ngoMzimba wakhe. Ukuze kuthi sesifile,
sifikekâ`ulungeni nini lanini.
2. Thina sonke, sasiduhile, njengezimvuzi, ngelamalusi. Kodwâ`iNkosi, elomusa yasixolela ebubini bethu!
3. Ngibethelwe, kanye loKristu, akuseyimi, engiphilayo. Kodwâ`uKristu, uphila kimi uyangithanda, insuku zonke.

(c/f Isa 53)A. Mahlangu
Y.title: Yena wathwala

Y.lyrics:
1. Yehla kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele, yehlâ`uvela ezulwini, khanyisâ`inhliziyo zethu; zilungise zibe mhlophe.
2. Moya kaNkulunkulu, ngenâ`enhliziyweni zethu, qinisâ`ukukholwa kwethu, ngamandla omusa wakho.
3. Kulukhuni kodwa konke, kuba mnyama njalo konke, lapho ungahlezi wena emphefumulweni yethu.
4. Woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele, uthekelâ` enhliziyweni; basa kizo zonkâ`umlilo wokuthandâ`uNkulunkulu.
Y.title: Yehla kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele

Y.lyrics:
1. Yehla kithi Moya oyiNgcwele yehlâ` uvela ezulwini. Khanyisâ`inhliziyo zethu.
Chorus: Woza kithi Moyâ`oNgcwele, Somandla thumelâ`uMoya, thumelâ`uMoya
Thumelâ`uMoya oyiNgcwele.
2. Woza kithi Moya oyiNgcwele, zilungâ`isintando zethu,
sikhalime nxa siduha.
3. Moya kaNkulunkulu ngenâ`enhliziyweni zethu,
Bona sibuthakathaka akusiqinise thina.
4. Kulukhuni kodwa konke kubamnyama, njalo konke,
lapha ungahlezi wena emphefumulweni yethu.
C. Zikhali
Y.title: Yehla kithi Moya oyiNgcwele

Y.lyrics:
1. Yehla Moya oyiNgcwele Yehlâ`uvela ezulwini.
Chorus: Thumela, thumelâ`imisebe yakho - oh, ize, izekusikhanyisela ah. (2x)
2. Yehla Moya wokulunga, Ulungisâ`ingqondo zethu.
3. Yehla Moya kaNkulunkulu, Usisizâ`ukwazâ`iNkosi.
4. Yehla Munwe kaNkulunkulu, sitshengisâ`indlela eyiyo.

P. Mthombeni
Y.title: Yehla Moya oyiNgcwele

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Yamâ`kelani, yamukelani uMoya oNgcwele. Lamhla zihla, lamhla zihlanziwâ`izono zenu. Wozanini, wozanini eJordani.
Zizahlanju, zizahlanjululwâ`izono zenu.
1. Ngenani ngesango elihle, isango leNkosi yethu. 2. Izithunywa ezaphezulu, ziyathaba ngalolu suku. 3. Woza kithi Moya oNgcwele, siqinise kokuphela. 4. Sivikele, usiphâ`amandla, simehlule uSathane.
5. Nkosi Jesu, usixolele, sixolelâ`izono zethu.
S. Mazalu
Y.title: Yamukelani uMoya oNgcwele (95)

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Yebo ngizasuka, ngibuyele kuBaba!
1. Yayikhona enye indoda, eyayila madodanâ`amabili.
Wathi omncinyane kuyise:
Baba ngipha isabelo sami.â`
2. Wasuka waya elizweni elikhatshana,
wachitha khona yonkâ`inotho yakhe.
Kwabakhona enkulu indlala, waseqalisa ukuswela. 3. Watholwa ngomunye umninipulazi,
wamelusisâ`ingulube zakhe. Wayefisa ukuthola ukudla,
kodwa kaphiwanga lokwengulube. 4. Wathi: ngizasuka ngibuyele kuBaba,
ngithi: baba ngonile ezulwini laphambi kwakho. Angisafanelâ`ukuba yindodana yakho:
ngenze ngibe ngomunye wenceku zakho.
5. Ngihawukele, Nkulunkulu ngesihawu sakho, ngobukhulu bobubele bakho. Ake ufihle ubuso bakho, ungakhangeli amacala ami.
6. Nkosi, uzwe umkhuleko wami, lokukhala kwami akufike kuwe. 7. Ungangixotshi ebusweni bakho,
lomoya wakho ungangemuki wona. 8. Nkosi, vula ezami indlebe,
lomlomo wami ubabaze udumo lwakho. 9. INkosi izwile ukucela kwami;
iNkosi yamukele umkhuleko wami.
(c/f Luka 15,11-19; Hubo 51;102;51;6) B. Ndlovu
Y.title: Yebo ngizasuka (116)

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Bass: Yamukela Nkosi.
Nkosi yamukela lesi Sinkwa.
Nkosi yamukela lewayini. Nkosi yamukela lezâ` izipho esiziletha kuwe Baba. (2x)
1. Sinikela, isinkwa lewayini yethu, Sinikela, imizimba lenhliziyo.
2. Baba Nkosi, silisa izigulani,
Baba Nkosi, sicelâ`uthando loMusa.
3. Abalambayo, basuthise ngomusa wakho, Thina sonke, sizinikela lamhlanje.

M. Matura
Y.title: Yamukela Nkosi (557)

Y.lyrics:
Yiwo lowu, uMzimba, uMzimba kaKristu, asidumise iNkosi, asidumise iNkosi.
Yilo leli, iGazi, iGazi likaKristu asidumise iNkosi, asidumise iNkosi.
P. Hlabano
Y.title: Yiwo lowu (529)

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Yamukelani nansi inceku yenu esithethwe
kulumhlaba (2x)
Bass: Yemukelani nansi inceku yenu... kulumhlaba, 1. Lina zithunywa limcelele kuJesu Kristu,
lakuMoya oyiNgcwele abaluqobo lunye. 2. Lina bokhokho bakhe lani zihlobo zakhe,
abakuNkulunkulu mhlangabezeni.
3. Wena mngcwele wakhe mhlangabezâ`osephuma
ezilingweni zalumhlaba. 
J. Nyathi
Y.title: Yamukelani nansi inceku

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Yilolâ`ukholo lwethu, (3x)
UKristu wasifela, uKristu wavuka,
UKristu uzabuyâ`abuye
kalidunyiswâ`ibizo lakhe (2x)
Bass: Ufanelâ`ukudunyiswa, ufanelâ`ukubongwa. 1. ULizwi, waba yiNyama,
wahlala phakathi kwethu, wabanguMuntu njengathi ukuzâ`asisindise ebubini.

2. Wathâ`elesimo sikaNkulunkulu, akwaba yintwâ`ayiphangayo, wazehlisa wabangumyanga, ngenxa yethu thina zoni.
3. Engumuntu, wazithoba, walalelâ`uNkulunkulu,
intando kaYise,
wayifuna kwaze kwabâ`esâ`phambanweni.
4. UJesu Kristu, wasifela esâ`phambanwenâ`esingcwele, wabuye wavuka, ekufeni, wasitholela ukuphila.
5. Hlanganani, zizwe zonke, esâ`phambanweni seNkosi, hubelani ngehubâ` elitsha, lokubongâ`uNkulunkulu.
6. Emhlabeni lasezulwini, wonkâ`amadolo azaguqa, indimi, zonke, zizavuma, ukuthâ`uJesu uyiNkosi.
(Joha 1,14;Fi12, 6-8) M. Mkandla
Y.title: Yilolâ` ukholo lwethu (654)

Y.lyrics:
1. Yehlaninike, zithunywa, lizosifundisa sonke. Izingoma zaphezulu, zokumkhonzâ`uJesu Kristu. Khona kuzahlabelela, izindimi zonke zithi: Adunyiswâ`uJesu Kristu okuleliSakramente.
2. Butho lamaSerafine, butho lamaKherubhini, lina elivuthâ`uthando, lokumthandâ`uNkulunkulu. Vuthelani lolo thando, lasenhliziyweni zethu. Adunyiswâ`uJesu Kristu, okuleli Sakramente.
3. E! maxuku ezithunywa, elibona ezulwini, uMsindisi wethâ`uJesu, likhuleka kuye njalo; lisisize ukumkhonza, yenâ`ofihlakele lapha. Adunyiswâ`uJesu Kristu, okuleliSakramente.
Y.title: Yehlanini zithunywa

Y.lyrics:
Chorus: Yamukelani nansi inceku yenu esithethwe
kulumhlaba (2x)
Bass: Yemukelani nansi inceku yenu... kulumhlaba 1. Lina zithunywa limcelele kuJesu Kristu,
lakuMoya oyiNgcwele abaluqobo lunye. 2. Lina bokhokho bakhe lani zihlobo zakhe,
abakuNkulunkulu mhlangabezeni.
3. Wena mngcwele wakhe mhlangabezâ`osephuma
ezilingweni zalumhlaba.
J. Nyathi
Y.title: Yamukelani nansi inceku

Z.lyrics:
1. Zwanini kuyahlatshelwa, emangweni laphaya. Bathi yimpi yezithunywa, izingoma zithini?
Chorus: Gloria in excelsis Deo! (2x).
2. Abelusi abathile, babonilâ` izithunywa;
zathi zona: Lingesabi, kuzelwe uMsindisi. 3. Hambani liyâ`estebeleni, lizaficâ`uMariya,
loMntwana wakhe omuhle, uMsindisi wabantu.
Z.title: Zwanini kuyahlatshelwa

Z.lyrics:
Chorus: Zonke izinto zenziwa nguLizwi. (2x) Ngaphandle kwakhe kakwenziwanga lutho, lakho konke okwenziweyo.
1. Ukuphila kwakukuye njalo kuyikukhanya kwabantu. 2. Yena wayekhona kuqala umhlaba wenziwa ngaye. 3. ULizwi waba yinyama wahlala phakathi kwethu.
4. Sabona inkazimulo yakhe injengeyozelwe yedwa uJesu. 5. Weza kwabakhe kodwa, abakhe kabamamukelanga. 6. Umlayo wanikwa ngoMose, umusa leqiniso kweza
ngoJesu Kristu.
Joha 1,1-14) P. Khumalo
Z.title: Zonke izinto zenziwa nguLizwi (130)

Z.lyrics:
Chorus: Zikhethele Jesu, Jesu, zikhethele Jesu, Jesu, zikhethele Jesu, phakathi kwethu.
1. Hlanganisa Baba, abantwana bakho, babe moya munye, ngebizo lakho Jesu.
2. Thelâ`umoya wakho, enzikini kithi, khetha phela wena abalandeli bakho.
3. Wenâ`olobubele, siqinisa lathi, silandele wena, ngothando langezenzo.
4. Jesu Nkosi yethu, sikhuthaza lathi, singakudanisi ngesono esikhulu.
5. Yenza sikuthande, insuku ngensuku, sidumise wena, Mdabuli wakho konke.
6. Adunyiswâ`uYise, leNdodana yakhe,
loMoya oNgcwele, abanguNkulunkulu munye.
W. Hlabano
Z.title: Zikhethele Jesu (229)
